32a3(dkon brtsegs): shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sem
32a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa thabs la mkhas
32a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi na/ thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa lags/ de skad ces
32a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so
32a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan
32a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bde ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong
32b1(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/
32b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dri bar sems pa ni rigs kyi bu yang khyod legs so// rigs
32b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la gzung shig dang / ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa khyod la bshad
32b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom
32b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni zan kham cig tsam yang
32b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la sbyin par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ gang gi tshe
32b7(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zad kham cig tsam sbyin par byed na yang / de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin par byed cing / dge ba'i
32b8(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya bar yongs su sngo ba'i phyir ro// de rgyu gnyis kyis ni sems can thams cad
33a1(dkon brtsegs): la yongs su sngo bar byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis ste/ rig
33a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas
33a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa mngon par 'dus byas pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed cing / rjes su yi rang nas kyang sems cad thams cad la yongs su btang te/ yongs su sngo zhing
33a4(dkon brtsegs): bar yang byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sbyin pa dang / sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang
33a5(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon par byed la/ len pa po gang dag yin de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed do// rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la ma
33a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / spos kyi shing
33a7(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dag gir ma byas shing yongs su ma bzung ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yod
33a8(dkon brtsegs): su bzung zhing yongs su bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang gtong bar byed de/ yongs su btang
33b1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do// phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phre
33b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongs su bzung ba dang bcas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi dri rlung gis btab pa'i ngad de dag kyang
33b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis thams
33b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ tshul khrim dang
33b5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de byang chub sems
33b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ phyogs
33b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas//
33b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus te/ 'chags par byed cing / 'di ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang dag yin
34a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad bdag gi lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag bde bar gyur cig ces go cha gyon par yang byed do// /
34a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas/
34a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag yang dag par bsdus te/ rjes su yi rang bar byed cing / rjes su yi rang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams
34a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sngo bar byed do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde
34a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yo byad rnams thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
34a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/
34a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 'di ltar so sor rtogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings gcig la nges par byung ba dang / tshul khrims
34a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gcig pa dang / shes rab gcig pa dang / rnam par grol ba gcig pa dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba gcig pa dang / ye shes
34b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa dang / rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do// des de ltar so sor brtags nas 'di ltar shes par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig phyag byas/
34b2(dkon brtsegs): bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/ bsnyen bkur byas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / bkur bsti byas pa dang /
34b3(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas pa dang / ri mor byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkha
34b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsams pas yongs su bzung nas thams cad
34b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o thabs la mkhyes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
34b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ gang gi tshe blo rtul bar gyur na yang de bdag nyid khyad du gsod par mi byed cing zhum par mi byed par/ de tha na tshig
34b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la yang mi 'jug par mi byed cing de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig pu 'di'i don gang
34b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do// des de ltar tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kha ton du bslabs nas
35a1(dkon brtsegs): zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po bskyed de/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / grags pa 'dod pa med pas/ grong dang /
35a2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skye bo mang po la tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa de rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed cing
35a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/ sems can gang su dag gis bdag gis tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa
35a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/ sems can gang su dag gis bdag gi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di
35a5(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par yang byed do// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs la
35a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas yongs su zin pa des sems can thams cad kun dga' bo ltar mang du thos par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de
35a7(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/
35a8(dkon brtsegs): gal te brgya la brgya lam na dbul por gyur na yang des za na gzhan gyi las kyang byas te kha zas nal ze gang tsam yang blangs nas/ zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun nam/
35b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed do// phul nas kyang de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rgya chen pos byin na/ sbyin pa yang rgya chen por 'gyuraro
35b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs pas na/ 'di ltar bdag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di ni chung mod kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis byin pas/ dpag tu med pa 'gyur ro snyam du so sor
35b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog par byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems tshad med par gyur pa des/ kha zas nal ze gang tsam po sbyin par byed cing bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang
35b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad 'di lta ste dper na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta bu bzhin du
35b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing lag na rin po che grub par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do// de dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
35b6(dkon brtsegs): du yongs su bsngos pa des/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i se bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur la/
35b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ lag na rin po che yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
35b8(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
36a1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur kyang / de dag la dga' bar mi byed cing / gal
36a2(dkon brtsegs): te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur lhag par yod la bdag la de lta ma yin par mthong na yang / de rgya gnyis
36a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag la rtog par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas bcom
36a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams las nges par byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yin no snyam du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing de 'di ltar so sor rtog pa yang byed de/
36a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir ni bdag nyid shin tu mchog dang shin tu gtso bo yin gyi 'di dag ni ma yin no// 'di dag ni bdag gi pa'i
36a6(dkon brtsegs): nor gyi phung po la yongs su spyod par byed pa yin pas/ bdag gis 'di dag la dga' bar yang mi bya la/ 'di dag la phrag dog kyang mi bya'o snyam du so sor rtog par byed do//
36a7(dkon brtsegs): des lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa des gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyur la/ bsnyen bkur ma byas kyang zhum por mi
36a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa/ kun tu 'dzin par mdzad pa lta bu'i rdzasu chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang
36b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas//
36b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ sbyin pa sbyin pa bas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drag po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ci ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems
36b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe slongs mo pa mthong ba na/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs te/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcod
36b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing / gtong ba chen po yang spel bar byed la/ sbyin no snyam pa'i sems kyang bskyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//
36b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa smin par byed pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag yin pa de dag
36b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims la 'god par byed cing sbyin pa byin nas/ 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i tshul
36b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang / le lo med
36b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni nga'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//
37a1(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / myang ba dag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par bsgrub par byed cing /
37a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsol bar byed pa dang / lus kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / sems kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i brtson 'grus
37a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// byin pa gang yin pa de la sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang / rnam par
37a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// sbyin pa byin nas chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed de/ sus byin/ su
37a5(dkon brtsegs): la byin/ ci zhig byin/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa sus myong bar 'gyur zhes chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed cing / des de ltar yongs su btsal nas kyang /
37a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis byin pa dang / gang la byin pa dang / ci zhig byin pa dang / de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar byed pa gang yin pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni de'i
37a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa sbyin pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
37a8(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces
37b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa gang gis sems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las
37b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin par bgyid la/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
37b3(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa de ni ngo mtshar legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
37b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ thabs la mkhas pa dang thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/ sbyin pa chung du yang chen por byed la/ chen po ni dpag tu
37b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / grangs med par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
37b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam na/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang ngam/ sems kun
37b7(dkon brtsegs): tu rmongs pas nyes pa byung na yang 'di ltar so sor slob ste/ gal te bdag phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na ni//
37b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na bdag gis yongs su gdung bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis 'di ltar go cha bgo ba bya ste/ bdag sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
38a1(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar bya ba la bdag gis sems zhum par mi bya/ 'jigs par mi bya/ sems skrag par
38a2(dkon brtsegs): mi bya/ yongs su gdung bar mi bya zhing / ci lta ci ltar 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / nyes pa 'di yang chos
38a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du phyir bya zhing / phyin cad kyang nyes pa mi byung bar bya ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes go cha
38a4(dkon brtsegs): gyon par byed do// rigs kyi bu yongs su brtags pa nye bar bzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad
38a5(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur na yang thabs la mkhas des sel bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa' la nyes med ces smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
38a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang
38a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang bcas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab
38a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la slob par byed pa na/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar byed cing sems can thams cad kyi legs par smras pa dang / nyes par smras so cog
38b1(dkon brtsegs): bzod par byed du zin kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i
38b2(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa lci ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa byang bar gyur pa ni/ phung po dang / khams dang /
38b3(dkon brtsegs): skye mched de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ni skal pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
38b4(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa dag ma bshegs/ ma spangs kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal pa med cing sangs
38b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyis thob par 'gyur ba'i skal pa med de/ de ni gnas med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
38b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/ mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/
38b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du ma mdzad pa chung zad kyang mi mnga' lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces dge slong gis nyes pa byung ba mthong na bcab par mi bya bar
38b8(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smros shig ces bka' stsal lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan
39a1(dkon brtsegs): @yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi slad du mchi ba na grong khyer gzhan zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can
39a2(dkon brtsegs): rab mchog rgyal po zhes bgyi ba khri'i steng na bud med cig dang lhan cig mchis pa mthong ba de bdag byams pa dang ldan pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom
39a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gsol lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig de skad ces gsol nas/ ring po ma lon par/ de nas de'i modo la sa chen po 'di rnam pa
39a4(dkon brtsegs): drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun
39a5(dkon brtsegs): srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyes pa'i chos dang
39a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa bar snang la 'dug par nus snyam 'am/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras
39a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ tshe dang ldan ldan pa kun dga' bo 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa dris shig/
39a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to//
39b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gtso bo chen po'i 'di lta bu la nongs par yongs su glengs pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/
39b2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa gang lags pa de/ nongs pa la nongs par yongs su gzung du gsol/ de nas
39b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa
39b4(dkon brtsegs): dag la nyes pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gcig pu zla med par zhi gnas kyi gnas pas gnas
39b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba la bar chad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa/
39b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa/ bud med kyi 'khor dam pa'i nang du 'dug cing / dga' bo dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa yang thams cad
39b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid la bar du gcod pa med par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni dkon mchog
39b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum po'o// gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
40a1(dkon brtsegs): la ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor gang yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg
40a2(dkon brtsegs): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur
40a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod par byed pa mthong na/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu yi dbang po lnga dang ldan zhing gnas pa yin par shes par bya'o// kun
40a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po khri gcig gi steng na bud med dang lhan cig 'dug pa gyur pa yang nyon cig/ kun dga' bo bud med de ni
40a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs lnga brgyar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de la
40a6(dkon brtsegs): lhag par sems kyis 'brel par gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po de'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang / tshul khrims kyi stobs bskyed pa mthong nas/
40a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas/ de gcig pu dben par 'dug pa na/ 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog
40a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bdag dang / lhan cig khri gcig gi steng na 'dug par gyur na/ bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o snyam mo// de nas
40b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa sems kyis shes nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / snga dro'i dus kyi tshe
40b2(dkon brtsegs): shams thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod
40b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyi phyir rgya ba na/ sring mo de'i khyim ga la ba der zhugs nas/ rang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / pha rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig
40b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin pa'i chos kyi sgo 'dis/ des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis/ lag pa g.yas pas sring mo do bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do// 'khor ma thag tu des de'i tshe tshigs
40b5(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// sangs rgyas 'dod la bsngags mi mdzad// de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin// 'dod la srid pa spangs byas nas// mi mchog sangs rgyas
40b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams su 'gyur// kun dga' bo de nas sring mo des tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas khri de las babs nas/ byang chub sems
40b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod gang sangs rgyas smad pa dag/ slan cad don tu
40b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyer mi bgyid// 'dod la sred pa spangs bgyis nas// mi mchog sangs rgyas grub gyur cig/ bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i// nod pa de ni khyod la 'chags//
41a1(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kun la sman slad du// bdag ni byang chub 'dun pa skyed// kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos
41a2(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa des/ sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag
41a3(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu bzhag nas stan las langs te song ngo // kun dga' bo de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos te/ kun dga' bo nga ni sring mo de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi
41a4(dkon brtsegs): lus bsgyur te bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang
41a5(dkon brtsegs): bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / des byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang sems can mi dge ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan
41a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to// kun dga' bo rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gang gzung ba log par ltung ba'i chos su 'gyur
41a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
41a8(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po la
41b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bgyi lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag ni 'di snyam du/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa yang dag par
41b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i slad du 'di lta bu'i nongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nongs pa ji lta bu 'byung bas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par 'gyur
41b3(dkon brtsegs): yang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni nongs pa 'byung ba de dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro bar bgyi lags kyi/ sam
41b4(dkon brtsegs): gcan gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btang ba la ni ma lags so snyam du sems lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab
41b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legaso legs so// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa ni nyes pa'i chos dang ldan par
41b6(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur la// nyes pa thams cad spongs par yang byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs
41b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgya che ba dang / dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba
41b8(dkon brtsegs): zhig byung bar gyur te/ des lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du nags 'dab dag tu tshangs par spyad pa sprad nas/ de lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de dag 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang leg
42a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor ces bya bar zhugs so// de grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa na/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes
42a2(dkon brtsegs): pa blta na sdug pa de mthong nas/ de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te/ rkang pa la gtugs so// /
42a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo khyod ci 'dod/ des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u kho mo ni khyod la
42a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa rnams don tu gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ kho bo ni tshangs par spyod pa yin no// des de la 'di skad ces smraso// /
42a5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u gal te khyod dang lhan cig tu 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur
42a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas/ deng brtul zhugs bshig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des bu mo de
42a7(dkon brtsegs): mthus spangs te bor nas/ gom pa bdun bor ba dang / de gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje skyes par nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis rtul zhugs bshig ste sems can
42a8(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang / bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzod par bya zhing bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus byed par
42b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des/ de nas phyir log ste/ lag pa g.yas pas bu mo de bzung nas/ de la 'di skad ces smras so//
42b2(dkon brtsegs): bzung mo longs shig dang / kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o// de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas/ yang mngon par byung ste/
42b3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bskyed nas/ de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar
42b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang / the tsom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze khye'u
42b5(dkon brtsegs): skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to// shog kya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma ni de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
42b6(dkon brtsegs): des chung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba bsnyil cing spangs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan dag gis sems can dmyal bar
42b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang /
42b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong sha ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu dag thabs la
43a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas
43a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor bo 'jig gi gsung rab la dge
43a3(dkon brtsegs): slong dri ma med ces bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung bar gyur to/ dgon pa'i phug zhig na gnas so// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/ de'i tshe/
43a4(dkon brtsegs): na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing char chen po bab par gyur to// de nas bud med gnyis shig grong bar gyi lam na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bskyab pa'i phyir
43a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhags te/ phug de nas phyir byang ba dang / drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med de gnyis dge slong dri ma med kyi phug nas phyir byang
43a6(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du/ e ma'o dge slong dri ma med pa 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa/ mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyam
43a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ tha pa dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de nas dge slong dri ma med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas//
43a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe steng gi bar snang gi na mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa/ drang srong de dag gis mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
43b1(dkon brtsegs): cag gis bstan chos dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pas ni steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so// zhes byung ngo snyam nas de dag gis de'i mang la/
43b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dri mod kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te nyes pa la nyes par bshags so// rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri med de de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phag
43b3(dkon brtsegs): te 'dug par ma gyur na ni/ drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du
43b4(dkon brtsegs): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tsom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// /
43b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong dri med ces bya ba der gyur to// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des khyod kyis 'di ltar/
43b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te dge slong sha ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can
43b7(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes 'jug
43b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ smad 'tshong ma sgyu rtsal drug bcurtsa
44a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i bya ba bshes shing legs par logs pa ni/ de'i 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs/
44a2(dkon brtsegs): su btang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang / ci srid du skyes bu de las don thams cad bgrubs kyi bar du/ de la yo byad thams cad kyang sra bar mi byed pa de lta de ltar gnas par byed do//
44a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu de la mi lta mi sems par spong bar mi byed cing / de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
44a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang / thabs la mkhas pa des sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar shes te/ rnam grangs des
44a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du drang du sbyor ba byed cing / de dag la yo byad thams cad kyang mi sri bar byed do// sems can rnams kyi dge ba la dga' bas//
44a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyang yongs su nyams gtong bar byed kyi yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no// gang gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas par gyur pa dag ste/
44a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gis phyir yongasu nyams par byed mi nus par shes nas ni/ de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo thams cad la mi lta bar spangs te/ 'gro zhing de dang 'brel
44a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis gnas par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongs su nyams pa med la/ myu gu 'byung ba'i
44b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa med pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang /
44b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gdungs na/ de 'dod pa'i yon ton dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon
44b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dud 'gro'i skye
44b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas su song ba'i srog chags bung ba ni me tog thams cad las dri sno ma zhing ro mong byed kyang / gang la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed
44b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed cing / de dag las dri dang mdab ma dang / sdong bu dang me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang
44b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod par byed kyang de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi
44b7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed par yang mi byed la/ bdag kyang smras par mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang smras par mi 'gyur bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lte ste dper na/ nya ba
44b8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni/ srang bu gcig la gzan ma btags te/ mchil ba byas nas mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro// de srad pu legs par bsrungs pa gci
45a1(dkon brtsegs): po des/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na/ mtsho chen po nas mchil pa de 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
45a2(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i
45a3(dkon brtsegs): sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtad pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug par byed kyang / de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrung
45a4(dkon brtsegs): ba des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu rigs sngags
45a5(dkon brtsegs): dang gsang sngags 'chang ba ni rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bzung ste/ zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang de ni gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe na rigs
45a6(dkon brtsegs): sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis chings ma de dag thams cad bcad nas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang/
45a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba myong bar byed cing de
45a8(dkon brtsegs): dag dang 'dres par gnas par byed kyang / de gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na/ shes rab kyi rigs sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
45b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bcad de/ de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye
45b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon legs par bslabs pa zhig/ ral gyi rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa gcig thogs te/ 'dron pa mang
45b3(dkon brtsegs): po sgrol bar byed pa de ni sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje che ba dang / brnyas pa'i
45b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces gzhu yang med/ ral gyi yang med/ dong pa yang med/ 'khor yang med pa 'dis ni 'dron pa 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus te/
45b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/ 'dron pa thams cad bsgral ba dang / chom rgan pa'i sde pham par bya ba lta ci smos ste/ de ni gnas med pas 'di ni
45b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar gyur la/ de nas 'phong gi slob dpon de 'brog dgon par song ste/ chom rgan pa'i tshogs lhags par gyur pa na mda'
45b7(dkon brtsegs): zhu thogs te/ go cha sra ba bgos nas mtshon cha de gzas te chom rkun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing / de chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang phral nas/ yang
45b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ shes
46a1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/ thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga'
46a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa byed pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe/ de
46a3(dkon brtsegs): dag de la ma dad pa dang / snying rje bskyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'di ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/
46a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing / bdud kyi sde pham par byed par lta ga la 'gyur te/ da ni gnas med pas/ 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes
46a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang zer mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na/ shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon
46a6(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad dral zhing rab tu gtugs nas/ shes rab dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang bral ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su
46a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do// gtan 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por
46a8(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/ de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ tshong dpon zhig gi khyim du phyin pa dang / tshong dpon de la bu mo dpal yon cam
46b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi mchog ces bya ba phyugs cung zhig yod par gyur pa khang bzangs kyi steng na 'deg pa des/ dge slong de'i skad thos nas/ bsod snyoms thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dag
46b2(dkon brtsegs): byed ga la ba der song ngo / 1/ dpe byad las byad bzhin dang sgra skad dang kha dog gi mtshan ma bzung ba dang / de 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis
46b3(dkon brtsegs): kun nas bslang ba'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gtugs pa'i sems dang / 'dod tshogs kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pas/
46b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo dpal yon gyi mchog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong ma thag tu/ 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis/ gya/ lus rdul bar gyur nas/ 'greng zhing
46b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong nas/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog
46b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas/ yud tsam zhig na de la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ chos gang la chags par gyur pa'i chos de
46b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin/ ci mig la chags sam/ mig ni chags pa ma yin te/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ sems dpa' med pa/ 'dus byas pa dang / rim pa bdun pa
46b8(dkon brtsegs): sha'i ri lu yin te/ mig de ni rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir/ sems dpar mi byed/ tshor bar mi byed do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / pags pa dang /
47a1(dkon brtsegs): mdog dang / sha yang de dang 'dra ste/ des rkang mthil yan cad/ glad pa man cad kyi bar la so sor brtags nas/ nad dang phyi rol na gang
47a2(dkon brtsegs): chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs so// des ma dmigs nas 'dod chags kyi sems de dang bral bar gyur
47a3(dkon brtsegs): cing / des sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas/ chos thams cad ma skyes par rig nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dga'
47a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po lan bdun du bskor ba byas nas/ nam
47a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' de nyid las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga'
47a6(dkon brtsegs): byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod
47a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/
47a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed 'dis ni 'dod chag
47b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems la brten te/ chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas/ bdud kyi sde btul cing chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to// de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog 'chi ba'i
47b2(dkon brtsegs): dus byas nas/ bud med kyi lus spangs te/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thob cing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// skyes ma
47b3(dkon brtsegs): thag tu de la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa yang byung bar gyur/ de'i rim gro byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ma lha'i bu mo khri bzhi stong yang nye
47b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas par gyur to// de'i mod la nges bdag gis las ci zhig byas shing bstsags pas 'dir skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang / de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag ni
47b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por chod dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las/ de na bdag gis kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed bltas
47b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bud med kyi lus rjes te/ bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing /
47b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la 'byor pa dpag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas/ sngon gyi las rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du
47b8(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ 'dod chags kyi sems las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
48a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' byed la phyag byas shing bsnyen bkur byas na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag 'dod pas dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spod
48a2(dkon brtsegs): cing bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ni/ bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin zhing mi rigs kyis/ bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
48a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu de la 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa
48a4(dkon brtsegs): dag thogs te bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der song nas/ kha dog shin tu 'phags pa shin tu 'phags pa'i snang ba chen
48a5(dkon brtsegs): pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal snang bar byas te/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom
48a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / dge slong gi dge 'a
48a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pa la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo pug phug por sbar nas/ de'i tshe tshig
48a8(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab// byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab// bde gshegs rnams kyi chos kyang bas
48b1(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab// grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab// mnyan yod du ni bdag sngon bu mor gyur// tshong dpon bu mo dpal yon mchog ces bgyi// mdzes shing thog mar phyugs
48b2(dkon brtsegs): chung gyur pa lags// pha ma'i glo bar mchi zhing rab tu byams// sangs rgyas sras po smad par ma gyur pa// mthu chen dga' byed ces bgyi gang lags pa// bsod snyoms spyod cing
48b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe// de ni bdag gi pha'i khyim du mchis// skad snyan yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas// bdag cag sems kyis bsod snyoms thogs nas ni// de bzhin gshogs pa'i
48b4(dkon brtsegs): sras po gang lags pa// dga' byed mthu chen ga la mchis par mchis// mthong ma thag tu bdag ni 'dod chags dang // ldan pa tshul bzhin ma lags sems skyes te// gal te ji ltar bsam
48b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma 'jal na// srog la mi lta 'gum pa'i dus bgyid snyam// tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab gdungs nas// de la bka' mching brjod par bgyi ba dang // bsod snyoms
48b6(dkon brtsegs): stsol ba'i rdo yang ma thogs lags// rdul byung der ni 'greng bzhin gum par gyur// bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phor gyur pa'i tshe// skad cig de la bud med lus spangs te// shi 'pho
48b7(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris 'jig rten skyes gyur nas// bdag gis 'od gsal skyes pa 'di nyid thob// rin chen sna tshogs blta na sdug pa'i// gzhal med khang mchog mdzes par grub gyur cing /
48b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha'i bu mo ni// khri dang bzhi stong tshang ba'ang byung bar gyur// bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyur pa ni// sug las gang gi rnams smin 'di 'dra ba// rjes su
49a1(dkon brtsegs): dran nas ngan bu 'di snyam bgyid// chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste// dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la// chags bcas
49a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis bdag gis bltas gyur pas// sug las de'i rnam smin bzang po des// ngan bu gzi brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas// chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di
49a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra na// gang gis de la mchod bgyis ci smos te// gang la bde gshegs mkhyen pa 'jug gyur pa// de ni nyan thos rang rgyal sa ma lags// ngan bu de bzhin gshegs
49a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyan sngar ni// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog rab bsgrub pa dang // bskal pa gang ga'i byed snyed spyad bgyi bar// bdag gi dam bcas 'di ni spang mi bgyi// dge
49a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen dga' byed dam pa la// chos kyi mchod pa mchog gis mchod par bgyi// gang dag byang chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs pa// gzhan gyis 'di la 'dren
49a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams mchod mi 'gyur// bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni// bdag la rtog pa bud med lus bsgyur nas// de kun 'jigs med skyes pa thob 'gyur bar//
49a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyad mchog dam pa spyad par bgyi// lus rdul shi bar gyur pa mthong nas ni// bu mo'i pha mtsho des 'debs byed cing // dge slong de yis byad ste ma yin snyam ste/
49a8(dkon brtsegs): du ngu zhing dge slong rnams la mi snyan brjod// sangs rgyas mthu yis lha'i bu de ni// song nas pha ma dag la tshig smras pa// dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ba med// yun
49b1(dkon brtsegs): ring sdug bsngal 'grub par ma byed cig/ bu mo dpal yon shi 'phos gang yin de// sum cu rtsa gsum skal pa mnyam gyur cing // des ni bud med lus kyang spangs/
49b2(dkon brtsegs): byas te// de ni lha'i bu mo 'od gsal gyur// bde bar gshegs kyi spyan sngar khyed deng la// khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa 'di shogs shig/ sangs rgyas mi mchog
49b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni ma gtogs par// sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnas gzhan med// 'jigs med de yis legs par bskul bas pas// pha ma gnyis kyis sangs
49b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas sgra thos nas// nye du tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur te// shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar dang bar gyur// mi mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// khro ba'i
49b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi nyes pa bshags byas nas// de bzhin gshegs la gus dang bcas byas te// bde gshegs rab byung la ni zhu nus pa// ci tsam gyis ni 'dren pa mchod
49b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// chos dang dge 'dun ji ltar mchod pa lags// zhus pa de'i lan ni stsal tu gsol// thos nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags// rgyal bas de dag
49b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dag mkhyen nas// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa// de yis brtan par byang chub sems
49b8(dkon brtsegs): skyed cig/ bu mo pham+ba dang nye du ni// lnga brgya tshang ba nyung ba ma yin pas// skyes bu khyu mchog de'i gsung thos nas// byang chub phyir ni sems kyang brtan par bskyed//
50a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas kun dga' bzang la bka' stsal ba// kun dga' ci skad bshad pa 'di nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
50a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas te// shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'ang de bzhin no// dga' byed smon lam yang dang yang 'debs pa// bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni//
50a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas// de dag myur du skyes bu 'jigs med shog/ bud med cig min gnyis dang gsum min te// bye ba khrag khrig stong
50a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang po rnams// gang dag dga' byed la ni chags gyur po// de dag thams cad shi 'phos skyes par gyur// kun dga' 'dod chags bskyed pa gang gis ni//
50a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis dpa' rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing // skyes par 'gyur ba'i yon tan de 'dra ltos// lha'i
50a6(dkon brtsegs): bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// des ni sangs rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas// rgyal ba blta na mdzes shes
50a7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar 'gyur// lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa// de dag mi mchog rnams su 'byung 'gyur bas// gang la dang byas bde ba bsam yas pa'i// 'jig
50a8(dkon brtsegs): rten mgon la su zhig gus mi byed// gang dag nyon mongs rnams kyang bde sbyin no// gang dag gus byed de la ci smos pa// grags chen dpal gyi rgyal po lta bu yi/
50b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la su sdang skyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
50b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/
50b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dog tu kha
50b4(dkon brtsegs): dog gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/
50b5(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na yang / de dag
50b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha dog tu sems gcig tu 'gyur ba lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan cad
50b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra bar 'dzin lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ sman gyi rigs chen
50b8(dkon brtsegs): po blta na mdzes shes bgyi ba mchis te/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis
51a1(dkon brtsegs): thebs pa gang la la dag gis de mthong na/ de dag thams cad kyi blo nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan
51a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag thams cad
51a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i bro nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
51a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa de bzhin te leg so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa
51a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas
51a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du/ 'dod pa'i khams na yang kun tu mnga' ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa
51a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang
51a8(dkon brtsegs): reg par mi bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po yang kun tu skyed par bgyid la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la yang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
51b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar lags te/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
51b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chags pa thams cad srung bar byed cing / 'di lta ste gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i chags pa dag la spyod par bgyid kyang
51b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems
51b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te/ dpe 'ba' zhig brjod lags so// bde bar gshegs pa spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung
51b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod spobs par bgyis shig/ 'od srung chen pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ 'brog dgon pa chen po zhig mchis par gyur la/ 'brog
51b6(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa chen po de la yang srid pa'i rtse mo la mnyam pa'i ra ba mchis par gyur cing / pa 'brog dgon pa chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhig zhugs par gyur la/
51b7(dkon brtsegs): 'brog dgon pa chen po de yang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa chen po de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ grong khyer chen po pa yang 'byor pa
51b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa/ gsang lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos kun tu bltam pa nyams dga' zhig kyang mchis par gyur la/ grong khyer chen po do yang chab sgo ni gcig mchis par
52a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / gang dag grong khyer chen po der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni dga' ba dang / 'gum pa ma mchis par 'gyur la/ grong khyer
52a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po de na yang mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul shin tu dog cing nyam nga ba zhig kyang mchis shing de'i g.yas g.yon na/ khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i ga yang sa chen po
52a3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang mchis par gyur la/ de nas 'brog dgon pa chen po de'i dbus nas/ sems can mkhas pa zhib pa glo ba gzhungs pa/ sems can thams cad la don tu/
52a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar 'tshal ba/ sman par 'tshal ba/ bde bar 'tshal ba/ grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba/ sman par 'tshal ba/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa cig cig byung ba
52a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ des 'brog dgon pa chen po der 'di skad ces/ kye grogs po dag kho bo ni khyed cag gi yongs su skyob pa yin te/ 'brog dgon pa chen po 'di nas ha cang
52a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mi ring ba na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig yod de/ gang dag der zhugs pa gyur pa de dag ni rga ba med pa dang / 'chi
52a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med par 'gyur zhing sems can dpag tu med pa rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par 'gyur ba/
52a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can shes pa dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg/ grong khyer chen po der 'dong do zhes sgra bsgrags shing / skad kyis go bar bgyis par gyur na/ de na sems can
52b1(dkon brtsegs): dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gang dag lags pa de dag ni/ 'di skad ces bdag cag 'di nas kyang mi g.yo bar gdams shing rjes su bstan
52b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang 'tshal la/ bdag cag 'di nas gnas bzhin du grong khyer de na mchis pa'i yon tan de dag kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces mchi lags so// sems can rgya chen
52b3(dkon brtsegs): po la mos pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni/ 'di skad ces bdag cag ni/ khyod ji lta ba bzhin du grong khyer der mchi'o zhes mchi lags so// sems can bsod nams
52b4(dkon brtsegs): chung ba gang dag lags pa de dag ni sgra de nyan cing / thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid cing / skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de'i slad bzhin du mchi bar mi bgyid
52b5(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ de nas skyes bu mkhas ga yang sa chen po de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas/ des g.yas g.yon gyi ga yang sa de dag rtsig pa dang / spang leb kyis
52b6(dkon brtsegs): bkum ste/ rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las 'da' bar bgyid la/ g.yas g.yon su yang mi lta bar slad bzhin du phyir rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs
52b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ston pa dag mchi yang / slar yang mi lta la/ skyo zhing yid byung ba yang ma mchis par der shul mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci lta ci ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta
52b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar/ grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur la/ ci lta ci ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par
53a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing grong khyer der zhugs na/ rga ba dang / 'gum pa dang / bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis/
53a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi don bgyid cing skye ba dang / rga ba dang / bro 'tshal ba dang / 'gum pa las yang yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston par bgyid pa zhig mchis na//
53a3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la 'brog dgon pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni 'khor ba'i dgon pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba zhes
53a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// 'brog dgon pa chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhugs par gyur pa zhes
53a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba de ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas leg so// 'brog dgon pa chen po de la yang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing zhes bgyi ba
53a6(dkon brtsegs): de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bgrod pa gcig pa'i shul blta bar bgyi lagaso// skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems
53a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blta bar bgyi lags so// sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par byung ba'i bsam pa can gnas de las kyang mi g.yo la grong khyer gyi
53a8(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yang 'chal pa de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar bgyi lags so// sems can rgya chen po la mos pa tshig 'di skad
53b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bdag cag ni khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer der mchi lags so zhes mchi ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag blta
53b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi lagaso// sems can bsod nams chung ngu sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu/
53b3(dkon brtsegs): dag gi tshig bla dgas so// 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par bsngos pa'i sems kyis
53b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa blta bar bgyi lags so// mtho gde tsam gyi tshad kyi shul zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni chos kyi dbyings blta bar bgyi lags so//
53b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i ga yang sa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa rnams blta bar bgyi
53b6(dkon brtsegs): lags so// g.yas g.yon gyi ga yang sa de dag rtsig pa dang spang leb kyis bkum ste zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
53b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa blta bar bgyi lags so// rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid la zhes bgyi ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems
53b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can dpag tu mi mchis pa rnams sdud cing yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid pa dag blta bar bgyi lags so// slad bzhin du phyir/
54a1(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi yang zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang
54a2(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bgyi la/ de bzhin du sems can sdig pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su nyon mongs pa can gyi las kun tu spyod par bgyid pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag
54a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'phya ba dang smod par bgyid par blta bar bgyi lags so// slar yang mi lta la zhes bgyi ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa'i
54a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas lags so// g.yas g.yon su yang mi lta bar zhes bgyi ng+ge ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dga' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
54a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas so// grong khyer chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong gi tshig bla dgas so// ci lta ci ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar
54a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthong
54a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / ye shes la nges par rtog par bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu legs par slong
54a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig bla dgas lagaso so// ci lta ci ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing zhes bgyi ba de ni
54b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa ma mchis shing the tsam dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so// grong khyer der zhugs na rga ba dang / 'gum pa dang / bro nad ma mchis
54b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid la/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / brond dang / 'gum pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston
54b3(dkon brtsegs): par yang bgyid ces bgyi ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan
54b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ ye shes dang ldan pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
54b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'od srung legaso legs so//
54b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba bskyed pa ni khyod legs te/ 'od srung khyod kyis dpa' rjod pa des lha dang mi rnams kyi skye
54b7(dkon brtsegs): dgu las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni
54b8(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa legs par bslabs pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gis bdag la gnod
55a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las byed cing / tshig gang gis bdag dang / gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de
55a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i tshig kyang mi smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gas
55a3(dkon brtsegs): to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig mi smra'o//
55a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od gzer 'phreng zhes bgyi bar
55a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong
55a6(dkon brtsegs): mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces gsungs na/ bcom ldan
55a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa ci las dgongs te gsungs lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
55a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshad rab tu
55b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dbye bas khyod la ci zhig bya mthong shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam
55b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ci lta ci ltar sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro//
55b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi 'on kyang legs par rab tu nyon la/ tshul bzhin du yid la zungs shig dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa
55b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
55b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad tshun cad du thabs la mkhas po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa gang yin pa de dag las/ phyogs tsam zhig bsten par bya ste/
55b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar mi mdzad mthong ma thag tu mi skye
55b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bar der/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs
55b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / shes pa zhabs pa med pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu ma skye bri'i chos la bzod pa zab pa'i byang chub sems dpo' ni 'do na/ zhag bdun gyis kyang byang chub
56a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
56a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod na bskal pa brgyas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa stong gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
56a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod na bskal pa 'bum gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
56a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod na bsam bzhin du srid pa len cing 'gro bar yang byed do// de ni thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na/ bla na med/
56a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing / 'dod na phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa brgya phrag mang por yang yid yongs
56a6(dkon brtsegs): su skyo ba med par gnas par byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang nyan thos kyang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms
56a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed mod kyi/ de ni lus g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sems g.yo ba
56a8(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur ro// nyan thos ni bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de kho nar shes par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'ju/
56b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus rgyan mi gcod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drag gis sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la/ sems
56b2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na/ snying rje chen po bskyed par yang byed de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
56b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'dug bzhin du bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar yang byed
56b4(dkon brtsegs): nus mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'dzeg par mi nus la/ lha rnam
56b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu gling du 'bab par nus so snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu gling du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de yang
56b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas/ ma'i mngal du ma zhug
56b7(dkon brtsegs): shing / mngal gyi dri mas ma reg par de kho nar de'i skad cig de nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang nus mod kyi/ de la sems
56b8(dkon brtsegs): can kha cig 'di snyam du lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ sprul pa zhig gam/ 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig snyam du/ nem nur dang yid gnyis dang / the tsom
57a1(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tsom skyes par gyur na/ nyon mongs pa yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir chos nyan par
57a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ shes par mi byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed par mi byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen ni de yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di
57a3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du byang chub sems dpa' mal gyi gnas su zhugs so snyam na/ khyod kyis ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba
57a4(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas bzhin du de snyoms par zhugs shing yongs su bsten nas/ ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs bzhin du dga' ldan gyi gnas
57a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug tu nas mod kyi/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de na de ma mthong bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs so snyams du shes
57a6(dkon brtsegs): par zad do// byang chub sems dpa' ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi g.yo bzhin du sprul pa dag gis 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa'i
57a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba thams cad kun tu ston par byed de/ de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa dag gis kun tu bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
57a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba yin pas/ phyir mngal gyi gnas su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de ci'i
57b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' glang po che thal kar du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal du 'jug par ston par byed ce na/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshig bla dgas yin no// de ci'i phyir/
57b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas na/ des ni ci nas kyang lha mi gzhan gang la yang med pa de lta bu kho nas mngal
57b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas shing dgur ma
57b4(dkon brtsegs): yin she na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du/ skye ma gzhon nu 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i dus yongs su mo rdzogs pas/ dbang po ma tshang bar gyur to snyam du sems can de
57b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi the tsom gcad pa dang / mngal gyi dus dang / dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas kyi/
57b6(dkon brtsegs): dgur ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas pa na yang / lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur
57b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' long spyod rin po che bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa
57b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i longs spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'odas pa mthong nas/ lha'i bu sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bzhi 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
58a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan brtol te/ mngal gnas//
58a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed ce na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' ni pha dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa yin gyi/ rdzus te skyes pa ma yin no snyam
58a3(dkon brtsegs): du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir ma'i mtshan brtol te/ mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun tu bstan to// byung ma thag tu lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lus la
58a4(dkon brtsegs): yang rma med cing sgo mod la/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis bde ba myong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i/ bde ba ni sngon nam yang ma
58a5(dkon brtsegs): reg cing sngon nam yang ma myong ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par gnas shing grong du ma yin/ zhe na/
58a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas dgon pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / dben pa la dga' ba dang / kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / grong du btsas na lha dang / klu dang / gnod
58a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang lha'i phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / me tog dag gi shin tu 'phags pa'i mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
58a8(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang rgyags pa dang / bag med pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma yin pa'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen
58b1(dkon brtsegs): de yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yul gyis shing klag sha'i yal ga la bzung ste/ bang ma la ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas she na/ sems can
58b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'di snyam du yum lha mo sgyu 'phral ni/ ji ltar bud med gzhan dag bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg cing byang chub sems dpa' btsas so snyam du sems pa'i sems
58b3(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gi the tsom gcad pa dang / bde bar btsas pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis shing klag sha'i yal ga la bzung ste/ bang ma la ma byas par
58b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas so// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing / skye gnas
58b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma yin/ lus kyi phyogs gzhan dag nas kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phag pa dang /
58b6(dkon brtsegs): gdul ba'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ des ni ji ltar sems can dman pa gzhan dag bzhin du ma'i mngal la brten cing gnas pa ma yin pa dang / btsa' ba ma yin pa de
58b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar skye ba bstan par ba dgos pa'i phyir te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal la brten cing gnas nas byung zhing
58b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yum lha mo skyo 'phrul gyi mtshan yang ma med cing sgro med par gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
59a1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bzung la/ mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na/
59a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar bas lha rnams 'dun par byas pas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu
59a3(dkon brtsegs): gos rin po ches gzung bar bya'o zhes sngon smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ de na byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las rgya chen po la brtson pa byed pa yin te/ de yang
59a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thab so la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/ drug kyang
59a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ brgyad kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ji ltar bzhin sus kyang sngon ma btab pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis brtson 'grus chen po dang / skyes bu
59a6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i rtsal don mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang / gom pa bdun bor bas sems can gang dag gi don gom pa drug gis kyang mi chog la brgyad kyis lhag par
59a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/ drug kyang ma yin brgyad kyang ma yin te/ de yang
