86b8(dkon brtsegs): ma khengs pa dang / thugs mnyam pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po dang / mnyen pa dang / nges pa dang / sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin pas/ bzod pa'i stobs bskyed
87a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong nas/ srog chags bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
87a2(dkon brtsegs): pas don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/ bram ze ba ra dA dzas spros pa btang snyomasu bzhag go// des kyang skyo bar byed pa bram ze ba ra da tsa de bzhin gshegs pa la sems
87a3(dkon brtsegs): dad par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas la skyabasu song zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi sa bon bskyed par gyur te/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas
87a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thams cad dang / srid pa thams cad du lhas byin yang dang yang du rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa de yang
87a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhas byin la brten nas/ nga pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs shing sems can
87a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don kyang byas pa'i phyir ro// rnams pa gang gis she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la gang gi tshe/ sems can rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur cing /
87a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe sbyin pa yang mi shes/ len pa po yang mi shes pa de'i tshen/ lhas byin byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs te/ thu drag kyang spong bar byed/ chung ma dag kyang sdung
87a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ rgyal srid dag kyang spong bar byed/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dag dang / mig dang / mgo yang slong bar byed cing / de dag la sogs pa dga' ba dang / sems
87b1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la bde ba skyed par byed pa gzhan gang rung ba dag kyang slong bar byed do// byang chub sems dpas zhum pa med par de dag sbyin par byed pa de sems can dpag tu
87b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag gis mthong nas/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ spro ba bskyed nas/ 'di ji lta ba bzhin du/ bdag cag de bzhin gyur cig ces
87b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag sbyin pa la mos shing / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par yang byed do// gzhan yang lhas byin dang sems can dpag tu med pa gang dag tshul khrims 'dral
87b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims mi 'dral ba mthong nas de dag kyang tshul khrims yang dag par len par byed pa dang / sems can de dag
87b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob pa na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas de dag la spyos sam brgyad bkag gam/ brdegs na yang 'khrug par mi 'gyur
87b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing / bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rnam grangs des kyang sems can rnams kyi don byas pa yin no// gang gi tshe lhas byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
87b7(dkon brtsegs): dkrongs pa'i phyir gshed ma pa'i mi dag spad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgrongs pa'i phyir glang po che gdug pa nor skyong bya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgrongs
87b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo 'phangs pa gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par blte bar bya'i/ lus kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa/
88a1(dkon brtsegs): na ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pa de la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi don mdzad pa'i phyir te/
88a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mdor na lhas byin de ni nga'i ston pa phan par 'dod pa yin no// las kyi rgyud bcu po thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par
88a3(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya'i/ las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can las kyi bya ba dang / rnam par smin pa chud gson pa rnams las kyi bya ba dang /
88a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams la las che go mo zhig rnam par smin pa ni 'odi yin no//
88a5(dkon brtsegs): las che go mo zhig gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes las kyi rgyud kun tu bstan te/ de thos nas sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / mi dge
88a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las la sgrib pa dang / dge ba'i las la sgrib pa dang / dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba la mi g.yel bar spyod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu thabs
88a7(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa bstan pa dang 'byung pa 'di ni gsung par bya ba yin te/ sems cad dmang po dge ba'i rtsa bu chung du rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya/ bstan par m-ig/
88a8(dkon brtsegs): bshad par mi bya/ klag par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bstadan pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas sems cad kyis yang ma yin na/ byis pas sa'i
88b1(dkon brtsegs): dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa 'di ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
88b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la 'dis don tu 'gyur ba med de/ thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di snod du 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis bstan pa 'di la bslab par bya ba ni byang chub sems
88b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma gtogs par gzhan dga' yang med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshan mo mun gnag gi nang du 'bru mar
88b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi mar me byung na/ khyim gyi snod thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas kyang thabs la mkhas pas bstan pa 'di thos na/
88b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par mthong zhing / bdag gis kyang 'di la bslab par byas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
88b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug cing 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de ni legs par yang dag par brtson pas sla'o snyam du sems pa dang / de
88b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa de dag la legs par bslabs pa dang / sems can rnams smras par mi byed pa de lta bu'i ming du yang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod mos par bya/
88b8(dkon brtsegs): khyad kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bum byang chub den tu gnyir bas ni/ gang nas thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstan pa rje
89a1(dkon brtsegs): sa du grags par 'gyur ba'i dpag cad 'bum du yang 'gro bar yang bya// da ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa/
89a2(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ snang ba thob par 'gyur zhing / be tsom dang bral ba dang / nem nur dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas
89a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'khor bzhi po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i snod tu 'gyur ba'i 'khor der 'das par gyur pa de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan
89a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur to// gang dag snod du ma gyur cing mi shes pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa de dag la ni chos kyi
89a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di rna lam du grags par yang ma gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags bdun khri nyis stong dag bla na med pa yang dag par
89a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
89a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam gra
89a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ thabs la mkhas
89b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das
89b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa
89b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang
89b4(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
89b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa byang
89b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho//
89b7(dkon brtsegs): le'u 'di la sho lo ka stong nyis brgya rtsa bcu gsum mchis// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya b+had tra pa she ShA pa ri brid can ma ma ha ya na su tra/
89b8(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ tshong dpon bzang srong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa ches
90a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
90a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khyab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/ sha ri'i bu la sogs pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ dge slong stong
90a3(dkon brtsegs): nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad na/ lus snyom pa dang /
90a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyid kyis gnas pas lus snyom mangs pa med cing / lus sdom pa med par gnas so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyigal gyi mdangs me tog pad ma
90a5(dkon brtsegs): tshal rgyas pa lta bur snang bar gyur to// de nas dge slong de dag 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi mdangs pad ma'i tshal rgyas pa lta bur snang
90a6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa las na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di chos kyi tshul ji lta bu zhig ston par dgongs shig gu snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe tshong dpon bzang skyong zhes bya ba 'khor
90a7(dkon brtsegs): tshong ba drug khri dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bang du dong ngo // de nas bzang stong shin tu gnon sha can la/ lus kyi mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa dang ldan pa bcom
90a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal ba der song gi byedan nas/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin tu zhugs pa rab tu zhi pa dang / dul ba'i yon tan ci gter du byung ga nasar
90b1(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa ltar gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong ngo // de nas bzang skyong dad pa skyes te mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid kyis 'di snyam du sems te/ kye thams cad
90b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes 'jig rten du snyan pa dag grags pa 'di ni mi brdzun no snyam ma
90b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta ba gtad te 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom
90b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bzang skyong la gzigs nas sku las 'od zer phyung ngo // 'od zer des kyang tshong dpon bzang skyong mo 'jigs pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan
90b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
90b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la da gdod dad pa thob lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags/
90b7(dkon brtsegs): pas phyogs 'ga' la re ba/ chos 'tshal ba/ 'khor ba'i gnod pa rnams kyis yongasu nyon mongs pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i shas che ba/ ngo mtshar du
90b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa can/ bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni the tsom can lags/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni som zhi can lags na/
91a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bdag rmongs par 'gyur zhing 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das ni thams
91a2(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa lags te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'grub par mdzad pas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu 'jig rten du de'u ma byung
91a3(dkon brtsegs): te byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad la ma nyes gshin pas na pha ma lta bu yang lags so// de skad ces gsol nas/
91a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang skyong de'i phyir khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang
91a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bzang skyong zhu bar 'dod pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// tshong dpon bzang skyong gzi brjid 'bar zhing
91a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs bzang po bum sum tshogs po/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas
91a7(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das bzang skyong 'di mdage bzang zhing rgyas pas rgyal ba'i dpal yang zil gyis non te/ lhag par mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//
91a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bol maka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bzang skyong 'dir bde ba'i yo byad gang yin pa dang / dan
91b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod pa gang yin pa de ni tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa ma gtogs par lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la yang med do// 'dzam bu'i/
91b2(dkon brtsegs): gling 'di na khyad par du 'phags pa rnams la yang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
91b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das tshong dpon bzang skyong 'di'i nor bu gyur pa ljags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis tshong dpon dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa
91b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'byor pa dang / longs spyod rgyas pa nyon cig/ kun dga' bo nor dang gser phun sum tshogs pa'i tshong pa drug khri 'di'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // mal khri tshon sna tshogs
91b5(dkon brtsegs): spel bas mdzes par byas pa/ smig thags can la stan nang tshangs can bting ba/ g.yas g.yos su sngas dmar po bzhag pa/ drug khri dang / bud med bgo ba dar dang /
91b6(dkon brtsegs): du gu la'i ras dang / men tri dang / mon dar dang / mos sbyangs pa'i gos dang / la tshig gu'i stod kor dang / dmar po dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snam phran can
91b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi gos gyon pa/ 'dod chags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ log mthil reg na sI zhing shin tu 'jam pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba/ dgod cing dga' ba dang /
91b8(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'tshogs shing sgeg la snyan pa'i gtam brjod pas bskyed pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas dgod par byed pa/ khyim thab la bsnyen bkur byed
92a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul gyis lus la stod par byed pa/ skyes bu gzhan la 'dod pa'i rgyud spangs pa/ 'dzem pas 'dud cing bla gos bzang po bgos
92a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gcig la gcig phrag dog gis 'thab pa dang / rtse bas bzhin khro gnyer gtsigs shing mgur ba 'gyur ba/ rka lag dang sor mo shin tu 'jam pa/ rka lag gi
92a3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs kyi bar mtshams mi mngon pa/ rkal ga rgyas pa/ skra mnyam zhing bcos la g.yas su 'khyil zhing mdzes pa/ snying chags pa dang ldan zhing shin tu
92a4(dkon brtsegs): snying nye ba/ snyan par grags pa'i rigs dang / rus las byung bas grags pa dang / legs par bskyed pa/ lus shin tu 'jam pa/ rigs mtho ba'i bud
92a5(dkon brtsegs): med rtse bar 'os pa'i khang pa dang / mal cha rgyas pa dang ldan pa drug khri dang / btso zangs drug khri gang ba'i 'bras can bzang po tshod ma shin tu dri zhim pos sna tha dad
92a6(dkon brtsegs): par phye ba/ sa lu bzang po'i chan dang / chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa lta bu'i kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong la dga' ba bskyed par byed pa//
92a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs par grub cing bsod nams kyis byung la dri nga zhing mi gtsang ba dang / lus kyi skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / mu tig pa
92a8(dkon brtsegs): bai dur+ya dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ rnam par phye la sdug cing mdzes par byas pa dang / ras spungs shing rlung gis bskyod pa'i bun long dang /
92b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog sil mas gtor pa dang / bsil ba'i chus reg na bde bas khyab pas bsil bar gyur pa/ khar rnga dang / pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang / pi bang dang /
92b2(dkon brtsegs): gling bu dang / rdza rnga chen po las byang ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dar dir dang / phug ron gyi skad yid du 'ong zhing chags su rung bas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi khri shing
92b3(dkon brtsegs): gis rtse mo dkris la/ sbrang ma sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ lha'i gnas dang / ri rab kyi brag gi bar lta bur rlung skyabs dang ldan pa'i mar mo 'bar ba'i gzi brjid dang /
92b4(dkon brtsegs): sman gyi sgron ma dang / rad pa drug khri dang / grong khyer bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang ba gam dang / srang sdug gus mdzes par byas pa/ yul sna tshogs kyi skad
92b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / spyod pa dang / zong dang / tshong khang sna tshogs spel bas mdzes par byas pa/ tshong pa'i tshogs sdong dag gis lang long du gyur pa/ nags dang shing ljon
92b6(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag gis 'khrigs pa/ ku mu ta'i me tog rgyas pa/ dri ma med pa spel bas mdzes par byas pa/ rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rtal
92b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis bun long du gyur pa drug khri yod do// kun dga' bo grong khyer de dag gi nang na/ tshong dpon dang tshong ba dang / yul gyi mi dang / ded dpon 'khod
92b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyang / tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong de'i sngags brjod cing / snyan par smra bar byed de/ nyin cig bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas 'dud par byed do//
93a1(dkon brtsegs): yul ko sa lnga'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang de'i dbang phyug pa dang 'byor pa dang / longs spyod rgyas pa mthong na/ bdag nyid la mi
93a2(dkon brtsegs): dngul po lta bur 'dzin to// kun dga' bo tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa 'di ni bco bzangs 'bum gyis g.yos byed pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te/
93a3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de'i bsnyen bkur byed pa yang bud med lnga stong yod do// kun dga' bo zla ba 'byor pa de la ni lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bde ba'i yo
93a4(dkon brtsegs): byad kyis kyang de la cha tsam du yang mi phod do// kun dga' bo tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa de la ni tshong dpon bzang skyong gi gzugs bzang ba dang / kha
93a5(dkon brtsegs): dog rgyas pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba'i yo byad kyis brgya'i char yang mi bod do// kun dga' bo 'on kyang bzang skyong la ni lha'i shing rta lha'i nor bu rin
93a6(dkon brtsegs): po che 'od 'bar ba nam mkha' skar mas spras pa dang 'dra/ ba/ lha'i gser 'tsher bas ngos spras pa/ rdo rje dang spug dang / me shel sna tshogs kyis mdzes
93a7(dkon brtsegs): nga myuphyug rlu ky-i thA / gags par na zla la sa/ rin pa 'i bye du pang 'am zhing ba bdang
93a8(dkon brtsegs): mas su ngas bya tshong tsha gi par khrig da sa ma
93b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon gnon nu bzang skyong 'dis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bsdum
93b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di snyed ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la
93b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dag gi rnam par smin pa de ni 'di yin te/ kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
93b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ngo // kun dga' bo tshong dpon bzang skyong de ni de'i gla tsug phung bzang zhes bya bar gyur to// bslab pa'i
93b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhi nyams shing tshul khrims 'chal bar spyod pa/ chos smra ba thos pa'i mdzod 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin par gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin du sems can
93b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la skad snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / zab cing brtan pa dang / gsang mtho zhing zur phyin pas chos bstan to// gang gis chos de thos shing kun chub pa
93b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de yang / byin cang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gis bar du lha dang mi rnams
93b8(dkon brtsegs): mgu bar byas so// kun dga' bo de'i shing rta'i gzhal med khang gang yin pa de yang bshad par bya ste/ kun dga' bo'i des dge slong tshangs par spyod cing tshul
94a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan pa/ lus nyam chung ba zhig la dad pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms byin nas/ lham zung cig kyang byin te/
94a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa des na/ lha'i shing rta'i mchog mngon par grub par gyur to// dkun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
94a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
94a4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'byung ba des/ khyod lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so// kun dga' bo tshong dpon bzang skyong 'di ni ngas 'dul ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
94a5(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon 'di ni nor dang / gser phun sum tshogs la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i
94a6(dkon brtsegs): yul rnams kyis kyang de dregs par ma gyur pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mkhas pa dag ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyas pa'i khyad
94a7(dkon brtsegs): par dag gis dregs par mi 'gyur te/ kun dga' ba tshong dpon 'di ni dge ba'i chos can/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nyas su myong ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsku
94a8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong gis bdag nyid kyi skabs phye bar rtogs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan
94b1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la sman 'dogs shing thugs brtse
94b2(dkon brtsegs): ba can la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de'i phyir khyod kyi dri ba dang 'thun pa'i dus la bab kyi
94b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol
94b4(dkon brtsegs): to/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rnams rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal te/ za ma tog gi nang gi rin po che mi rig pa bzhin du/ thams cad kyis rnam par shes
94b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi rtogs na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi gum pa'i rka lag dang
94b6(dkon brtsegs): mig nyams shing 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe/ dbang po rnams 'gag cing khams rnams dang mi ldan par gyur pa na/ rnam par shes pa 'di lus las ji ltar 'pho zhing 'chi
94b7(dkon brtsegs): snazlum san bu lags/ rang bzhin na ngas bu lags/ lus dang ni di ltar 'azang bar 'ar/ rnam pa shes pa 'dis lus yangs su bta ga/
94b8(dkon brtsegs): dri me bar 'gyur/ ji sa ma 'ams rnams yongs su btang zhing bye mched rnams par das/ 'dzis 'jig rten pa mo chu ma
95a1(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa dag len par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi gum pa'i skye mched rnams rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
95a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa 'jig rten pha rol tu ji ltar myong bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na phung po 'di dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngags la phyis phung po gzhan dag
95a3(dkon brtsegs): gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di lus kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na skye mched rnams lus kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/
95a4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang skyong legs so legs so de de bzhin no// khyod kyis ngal
95a5(dkon brtsegs): bskul ba bzhin no// bzang skyong de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'pho ba dang / 'gags pa nyodan cig/ bzang skyong dper na rlung gi khams
95a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin pa yang bstan du yod cing gzung du yod pa dag las gzugs su snang ngo // de la bstan tu yod pa ni shing 'gul zhing g.yo dang / sgra skad 'ur 'ur
95a7(dkon brtsegs): be'i sgra 'byin pa dang / grang ba dang / dro ba'i reg pas tshor ba skyed pa yin yang de la rka lag dang / mig dang gdong dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ sngo ba sangs dang / dkar ba
95a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes kha dog lhag par mi dmigs so// b.rang skyong de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang gzugs su mi dmigs shing / gzugs snang bar mi 'gyur te/
95b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rgyu'i bye brag dag gis rnam par shes pa'i khams rtogs par bya'o// de la rgyu gang zhe na/ sems pa dang / tshor ba dang / chos kyi khams so// de la ji ltar na
95b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di lus yongs su btang nas/ tshor ba dang / sems pa len ce na/ dper na rlung gi khams kyis me tog gis dra ba bsdus nas/ 'phos
95b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba de las lha'i me tog gi dri 'di ngad ldang ngo zhes shad mod kyi/ rlung gi khams kyang me tog gi dri mi 'dzin la/ rlung gi khams med par yang me tog rnams kyi dri mi
95b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigaso// dri de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ rlung gi khams de yang gzugs can ma yin/ sna'i dbang po de yang gzugs can ma yin no// bzang skyong de bzhin du
95b5(dkon brtsegs): mi shi ba'i rnam par shes pa des tshor ba yongs su blangs shing / sems pa kun tu blangs te/ chos kyi khams yang dag par blangs nas/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ste/
95b6(dkon brtsegs): rdza ma dang phrad pa las rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa skyes na tshor ba rnams dang / sems pa rnams 'du bar 'gyur te/ dper na me tog gi dbang
95b7(dkon brtsegs): gis snas tshor la/ sna'i dbang gis dri dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang lus kyi dbang gis rlung gi rang bzhin gyi reg pa dmigs par 'gyur la/ rlung gi dbang gi
95b8(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ tshor ba'i dbang gis sems la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems
96a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dbang gis dag pa 'am mi dge ba shes pa'i chos kyi khams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dper na ri mo mkhan rtsig pa dang shing leg/
96a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu byi dor byas pa la ci 'dod pa bzhin du las byed de/ las la blo sbyangs pa ci 'dod pa bzhin du gzugs rnams mngon par grub par byed kyang / de'i rnam
96a3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de yong gzugs can ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa gzugs can ma yin pas kyang / gzugs sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du/
96a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'dis/ gzugs kyi lus drug mngon par 'grub par byed de/ 'di lta ste mig gi rkyen gyis gzugs mthong la/
96a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa mig la rten pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin no// rna ba'i rkyen gyis sgra ste de yang gzugs can ma yin no// sna'i rkyen gyis dri ste
96a6(dkon brtsegs): de yang gzugs can ma yin no// lce'i rkyen gyis ro ste de yang gzugs can ma yin no// lus kyi rkyen gyis reg bya ste/ de yang gzugs can ma yin no//
96a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi skye mched kyang gzugs can ma yin no// rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin pa/ ste/ de bas na spyod yul rnams kyang gzugs
96a8(dkon brtsegs): can yin par blta bar bya'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o// ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams
96b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dris lus yongs su btang nas/ 'jig rten pa rol tu 'gro zhe na/ bzang skyong 'dir 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe las zad pas tshe 'gag pa na/ las kyi sgrib pas zin/
96b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di 'pho bar 'gyur te/ dper na dgra bcom pa 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khamasade khog pa
96b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gags nas yongs su 'phyan pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang skye ba po shi ba'i lus yongs su btang zhing khams bor nas/ dran pa stobs dang
96b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag ni mchod sbyin gyis byin zhes bya ba de nyid yin te/ lus kyi tshor ba dang / yid kyi tshor ba dang / tshor ba rnam pa gnyis kyis zin to
96b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam tu rab tu shes te/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ni lus kyi tshor ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shi nas ni yid kyi tshor ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
96b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na/ sa bon gyis lus kyi mi gu mngon par 'grub par byed pa sems pas shes pa dran pa thob par gyur te/ de bas
96b7(dkon brtsegs): nas pan dang / shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas shes pa du rtogs bsan/ de byi m+b+ha/
96b8(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rig pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge sbyongad yul shes pas na/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//
97a1(dkon brtsegs): sa bon gyis mi gu skyed pa de bzhin du lus bsgrub pas/ de'i phyir yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// bzang skyong gzhan yang
97a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis lus yongs su btang nas/ 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur zhes khyod kyis smras pa/ de ni dper na me long gi gzugs brnyan lta
97a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / 'jim pa la rgyas btab pa'i 'bur bzhin no// dper na nyi ma shar na rab rib dang mun par 'gyur la/ nyi ma med par gyur na yang mun pa 'byung bar 'gyur
97a4(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi mun pa de'i gnas ther zug pa 'am/ ther zug pa ma yin pa yang med la/ mun pa de la yang gzugs dang tshor ba mi snang ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
97a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang lus la skyes nas/ mun pa bzhin du lus la gnas par 'gyur te/ mis kyang rnam par shes pa mthong la/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus 'dzin par byed do//
97a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na bud med kyi mngal na bu gnas pa la ci bdag gi lton 'dug pa 'di khye'u 'am bu mo'am/ sngo bsangs sam/ dkar ram/ gser ram/ dbang po mchong ba 'am/
97a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa 'am/ rga lag ma nyams pa yin par mi shes la/ lha'i mngal na 'dug pa de yang kha zas ha cang tshabs 'gul zhing rig la tshor bar 'gyur ba de
97a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / brkyang ba dang / bskum pa dang / mi 'dzums pa dang / 'byed pa dang / las thams cad yongs su spyod ci
97b1(dkon brtsegs): dgod pa dang / gtam dang / bsam pa skyed pa'i rang bzhin can lus la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa la bdag gi lus la rnam par shes pa gnas pa 'di rang bzhin ci lta bu/
97b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig tu sems can rnams kyis mi shes so// bzang skyong gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang / dngos po thams cad
97b3(dkon brtsegs): la nub pa yin la/ dngos po rnams kyis kyang gos pa med do// bzang skyong 'di na rnam par shes pa ni bsgos pa yin te/ dbang po drug dang / dbang po drag gi spyod
97b4(dkon brtsegs): yul rnams dang / khams bzhi po rnams dang / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams dang / bzang skyong 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa la bsgo bar bya ba yin par1
97b5(dkon brtsegs): blta'o// dper na shing gi 'khrul 'khor phur bu gcig gis gzungs byas pa des bya ba thams cad byed de/ rgyug pa dang / mchod pa dang / gar byed pa dang / bya ba
97b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs dag la 'jug na/ bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'khrul 'khor de gang gi dbang gis 'jug par 'gyur/ bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
97b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das bkas rmas pa de'i rgyus ni bdag gis ma 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'khrul 'khor de ni las kyi dbang gis 'jug ste/
97b8(dkon brtsegs): la de ba chus can pa yi dang / rnam par shes pa las ma par 'gyung ba'o// chus kyi 'phrul lal di 'ang sa pa shes pa'i nga gis 'drus
98a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus sna tshogs la 'jug pa yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus skyed par byed pa'i phyir byed pa yang yin no//
98a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni/ lus kyi khams la sten pa'i phyir mi zad pa yang ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni sngon gyi lus kyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i
98a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir blo phun sum tshogs pa yang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni nyi ma'i 'od gzer dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni dri nga ba dang /
98a4(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba dag dang / ro dag la yang bab ste/ 'on kyang de dag la dri des gos par mi 'gyur la/ nyi ma yang dri nga ba bor te yang mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes
98a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'di yang phyis dang / stag snyig za ba'i khyi dang phag gi skye gnas dag tu yang skye ba yongs su 'dzin te/ 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod pa ngan pa de
98a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis gos pa med do// bzang stong gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus yongs su btang nas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug ste/ de yang ji lta zhe na/
98a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'dis lus 'di bor nas/ bsod nams dang bsod nams pa yin pa yongs su 'dzin to// dper na rlung gi khams
98a8(dkon brtsegs): brag gi zag nas byung nas shing cas pa ka dang phrad ni gros shin tu dri zhim pa khyer nas/ yang dri nga ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / ra dri yang khyer te 'grol/ bzad las pa/
98b1(dkon brtsegs): ches shas che ba de'i'adri dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar rlung gi khams de dri rnam pa gnyis khyer te/ 'gro yang rlung gi khams de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ dri de gnas/
98b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus las 'phos te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba khyer nas 'thos ste/ de ltar na de'i 'pho ba mi dmig so//
98b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na rmi lam na mis dngos po thams cad shes kyang lus de mal na 'dug par mi shes pa de bzhin du/ bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams rmi lam rmi ba bzhin du/
98b4(dkon brtsegs): 'pho zhing 'gro yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lkog ma'i med pa rnams nas kyang mi 'byung / bu ga rnams nas kyang ma yin te/ de ni khung bu dang gseb rnams mi 'tshal// /
98b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ bya gag gi sgo nga'am/
98b6(dkon brtsegs): ngang pa'i sgo nga ma 'khrugs pa shun pa ma brtol bar sgo nga'i nang nas bye'u phrag rnams 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur lags/ ji ltar na bu ga ma rdol bar rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur/
98b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dper na til 'bru tsam pa ka'i me tog gis bsgos nas legs par brdungs btsir pa las til mar byang ba ni/ tsam pa ka'i
98b8(dkon brtsegs): til mar shes bya'o// 'dis ste dper na dri des kyang ti'i 'brum brtol bzhin du dri zhim pas bskos te 'bas te 'gro bar yang dri des snum gyi myong bar yang mi 'dur pa
99a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bru'i rkyen dang me tog dang phrad pas til mar dri dang 'dres pa'i dngos por gyur te/ 'on kyang til gyi 'bru de la me tog gi gseb nas 'dra
99a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ni med na/ de'i rkyen gyis dri de 'pho zhing 'gro ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang me tog gi dri bzhin du sgo nga'i shun pa ma gtol bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste
99a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'pho ba yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang de'i 'pho ba ni nyi ma dang me shel dang bsreg bya dang 'dra bar yang blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang sa bon 'pho
99a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang 'dra ste/ ras phyogs gang du sa bon btab na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams gcig pa kho na las/ sa bon de sa la
99a5(dkon brtsegs): rten cing sdong bu dang lo ma sngon par 'grub la/ me tog dkar po 'am/ sngon po 'am/ dmar por snang ba 'am/ kha dog sna tshogs sam/ smin pa'i ro tha dad par 'grub
99a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chos kyi khams gcig pu 'di las srid par skye ba thams cad du lus sngo bsangs sam/ dkar ba 'am/ ser ba 'am/
99a7(dkon brtsegs): khra bo 'am/ gnag po 'am/ rang bzhin gyis gnyen por skye bar 'gyur ro// mazang skyong gzhan yang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di lus yongs
99a8(dkon brtsegs): su btang nas/ sa bon tu 'gyur te/ bdag nyid rga lag dang ldan par shes so// 'on kyang de la yan lag dang nying lag ni med do// de yang sa'i khams yongs su
99b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin te/ chos kyi khams yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ chos kyi khams de yang dran pa dang mtshungs par ldan no// dran pa de yang spyod yul gyis stobs dang ldan no//
99b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams dran pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i len pa'i rgyu ni rnam par shes pa yin te/ rnam par shes pa ma gtogs par yang chos kyi khams mi dmigs la/
99b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams ma gtogs par yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med do// rlung khams ni rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'jug go// gzhan yang lha'i khams 'di lta ste/
99b4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i khams dang / tshor ba'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa de rnams kyang rjes su 'jug go// de skad ces bka'
99b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par shes pa de gzugs can lags/ bcom
99b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'di la nang gi gzugs dang phyi rol gyi gzugs yod do// de la nang gi gzugs gang zhe na/ zin pa'i mig gang
99b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// rna ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so//
99b8(dkon brtsegs): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// sna gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi
100a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs so// rtse gang yin pa de ni phyir gyi gzugs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so//
100a2(dkon brtsegs): lus gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa de ni nang gzugs so// bzang skyong 'di lta ste/
100a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ mi dmus long zhig nub mo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pa na lha'i gzugs rka lag mnyam zhing mchog tu yid du 'ong ba dag mthong la/ des de dag mthong
100a4(dkon brtsegs): nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyed de/ gnyid log pa las sad pa las/ gzugs de dag ma mthong la/ de nas langs nas 'di skad du khyod nyon cig/ ma dang mtshan
100a5(dkon brtsegs): mo bdag gi rmi lam du bud med kyi gzugs mchog tu yid du 'ong ba dang / skyes mos tshal mi stong gis gang ba mthong ste/ der bdag gis mi lus shin tu gzhon
100a6(dkon brtsegs): sha can/ lag pa glang po che mchog gi sna ltar ring ba/ thal gong rgyas shing yangs la brang yangs shing mkhregs pa dag mthong ngo zhes smra zhing / mi de dag gi lus
100a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyan mdzes pa/ gang yin pa de dag bzlas la/ de nas dmus long des mi de dag nyid kyi gzugs rnams mthong na/ bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dmus
100a8(dkon brtsegs): long des rmi lam du gzugs rnams ji ltar mthong / bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
100b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bas na nang gi mig shes pa dang ldan pas/ rmi lam du gzugs rnams mthong gi/ sha'i mig gis ni ma yin no// ji ltar
100b2(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du yud tsam zhig dran pa 'byung ba bzhin du/ sha'i dran pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ nang gi gzugs de yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o//
100b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong gzhan yang mi shi ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams des sa bon gyi khams bzhin du/ 'pho zhing 'gro ba des bshad par bya ste/ dper na sa bon gyi
100b4(dkon brtsegs): khams sa bzhi la btab na/ khams bzhi po dag sdang bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang dran pa rab tu 'dzin cing tshor ba yongs su
100b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yang rjes su bzung nas lus yongs su btang ste/ 'pho zhing 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par shes pa de dge
100b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mi dge ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che pad ma ral ni 'od nag po 'am dkar po 'dzin te/ 'od kyi rang bzhin
100b7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du nor bu rin po che de la 'byung zhing / de'i rang bzhin nyid nor bu rin po che de la snang bar 'gyur te/ gnas gang dang gang tu 'phos pa dang der kha dog snang ba de bzhin du/
100b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa yang dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su bzung nas 'pho zhing 'gro'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
101a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ 'das ji ltar na lus 'di la rnam par shes pa rtogs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong rnam
101a2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa 'di bsngags pa'am/ spungs par mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di skye zhing 'gag pa'i phyir ro// bzang skyong dper na
101a3(dkon brtsegs): sa bon las myu gu 'byung mod kyi/ sa bon rul pa las kyang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la sa bon ma nyams pa las kyang myu gu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ myu gu yang 'grub par
101a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na/ bzang skyong de d+hI snyam du sems/ myu gu de'i sa bon sdong bu 'am/ lo ma 'am/ sbub gang la gnas/ sa bon ni shing gi rtse mo na yang mi gnas so// de bzhin
101a5(dkon brtsegs): du lus 'di la rnam par shes pa gang na 'ang mi gnas te/ mig la yang mi yin/ rna ba laR+sha pa ni/ sna'i dbang po la yang ma yin/ sa bon gyi myu ga skye gang yin pa de ni sems
101a6(dkon brtsegs): chung ba yin no// mngal du skye ba de ni tshor ba chung ba yin te/ dper na myu gu 'byung zhing dus tshogs dang ldan pas na/ me tog rnams 'grub ste/ me tog grub na 'bras bu
101a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa yod pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus 'grub par 'gyur ro// lus grub pa na yan lag dang nying lag gang la yang rnam par shes pa
101a8(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas la/ rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye bar 'gyur ro// dben shing yongs su smin pa las sa bon 'byung la/ yongs su ma smin pa las ma yin pa de
101b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ lus kyi las rnam par shes pa 'di snang bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ sred pas bsdams pa/ dran pa yongasu bzung ba//
101b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan/ mi dge ba la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ rlung gi khams kyis yongs su zin pa/ shes pas mngon par brlan pa/
101b3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen la mngon tu 'phyogs pa'i rnam par shes pa bam dang phrad pa na skye bar 'gyur ro// dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang yang
101b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung la/ me long med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung ste/ ji ltar bzhin dang me long phrad pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur
101b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs yin la/ de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes pa myed de/ lus gang dang gang du skyod pa de dang de dag nyid du gzugs brnyan 'pho zhing /
101b6(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bur lus smra ba dang / 'bod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang bar byed pa de bzhin du/ bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan yang 'gyur bar snang ngo // bzang
101b7(dkon brtsegs): skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi dbang gis gzugs brnyan de dmigs par 'gyur/ bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ mi'i dbang gis gzugs brnyan mda' ste/
101b8(dkon brtsegs): de yang me long gi rkyen gyis bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mda' la/ bzhin gyi mdog ci 'dra ba dang / dbang ma chong ba 'am/ dbang po tshang ba de nyid kyi gzugs ban
102a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung lags so// bzang skyong ji ltar lus kyi dbang dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi rkyen gyis gzugs brnyan 'grub par 'gyur/
102a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis lus tshor ba myong zhing / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / yid la byed pa 'grub par byed do// de la me long gang
102a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni pha ma phrad pa lta bur blta'o// ji ltar lus mi snang na gzugs mi snang ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin yod pa spangs
102a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ yang chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan 'byung bar byed pa bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongs su su btang ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin 'phangs nas
102a5(dkon brtsegs): phung po gzhan thob par 'gyur ro// dper na sa bon gyi khams chung ngu zin kyang / shing n+ya gro ta dang / u dum ba ra la sogs pa'i shing gi phung po chen po bskyed nas/ yang
102a6(dkon brtsegs): shing de yongs su btang ste/ shing gzhan 'dzin la sa bon gyi khams yongs su btang ba na/ dus bzlog par 'gyur bas/ shing de'i khams kyi bcud med par 'gyur ro//
102a7(dkon brtsegs): khams kyis bcung rnams med par gyur pas shing de yongs su rnyings shing yongs su skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phra zhing mi gsal ba 'dis kyang
102a8(dkon brtsegs): lus rnams bskyed nas yang yongs su btang ste/ lus gzhan dag sgrub par byed do// dper na nas dang / til dang / gro dang / mon sran gre'u dang / mon sran sde'u la sog
102b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa bon chung zad gang na yod pa der/ chung zad sems pa lta bur gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang sems can gyi ris gang dang gang du/
102b2(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba de dang der sems pa yongs su bzung zhing / tshor ba chung ngu dang / bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa rjes su bzung nas/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pa
102b3(dkon brtsegs): rol du 'pho'o// dper na bung ba rol sred pas yun ring du me tog la gnas te/ longs spyad nas me tog yongs su btang ste/ me tog gzhan du 'pho la/ bung ba de
102b4(dkon brtsegs): yang me tog dri mi zhim pa longs spyad nas/ dri zhim par 'gro bar byed de/ me tog gang dang gang la 'jar ba de dang de la chags shing ro yang myong bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par
102b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i lus blangs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu longs spyod nas phyir yang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yi dgas kyi/
102b6(dkon brtsegs): nang du lus blangs te/ des mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su myong nas yang phung po gzhan dag len to// de la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji ltar blta zhe na/ dper na gur
102b7(dkon brtsegs): kum gyi sa bon nam leb rgyan rtsi'i sa bon rnams rang bzhin gyis dkar la de dag gi khon myu gu yang mi snang / me tog kyang mi snang kha dog kyang mi snang la/ sa bon desa'i khams
102b8(dkon brtsegs): la btab na/ chu'i khams kyis sa yongs su brlan nas myu gu mngon par 'grub par byed do// myu gu mngon par grub na/ me tog dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ sngon po 'byung
103a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang kha dog de yang sa bon gyi khong ni mi gnas la/ sa bon med na yang kha dog dang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam/
103a2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas/ mi'i sha tshugs can yin la/ sha snag gu'i dbang po'i byung ba'i skye mched dang ldan pa ma yin te/ de lha'i mig dang /
103a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rna ba dang ldan zhing sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi skye mched rab tu shes pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur la/ 'di snyam du gang dag gis las byas pa de
103a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni bdag yin no snyam du yang shes so// lus de yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa yin te/ dper na der gyi srin bu rang gi lus las skud pa'i rgyud byung bas/
103a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim byas la de nyid de'i nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus bskyed nas/ dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid yang lus yongs su
103a6(dkon brtsegs): btang myed par 'gyur ro// dper na pad ma chu'i nang nas skyes te/ lha'i dri dang kha dog mngon par 'grub kyang / pad ma dkar po de la chu'i khams kyang mi dmigs la/ de'i nang du mi
103a7(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur nas/ gang du sa bon gnas pa der kha dog dang dri dang ro rnams gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang du 'pho zhing 'gro ba der dang
103a8(dkon brtsegs): po dag gi spyod yul rnams 'pho bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba dang sems pa dang / chos kyi khams kyang der 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rid ba ni
103b1(dkon brtsegs): gang du 'gro ba der longs spyod thams cad 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na nyi ma dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams nyi ma gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du 'od zer rnams kyang
103b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang de nyid du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang chos kyi khams rnams kyang 'pho zhing 'gro'o//
103b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su btang nas/ dngos po thams cad kyi phrad pa yongs su bzung ste/ sha med pa dang / rus pa med pa'i lus
103b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i lus len pa'i rgyu ni gzugs yin no// dbang po'i dngos po rnams ni tshor bas med do// dran pa ni lha'i lta bas mthong ste/ dge ba
103b5(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dge ba yang yongs su len to// dper na rgya shug dang 'bra go dang / a mra dang / nyo ti dang / se'u dang / bil ba dang / ka pid ta la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni
103b6(dkon brtsegs): ro du mar 'grub ste/ tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan tsha'i ro dang / bskal ba la sogs pa'i ro re rer rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ la la ni ngo tsha bar 'gyur
103b7(dkon brtsegs): la la ni sbyar/ la la mngar ro// 'bras bu de dag med par gyur pa'i sa bon gang dang gang du 'pho ba der ro yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par shes
103b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der tshor ba 'pho bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dran pa yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro//
104a1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyu ga sa pas smra du sa
104a2(dkon brtsegs): shes te/ de bas na 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya'o// dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so// mi dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so// las 'di
104a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // bdag kyang 'di dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo snyam du de ltar rab tu shes te/ de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan
104a4(dkon brtsegs): yang lus 'di bya ba thams cad rab tu shes te/ de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// dper na rlung gi khams grang bar yang 'gyur zhing tsha bar yang 'gyur la/
104a5(dkon brtsegs): dri zhim por yang ldan zhing dri nga bar yang ldan te/ spyod pa de dag thams cad ni rlung gi khams kyi rkyen las byang yang / rlung gi khams de yang gzugs can yang ma
104a6(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ len pa'i rgyus snang ste/ ji ltar rlung gi khams kyis shing g.yo ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i reg pa len pa'i rkyen byed pa'i las rlung gi khams shes par
104a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang gzugs can ma yin te/ gzugs len pa'i rkyen dang / 'dod pa len pa'i rkyen dang / lta ba len pa'i rkyen dang /
104a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis lus dang / kha dog skye zhing 'grub par byed pas na/
104b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// btso
104b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gzugs ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ len pa ni ji lta bu lags/ las len pa ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ lta ba len pa ni ji lta bu lags/ tshul khrims dang
104b3(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhags mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba 'byor pa leg so legs so// mkhas pas
104b4(dkon brtsegs): ni/ mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar shes so// zlo ba 'byor pa 'di na kha dog bzang po'am/ kha dog ngan pa yang rung ste/ de ni sha kham tshad dang / rtsa dang / rgyus
104b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mgo dang / glad pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / rgya ma dang / gnye ma dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / lto dang / glo ba dang / phyi sa dang / gcin dang /
104b6(dkon brtsegs): lgang ba dang / pho ba dang / long ka dang / zhag dang / chu gser dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / ngar snabs dang / ska dang / kha sgra dang /
104b7(dkon brtsegs): sen po dang / spu dang / bags pas g.yogs pa shin tu gyur pa/ mi sdug pa dang / mi gtsang ba mang po la rten pa'o// gzugs gang ci yang rung ba de dag bam
104b8(dkon brtsegs): cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi rgyur byas pa las mngon par 'grub ste/ de yang pha ma phrad pa'i gyen gyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bas
105a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs len pa'i rgyu zhes bshad do// zla ba 'byor pa lus kyi sra ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams so// gsher ba nyid gang yin
105a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni chu'i khams so// dro ba nyid dang yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams so// g.yo ba nyid dang bskum pa dang / brkyang ba nyid gang yin pa de ni
105a3(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams so// lus de'i bar du shes pa dang / re'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / dran pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par
105a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe/ rnam
105a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa 'dis gzugs kyi khams ji ltar yongs su gtong bar 'gyur/ lus las rnam par shes pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ lus yongs su btang nas
105a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi khog pa yin no snyam du ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba 'byor pa 'dir lus 'dir gnas par gyur
105a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ dus log par gyur pas khams rnams yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ dper ra 'o ma dang chu bsres te lhan cig tu bzhag pa me dang brad na/ 'o ma yang logs shi tu
105a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / chu yang logs shig tu 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i snam gyi khams gang yin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin no// zla ba 'byor pa bzhin du mi shi ba'i khog pa yang log
105b1(dkon brtsegs): shig tu 'gyur/ khams rnams kyang log shig tu 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa yang log shig tu 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa de yang khams kyi rten yongs su blangs nas/
105b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams yongs su len to// dran pa ni chos kyi khams dang 'brel par 'gyur te/ dran pa chos kyi khams dang 'brel pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba blangs nas/
105b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na dge ba chen po zhes bya ba'i sman mar de ni sman ro tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan tsha'i ro dang / bskal
105b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ro'i mthu dang rnam par smin pa du ma blangs nas/ lus kyi nang du 'gro'o// dge ba'i sman mar gyi ro'i mthu dang rnam par smin po de nang du song bas lus la kha dog dang //
105b5(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / ro skyed par byed cing / de mar gyi khams yongs su btang nas lus la 'pho ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas//
105b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su blangs shing / chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas/ rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur te/ mar gyi khams gang yin pa de ni lus
105b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'o// sman rnams phrad pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams phrad pa lta bu'o// sman rnams kyi kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya gang yin pa de ni rnam par
105b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lta bu'o// 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos pa'i rnam par shes pa 'pho ba lta bur blta bar bya'o// mi'i kha dog rgyas pa dang / mdog bzang zhing bde bar
106a1(dkon brtsegs): smin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba lta bur bstan to// dge ba chen po'i sman mar des mdog ngan cing skya bor 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba
106a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bur bstan to// dge ba chen po'i sman mar rin po che ji lta ba de bzhin du ni rnam par shes pa'i khams blta bar bya'o// ji ltar dge ba chen po'i sman mar gyis/ sman
106a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi kha dog 'jug par byed cing / ro dang dri 'jug par byed kyang mar de la rka lag dang mig med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su
106a4(dkon brtsegs): btang zhing khams rnams bor nas/ chos kyi khams yongs su len cing tshor ba yongs su len te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su len to// za ba 'byor pa mi shi
106a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phos pa des kyang lha'i dran pa thob par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo // sems can dmyal bcu drug kyang mthong ngo // bdag nyid kyi
106a6(dkon brtsegs): las rka lag nyams pa yang mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi khog pa yin no snyam du yang shes so// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'i dran pas lnga'i ltas khang pa
106a7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa rnam par bka' zhing / shing gel ba dang / khro shing dang / ldum bu sna tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ gser bco ma'i sar pa'i mdog ltar sba ba/
106a8(dkon brtsegs): sa pa rnam par dbye ba byas pa dag mthong ngo // des ltas de mthong nas/ mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ de dga' ba skyes pa des bde ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'a
106b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus kyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rnam par shes pa de ni rtul zhon pa dang 'dra bar blta ste/ dper na g.yul ngor chos pa na dmag mi'i nang na rtsi ci la ma rag
106b2(dkon brtsegs): bar rnas pa ska las bzung ste sbyar ba myung bar zhon par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang dge ba la dmigs pa dang 'bral cing / dbugs
106b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba rgod pas chos kyi khams yongs su blangs shing skye mched 'gags te/ lus bor nas lha'i gnas 'og min man cad tshangs pa'i bar du yongs su len par
106b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de nas sman chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam par shes pa lus las 'pho
106b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen da ltar khyod kyis nga la ji skad bskul ba de ni de bzhin te/ legaso legs so//
106b6(dkon brtsegs): dri ba 'di ni mchog tu zab po// dri ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par bya ba yin te/ rnam par shes pa de ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par
106b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen ni/ zab mo'i zhu ba zhu
106b8(dkon brtsegs): ba la mkhas pa la mkhas pa lags te/ bro bzhi ba cing 'dzangs la mkhas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bzhin te/
107a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par bskyed pa yin no// /
107a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong rgyal ba'i bu gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du gzhan mu stegs cen du gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du rtog ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di/
107a3(dkon brtsegs): ci yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di su yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji lta bu zhig yin snyam mo// bzang skyong 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i 'gro ba dang 'od
107a4(dkon brtsegs): bakhong du ma chud de/ ngas 'di'i the tsom bstsal bar bya'o// de nas tshong dpon bzang skyong gis sman chen la 'di skad ces smras so// sman chen legs so legs so//
107a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni shes rab rgya che zhing yangs la chos zab mo zhu ba la mkhas so// sman chen bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'jug pa blo dag pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa la skul cig/ zla ba 'byor pa
107a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byis pa ste/ yul la sred pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la lan 'ga' yang ma bskul bskul bar ma byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni
107a7(dkon brtsegs): rnye ba da/ ma/ sh-i 'i sa nga byung ba nga 'di myed par dang// bco ldan las kyi pa ring ba'i gas nams tsu ldan 'das 'ayul du/ da
107a8(dkon brtsegs): tshad kyis bcom ldan 'as kyinapa ston pa'i dus kyi matog pa ma'i tshal ltar rgyas pa mthong ngo // mangs kyang slan che dang pa byes te bcom ldan 'das la dzin kyi gas ga
107b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'tshal ba lags na/ bde bar gshegs pas bdag la bstan tu gsol/ bskal pa'i mthar thug par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
107b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bzhin du gyur nas/ de'i slad nas sems can 'di dag gis las dge bas dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mtshul te/ 'khor ba na yongs su lakhyam
107b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen ngas tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don gyi phyir yang brag gi rtse mo nas rang gi lus bor te/ dka' ba
107b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgya stong du ma nyams su myong ngo // sman chen khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyod la len bdab po// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
107b5(dkon brtsegs): la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di'i rang bzhin ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen sgyu ma mkhan
107b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi mi'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mi'i dri ba ma chu'i nang du byung ba gsal ba ma yin zhing mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mig dang na mkha'i rang bzhin gang
107b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / sred pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa bzhin no// sman chen gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sred pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
107b8(dkon brtsegs): pa phrus pa/ shid 'i pa/ ngag pa dang / ma pa sa nga na kyi ju rna /
108a1(dkon brtsegs): @phyung na rang gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mi mthong ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di 'phos na rang gi bsod nams dang
108a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma yin pa rnam par shes pa'i khams des mthong ngo // dper na mi dmus long gis nyi ma 'char ba 'am nyi ma gang na 'dug pa yang mi mthong la/
108a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo yang zla ba 'char ba dang / nub pa mi mthong ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus la mi snang ngo // sman chen 'on kyang lus la sred pa dang /
108a4(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin te/ de yang lus 'di'i khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
108a5(dkon brtsegs): phung po rnams phrad par byed pa yin no// de la thugs kyi dngos po gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / d+bi dang / sgra rnams so//
108a6(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba dang / yid rnams ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i dngos po ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no// sman chen ji ltar ma'i
108a7(dkon brtsegs): lce'i thor to sa ro kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / sbyar ba dang / dngar ba dang / lan tsa'i ro dang / bskar ba tshor te/ de'i lce de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ ro dngos po yang
108a8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can yin no// de bzhin du lus 'di la yang rus pa dang sha dang khrag ni gzugs can yin la/ tshor ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs can ma yin te/ gang gis rnam
108b1(dkon brtsegs): bar smin pa dang / bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba de ni rnam par shes pa'o// de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/
108b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
108b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ bzang skyong de'i phyir nyon cig/ bden pa ma mthong bas ni rnam par shes pa 'di ma thong ste/ de ni lag mthil du sbya rur bzhag pa bzhin mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//
108b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni mig la yang mi gnas te/ mig las kyang skye la mthong bar yang mi 'gyur ro// bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis rnam
108b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams 'di ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin du/ ngas kyang gzugs can ma yin par thugs su chud do// 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i
108b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis dpes bstan to// bzang skyong 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis/ bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa
108b7(dkon brtsegs): du sas/ kyil lasam byed dag parjid byed nga// dza na das/ lda ga sa sbyi ra smra spya
108b8(dkon brtsegs): khong na 'dug pa'i skem byed dam/ dri za'am/ lha de snang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// mi de'i nang ngas slad rol na yang gdod /
109a1(dkon brtsegs): gda' ste/ gdon de dag ni gzugs ma mchis pa lags so// bzang skyong dper na lha'i gdon chen pos me tog shin tu dri zhim pa dang spos
109a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gdug pa dang / me tog 'phreng byin pa len pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsod nams dang ldan pas kyang lus blangs nas/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam
109a3(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon nyid dam/ lha nyid byed du 'jug ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no// ji ltar lha'i gdon de lha'i me tog 'breng byon pas
109a4(dkon brtsegs): rangs par 'gyur zhing mi de'i lus kyang tshim par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug nyid la dga' bar 'gyur zhing / lus de
109a5(dkon brtsegs): yang tshim par 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no// bzang skyong dper na lus srul pa'i gdon mi sdug cing / gzugs mi snang ba
109a6(dkon brtsegs): mi'i lus la gnas te/ mi gtsang ba dang / rul pa dang / ldan ljin dang / gtor khung nas 'bab pa dang / gtor ma 'dod cing de yang gtor ma des dga' bar 'gyur la/
109a7(dkon brtsegs): mi de yang gdon gyi dbang gis dri nga zhing / mi gtsang ba las byung ba'i kha zas brtsog pa dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes
109a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'di yang bsod nams ma yin par 'gro ba'i las kyis skye gnas ngan par skyes te/ dbul po 'am/ yi dgas ngan pa 'am/ ldan ljin za ba dag la
109b1(dkon brtsegs): chags shing dga' bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba yang yin no// dper na lha'i gdon chen po gzugs med pa
109b2(dkon brtsegs): de lha'i longs spyod len pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'di yang bsod nams gzugs ma yin pas/ yongs su bzung nas lha'i
109b3(dkon brtsegs): lus rnams skyed par byed do// dper na srul po'i gdon gzugs med pa mi la gnas shing / byi sa dang ldan ljin za bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i kham
109b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i las rnams kyis skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma
109b5(dkon brtsegs): yin par nye bar 'gro bar yang blta'o// bzang skyong de bas na khyod kyis gdon gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams lta bur blta'o// gdon/
109b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi longs spyod bzang po dang ngan pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ dge ba dang mi dge ba lta bur blta'o// mi gang yin pa de ni lus lta bur blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
109b7(dkon brtsegs): sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lus 'di len pa'i rgyu ji ltar blta bar brtsi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'din pan tshun
109b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rkyen gyis 'dod pa len par byed de/ dper na gachub stan las kyang brten/ de skyed pa'i tshol ba las brten te mi 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di len pa'i cu skyes pa dang /
110a1(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi rkyen gyis sgra dang reg pa dang / ro dang gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// dper na me tog las 'bras bu
110a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur ba te/ 'on kyang me tog de la yang 'bras bu ma dmigs la/ 'bras bur 'grub pa la yang me tog mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ las 'di las rnam
110a3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa 'byung ste/ 'on kyang lus de la yang rnam par shes pa mi snang la/ rnam par shes pa ldog pas kyang lus kyi rus pa dang / rkang dang / mer mer po dang /
110a4(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba rnams rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// dper na sa bon de me tog gi kha dog dang / dri dang ro 'bebs pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis
110a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang lus yongs su btang nas dge ba dang mi dge ba btab cing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa yang btab nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'o//
110a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na skyes pa dang bud med gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis phrad nas dga' bas brlan te/ bud med la shin tu dam por 'khyud nas nyon mongs pa 'byin par byed de/
110a7(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyi nyon mongs pa med par gyur na yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ der nyon mongs pa byung nas
110a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags med par 'gyur te/ yang gcig la gcig 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus dang phrad pa rnyed nas
110b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skyed de/ chags pa 'phel bar byed do// dper na lus kyi rkyen gyis bud med kyis gzugs mthong na/ skyes pa'i 'dod chags skyed la/ yang phrad pa
110b2(dkon brtsegs): las bral na phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su blangs nas yang bor te gzhan du 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ro//
110b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la pha ma phrad pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas pa dang / las la dmigs pa'i dngos po las rnam par shes pas lus 'grub par byed de/ las de dag kyang gzug
110b4(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin la/ skyes dang bud med kyi rkyen gyis ngo bo de yang gzugs can ma yin no// len pa'i rkyen las 'dod pa byung ste/ de bas na 'dod pa'i len pa zhes
110b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gzugs kyis 'dod pa len pa na/ de'i phyir yang 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// sman chen gzhan yang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin
110b6(dkon brtsegs): bo'i len pa de gang zhe na/ 'di la tshul khrims ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang /
110b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par byed pa bag med pa'i gnas spong ba'o// de'i mchog tu 'dzin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig
110b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// de'i len pa ni srid pa ste/ lha dang mir skye zhing / skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa skyed pa ste/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med
111a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed do// phung po rnams kyi sa bon yang brlan par byed do// las dge ba dang / mi dge ba/
111a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang sdud par byed do// rnam par shes pa yang sbyong bar byed do// nyon mongs pa blangs pa rnams kyang sreg par byed de/ de bas na 'di ni tshul khrims dang
111a3(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
111a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dis rnam par shes pa 'dis ji ltar lha'i nang du lus yongs su len pa lags/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
111a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig/ 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas/ lha'i lta ba skyed de/ de'i lta ba de yang sha'i mig
111a6(dkon brtsegs): la rten pa ma yin no// de'i lta bas mthong ba gang yin pa de ni legs pa zhes bya ste/ de bas na lta ba'i len pa zhes bya'o// de'i lha'i lta ba bsod nams la dmigs pa dang
111a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i gnas mthong ste/ der lha rnams lha'i rtse ba dag gis rtse ba mthong nas/ de der chags pa skye
111a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni der 'gro'o snyam mo// des der chags su rung zhing dran pa dang ldan pa'i srid pa rab tu shes so// dur khrod na 'dug pa'i khog pa de/
111b1(dkon brtsegs): yang des mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ de bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len pa gang yin pa'i/
111b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags so// snyam mo// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
111b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnam par shes pa khog pa de chags na ci'i slad du mi gnas/ khog pa de nyid la ci'i slad du mi rten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen/
111b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na mi la la'i skra dang kha spu bregs te skra dang kha spu de mthong nas/ mi de 'di snyam du sems sam/ skra 'di dag ni dri zhim zhing gnas pa yin gyis/ 'di dag ni
111b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang mgo la bskyed par bya'o snyam 'am/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci skra de dag phyir skye bar 'gyur ram/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag
111b6(dkon brtsegs): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis khog pa de nyid la gnas pa 'di ni gnas med do//
111b7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam par shes pa'i khams cha bra zhing mi mngon pa 'dis glang
111b8(dkon brtsegs): pa che'i lus bong chen po ji ltar bsgrub par bgyid cing / rdo rje ltar sra ba'i khog pa 'di yang ji ltar ltol bar bgyid/ glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan
112a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi dang / glang po che'i rgyal po yang ji ltar 'dzin par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na/
112a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan tu med pa ri'i brag na gnas pa de yang / ri'i brag de nas byung ste/ ri rab dang 'dra bar mtshungs shing ri yi rtse mo rnyil
112a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing / 'gyes par byed na/ sprin chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ri de'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sman chen gyis
112a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ rlung gi khams ni ste zhing lus ma mchis par blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de de bzhin te/ ji ltar
112a5(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams snyi zhing lus med pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i 'di yang gzhag cing lus med mod kyi/ lus chen po dag dang chung ngu dag kyang skyed par byed de/
112a6(dkon brtsegs): sbrang bu'i yang rnam par shes pa de nyid yin no// glang po che'i yang de nyid yin no// dper na mar me'i me lce chung yang ra ba 'am khang pa'i nang gi mun pa chen po sel
112a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang las len pa'i rgyu des na/ gzugs chung ngu dang / chen po rnams 'grub par byed do// de skad
112a8(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji las de gzugs can zhig lags sam/ 'on te
112b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ma mchis pa lags/ rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lags/ rkyen ni ji lta bu las blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen 'di la las
112b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod yul ni lha'i bde ba dag dang / 'byor pa dag dang / lha'i kha zas thob pa yin no// dper na mi dbul po gnyis shig 'brog tu 'khyam pa las/ der
112b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis ni chu bsil ba rnyed la/ gcig ni skom ste shi na/ chu de la la zhig gis snyim pas bcus te/ mi de la byin pa yang med/ la la zhig gis mi gcig shos/
112b4(dkon brtsegs): la de la bkag pa yang med kyi/ bsod nams kyi mthu 'ba' shig gis/ gcig gis ni chu rnyed la/ gcig gis ni ma rnyed pa de bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i
112b5(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag blta bar bya'o// zla ba yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dper na shing thog rlon pa
112b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin pa na kho dog gzhan du 'gyur te/ kha dog de yongs su smin pa yang me'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lus 'di yang bsod nams kyi dbang
112b7(dkon brtsegs): gis tshong dpon gyi khyim nor dang gsor 'byor pa dag tu rgyun nye bar ston to// lha'i gnas dag tu lha'i rgyan dag nye bar sten te/ dbang phyug gi rgyu gang yin pa de ni bso/
112b8(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi dper bstan to// dper na sa bon sa la btab na shing gi rtse mor snang bar 'gyur la/ sa bon de yang sdong bu nas sdong bu'i rtse mor 'pho ba med cing / shing /
113a1(dkon brtsegs): nang na yang sa bon de mi dmigs la/ mi la la zhig gis lag pa gnyis kyis sa bon de blangs te/ shing gi rtse mor bzhag pa yang med cing //
113a2(dkon brtsegs): sa bon rtsa ba nas 'pho ba yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba lus la gnas pa rnams kyang lus la mi snang ngo // dper na sa bon sa las me
113a3(dkon brtsegs): tog 'grub pa na/ sa bon gyi nang na yang me tog mi snang zhing / me tog gi nang na yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/ sa bon dang me tog kyang gnyis su dbyer med pa de bzhin du/
113a4(dkon brtsegs): lus las kyang las 'byung / las las kyang lus 'byung mod kyi/ lus kyi nang na yang las mi snang / las kyi nang na yang lus mi snang ngo // dper na me tog yongs
113a5(dkon brtsegs): su smin pa na 'bras bu dmigs pa na 'bras bu dmigs pa de bzhin du/ lus byin na las rnams dmigs so// dper na gang na sa bon gnas pa der me tog 'byung bar
113a6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba de bzhin du/ lus di gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der las dge ba dang mi dge ba 'byung bar snang ste/ las de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ rnam par
113a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa yang gzugs can ma yin no// dper na mi'i lus las grib ma mi gsal zhing gzugs can mo yin pa 'byung la/ mi nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ grib ma yang
113a8(dkon brtsegs): mi de'i lus dang 'brel pa ma yin la/ lus med par yang grib ma 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di la dge ba dang mi dge ba 'brel par mi 'dug ste/ lus gang
113b1(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der las rnams 'brang bar 'gyur te/ lus kyi dbang gis las rnams 'brang ba yang ma yin la/ lus med par yang las rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//
113b2(dkon brtsegs): dper na sman tshwa dang / kha ba dang / bska ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus la bkrus sman btang na/ nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / lha'i mdog rgyas pa yang
113b3(dkon brtsegs): lus la snang bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar sman tsha ba dang kha ba rnams kyis lus kyi mdog gzhon shar 'dug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sgrub par byed cing / 'di snyam du mi 'dis ni sman
113b4(dkon brtsegs): zos gor ma chag go snyam du shes par 'gyur mod kyi/ sman de dag gi ro dang smin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ ro dang smin pa gzugs can ma yin pa yang mi'i mdog
113b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa las snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dge ba'i las 'di yang gzugs can ma yin te/ de las lus grub nas/ kha zas dang nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod dang /
113b6(dkon brtsegs): gos kyi bye brag gi dbang gis rka lag mnyan zhing mchog tu bde ba dang ldan te/ nor bu dang gser dang dngul 'byor par 'gyur ba ste/ de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i las
113b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'bras bu yin no// rigs dang longs spyod rgyas shing 'byor pa las nyams pa dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bral zhing gzhan la re ba dang / kha zas ngan pa za zhing mal stan ngan
113b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzugs ngan cing mi sdug pa'i lus can gang yin pa de dag ni mi dge pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dper na me long gi dbang gis bzhin gyi mdog sdug pa dang/
114a1(dkon brtsegs): mdog mi sdug par snang la/ me long gi gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs ma yin pa de bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis
114a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa 'di lnga rnams dang / maM rnams dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / ye dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sman chen las rnams ni
114a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar blta bar bya'o// de ltar na las 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis dbang po rnams ji ltar
114a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs/ lus chen po yang ji ltar yongs su 'dzin par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen 'di lta ste dper na/ rngon pa nags thibs po'i nang du
114a5(dkon brtsegs): song nas/ gzhu shin tu bkang ste/ dug mda' spos kyi glang po che bod tshod che ba la bsnun pa la/ dug de yang khrag dang phrad pa la yan lag dang nying lag rnams su 'pho zhing
114a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ste/ dbang po'i spyod yul thams cad 'dor la/ gnang rnams su bsnun cing khrag gi kha dog bsgyur te/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du 'pho zhing 'gro la phyir yang lus
114a7(dkon brtsegs): bor nas/ dug de las las phyir byung na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ dug de dang glang po che'i khog pa de'i tshad ci tsam/ gsol pa/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin
114a8(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dug de ji ltar 'pho ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongs su spong zhing dbang po rnams kyang 'dor la khams
114b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang yongs su gtong ngo // de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i dbang po rnams 'dor bar byed do// sman chen gzhan yang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes
114b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lta bur lus chen po yongs su 'dzin par bgyid ces zer ba ni/ ji ltar kho lag che zhing rags pa'i lus 'di la mi sems pa bzhin te/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi
114b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/ de yang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis kyis sum khri su yongs su dkris te/ klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kyis
114b4(dkon brtsegs): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bas/ rgya mtsho btung du mi rung bar 'gyur zhing / de gnyis kyi dbugs kyis ri rab kyang g.yo bar byed de/ de gnyis ji ltar dug che la spro ba che zhing
114b5(dkon brtsegs): yangs pa bzhin du/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o// sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ de dag gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sbrang bu'i
114b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan no snyam na de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/ sman chen 'di ltar rnam par shes pa de nyid sbrang bu'i yang yin la/ de nyid de dag gi yang yin no// dper na dug bdas na
114b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nyal ha la'i thigs pa chung ngu yang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / the dga' la sogs pa de dag gis zos na/ de dag kyang 'chi bar
114b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / bdas na ba dang / hal ha la'i dug gi thigs pa gang
115a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni nang na ches mang ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyi dug ches mang bar bgyi ste//
115a2(dkon brtsegs): bad sa na ba dang / ha la ha la'i dug ni de lta ma legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du lus chen po glang po che dgu stong gi stos
115a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chung zhing mi gsal la/ gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o// rnam par shes pa de yang las
115a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rkyen gyis lus chen po mngon par 'grub par byed de/ dper na shing n+ya gro ta'i sa bon chung ngu las shing gi rgyal po mtho zhing rgya che la yal ga dang yal ga
