115a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya lhan du rgya 'phre'u brgya stong gis rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ sa bon de'i tshad ni ci tsam/ shing de'i tshad ni ci tsam//
115a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru'i nang dang bar snang bzhin te/ khyad par che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin
115a7(dkon brtsegs): du sa bon de'i nang na yang shing mi snang la/ sa bon med na yang shing skye ba mi dmigs te/ ji ltar sa bon phra mo las shing chen po skye ba de bzhin du/ rnam par
115a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa cha bra ba las gzugs chen po 'brug par 'gyur te/ lus la yang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs la/ rnam par shes pa med na la/
115b1(dkon brtsegs): lus skye ba mi dmigs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i
115b2(dkon brtsegs): snying po lta bu'i rnam par shes pa des/ lus nyam chung ba rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na
115b3(dkon brtsegs): mi dbul po la la zhig gis/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de blangs nas/ lha'i gnas dang skyed mo tshal dang / bskyed
115b4(dkon brtsegs): tshal dang / zhing dang / ra ba dang / sgo gang dang / shing gel ba dang / khri shing sna tshogs kyis 'khor ba dang / khang pa me tog gis gtor ba dang / rdzas dang yo
115b5(dkon brtsegs): byad dag sprul na/ sman chen de dag thams cad ni/ mi brtan zhing nyam chung la myur tu 'gyes shing 'dzag pa'i chos can yin te/ yid bzhin gyi ro nor bu rin po che
115b6(dkon brtsegs): de mi de'i lag nas stor na/ de'i bde ba longs spyod de dag kyang med par 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de rdo rje stong gis kyang mi byed la do/
115b7(dkon brtsegs): yo byad de dag 'jig pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rdo rje'i snying po'i rang bzhin lta bu yin la/ lus gang yin pa de ni
115b8(dkon brtsegs): stong pa med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa shes pa'i khams zhan pa des de ltar gzugs mdzang zhings pa bye 'amazhing tsha/ com na
116a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na chu'i rgyun shan tu 'jam pa ri'i gseb na 'dug pas ri de nyid brtol te byung na/
116a2(dkon brtsegs): sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i nang na tshes sra ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ri ni rang bzhin gyis mkhrang la/ rdo rje ltar brten zhing sra ba lags
116a3(dkon brtsegs): la chab ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing reg na bde ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis zhan
116a4(dkon brtsegs): pas lus chen po dag phye ste 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can gyi ris na sems can shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du
116a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba len pa lags/ ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de'i
116a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir nyon cig/ sems can de shi 'phos nas bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i dru byed kyis yongasu zin na/ lus yongasu btang nas/ rnam par shes pa des
116a7(dkon brtsegs): mi'i lta ba yongs su spangs te/ lha'i lta ba thob par 'gyur ro// de lha'i lta ba des 'dod pa ni spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo // sems can dmyal ba
116a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po brgyad kyang mthong ngo // lus de yang 'dar ba mthong ngo // lha rdzas kyi lha'i gnas dang / dga' tshal dang / 'dres tshal dang / me tog gi rna rgyan dang / shing
116b1(dkon brtsegs): kun she sha ya dang / ko ka na da dang / gzhal med khang dang / tshal stug po dang / lha'i bu mos rtse bas bskor ba yang mthong ngo // rtag tu me tog rgyas shing rnam par
116b2(dkon brtsegs): bkra bar byas pa'i lha'i longs spyod sdug gus mdzes par byas pa dang / se mo do dang / gdub zlum dang / gdub leb dang / dpung rgyan sba zhing sbas pas brgyan pa
116b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang des mthong ngo // lho gzhon nu dang / lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug cing yid rab tu dga' ba yang des mthong ngo // des de dag mthong nas kun tu chags pa skyed do// /
116b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar kun tu chags pas dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro// dga' ba thob pas yid rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de snying dga' bas de'i tshe lus kyi kha dog rgyas par
116b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ 'di ltar bzhin gyi mdog pad ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur zhing / lta ba phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ro// sna yang yo bar mi 'gyur/ de'i kha yang mnam par
116b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de'i mig ud pa la sngon pa'i mdab ma 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i gdan rnams kyang chad par mi 'gyur/ de'i khrag kyang zad par mi 'gyur/
116b7(dkon brtsegs): phyi sa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ de'i spu zing zhes byed par mi 'gyur/ de'i sde mo rnams kyang nag por mi 'gyur/ lag pa yang ser por snang bar mi 'gyur/ rga lag
116b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang g.yob par mi byed de/ rga lag 'khums bzhin du 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro// sman chen 'chi ba'i dus kyi che/ lha'i lhas 'byung bar 'gyur te/
117a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar khang pa brtsegs bka ba brgya stong gis brgyan pa mthong ste/ lha'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang //
117a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog sna tshogs spel ba'i 'phreng ba shin tu dri zhim pa dag mthong ngo // lha gzhon nu rgyan dang gser gyi mchog dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan gyis
117a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byas shing lus brgyan pa dag kyang mthong ngo // des lha gzhon nu dag thong nas mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// de yid dga' bas khog pa la ltas gnyis 'byung bar
117a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ me tog kun dang / ku mu ta ltar dkar bar snang ngo // mig ha cang yang mi 'dzums/ ha cang yang mi 'byed do// sgra snyan pa dag kyang 'byung ngo // de'i bzhin
117a5(dkon brtsegs): yang pad ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur/ shi ba'i khog pa yang ha cang tsha bar yang mi 'gyur/ ha cang grang bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de'i gnyen sdug pa rnams kyang smre sngags
117a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'don par mi byed do// de nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/ 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// phyogs kyang mun par snang bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'chi ba'i
117a7(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi che/ phyogs shin tu dri zhim zhing / shin tu yongs su dag pa tshor bar 'gyur ro// de'i mig kyang ser bar mi 'gyur/ de'i lta ba yang phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/
117a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong na yid ches shing dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ gnyen sdug pa dag mtho ngo na gzhig nas phyir 'ongs po dang / ring mo zhig du 'dug
117b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du mgul nas 'khyud cing yid rab tu dga' ste/ 'di skad du srid par skyes pa thams cad kyi tshul ni yin gyis dang dang bral ba'i phyir gdung ba ma byed par thong shig ces
117b2(dkon brtsegs): des gnyen de dag yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do// sman chen gal te sems can bsod nams su nye bar 'gro bas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ sbyin pa la sred cing yud
117b3(dkon brtsegs): tsam re re la tshigs bcad dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / gtam sna tshogs dang / gtan tshigs sna tshogs rjod cing smra la/ de'i nyid la yang srid par mi 'gyur zhing /
117b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyid kyi dbang du yang mi 'gro na/ bde ba thams cad dad pas de'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ro// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ lha dang lha mo lhan cig tu khri gcig gi steng
117b5(dkon brtsegs): na 'dag la/ lha mo khI steng na 'dug pa de'i lag pa lha'i lage pa'i steng du bzhag cing // de'i lag pa gnyis las me tog dag kyang 'byung ste/ lha mo dos me tog byung ba dag
117b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ lha de dag 'di skad du lha gzhon nu skye ba'i dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis dgyes par mdzod cig ces zer ro// des kyang me tog rnams lag par mnye zhing
117b7(dkon brtsegs): phur par byed do// des me tog de mnyes pas sems can de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rnam par shes pa des kyang dbang po rnams bor zhing dbang
117b8(dkon brtsegs): po'i spyod yul rnams btang ste/ khams rnams yongasu btang nas khams kyi don yongs su blangs te/ mi gsal zhing gzugs can ma yin la rtazhon pa lta bung /
118a1(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang / me shel dang / sreg bya lta bu dang / chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sbubs kyi nang gi rlung ltar dge ba la dmigs/
118a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bsdus nas byung ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o// de yang de'i tshe me tog la brten nas pha ma khri gcig la 'dug cing phrad pas rnam par shes pa me tog de dag gi nang du 'dres
118a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// yang der bdud rtsi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ rlung des rnam par shes pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang / lha gzhon nu rna cha gdung kor dri ma med
118a4(dkon brtsegs): tsang mgul ba dang ldan pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
118a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gi gzugs rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid/ rkyen rnams la yang ji ltar gda' bar 'gyur//
118a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan tu med cing rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub
118a7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid/ rkyen rnams la yang ji ltar gda' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan
118a8(dkon brtsegs): tu med cing rkyen gyi dbang gis lha'i gnas dang / ri dang nags tshal la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'dis/
118b1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams 'grub par byed do// sman chen gzhan yang shing 'dzings pa gnyis phan tshun phrad de gcig la cig brud cing gtsubs pa las mi 'gru
118b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ me de yang shing gi nang na mi snang la/ shing med na yang me 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ me yang rkyen gyi dbang gi shing las 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ rkyen
118b3(dkon brtsegs): med par mi 'byung ngo // gzugs kyi dbang gis kyang shing gi nang na me mi snang la/ shing ma gtogs par yang me mi dmigs so// sman chen de bzhin du rnam par
118b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de yang pha ma'i dbang gis 'jug ste/ rnam par shes pa yang lus kyi nang na mi dmigs/ lus med par yang rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ngo // sman chen dper
118b5(dkon brtsegs): na me ma byung gzugs dang / dro ba dang / kha dag gsal bar mi snang ngo // sman chen de bzhin du lus ma sgrub pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
118b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams mi snang ngo // sman chen dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bar snang zhing gzi brjid kyis la mer 'dug kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis nyi
118b7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i gzugs gnag gam/ ser ram/ dmar ram/ dmar ser du mi thong ngo // sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / sdom pa dang / ro myang
118b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / reg pa'i rnam padag gis rtogs par 'gyur gyi/ lus la rnam par shes pa gnag pa 'am/ dkar ba 'am/ gzugasu snang bar mis mi mthong ngo // dper
119a1(dkon brtsegs): na nyi ma tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / 'gro ba dang / phyir yang 'char ba dag gi rtags las snang ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang rtags
119a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
119a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed kyi rtags dang / tshor ba'i rtags dang / 'du shes kyi rtags dang / sems pa dang / mya ngan dang / gdung ba dang / yid mi bde ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rtag su blta'o//
119a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i bag chags 'di ltar dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems dang / mi dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems las blta'o// de skad ces bka' stsal
119a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rnam par shes pa lus las byung ste/ myur du skyes pa yongasu bzung ba
119a6(dkon brtsegs): des ji ltar lus gzhan la gnas par bgyid/ rnam par shes pa 'di ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ sman chen dper na mi la la
119a7(dkon brtsegs): lag pa ring zhing thur du bskyang la/ g.yul gyi cha gon te/ lha'i rta rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa la zhon nas g.yul du 'gro ste de dag g.yul ngo der song nas mdung dang
119a8(dkon brtsegs): ral gri dang / mda' dag gis snying myos te/ g.yul ngor rta'i mchog de las sa la lhung la/ de yang lus kyis 'phong rtsal yongasu sbyangs pa zhig ste/ myur ba myur bar sa las rta'i
119b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyab tu 'gong bar byed na/ ji ltar mi de lhung nas rta la zhon pa dang / 'gong che bas ji ltar rta nye bar gnas pa la 'gong ba na/ rta 'gro bzhin du 'gong ba chen po 'gong bar byed pa de
119b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rnam par shes pa la yang blta bar bya'o// ji ltar mi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs shing skrag nas/ rta zhon te 'bros pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa 'di
119b3(dkon brtsegs): thog ma shi 'phos nas lha'i dmigs pas yongs su zin cing lha dang lha mo khri steng na 'dag pa mthong nas/ shin tu myur bar skye ba yongasu len to// sman chen gzhan yang dang
119b4(dkon brtsegs): bo shi 'phos nas da dung ma skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa ji lta bar bya zhes gang khyod kyis smras pa de ni/ dper ni ming chu'i steng du bab pa gzugs su yang snang mod kyi/
119b5(dkon brtsegs): de gzugs su gtogs par yang blta bar mi bya'o// sman chen dper na rka lag mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs chu'i steng du bab pa de la ni dro ba'am/ grang ba 'am/
119b6(dkon brtsegs): lus ngal bar 'gyur ba med cing / lus de la ni sha'i dum bu lta bu yang med do// grib ma de la ni khams kyis glags pa yang med do// mi'i gzugs brnyen chu'i nang
119b7(dkon brtsegs): du byung ba/ de las ni sdug bsngal ba'i sgra 'am/ bde ba'i sgra 'byung ba yang med do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos nas lus kyi khog pa bor te gzugs
119b8(dkon brtsegs): brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ro// sran chen de ltar rnam par shes pa bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ni/ lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len par 'gyur ro//
120a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa sems
120a2(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal rnams su ji ltar skye ba yongs su len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i sems
120a3(dkon brtsegs): can ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa nyon cig/ sman chen 'di la sems can las mi dge bas yongs su zin pa de ni sems can gyi ris
120a4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'chi 'phos te/ shi 'phos pa de 'di snyam du mi de ni nga nyid yin te/ sems can dmyal ba 'di nas shi 'phos so// 'di nyis ni bdag gi pha ma yin no// snyam du dran pa skye//
120a5(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos pa de'i lus ni tha mal pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yan lag skyes pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba nyid du snang ngo // dang po/
120a6(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos pa de mya ngan gyis g.yengs nas sems can dmyal ba sna tshogs su snang ba mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos pa de'i las sems can
120a7(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba dang 'brel par 'gyur te phyogs kha cig na ni sems can dmyal ba'i sa gzhi khrag gis gtor ba mthong nas/ de der chags pa skyed par 'gyur ro// de
120a8(dkon brtsegs): chags par gyur nas sems cad dmyal ba'i lus 'grub par 'gyur to// de'i rnam par shes pa de las kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis chu'i rjen shul shin tu rul cing / mchog tu/
120b1(dkon brtsegs): dri mi rim pa mnam pa'i nang du lus skye ba yongs su len te/ dper na mi gtsang ba dang / ldan ljin mnapa po'i rkyen gyis srin bu skye ba dang / dper na zho dang sbrang rtsi dang chang
120b2(dkon brtsegs): mnam por gyur pa'i phyir srog chags skye bar 'gyur ro// sman chen de bzhin du sems can rnams/ sems can dmyal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'
120b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas/ bzang skyong gis thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams
120b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi kha dog gi rnam pa ji lta bu lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ji lta bu 'grub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong der khrag gi
120b5(dkon brtsegs): nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni khrag gi mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chu klung rgal du med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa deng dag ni/ sprin sngon po'i kha
120b6(dkon brtsegs): dog lta bur 'gyur ro// ba tsa can gyi chu klung gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de ni sha zig gur 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus ni rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu ba de dgur
120b7(dkon brtsegs): rim gro byas pa ltar gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro// bzang skyong de na lus gang yin pa de dag ni lus bong che bar 'gyur te/ mgo bo gtogs par khru brgyad par 'gyur/
120b8(dkon brtsegs): son mo ring zhing kha spu yong la spun por 'gyur zhing rka lag mi sdug par 'gyur te/ gal te 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba pa'i ltar 'gro na/ mthong ma/
121a1(dkon brtsegs): #zag tu 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzang skyong gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kha zas za mod kyi/
121a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la bde bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
121a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sems can de dag kha zas ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen sems can dmyal ba de dag yongasu 'khyam la/ shin tu
121a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyang ring ba nas zangs deng ra gan dmar mor snang ba mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag mthong nas kha zas kyi tshig rjod par byed de/ kha zas 'dod pa khyed tshur ces zer ro//
121a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag kun nas 'phungs te/ snyim pa bzeng nas zangs dang ra gan bskol pa ga la ba der deng ste lhags nas/ snyim pa bzad cing / zangs dang ra gan bskol ba'i
121a6(dkon brtsegs): kha zas de dag 'dod pas kha gdangs te/ de dag zangs dang ra gan rab tu 'bar ba des/ su ru rur rab tu 'bar zhing khog pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sman chen de dag
121a7(dkon brtsegs): kha zas 'dra bas bslus nas/ sdug bsngal shin tu che ba myong bar 'gyur ro// sman chen sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can dmyal de dag gi rnam par shes
121a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de rus pa'i lus ngag la gnas par 'gyur zhing / rus pa'i tshogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag rnam par
121b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de dag bru ba tshabs gzir bzhin du/ de na kha zas kyi bya ba yang med do// de na lha'i bskyed/
121b2(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal shing ljon pa brgya phrag mang po me tog shin tu rgyas pa dag dang / gsong ma sngon po yangs pa'i sa phyogs dag kyang yod par mthong ngo // de dag gis
121b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mos tshal de dag mthong nas/ yid rab tu dga' ste/ 'di skad du grogs po dag bskyed mos tshal 'di na reg na bde ba'i ser bu ldang ba yod kyis tshur sheg
121b4(dkon brtsegs): ces zer te/ de dag 'dus nas myur ba myur bar bskyed mos tshal de'i nang du 'gro'o// de dag de'i nang du song nas yud tsam zhig bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed do//
121b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi shing de dag las byung ba'i me tog de dag dang / lo ma de dag ral grir gyur te/ ral gri de dag gis de dag gi yal la gcod cing / gshegs par byed de/
121b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag ral gris bcad nas/ nyams thag pa'i sgra chen po byin par byed cing / phyogs phyogs su 'byer ro// de dag 'byer yang rang gi las las byung ba'i gshin
121b7(dkon brtsegs): rje'i mi/ lag par sog dang / tho ba sogs shing so dang bzhin bsgyur la skra 'bar zhing lus 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas yog la/ mtshon cha gzas pa dag kyi
121b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sgra 'byin cing 'di skad du khyed cag sdod cig/ nga gar bros khyed rang gi las kyis bsgrubs pa'i tshal 'di nyams su myong bar gyis shig ces zer
122a1(dkon brtsegs): sman chen de ltar na sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro// sman chen gzhan yang zhag bdun lon nas/
122a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyis/ las nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ bung ba me tog la 'pho ba bzhin du/ dngos po sna tshogs kyi rkyen gyi dang
122a3(dkon brtsegs): gis rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len to// de yang dang po shi 'phro nas dbang med par khrid de/ sdug bsngal zhing yid
122a4(dkon brtsegs): mi bde bar gyur nas/ mun pa mun nag chen por zhugs te/ mi rgod kyis khrid pa bzhin du/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud da ni bdag 'dzam bu gling rnam
122a5(dkon brtsegs): par bkra ba bor te/ gnyen sdug pa yongs su spangs nas/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu mngon tu gnas par gyur cing 'dug gam/ da ni mtho ris kyi
122a6(dkon brtsegs): lam mi mthong ngo snyam mo// de yang dar gyi srin bu rgyud gcig gis dkris pa bzhin du shin tu myur bar skye ba yongs su len te/ de yang bdag nyid kyi mgul
122a7(dkon brtsegs): nas zhags pas btags par shes so// bzang skyong de ltar na sems can dmyal bar sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing / de ltar na de dag la rgyu'i bye
122a8(dkon brtsegs): brag dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bzang skyong spu zing zhes byed nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ngo // rgyal ba'i bu gzhon nu sman
122b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyang / 'di skad du dam pa'i chos mnyan pa 'dis bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ log par ltung ba'i chos can du ma gyur cig/ bdag sems can dmyal ba/
122b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams su skye ba yongs su len par ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan
122b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la bdag zhu ba zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod pa dris shig/ bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom
122b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bstsags pa ni gang lags/ spungs pa ni gang lags/ phung po rnams ni gang lags/ 'pho ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bza
122b5(dkon brtsegs): skyong 'di la khams phrad pa'i phyir/ khams bzhi po dag gis lus 'grub par byed de/ shes rab dang lta ba dang / yid dang / ma rig pa dang / khams dang / spyod yul dang /
122b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa rnams ni bstsags pa zhes bya'o// de la spungs pa ni khams drug po nyid dang / skye mched kyi spyod yul drug dang / khams kyi rang bzhin gsum dang /
122b7(dkon brtsegs): skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis dang / skad dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / dad kan dang / snabs dang /
122b8(dkon brtsegs): tshal dang / chu ser dang / rgalag dang / mig dang / yan lag dang / nying lag tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes bya'o// dper na 'bru spungs pa bzhin te/ nas dang / til dang /
123a1(dkon brtsegs): gro dang / mon sran sde'u mang po la spungs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du/ lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag tu gtogs pa tshogs pa la spungs/
123a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// khams drug po dag gang zhe na/ de la sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par
123a3(dkon brtsegs): shes po'i khams zhes bya'o// skye mched drug gang zhe na/ 'di la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ces bya'o// skye mched kyi spyod yul
123a4(dkon brtsegs): drug gi spyod yul drug gang zhe na/ 'di la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi skye mched ces bya ba ste/ de dag ni spyod yul drug yin no//
123a5(dkon brtsegs): dri la khams kyi rang bzhin gsum gang zhe na/ 'di la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya'o// de la de dag nyid kyi kun nas ldang ba gang zhe na/ rlung dang
123a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhris pa dang / rten bad kan rnams so// de la skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di la tshul khrims dang / dad pa dang / gtong ba dang / nor dang / brtson
123a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba zhes bya'o// de la phung po zhes bya ba'i dor gang zhe na/ 'di la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
123a8(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag gi gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po rnams so// de la tshor ba ni myong ba'o// 'du shes ni shes pa'o// bde ba dang sdug bsnga
123b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'du byed rnams so// lta ba dang nyan pa dang / sdom pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg bya rnams rig pa'i rnam par shes pa ste/ dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs
123b2(dkon brtsegs): pas ni/ lus la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang / len pa dang 'thun pa yin no// de la 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / lus dang ngag gi las kyi
123b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob pas/ 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang yin pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa des phung po rnams yongs su btang nas/ yang sred par mi skye zhing phyir mi ldog pas na/
123b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bde bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste/ 'phos pa de'i phyir yang 'pho ba can ma yin pa de lta bu ni/ de'i 'pho bar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas bzang skyong dang sman chen gyis bcom
123b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa sems can rnams tshim par bgyid pa gang
123b6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa'i chos kyi tshogs 'di legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di ni bcos ma ma
123b7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'di'i rang bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas rig pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi snang ba 'di ni dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong du mas bsgrubs pa ste/
123b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ngas ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du/ chos kyi nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snang bar byed pa/ yon tan gyi grags pa rgyas par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen
124a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i mdzod/ sems can rnams kyi rgyud 'dul bar byed pa/ 'dul ba ston pa 'di yul gang na gnas sam/ de ston par
124a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba der ni mi ma yin pa rnams srung bar byed de/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / lto 'phyo chen po rnams phyag bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'a
124a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya chen rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de la ni mtshon gyis 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur//
124a4(dkon brtsegs): dug gi 'jigs pas 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / nu dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dge slong dag khyed kyis deng
124a5(dkon brtsegs): pan cad ma dad pa rnams la bshad par mi bya'o// bran ga chol ba rnams ma yin/ gcer bu pa rnams la ma yin/ gtsor bu'i nyan thos rnams la ma yin/ gnas gnan
124a6(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa la bshad par mi bya'o// ma dris par yang bshad par mi bya'o// de bas na gal te la la 'khrul par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul par
124a7(dkon brtsegs): byas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag khyim na gnas pa gang yin pas 'di rtogs pa de ni/ phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du/ gus
124a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed par bya zhing 'di ni mdzod 'dzin pa yin no snyam du gzung bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
124b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ shod cig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/
124b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom
124b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnam par shes pa 'pho ba zhes bya bar zung shig/ bzang skyong gis zhus
124b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ sangs rgyas bstan pa la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ 'chi bdag sde
124b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzhom par bya// gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/ chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ sdug bsngal mthar mar
124b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byin par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen dang / tsho dpon bzang skyong dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin da/
124b7(dkon brtsegs): namakha' lding dang / dri za dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
124b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen pa chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ tshong dpon papang skyong gis nus pa'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu cu dgu pa rdzogaso/
125a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ bu mo rnam dag dang bas zhus pa zhes bya ba
125a2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
125a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
125a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po brgya stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang shes par bya ba rnams rab tu shes pa/ gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa/ bzod
125a5(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'jom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis brnyes pa'i chos rnams rab tu thob pa/ sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
125a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' lam 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin chen po
125a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' mos byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mdzes bkod pa dang / byang chub
125a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rin po che tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'
125b1(dkon brtsegs): rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / gzhan yang
125b2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa dang thabs gcig go// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zla med pa'i byang chub
125b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa drug cu po de dag dang thabs gcig go// gzhan yang skyes bu chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyod
125b4(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa drug cu dang yang thabs gcig go// gzhan yang dga' ldan gyi ris lha'i bu nyi khri 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa dang thabs
125b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig go// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i mdzod ces bya ba seng ge'i gdan la 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pas/
125b6(dkon brtsegs): nyi zla lta bu'i 'od zer gyis ni kun tu snang bar mdzad/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i rgyal po ltar gzi byin gyis ni khyad par du 'phags/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta bur
125b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mtho zhing / bral las ni mngon par 'phags par gyur/ sgron ma chen po lta bur 'od zer ni rab tu 'bar/ glang po che'i rgyal po lhur phan tshun du ni gzigs
125b8(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad/ sde ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ltar bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar ni chos ston par mdzad/ rgyal po sgregs can zin ltar 'khor mang po rnams ni zil gyis mnan/
126a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po dag gis ni sku rab tu brgyan/ gzi brjid dang mthu stobs dag gis ni rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/
126a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad nges pa'i don mchog la dgod cing khong du chud par mdzad pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
126a3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bsgrags nas/ 'khor mang po'i dbus na chos ston par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo rnam dag dang ba zhes bya ba/ gzhon nu ma byad bzhin sdug
126a4(dkon brtsegs): cing mdzes pa/ sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos pa/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po bsgom pa zhig yod pa de bu mo gnon nu ma lnga brgyas
126a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor te/ so so nas gser gyi phreng ba thogs nas/ grong khyer mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
126a6(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ phyag byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshigs su bcad de mngon
126a7(dkon brtsegs): par stong pa// yun ring bsod nams rnam dag phrin las bsags/ yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas yongs rdzogs shing / mang po'i dad mos dga' bar mdzad pas na/
126a8(dkon brtsegs): de spang thub mchog khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ gzi byin lha me ya mtshan rab ston cing // rin chen 'byung gnas chos gos ston par mdzad/ sku yi 'od zer mdom ga
126b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag gsal bas// blo chen bsil ba'i rdzing la bdag phyag 'tshal/ yon tan rdzogs shing bsod nams pasam 'tshal/ mi mchog khyod la 'jig rten kun gyis bsngag/
126b2(dkon brtsegs): smon lam chen po tshul khrims yongs rdzogs pas// de slad mchod 'os gtso la bdag phyag 'tshal// chos mchog rab gnas brtan par zhi zhing dben// 'jig rten kun
126b3(dkon brtsegs): la thugs snyoms bu cig bzhin/ mkhyen pa dag gis spyod rnams rab mkhyen pas/ 'dren mkhan bzhin du mnyam pa'i shal yang ston// rab brten brtson 'grus ldan
126b4(dkon brtsegs): par mchis 'gyur na/ byams dang thugs rjes sems can sman mdzad pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang lags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas ni bshad
126b5(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// ji ltar rab brtan stobs ni thob 'gyur nas/ 'khor bar gnas kyang bdud dpung 'pham bgyid lags/ ji ltar mnyam pa'i chos ni thob 'gyur zhing //
126b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid lags/ ji ltar bgyis na sa gzhi nam pa'i dang / rlung dang me chu ji lta bzhin du 'gyur/ ji ltar srid ches thos na chos gnas
126b7(dkon brtsegs): shing ste/ ri rab seng ge rgyal po bzhin du 'gyur/ ji ltar byams sdang sems ni yongs spangs nas/ sems gtsang drang la g.yo sgyu ma mchis 'gyur/ ji ltar sbyin dang
126b8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus bsam gtan rnam grol skye 'gyur zhing // shes rab nyon mongs mun pa rab bcom zhing // rtag par thabs chen la ni gnas pa dang //
127a1(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin gzungs la thogs pa ma mchis shing // tshad med bzhi dang mngon shes lnga la gnas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas spyan sngar gnas gyur nas//
127a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par brdzus te skye zhing tshe rabs dran/ sbyangs pas rtsod pa ma mchis dgon na gnas nas/ sems ni rab btul nyon mongs zhi bgyid dang / tshul khrims ldan zhing
127a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lame sgom dang / bdud rtsi mchog thob bdud dpung 'jom pa dang / bde stsol chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i yang dag lam bkas bshad gsol//
127a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rnam dag dang ba la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/ 'khor ba na gnas kyang
127a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur zhing yongs su ngal ba med par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po na sems kyi 'dun pa'i stobs te/ g.yo sgyu med pa'i phyir ro//
127a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ni mos pa'i stobs te/ sdig pa rnams spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni sbyor ba'i stobs te/ rtag tu dge ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni mngon par
127a7(dkon brtsegs): yid ches pa'i stobs te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa dag la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs te/ theg pa dman pa rnams
127a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi tshol ba'i phyir ro// drug pa ni byams pa chen po'i stobs te/ sems can la gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa ni snying rje chen po'i stobs te/ gnod pa/
127b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang du len par byed pa'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi stobs te/ dus dus su sad par byed pa'i phyir ro// bu mo 'di ni stobs rnam pa brgyad
127b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur bas/ 'khor ba na gnas kyang mngon par
127b3(dkon brtsegs): zhen cing chags pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs bcad de bka' stsal pa// sems can dpa' bo gang yin pa/ g.yo sgyu dag ni
127b4(dkon brtsegs): spong byed cing // rtag par drang por spyod pas na// yang dag byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// mos pa'i stobs ni gang yin pa// nyes pa mang po spong byed cing //
127b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba 'ba'i shig spyod pas na// yang dag brtson la gnas par 'gyur// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs 'gyur/ ba// rtag tu legs par rab brtan nas// brtson /
127b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtan par 'gyur bas na// sems can rnams ni bde bar byed// mngon par yid ches stobs dbang gis// las kyi rnam smin rig pas na// sangs rgyas
127b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs da nga // ga slongs su bya // rlung sa su na sa/ smra phyu /
127b8(dkon brtsegs): bdud na mi gcad pas// tshas ga la ni das pa thar/ rgyams kyi'i se sa kyi ba gis na// sems cad byams pas khyen cing/
128a1(dkon brtsegs): ni med pas na// zhe sdang gnod pa skyed mi 'gyur// snying rje chen po stobs kyis ni// sems can dang du len byed cing // 'khor/
128a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dag la zhen byed cing // yongs su skyo zhing ngal ba med// dge ba'i bshes gnyen stobs kyis ni// rtag par phan tshun bde byed cing // sems ni bying bar
128a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas// byang chub la ni gnas par 'gyur// dpa' bo gang yin de dag gis// stobs brgyad 'di dag thob 'gyur nas// byang chub snying por 'dug nas/
128a4(dkon brtsegs): ni tatabadud dpung mang po bcom par 'gyur// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/ mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas
128a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sems can thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni chos thos
128a6(dkon brtsegs): cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ chos thams cad rab tu dben pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni zhing thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi khams su 'jug
128a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni shes pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ stong pa nyid ston pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni spyod pa thams cad mnyam par gyur/
128a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// drug pas ni theg pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ 'dus ma byas su mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// bdun
128b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni sems mnyam par gyur pa ste/ sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni bdud rnams mnyam par gyur ba ste/ nyon mongs pa'i thibs po ma dmi
128b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro// 'di chos rnam pa brgyad kyis mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/
128b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rang bzhin bdag med pas// skad cig tsam yang dmigs mi 'gyur// mnyam pa nyid la gang gnas pa// de lta bar ni blta bar bya// chos rnams
128b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mnyam pas na// rang bzhin rtag par stong zhing dben// yi ges tha dad bye bar zad// chos rnams rang bzhin bye brag med/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams
128b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun// mu mtha' dag ni mi dmigs pas// de'i rang bzhin na mkha' 'dra// sangs rgyas zhing ni rtag tu mnyam// dus gsum de bzhin ga sh+ye
128b6(dkon brtsegs): pa kun// chos dbyings gnas par mnyam pas na// ye shes mtha' yas rnam par grol// sangs rgyas kun kyang de bzhin no// sems can rang bzhin rgyu
128b7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen rnams// thams cad kun yang mnyam pa dang // de'i spyod pa rab shes pas// ci rigs par ni go bar byed// sems can ji snyed tha dad pa// sgyu 'bru//
128b8(dkon brtsegs): lta bur rab tu rtog/ phyi nang gnyi ga len byed pas// rang bzhin rtag tu rnam par dag/ theg pa sna tshogs rab bshad kyang / 'dus ma byas su rab tu mam me/
129a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pas thabs ni rab mkhyen pas// rnam par phye ste theg gsum bshad// nyon mongs bdud la rab gnas kyang //
129a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs dngos po tsa yang med// lha dang phung po 'chi bdag bdud// spyod yul thams cad stong pa yin// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
129a3(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad dang ldan na byams sdang yongs su spong bar byed do// brgyad gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / rtag par ban
129a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos la ma chags pa dang / rang gi lus la chags pa med pa dang / rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sems sgom pa dang /
129a5(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/ cha chos brgyad po 'di dag mngon par sgrub par nus na/ byams sdang
129a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byams sems go cha rab bsgoms nas// thams
129a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kun la snying brtse zhing // mnyam pa'i sems la gang gnas pa// byams sdang sems ni skye mi 'gyur// blo ldan pan 'dogs spyod pas na// rtag
129a8(dkon brtsegs): par gzhan la bde ba gtong // rnyed pa thob kyang rang mi thong // brnyas shing slad kyang mkhon 'dzin med// rlung brgyad kyis ni mi bskyod pas// byams
129b1(dkon brtsegs): sdang dag ni mi skye zhing // bdag gam gal te gzhan yang rung // byams sdang 'du shes yong mi skyed// 'du shes rnams ni rab spangs nas// spyod yul/
129b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la zhen pa med// rtag par rang gi lus rtogs pas// lus srog dag la phangs pa med// khams rnams sdug bsngal bde ba yis// g.yos par
129b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur na mkha' bzhin// nyon mongs legs par rtogs byed na// bdag dang bdag gi gnyi ga spong // spyod 'dzin rtog par sa 'dra bas// byams sdang dag ni
129b4(dkon brtsegs): yong mi skyed// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ 'khor bas yongs su ngal bar mi 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
129b5(dkon brtsegs): yangs shing rgya che ba'i phyir dang / sems can la so sor rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang / rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing mchod pa'i phyir dang /
129b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rtag par sangs rgyas kyi rtog pa mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir dang / 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtog pa'i phyir dang / chos
129b7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par can dag la zhugs pa med pa'i phyir dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mi'i mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan
129b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor lapa ni gang slob pa// dge sbyong skyon 'phan dri ma med// bar snang zla ba rnam dag bzhin// rdzu
130a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal sems can sgrol bar byed// yon tan rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// sems can rang bzhin
130a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog med cing // rab brtan brtson 'grus spyod par byed// sangs rgyas zhing ni tshad med du// sangs rgyas rnams ni gus mchod pas// de phyir stobs bcu gang ldan pa/
130a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// 'jig rten tshad med dpag tu med// bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // dkon mchog gsum gdung mi gcod pas//
130a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rgyal nyid du mngon sang rgya// tshul khrims dam por gang srung ba// 'khor bas ngal bar mi 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa// rmi lam sprin
130a5(dkon brtsegs): dang glog ltar shes// chos la gang zhig rnam grol ba// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// byang chub la ni rab gnas shing // dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu bde//
130a6(dkon brtsegs): thabs kyis pha rol gang phyin pa// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// rtag par dam chos sgrub pa yod // bar snang zla bzhin 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs
130a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan gang mos pa// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// 'khor ba mu mtha' med 'gyur yang / rtog par yang dag mtha' la gnas// yud tsam shes rab
130a8(dkon brtsegs): rjes mthun pa/ 'khor ba dag gis ngal mi 'gyur// gzhan yang bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan na/ sems can gyi khams mnyam par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ sems sa
130b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems chu dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems me dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems rlung dang mtshungs par/
130b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems na mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems rnam par grol ba
130b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni sems kyi khams mnyam pa nyid rnam pa brgyad ces bya'o// de nas
130b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sems ni sa dang mtshungs pas na// thams cad khur du khyer bar byed// dge ba dang ni sdig pa'ang rung //
130b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa'ang med// sems ni chu dang mtshungs pas na// dri ma mi gtsang 'khru byed cing // 'jig rten rnams ni gso ba dang // nyon mongs gdung ba sel
130b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// sems ni me dang mtshungs pas na// nyon mongs dag ni sreg byed cing // sgron ma chen po snang ba yis// gsal bar mi byed gang yang med// sems ni rlung
130b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs pas na// gnas pa med cing rten byed par// tshul khrims thogs pa dri yis ni// dus gsum kun tu khyab par byed// sems ni mkha' dang mdzungad/
130b8(dkon brtsegs): bas na// lta ba spong zhing rnam par dag/ thams cad kun tu 'jug byed kyang // bdud kyi rjes su 'brang mi byed// sems ni chos dbyings mtshungs pas na/ bde ba nyid du
131a1(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas shing // 'phel ba med cing 'grib med par// rtag par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug/ nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi// rnam par grol ba
131a2(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyur kyang // 'ching ba dag kyang yod min la// grol ba dag kyang yod pa min// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// 'ong ba med cing 'gro med ces// rab dben nyer ni
131a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas ni// dus gsum kun tu 'gro bar byed// gzhan yang bu mo chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur ro//
131a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sbyin pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ ci bdog pa rnams yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni tshul khrims 'byung gnas su gyur pa
131a5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni bzod pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ zhe sdang med pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni brtson 'grus 'byung gnas su gyur
131a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ le lo med cing nur ba med pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni bsam gtan 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// drug pas ni shes rab
131a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ tshul khrims srung zhing mang du thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rnam par grol bas te
131a8(dkon brtsegs): bden par gyur ba'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni mngon par zhen pa'i byung gnas su gyur ba yin te/ rtag par ma'am par bzhag pa la rab gnas pa'i phyir ro// de nas pa
131b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// rtag par sbyin pa gang gtong ba// 'dod chags gdung ba spong bas na// 'bras bu rnam smin mi re bar// sangs/
131b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas byang chub sngo bar byed// khrims ldan theg pa che ba'i phyir// bcad cing gtubs kyang khyong khro med// rtse gcig bde chen gnyer byed cing // bag chags spangs nas
131b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gog mngon byed// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can// bskal mang sems can ched du ni// sdug bsngal bzod cing 'jig rten rgyu// brtson 'grus stobs ni
131b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed// bsam gtan dag ni gang sgom pa// spros pa rnams ni spong byed cing // bsam gtan pha rol phyin gyur kyang // bsam gtan rjes su yongs mi skye/
131b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chen po mtshungs med pas// mthar lha rnams ni spong byed cing // 'jig rten stong dben rig pas na// gti mug mun pa ma lus sel// nyer zhi tshangs gnas
131b6(dkon brtsegs): gang sgom pa// ngan song rnams ni spangs pas na// rtag par brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur// don gyi phan pa nan tan bsgoms// mngon shes sangs rgyas zhing rgyu ba//
131b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur chos kyang nyan// rang bzhin mos pa rab shes nas// chos bshad sems can slob par byed// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos
131b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ gzugs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ chos la bla mar byed pa'i phyir dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon
132a1(dkon brtsegs): la rim gro byed pa'i phyir dang / chos yongs su nye ba la skyo ba med pa'i phyir dang / ji skad thos pa bzhin du/ yang dag par ston pa'i phyir dang /
132a2(dkon brtsegs): chos la ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa sgrogs par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / chos smra ba dag la ston pa bzhin du gus pas sri zhu byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi
132a3(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa mi mthong zhing nyes pa spangs par skul bar byed pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa
132a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// rtse gcig rtag tu chos gnyer ba// mkhan pa
132a5(dkon brtsegs): dge bshes rim gro byed// sdig pa'i grogs po spong bas na// mi bzad gter 'dzin thob par 'gyur// mang thos yongs su skyo med pa// rab brtson chos ni gnyer bar
132a6(dkon brtsegs): byed/ ji skad thos bzhin ston byed pas// rnyed pa dag la raM rtsol med// spobs pa rnam dag gang thob pa// 'khor mang dga' bar byed pas na// chos sbyin pa la
132a7(dkon brtsegs): rab mos shing // ser sna phrag dge spong bar byed// chos spyod mngon par zhen byed cing // gzugs ni gang zhig thob 'gyur ba// khrims srungs rang las lta bsam
132a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi nyes skyon yod mi tshol// byams dang snying rje gnas gyur cing // dus min tshig ni mi smra bas// thogs med spobs pa thob 'gyur nas// spro tshig pha rol phyin pa ston//
132b1(dkon brtsegs): chos ni legs par smra ba la// mkhan po bzhin du gus par byed// skyon 'chab nyes pa spong bskul bas// mi bzad kun 'dzin rgya mtsho thob// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub
132b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ srog la bab par gyur na
132b3(dkon brtsegs): yang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi brjod pa dang / sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro bar bskul ba dang / thams cad byang chub kyi sems la dgod
132b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag byas nas pad ma'i gdon la 'jog pa dang / sems can mya ngan byed
132b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi mya ngan sel bar byed pa dang / khengs shing nga rgyal med pa dag gi mdun du rtag par bdag nyid dman par byed pa dang / gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed pa gang yin/
132b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gal te sdug bsngal gzir 'gyur kyang // nam yang gzhan gyi skyon mi smra//
132b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag par dkon mchog gang bsngags pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus skye// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyer bskul nas
132b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu tshangs par gang spyod pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye// gser gyis sangs rgyas gzugs brgyad te// rin cher pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs/
133a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can mya ngan gang sel ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye// nga rgyal byed pa de dag la// slob ma bzhin du bdag
133a2(dkon brtsegs): dman zhing // gzhan la gang zhig mi 'tshe ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye// gzhan yid bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur ni/
133a3(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / rtag por dgon pa na gnas par mos par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog
133a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba bdag nyid gso byed pa dang / rtag par 'phags pa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
133a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas sems la lhag par skyo ba dang / rtag par mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag med par lta ba dang /
133a6(dkon brtsegs): dad pa shin tu brtan zhing gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa// 'dod pa chung
133a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing chog shes pas// chos dga' dge mang bdag nyid gso// rtag par 'phags rigs bsgrub la mos// 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sems la skrag
133a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa dag la rtag mos pas// bse ru gcig ltar grogs kyang med// 'dus byas sdug bsngal bdag med ces// blo yas rab dang brtson 'grus gnas//
133b1(dkon brtsegs): chos mthong gzhan gyi rjes mi 'brang // rtag par dben gnas sangs rgyas bsngags// sbyangs pas thang bsrings gdung ba med// rtsod smras nyes mig mang po med//
133b2(dkon brtsegs): nye shes yongs bsngags bsngags pa brjod// des na dgon par gnas la mos// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i
133b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir bdud kyi dpung rab tu pham par byed do// brgyad gang zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la zhugs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang / smon
133b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par rab tu shes pa dang / nang the tsom dang som nyi med pa dang / skye ba med par rab tu bzod pa
133b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ha ta ngo bo nyid med par rab tu rtogs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas chos thams cad la so sor rtog cing de bzhin nyid 'jig par mi byed pa gang yin pa'o//
133b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// stong dang mtshan ma med dang smon med pa// rnam thar gsum thob bdud dpung rab tu 'jom//
133b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas 'dus min mtshan nyid gnyis su med// skye med thob pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur// chos rnams skye med de ltar gang bzod pa// de dag bdud dpung
133b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu pham por byed// skye ba med dang 'gag med 'di dag dang // phung po khams la bdag med sgyu ma 'dra// chos la ngo bo nyid med nges rtogs shing // de bzhin
134a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni mi 'jigs thabs mkhas pas// chos rnams bdud kyi las zhes gang byed pa// rnam rtog spangs nas bdud ni pham par
134a2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ thabs dang shes rab gnyi ga rab spyod cing // yong dang stong la gnas pa med par ni// de ltar chos mchog gang zhig sgom byed pa// thabs mkhas gzug
134a3(dkon brtsegs): lus mdzes pa thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir byang chub dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
134a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta bas log lta ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pas log par sems pa'i sems can
134a5(dkon brtsegs): la snying brtse bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gis log par smra ba rnams la snying brtse bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' log pa'i las can
134a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su sdud pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol bas log par rtsol bas yongs su zlog pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas log pa'i 'tsho ba'i sems can
134a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams spong bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pas log par yid la byed pa spong bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis log pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
134a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dag po slang na/ rtsol du gzhug pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// yang dag lta dang gang
134b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ log lta de dag smin par byed// rtag par yang dag gang sgom pa// log sems dag la rtse bar byed// rnam dag yang dag ngag gis ni// log sems
134b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la rtse bar byed// rnam dag yang dag ngag gis ni// log smra rnams la rtse bar byed// yang dag las mtha' gnas pa yis// log pa'i las can sdud
134b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed// rtag par yang dag rtsol bsgoms nas// log brtson dag ni spong mi byed// yang dag 'tsho bas rjes 'thun pas// log 'tsho gang yin sdud par
134b4(dkon brtsegs): byed blo ldan yang dag rtog pa yis// log par yid ni brtse bar sems// yang dag ting 'dzin rtag gnas nas// log pa'i ting 'dzin sdud par byed//
134b5(dkon brtsegs): bla med yang drag lam brgyad kyis// chu bo dag la bde bar sgrol// rgyun phyogs ded pa zlo byed pas// de ni byang chub lam chen yin// nyan thos dang ni rang
134b6(dkon brtsegs): rdul rnams// rtswa'i gzings bzhin bdag nyid zlo// byang chub sems dpa' kun zlo bas// dper na gru chen 'dren mkhan 'dra// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub
134b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir bdud rtsi lam mngon gsum du byed par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ rtsod pa med pa'i chos la gnas pa dang /
134b8(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa'i sems legs par byed pa dang / rtag par de kho na nyid kyi don la lta bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gnas nas rjes su dran pa rtag par
135a1(dkon brtsegs): sgom par byed pa dang / nan tan brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs nas sems
135a2(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas nas yang dag pa'i chos yongs su sdud par byed pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/
135a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ldog pa la rab tu gnos pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// rtag par rtsod med spyod bsgrubs nas/
135a4(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong chen po chos la gnas// zhe sdang nyes pa yongs spongs nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par byed// yang dag don ni rab lta bas// mi zad spobs rnams thob par byed//
135a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems la rab gnas nas// rtag par dran byed rjes su dran// pha rol phyin pa thams cad kun// rab brtson bsgrub pas log pa med// thabs mkhas stobs rnams
135a6(dkon brtsegs): thob pas na// des ni sems can sgrol bar byed// chos kyi mnga' bdag nor gyis ni// brtse sems thams cad kun sbyin pas// myur du mi skye bzod thob nas// byang
135a7(dkon brtsegs): chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// gal te de ltar spyod nus na// sangs rgyas chos ni thob mi dka'// ring po mi thogs bdud btul nos// byang chub mchog ni thob par
135a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de nas bu mo des chos de lta bu thos nas// dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho
135b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa du ma dang ldan par gyur na/ bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan par
135b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ phrag dog mi byed pa dang / ser sna mi byed pa dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / khong khro ba med
135b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / ngag rtsub mo mi smra ba dang / 'dod chags spangs pa dang / log par lta ba rnams spangs pa gang yin pa ste/ bu mo chos brgyad po de dag
135b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrubs nas/ myur du bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gzhan yang
135b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog mi byed cing // ser sna spangs nas chos mos pa// g.yo sgyu dag ni mi spyod cing // bud med lus la skyo ba dang // byams sems zhe sdang rab spangs nas//
135b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag par bden tshig smra ba dang // 'dod bstsal ngag rtsub spangs nas ni// yang dag lta la gnas par bya// gang gis bud med lus skyo nas// 'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub
135b7(dkon brtsegs): byed na// myur du bud med dngos spangs nas// skyes pa'i lus bzangs len par 'gyur// gzhan yong bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na// bud med kyi dngos po
135b8(dkon brtsegs): las ldog par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la bla mar byed cing chos la shin tu mos pa dang / tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / mang du thos pa dang ldan
136a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byed pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khyim gyi dngos po dag la mngon
136a2(dkon brtsegs): par zhen cing chags pa med pa dang / bslab pa'i dngos po yang dag par blangs pa rnams 'jig par mi byed pa dang / srog chags thams cad la log pa'i bsam pa mi skyed pa
136a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bud med kyi dngos po la yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba dang // byang chub kyi sems kyis skyes bu chen po'i chos la gnas pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i
136a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim gyi 'tsho tshis rnams la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam lta bur lta ba gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas rab
136a5(dkon brtsegs): gus chos la mos// tshul khrims mang thos bla mar byed// 'dod chags sred sems mi skyed na// bud med dngos po myur du spong // khrims su ngo tsha khrel yod ldan// gzhan
136a6(dkon brtsegs): la mi bden bsam mi byed// byang chub sems la rab gnas nas// theg pa gzhan la mos byed na// des ni myur ba kho nar yang // mi gtsang bud med dngos po spong //
136a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa mchog gis sems skyon// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang // chos rnams rang bzhin ga yo med dang // sgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong dben zhes// nan tan yang dag chos
136a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms na// myur tu skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur// de nas bu mo rnam dag dang bas// gser gyi phreng ba de dag bcom ldan 'das la gtor ba dang / steng gi bar snang la gser
136b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dag tu gyur nas/ gzhal med khang de dag gi nang na/ sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa sha stag
136b2(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur to// de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang / so so nas rgyan rnams bkrol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ba dang / steng gi bar snang la gser
136b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi gzhal med khang dang / rin po che'i gur dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to// de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis/ de lta bu'i chu
136b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul chen po mthong ba dang / skad mthun par tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bcom ldan mi mchog khyad par 'phags pas na// thugs rjes sems can rnams la sman par
136b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// bdag cag deng ni byang chub sems skyed nas mos pa rjes mthun rab tu 'dul la gnas// bcom ldan 'dren pa bde bar rab sol nas// bdag cag mi mchog
136b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni mchod par bgyi// chos thos dbang gis rdul rnams rab spangs nas// bdag cag the tsom nem nur yang ma mchis// des na bud med nyon mongs mang spangs nas
136b7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs gtan bcom bdud ni pham par bgyis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba tshad med rnams// bdag cag dga' bas rtag tu mchod par 'tshal// sbyin dang
136b8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims brtsod 'grus rib gnas nas// bzod dang bsam gtan sems ni rab tu bgyi// thabs dang shes rab sems can rnams yongs bsdus nas// byang chub
137a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog lam gang lags mngon tu bgyi// lha mi 'khor ni tshad med sman btags nas// thams cad theg chen sems ni skyed par skul/
137a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs par 'gyur// bdag cag lha mi ston par bgyid par mchi// de nas bcom ldan 'das mdzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
137a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni nam mdzum pa mdzad pa ni/ 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / len rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag
137a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ nam tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par byas nas//
137a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la len gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tu thim par gyur pas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las
137a6(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du mdzum pa mdzad pa 'di lta bu bstan par mdzad lags//
137a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo rnam dag dang ba 'di mthong ngam// kun dga' bos gsol pa mthong lags so// bcom
137a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo bu mo rnam dag dang ba la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag ni 'di nas tshe zad pa dang / bud med kyi lus spangs nas/
137b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye ste/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa dang / skal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bkur bsti dang / rim gro dang /
137b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas/ bu mo rnam dag dang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'od ces bya bar
137b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer gyi bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa'i ming ni rtag tu snang ba zhes bya'o//
137b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni dga' ldan gyi lha bzhin du tshe lo stong phrag bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na yang byang chub sems
137b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' shig gi 'khor tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gis 'khor byed par 'gyur ro// bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang 'khor 'di dag
137b6(dkon brtsegs): gi nang gtso bo mchog byed par 'gyur ro// ci ltar da ltar nga'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa drug cu po 'di dag gtso bor gyur pa bzhin no//
137b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo bud med gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas yongs su 'dzin par byed/ glog par byed/ kha ton du 'don par byed na/ bud med kyi
137b8(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di gtugs nas/ phyis yang len par mi 'gyur zhing myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// /
138a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bu mo rnam dag dang ba la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang
138a2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' nas mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkan
138a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las// / bu mo rnam dag dang bas zhus pa'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu pa rdzogas+ho//
138a4(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya mai tre ya brid tsa pa ri brta ma ma ha phA na su tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po
138a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas dang // / byang chub sems dpa'
138a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma rgan/ chu srin byis pa gsod pa lta bu'i ri 'jigs su rung /
138a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nags ri dgas kyi nags na/ dge slong blargya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pa/ gnas brten nyan thos chen po
138a8(dkon brtsegs): stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u 'di na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / chu tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan
138b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gzi ldan dang / tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas mgo dang / tshe dang ldan pa
138b2(dkon brtsegs): lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byin pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
138b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa blo gros bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
138b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ri rgyal dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin dang / de dag la sogs pa dge
138b5(dkon brtsegs): slong lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa khri dang yang thabs
138b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan dang / zlo
138b7(dkon brtsegs): thos yangs pa dang / spobs pa 'irtsegs pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / me tog dpa lnga dang / 'dzam dpal dang / mngon par
138b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa dang / dmigs pa med pa yid la byed dang / dad ldan dang / rin po che'i tog dang / dbang po'i lha dang / chu lha dang / sgra dbyangs snyan dang
139a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing rnam par ston dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang po'i dbang dang / sa 'dzin dang / sems can/
139a2(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba skems dang / ngan song spong dang / rin chen ze ba can dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
139a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/
139a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig/
139a5(dkon brtsegs): tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
139a6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zha ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
139a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
139a8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa dri ba lung bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes/ byams pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod/
139b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung stan pas sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
139b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pa'i sug par lhung bar mi
139b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ myur du bla na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
139b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/
139b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ tshe rabs dran pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ste/ byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo
139b6(dkon brtsegs): mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
139b7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / ri gus kyi bu mo da ltar gyi dang ma 'ongs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ zhus nas khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'dri bar sem
139b8(dkon brtsegs): ba legs so log so// byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
140a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
140a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur tu bla med pa yang dag par
140a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ chos gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ byams
140a4(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po de dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro ba/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
140a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i
140a6(dkon brtsegs): grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro la// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
140a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig nas yongs su tshol ba dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig
140a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub
140b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos gsum dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
140b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste snying rje chen po dang / stong pa nyid kyi chos nges par sems pa dang / des kyang
140b3(dkon brtsegs): rlom so so su mi byed pa ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i gro po'i lag
140b4(dkon brtsegs): tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems
140b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
140b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims la gnas pa yin/ chos thams cad la som nyi med pa yin/ dge ba'i chos la mngon par
140b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yin/ yang dag par zhugs shing yang dag par blangs pa las mi g.yo ba yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi de dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad
140b8(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'o lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams gzhan yang
141a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med
141a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang /
141a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag la rtog pa dang / chos la mngon par dga' ba dang / gzhan la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa yin/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan
141a4(dkon brtsegs): song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa
141a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos drag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro la// myur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
141a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ drag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brkam pa med pa yin/ sdang ba med pa yin/ rmongs pa med pa yin/ dris ma thag du
141a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du lan ldan pa yin/ bsnyen par dka' ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems
141a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos drug po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pA lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
141b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig/
141b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
141b3(dkon brtsegs): dran pa la mkhas pa yin/ chos la mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ dga' ba thob pa yin/ shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ ting nge
141b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la mkhas pa yin/ shes rab kyis rab tu mkhas pa yin te/ byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad
141b5(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan
141b6(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grog so po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
141b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag par lta ba can yin/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa can yin/ yang dag pa'i ngag can yin/
141b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' can yin/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba can yin/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba can yin/ yang dag pa'i dran pa can yin/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
142a1(dkon brtsegs): gcan yin te/ byams pa chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur
142a2(dkon brtsegs): tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu dang ldan na/ ngan song
142a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ dgu gang
142a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na 'di lta ste/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/
142a5(dkon brtsegs): dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang rab tu dang
142a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so//
142a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas gtang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa
142a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa/ gtang spobs pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so// bde ba yang spangs te snga nas
142b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/ gtang snyoms dang dran pa yongs
142b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes
142b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched pa sgrubs te
142b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas
142b5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i
142b6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs
142b7(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas
142b8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu bo de dang ldanan/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'grol/ myur du bla med pa yang da/
143a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/
143a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bcu gang
143a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ thabs kyis 'gro ba'i ting nge
143a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par snang byed kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ kun tu gasla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin//
143a5(dkon brtsegs): rin chen zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo//
143a6(dkon brtsegs): dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi
