143a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul/ myur du byu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rer pa byamasapa
143a8(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ bla ges phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mogayos pa'i wA/
143b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo byar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
143b2(dkon brtsegs): bstod do// sngon chad sbyin pa sbyin mdzad pa// sdug pa'i bu dang zas skom dang // mig dang mig kyang gtong mdzad de// sangs rgyas sbyin kun pha rol phyin// g.yag rnga bzhin du yun
143b3(dkon brtsegs): ring nas// khyod kyis tshul khrims ma nyams bsrungs// khrims kyis khyod 'dra' ma mchis te// sangs rgyas tshul khrims pha rol phyin// bzod pa'i stobs ni bskyed mdzad na//
143b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pas nongs pa bgyis pa bzod// bzod pa'i stobs rnams kun dang ldan// sangs rgyas bzod legs pa rol phyin// brtson 'grus stobs ni bskyed mdzad nas/
143b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba de bla na med pa brnyes// brtson 'grus stobs kyi stobs dang ldan// sangs rgyas brtson legs pha rol phyin// sdig pa thams cad sreg mdzad de// 'dren pa skyes chen
143b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dgyes// bsam gtan stobs kyis stobs dang ldan// sangs rgyas bsam legs pha rol phyin// chos rnams de dang rang bzhin stong // ngo bo nyid kyis gang
143b7(dkon brtsegs): mi skye// shes rab kyis ni pha rol gshegs// sangs rgyas shes legs pha rol phyin// mkhyen chen byang chub shing drung du// sder bcas bdud ni khyod kyis btul/
143b8(dkon brtsegs): don gyi mchog ni brnyes par gyur// sangs rgyas bdud kyi tshogs ngan 'joms// skyes chen ba ra na ser ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// mu stegs chog ngan skrag par mdzad/
144a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mu stegs can tshogs 'joms// shes rab chen po bla na med// kun nas zla dpe' yong ma mchis// dkon mchog chos de/
144a2(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad// 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od mdzad lags// sbyin pa dang ni khrims stobs dang // bzod brtson khyod dang 'dra ma mchis// kun gyi pha rol phyin par gyur// sangs
144a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan mang po 'phags// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su pa 'di dag gis mngon
144a4(dkon brtsegs): par bstod nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub
144a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'di ltar shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / 'di ltar
144a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang yi ge mtshungs pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'di ltar zab mo'i tshig gis ston pa dang / 'di ltar legs par 'phel ba'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / dran pa'i tshig gis
144a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
144a8(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa nas/ rjes su dran pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa
144b1(dkon brtsegs): sa pa sa nga sa mas sa/
144b2(dkon brtsegs): rlu ba ma dus na/ bags pags med pa pas ba gyur bad ma 'dus sa/ de bzhi ga shegs pa datha nam pacing dag pa
144b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lce dang mi rnam
144b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces
144b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ bskyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/ grong bar bdu phyin pa dang /
144b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa mdzes pa/ dad par bya ba/ dbang po zhig
144b7(dkon brtsegs): bugs ni pa/ dul ba dang ni gnas kyi mchog brnyes pa/ dul ba dang gi gnas kyi dam pa'i rnas pa/ dbang po bsrungs pa/ glang po che thul pa lta bu// 'tsho ltar dang ning rlig/
144b8(dkon brtsegs): ba med la gsal ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis sku legs par rgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad sru de dag gis sku rnam par spras pa/ shing
146a1(dkon brtsegs): sa lha'i rgyal po me tog shin tu rgyas pa 'dra ba/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ zhal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhi ba/
146a2(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar lam me lhan ne lhang nge ba/ shing n+ya gro ta ltar chu zhing gab pa/ 'od 'bar ba'i skas dpal chen po 'bar ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de
146a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur te/ de sems dad nas 'di snyam du sems ste/ a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di rnam par spras shing kha dog dang //
146a4(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / mtshan rnams kyis 'di ltar 'bar zhing / lam mi ldan ne lhang nge ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis 'di skad
146a5(dkon brtsegs): smras te/ a la la bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lus 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal dang mtshan rnams kyis 'di ltar
146a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ber zhing lam me lhan ne lhang nge bar gyur cig ces smon lam de skad btab nas/ sa la nyal te 'di snyam du bsams so// gal te bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus
146a7(dkon brtsegs): na 'di lta bu'i lus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ kha dog dang gzi brjid dang / dpal dang mtshan rnams kyis 'bar zhing lam me ldan ni ljang ngerang 'gyur nas/ de ban
146a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i zhabs bdag gi lus la reg par gyur cig snyam mo// kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas sa
146b1(dkon brtsegs): bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ga la ba der gshegs te/
146b2(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag
146b3(dkon brtsegs): la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol
146b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mngon par shes pa des snum logs su gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang gis bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i lus la
146b5(dkon brtsegs): rkang pas mi rdzi shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas de nyid kyi tshe bram ze'i khye'u
146b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang dag gis lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon gsum du bya ba'i shes pa thob po// rdzu 'phrul
146b7(dkon brtsegs): yang mngon par bsgrubs so// de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis kyang mngon par
146b8(dkon brtsegs): bstod do// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su bskor te btsal bgyis kyang // 'jig rten dag na mi dbang khyod 'dra yong ma mchis// 'gro ba kun nas rdzogs pa'i sangs
147a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mngon par 'phags// rnam par 'dren pa rang 'byung khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dper na bar snang na ni nyi ma lhan ne ltar// phyogs dang //
147a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs mtshams kun gyi 'jig rten khams rnams na// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad 'od kyis lham mer gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan gzi mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/
147a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar seng ge nags khrod dag na sgra sgrogs pa// wa tshogs phal chen thams cad zil gyis gnon par bgyid// ji ltar mi yi dam pa mthu chen mnga' ba yang / mu steg
147a4(dkon brtsegs): can mang 'dus pa thams cad zil gyis gnon// bde bar gshegs pa smin mtshams bar gyi mdzod spu dkar// dngul dang kha ba'i tshogs bzhin mtha' yas gzi brjid
147a5(dkon brtsegs): can// des ni 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad snang bar bgyis// 'jig rten kun na sangs rgyas khyod ni mi mnyam mnyam// skyes bu khyu mchog zhabs la lha'i 'khor lo
147a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ gsal zhing mdzes la rtsibs stong 'tshal zhing mu khyud 'khor// de dag gis ni ri dang nags bcas sa 'di rnams// rab tu g.yo bgyid thub pa gang zag mtshud
147a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ nyon mongs shas chen dor ba bgyi ba thams cad bor// 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam ni rab tu brnyes// nor rnams kun dang ldan zhing yon tan rnams
147a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis phyag / bsam pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i nor rnams bkad mdzad pa// sa dang mtshungs shing sbyin pa'i gnas gyur mtshungs ma mchis// yon tan kun la mnga' brtse/
147b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam dag pa// ji ltar na mkha' lag pa mi thogs mi chags ltar// 'jig rten dag na khyod la rjes chags khro mi mnga'// bzod pa zad kyis gtugs pa do//
147b2(dkon brtsegs): dang chos rnams kun// snying po ma mchis pa dang gsob gsog tu mkhyen// srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad dag na gang rnams la// rlom sems 'gyur yi sems can
147b3(dkon brtsegs): srog dang dngos ma brnyes// khas dang spyod pa dag dang sbyor dang bsam pa mkhyen// rmad du byung dang rnam par 'byed mdzad sgron mar gyur// chu bo chen pos ded pa'i 'gro
147b4(dkon brtsegs): ba gzigs gyur nas// sngon chad brtson 'grus stobs brtson mthu ni bstan pa mdzad// skye ba spangs shing nyon mongs zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan// thugs rgya chen po
147b5(dkon brtsegs): skye dang rga shi mtha' mar 'byin// nam mkha' dkyil dang mtshangs par chags pa mi mnga' rgyu// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos 'jig rten gsum na rgyu// bdag nyid chen
147b6(dkon brtsegs): po shes rab kyis ni snang bar mdzad// mun pa mun gnag gyur pa thams cad rnam par sel// 'dod chags rdul zhi mdzad cing zhe sdang gti mug gi/ dri ma sna tshog/
147b7(dkon brtsegs): mun bskul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun dga' bo de tshun chad bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i rdzu 'phrul rnams sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyams par
147b8(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur to// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis sam the tsom zan
148a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i
148a2(dkon brtsegs): khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa
148a3(dkon brtsegs): de la tshigs su pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
148a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de gal te yun ring po de srid nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob lags na//
148a5(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
148a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bkod pa dang / yongs su bzung ba ni gnyis po 'di dag
148a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang she na/ sems can bkod pa dang / sems can yongasu gzung ba dang / zhing bkod pa dang / zhing yong su gzung ba dang / gnyis po 'di dag yin na/
148a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ zhing gi bkod pa rnam par spangs shing / zhing yongs su
148b1(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba yongs su gzung ngo // kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ngas ni sems bkod pa rnam par sbyangs/ sems can yongs su gzung ba/
148b2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gzung / zhing bkod pa yang rnam par sbyangs/ zhing yongs su gzung ba yang yongasu bzung ngo // kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
148b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i 'og tungs/ gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
148b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das nas/ bskal pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhin bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rig pa las/
148b5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo ngas brtson 'grus 'bar ba byas nas/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun dga' bo ngas brtson
148b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rlabs po ches myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs so// kun dga' bo chos bcu po 'di dag gis nga myur tu bla na med pa
148b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang ba dang / chung ma spangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / bu pangs
148b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su btang ba dang / mgo 'phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / mig phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / rgyal srid phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / longs spyod phangs pa/
149a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btang ba dang / khrag 'das pa yongs su btang ba dang / rus pa dang nang bangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / yan lag pangs pa
149a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cadasam su bta bas sgru ma med pa 'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed nab mngan par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun dpa ma tshas chu ba de dag gis dbyung
149a3(dkon brtsegs): tha mad pa yang dran par rdzogs pa'i bring dris mngon par rdzogs pa sa sa rgyas so// kun ga ba gtan pang chos bcu myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
149a4(dkon brtsegs): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kun dga' bo nga tshul khrims kyi yon gyi nos la gnas te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
149a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo nga bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pas/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
149a6(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo nga brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pas/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
149a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas so// kun dga' bo bsam gtan gyi yon tan la gnas te/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
149a8(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
149b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo ngas sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang bas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
149b2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo nga thabs la mkhas pa la gnas te/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo nga
149b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la sems snyom pas/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo ngas sto/
149b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi chos rtogs pas/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo ngas mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
149b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i chos rtogs pas/ m+WAr tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nungab mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// kun dga' bo chos bcu po de dag gis dbyug
149b6(dkon brtsegs): ma pa yang dag pa sa pa rnas nga sa // sma du bu ga d+hA
149b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de/ gal te khyod kyis shes su zin na/ kun dga' ba khyod kyis spobs
149b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung / gad ci'i phyir zhen/ kun dga' ba sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyam bu gan du nang bams cad tshun pa zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang tha ma
150a1(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa/
150a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/ grong bar du phyin pa dang / gnod pas nyen cing sdug bsngal la/ nad tshobs chen pos btab pa'i mi zhig mthong ngo // ma
150a3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de snying rje bar gyur te/ mi dag la der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smraso// kye ma khyod ci sdug bsngal lam/ des smras pa/ lha bdag ni nad kyis
150a4(dkon brtsegs): btab bo// des smras pa/ kye mi khyod kyi nad cis zhi bar 'gyur/ khyod la ci spyir/ des 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus las
150a5(dkon brtsegs): ci tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur khrag cig btung du gyur pa lta na/ bdag gi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa des/
150a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang gi lus phug nas khrag gzags te/ mi de la btung bar byin no// kun dga' bo mi des 'thungs ma thag tu/ mi de'i nad sos par gyurate
150a7(dkon brtsegs): kun dgu' brgyal bu gzhon nu ra thams cad sbyin pas rang gi lus drug ste/ khrag thams cad ga phags kyang 'thong pa'i ba'i sems gcig pang med do// kun da
150a8(dkon brtsegs): po'i'i che de'i dus na rgyal du gnon nu dor bams cad sbyin par gyur pa de gzhan nag yin sram du khyod dgas shing 'ad gnyis za'am/ bcom pan de sbyar mi bgyi'o//
150b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni tshad gzung du yod
150b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su rje tshol zhing / nges sngon sems can rnams la khrag byin pa ni tshad med do// kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
150b3(dkon brtsegs): dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal
150b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro ste/ grong bar du phyin pa dang / skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab pa'i mi gnad pas nyen pa sdug bsngal ba
150b5(dkon brtsegs): nad tshabs chen po zhig mthong ngo // des de mthong nas kyang snying rje bar gyur te/ de mi dag la der song nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye ci zhig gis mi khyod kyi nad zhi bar la
150b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la ci zhig sbyin/ des 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag gis lnga khyod kyi lus las ci tsam zhig gis tshim par 'gyur ba'i rkang nig zab pa lda na/ bdag ga
150b7(dkon brtsegs): nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog de nim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas/ bde ba dang yid bde ba smos te rang gi lus brdungs nas/ rkang khrus
150b8(dkon brtsegs): te mi de'i lus la bskus so// kun dga' bo nga skyes ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos par gyur to// kun dga' bo rgyal po gzhon nu me tog gis rang gi lus brdungs rkang gzugs/
151a1(dkon brtsegs): nas sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa
151a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis za 'am/ the tsom za na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya bar gyur to// kun
151a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i tshad gzung du yod kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing ngas sngon sems can rnams la rkang byin pa ni tshad medo//
151a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyal
151a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'byor pa sbyin po dang / rgyal ba'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yang bde bste / chos tshal du 'ag ste/ thong bar du phyin pa dang / mi mig med pa long ba dbul lo gas
151a6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ spong mo byed pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de steng rje bar gyur to// de nas mi de rgyal po zla 'od gal ba der song ste/ phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha khyodam
151a7(dkon brtsegs): skyed do// khro khyod ni dgyes so// bdag ni sdug bsngal lo// long ngo // mig sa mchis so// dngul so// bzhin no// spongs po 'o// bgon pa mchis so//
151a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa ba denas kyim pazlal rgyas me de yang me ma cig ca sa/ dus kyi kyim pagapa bzhin du de la 'di ga ces smras so// sam khyong sa ci dgas
151b1(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gzhon pa dang / rgyan pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che sna tshogs sbyin par bya 'am/ khyod la gang dgos pa de
151b2(dkon brtsegs): smros shig/ mi des smras pa/ bdag la mi 'tshal na/ bdag la mi stsal bar gsol/ kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po zla 'od des/ rang gi mig phyung ste mi de la byin no//
151b3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rgyal po zla 'od kyis rang gi mi phyung ste mi de la byin yang de'i sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya bar
151b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis za 'am/ the tsom za na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od
151b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya bar gyur te/ kun dga' bo ro'i rgyal po ro rab la ni tshad gzung du yod kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing ngas sems
151b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la mig byin pa ni ches mang ste/ tshad med do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na//
151b7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa bde ba 'jug pa bde ba/ lam bde bas b+hA na sde pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa
151b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pas ni/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ lag pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/ rkang pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/ chung ma yongasu btang
152a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
152a2(dkon brtsegs): ma byas/ bu phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/ grong dang grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
152a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe//
152a4(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pas/ theg pa bde ba/ 'jug pa bde ba/ lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par bsgrubs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa/
152a5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas thabs mkhas pas lam gang la gnas nas/ bla na/
152a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
152a7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nyin lan
152a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ ral mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gsum du byas te
152a9(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
152b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog bgyid cing // mtho ris lam ni rab ston la// rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/
152b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su// bdag gis de dag bshags par bgyi// bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis// bsod nams tshogs
152b3(dkon brtsegs): ni skyes pa de// bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon de// bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa gang 'byung ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen/
152b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yi rang bas// de la bdag ni yi rang ngo // sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyid// bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni ye shes
152b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' bya chub mchog/ 'tshang rgya bgyid par skal ma 'debs// byang chub dam
152b6(dkon brtsegs): pa sangs rgyas zhing // sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas// srog chags kun la sman slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 'gyur cig/ chos rje chen po'i sgra yis ni// sdug bsngal
152b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can mthar bgyid shog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs 'gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying 'gyur cig/ srid pa'i srad bus dmapa
152b8(dkon brtsegs): patata 'ching ba kun gyis bcings bdag la// rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs su gsol// sems kyis dri mar bgyis pa lags// sangs rgyas rnams ni spod mi mdzad//
153a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang // gang dag 'das/
153a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ma byon dang // de dag rjes su bdag slob cing // byang chub spyad pa spyod 'gyur cig/ pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// 'gro drug sems can 'thar bgyid shog
153a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas// bla med byang chub reg 'gyur cig/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang // rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis// rnam rig ma mchis dngos
153a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// stong pa'i chos ni rtog par shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar// sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis// bdag
153a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa ni// dngos po kun la mi gnas par// sems can kun la bde slad du// ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong
153a6(dkon brtsegs): shog/ dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas// bdag gi longs spyod lhan grub shog/ dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ khrims
153a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing // tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sa 'am yang na
153a8(dkon brtsegs): chu 'am me// rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing // bzod pa'i khro ba ma mchis par// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis//
153b1(dkon brtsegs): brtan sgro le lo ma mchis shing // stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang // dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
153b2(dkon brtsegs): dang // rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang // rigs gsum mngon
153b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum bgyis pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang // 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i brtson
153b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs 'gyur cig/ de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing // byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis// pha rol phyin drag rdzogs byas nas// sa bcu po/
153b5(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gang la gnas nas thabs la mkhas pas theg pa bde ba/ 'jug pa bde ba/ lam bde
153b6(dkon brtsegs): bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yin no// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byan
153b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba/ zhe sdang chung ba dang gti mug chung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa
153b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ phyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mo par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar zhing rnam par sbyang so// kun dga' bo dus de dang chod de 'byung /
154a1(dkon brtsegs): ba yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dag 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan
154a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag byung bar gyur te/ de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa smon lam gyi dbang gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
154a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa'i tshe/ sems can
154a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyis shas che ba dang / zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang / gti mug gi shas tsho ba dang / 'dod chags bdo ba dang / gAti mug bdo ba dang / chos ma yin pa la chags
154a5(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa dang / chags pa yang zil gyis non pa dang / chos log pas yongs su zin pa dang / pha la khu ba dang / ma la 'khu ba dang / spun la 'khu ba dang / ming sring la 'khru/
154a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / khyod shugs la 'khu ba dang / nye dul 'khu ba dang / 'phags pa la 'khu ba dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la la khu ba dang / bdag la 'khu ba dang / mi la 'khu ba dang /
154a7(dkon brtsegs): mi dri ma can dang / mi dmu rgod dang / mi cang shes pa ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci ma rung
154a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes de ltar smon lam yongasu sbyangs te/ dus yang ba 'di lta bu la gnas nas/ kun dga' bo ngas snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ ngad
154b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su zhugs te/ chos ston pa nang la kha ngan zer zhing gshe rgya ste/ cho ga
154b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi dbyung ba/ rtsub pa brlang pos spang bar byed do// kun dga' bo nga la chad par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro// rtag par sba ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro// 'khor 'dod pa mang
154b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes kyang gleng ngo // 'dod pa che'o zhes kyang gleng ngo // khyim gyi nang du zhugs na yang nga la sas kyang 'thor ro// dug dang sres pa'i kha zas kyang sbyin no// me'i phung po yang nye bar
154b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs so// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas su gyur kyang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba lta bu 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pas/ nga la skur pa yang btab po// kun dga' bo nga ni snying rje chen po
154b5(dkon brtsegs): mdun du byas te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ da ltar sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun dga' bos 'di
154b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de lta bu de dag chos ston pa mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba
154b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba/ khur chen po bsnams pa/ dga' bar mdzad pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
154b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dug ga
155a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa dang / bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
155a2(dkon brtsegs): khur chen po bsnams pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ gang dag sems can de dag sems can de 'dra ba dag la/ chos ston pa ni/
155a3(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba mdzad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun
155a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi khyu mchog gi gnas 'di thos nas spu zing zhes
155a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar logs so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/
155a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar ya/
155a7(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/ byang chub kyi dgongs pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
155a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
155a9(dkon brtsegs): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa che
155b1(dkon brtsegs): pa chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho//
155b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya me tri ya pa ri prid tsa/ na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa
155b3(dkon brtsegs): las/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos/
155b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
155b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pa zhes bya ba/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos
155b6(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
155b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
155b8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdage phyogs 'ga' zhi ga zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen brgya
156a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris
156a2(dkon brtsegs): shig dang / de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
156a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
156a4(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te/ khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
156a5(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin rtogs nas/ 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo ba dang / yongasu mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las
156a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes kyis/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
156a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa leg so// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems la khyod yang
156a8(dkon brtsegs): leg so// byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te// byang chub sems
156b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems/
156b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongasu mi nyams te/ khyad par
156b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas/ 'khor ba nas
156b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/ yongasu mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
156b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sbyor ba phun sum
156b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yin/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin/ byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin/ thab la mkhas pa yin/
156b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la
156b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/
157a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bas pa'o nges pa yin/ dge 'dun
157a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin te byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
157a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa
157a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshi/
157a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na
157a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze
157a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / 'phod pa dang / slong ba rnams glos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams gtong ba dang / sbyin bdag tu gyur pa yin te/
157a8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams po ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
157b1(dkon brtsegs): yong su sngo ba la mkhas pa yin na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang ci
157b2(dkon brtsegs): yang rung ste/ de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu yong su sngo bar byed de/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yong su sngo ba
157b3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
157b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa
157b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byam pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun
157b6(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnod sems med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i
157b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ gong+ka sems med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum
157b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yin no// byams pa 'i lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i bas la gangs pa med nan/ byams pa 'das byang chub sa sa dpa sas
158a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po ni kun rdzob kyi don la mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i don la mkhas pa yin/ gnyi ga'i don la mkhas pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang /
158a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges pa
158a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di sgrub ste/
158a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye
158a5(dkon brtsegs): mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyi reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i
158a6(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de
158a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'a
158a8(dkon brtsegs): pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched
158b1(dkon brtsegs): drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/
158b2(dkon brtsegs): len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gag pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
158b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' shig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
158b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/
158b5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams yongs su mi nyams te/ khyad par thob par 'gyur/ bdud phyir rgol ba brtsa
158b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas/ 'khor ba na yongasu mi skye bar 'gyur/ yongs su mi
158b7(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba'i yid dang ldan nas kyang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom
158b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang /
159a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
159a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// /
159a3(dkon brtsegs): shu log ka brgya bcu rtsa gsum mchis// 6/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ko sh+ya pa pa ri pa rta na ma ma ha ya na su tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags
159a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
159a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab pa rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas
159a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa khri drug stong thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe
159a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chos bzhi
159a8(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos dang chos smra ba la mi gus pa yin/ chos smra ba la ser sna
159b1(dkon brtsegs): byed cing chos la slob dpon gyi dpe khyud byed pa yin/ chos 'dod pa'i gang zag rnams la chos kyi bar chad byed cing 'dun pa zlog par byed/ rnam par 'khrug par byed de/
159b2(dkon brtsegs): mi ston cing rab tu 'chab pa yin/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod yin te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongasu
159b3(dkon brtsegs): nyams par 'gyur ba'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// chos smra ba la gus pa med pa yin// chos la ser sna byed par gyur pa dang // chos la slob dpon dpe mkhyud byed
159b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin// chos 'dod rnams la bgegs ni byed gyur cing // 'dun pa zlog la de bzhin rnams 'khrug byed// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni yong mi ston// lo lo
159b5(dkon brtsegs): can de bdag stong rtag tu brtson// gzhan la smod par byed la mngon par dga'// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi// shes rab nyams par 'gyur
159b6(dkon brtsegs): bar rgyal bas gsungs// chos bzhi 'di dag rab tu spangs byas la// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos bzhi gzhan bsgom mo// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag
159b7(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa
159b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bkur sti dang / tshig su bcad pa la mi re bar ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin/ mang du
160a1(dkon brtsegs): thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar rig nas/ mgo 'am gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du thos pa yongasu tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par byed
160a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ nan tan snying por byed kyi/ smra ba dang brjod pa'i tshig lhar sten pa ma yin te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di/
160a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ chos smra ba la gus dang bcas pa yin// zang zing med par rnyed dang bkur sti la// re ba med cing tshigs bcad mi sems par// ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la/
160a4(dkon brtsegs): ston// thos las shes rab 'byung bar des rig nas// mgo la 'bar bzhin rtag tu thos pa tshol// de ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin// chos bzung nas ni nan tan bya phyir gnas//
160a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas de nan tan snying por byed pa yin// tshig lhur mi len smra ba lhur mi len// mkhas pas chos bzhi 'di dag bsten byas nas// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur//
160a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / sbyin gnas la slu ba dang /
160a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'gyod pa med pa dag la 'gyod pa nye bar bsgrub pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / rjod pa ma yin
160a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra tshis su bcad pa byin pa dang / sku dang g.yos gzhan la nye bar spyod kyi/ lhag pa'i bas phe bas ma yid pa ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos pazhi dag dang ldanan/ byang nug
160b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sbyin gnas bla mas bsgo bzhin mi byed dang // gzhan dag la yang the tsom nyer sgrub dang // sems can gang dag byang chub ba zhugs pa/
160b2(dkon brtsegs): de la bsngags min mi snyan smra ba dang // sgra dang g.yo dang brgyan la dor byed pas// gzhan la sten gyi bsam pas ma yin pa// chos bzhi 'di dag kun tu bsten byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub
160b3(dkon brtsegs): sems mchog nyams par 'gyur// de lta bas na chos 'di bsten byed no// byang chub mchog las de ni ring bar 'gyur// de las zlog pa bsten par byed na na// byang chub mchog rab bsngags
160b4(dkon brtsegs): pa reg par 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na skye ba thams cad du skyes ma zag tu/ byang chub kyi sems mngon tu 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar
160b5(dkon brtsegs): ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gi phyir ram/ zan bzhad dgad kyi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na/
160b6(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed par byed cing / de dag gi yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i
160b7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir/ sems can gang rnams yongasu smin par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa ste/ 'od srung
160b8(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon tu 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar tu bar ma dor brjed par mi/
161a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// srog gi phyir yang brdzun tshig mi smra zhing // rtag tu don dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams smra// sgyu dang g.yo ni rtag tu rnams/
161a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs te// lhag pa'i bsam pas rtag tu sems can lta// sems can dag la byang chub gang zhags pa// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par sems// po'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas
161a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang / de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod par byed// sems can gang dag yongs su smin byed pa// bla med ye shes yang dag 'dzin tu 'jug/ chos de dag la rab tu gnas pa rnams
161a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni nams yang brjed mi 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing 'byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de
161a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig tshol ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la lhag par zhen pas khyim la lta ba
161a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par sdang zhing skar pa 'debs pa dang / ma thos pa dang / ma zin pa'i mdo ste rnams spong ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
161a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nga rgyal gyis ni 'jig rten rgyang phan tshol//
161a8(dkon brtsegs): rnyed kyi phyir ni khyim la sbyor ba byed// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas sras la sdang // de dag sngags min kun tu smra bar byed// de ni ma thos pa dang ma zin mdo// bde bar gshegs pas
161b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa spong bar byed// chos 'di dag dang ldan par gyur pa ni// dge ba'i chos kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yis// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyad bsrid/
161b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spang // 'di dag bsten na byang chub rab ring ste// gnas sa ring bas shin tu ring bar 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongasu mi/
161b3(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod tshol ba la brtsams nas legs par thos pa
161b4(dkon brtsegs): chol gyi nyes par thos pa mi tshol te/ sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa'i phyir/ sems khyi dang 'dra ba yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas mchog par 'dzin te/ log par tshol ba thams cad yongs
161b5(dkon brtsegs): su spangs shing / 'phags pa'i rig kyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan dag gi ltung ba byung ba dang ma byung ba mi gleng zhing / gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan mi tshol ba yin/ sangs
161b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos zab mo gang dag de'i blos mi rtogs pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mtha' yas shing / sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa
161b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/ bdag gis ni mi shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon gsum mo zhes byas nas mi spong ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa'
161b8(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ khyad par du 'gro bas mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de ni rtag tu pha rol phyin rnams dang // thabs la mkhas pas
162a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sde snod brtson// nga rgyal med pas khyi 'dra sems kyis su// sems can kun la nga rgyal bcag pa yin// chos dang mthun pa'i rnyed pas chog
162a2(dkon brtsegs): shes shing // 'tsho ba yongs dag 'phags pi rigs la gnas// gzhan bya ltung ba gang bar ma bdang // gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol bar mi byed cing // gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar ma byed//
162a3(dkon brtsegs): gang la de'i blos ni mi rtogs pa// de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon gsum ste// bder gshegs bshad pa'i byang chub mtha' yas pas// rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so//
162a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag rig par gyur pa ni// ye shes khyad par 'phags mchog nyams mi 'gyur// chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dka'// 'od
162a5(dkon brtsegs): srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongasu spang bar bya'o// gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la som nyi dang yid
162a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang / the tsom za ba dang / sems can rnams la nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa rnams la phrag dog dang /
162a7(dkon brtsegs): ser sna byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshig su bcad pa 'byin pa ste/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni
162a8(dkon brtsegs): ma thu cad gyi sesem bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs spang bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// chos rnams la nis ma nyi yi gnyis byed// sems ca
162b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la nga rgyal rgyags khro ston// gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag dog byed// rgyal ba la ni nams kyang dad mi byed// mi mkhas rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' la// bsngags pa min
162b2(dkon brtsegs): dang brjod min mi snyan brjod// gya gyu can gyi sems gzhi rnam par spang // byang chub sems dpas rtag tu sems can bsten// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
162b3(dkon brtsegs): drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba rnams mi 'chab cing rjod de/ rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'chags pas kun nas ldang ba med pa yin/ de'i bden
162b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal srid stor pa 'am/ nor yal ba 'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur yang bden pa'i tshig mi 'khyud cing / gzhan yang gzhan du sbyar pa'i tshig mi smra ba yin/ gzha
162b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis gnod par bya bar skur pa dang / 'tshang 'dra ba dang / smod pa dang / bshad pa dang / bsdig pa dang / rdeg pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'ching bar byed pa'i nyes pa thams cad la bdag
162b6(dkon brtsegs): gis nyes par sems shing / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rten pas gzhan dag la mi 'khrug shing mkhon tu 'dzin pa med pa yin/ de dad pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bsam pa
162b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i phyir thams cad dad par mi 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dad pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i mtshan nyid yin no//
162b8(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ltung ba byung ba 'chab par mi byed kyi// rjod cing rnam par 'byed de nyes pa 'dor// nor dang rgyal srid phyir dang srog phyir yang // 'du shes bskur te rdzu
163a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig mi smra// skur dang smod dang bshang dang gsod pa dang // 'ching ba byed dang go rar bcug pa la// bdag gis nyes sems gzhan la 'khrub
163a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed// las ni bdag gir bya bas kho na mi 'dzin// de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub dang // dad la gnas shing bsam pa dang ldan pa// 'di dag drang ba'i mtshan nyid sangs
163a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gsungs// sems can mchog gis rtag tu bsten par bya// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod de// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa la gces pa
163a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing chos kyi rje su 'thun pa'i chos bsgrub pa la nan tan du mi byed pa yin/ rje su bstan pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing / slob dpon dang mkhan po
163a5(dkon brtsegs): la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/ dam bcas pa las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa kun spyod de/ dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba cang shes
163a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong na/ mi gus shing nga rgyal 'dzin pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// thos pas rgod par gnas par
163a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin// rjes su bston pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur// de ni chos kun gces pa 'dor ba sten// 'phags pa rnams la nam yang sri zhu med// dam bcas nyams
163a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang dad pas byin pa yi// kha zas rnams la de ni rtag tu za'// byang chub sems dpa' cang shes thob pa dag/ mthong bar gyur na gus par mi byed cing // dmu rgod de ni nga chag
163b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gcig mi sten// 'di dag dmu rgod de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// de dag rgyal sras rnams kyis yongs su spang //
163b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i cang shes pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ legs par thos par nyan cing de la nan tan du byed de/ don la rton kyi tshig
163b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bru la mi rton pa yin// gdags ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin cing bka' blo bde ba la legs par byed pa'i las byed cing bla ma la sri zhu bya ba tshar
163b4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin las ma nyams te/ cang shes pas zas za ba yin// byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes rnams mthong na gus
163b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bcas par de la gzhol// de la 'bab te de la bab cing de'i yon tan 'dod pa yin te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes so//
163b6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gang mnyan de ni legs par thos par byed// chos don snying por byed cing nan tan gnas// rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin byed
163b7(dkon brtsegs): cing chos 'dod bka' blo bde bar bla ma sten// tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin la rtag gnas shing // tshul khrims bsdams nas de ni bza' ba za// gus dang
163b8(dkon brtsegs): bcas shing zhe sar bcas pa yin// de la gzhol zhing der 'bab yon tan 'dod// rgyal sras gang dag cang shes thob gyur pa// de dag la ni rtag tu dag
164a1(dkon brtsegs): bas lta// bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni// bder gshegs sras po cang shes thob pa yin// 'od srung bzhi po 'di
164a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa rnams la yin rton pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul
164a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can snod du ma gyur pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems
164a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la/ theg pa dman pa ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can yang dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ tshul khrim dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can rnams
164a5(dkon brtsegs): la brnyas shing tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can kun tu sdud pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'o// de la
164a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste// yongasu ma smin rnams la yid mi brtan// snod min rnams la rgya cher chos mi bshad// rgya chen sems can rnams la theg pa dman// byang chub sems dang
164a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi bshad mi bya// yang dag gnas shing tshul khrims yon tan ldan// dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyes mi bya// tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs mi sdud//
164a8(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang bar bya// 'khrul pa'i chos bzhi 'di dag shes gyur nas// byang chub sems dpas rgyang bsring rnam par spang // 'di dag bsten na byang chub 'tshang mi/
164b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na mkhas pas chos 'di spang // 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / sems
164b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba ste//
164b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sems can rnams la rtag tu sems snyoms bya// sangs rgyas theg mchog yang dag 'dzin tu 'jug
164b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni bstan par bya// sems can kun la dang ba'i sems su bya// yang dag sbyor zhing nan tan byed par gnas// sems can kun la mtshungs par spyad par bya/
164b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal bas rab bsngags te// rgyal sras rnams kyis de dag rtag tu bsten// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa/ grogs po ngan pa ste/
164b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub sems dpas yongasu spang bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa don
164b7(dkon brtsegs): nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan pa gsang tshig sna tshogs kyi spobs pa can dang / gang la bsten pas 'jig rten gyi zang zing kun sdud par 'gyur gyi/ chos kun mi sdud pa'o/
164b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan po grogs po ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas longasu spang bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste//
165a1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos gang dag bdag phan brtson pa dang // gang dag rab tu byung nas rnal 'byor spyod// rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing // bdag gi don tu
165a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du 'dzi rnam par spong // byis pa gang dag 'jig rten rgyang phan klog/ ji ltar bstan bzhin gang dag 'dir rtsod byed// gang la brten na zang zing kun sdud kyi// chos 'di nam yang sdud par
165a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa// de bzhi byang chub sems dpas rab spangs nas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi la brten par bya// 'di dag bshes gnyen ngan dang grogs ngan du// rgyal bas gsungs te
165a4(dkon brtsegs): bgo ma srid yongasu spong // 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi lam ston pa'i phyir slong ba byang
165a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / thogs pa'i shes rab rton pa'i phyir chos smra ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rton
165a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rton pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas bcom
165a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
165a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yongasu rton phyir len pa po// sbyin byed rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin// chos don smra ba thos dang shes rab byed// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par bde gshegs
165b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// gang dag rab 'byung yang dag 'dzin bcug pa// de dag dge rtsa yin par bshes gnyen gsungs// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi lam ni ston pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas
165b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni bde gshegs sras kyi bshes// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bzhi po 'di dag ni// bde gshegs sras kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te// 'di dag ston cing rtag tu bag/
165b3(dkon brtsegs): yod na/ bde gshegs bstan pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang
165b4(dkon brtsegs): bkun bsti don tu gnyer gyi/ chos don tu gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / brjod pa'i sgra tshig su bcad pa don tu gnyer gyi/ yon tan don tu gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / bdag bde ba don tu
165b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyer gyi// sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsngal ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / 'khor gyi tshogs don du gnyer gyi/ dben pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag
165b6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rnyed pa don du gnyer gyi chos 'dod min// brjod pa don gnyer yon tan don gnyer min// bdag bde rtag tu
165b7(dkon brtsegs): don tu gnyer byed cing // sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba don mi gnyer// 'khor tshogs don tu gnyer gyi dben mi 'dod// bde la chags kyi yon tan ma chags pa// bzhi pa
165b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag bcom por gsungs pa ste// de dge byang chub sems dpas yongasu spang // 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa
166a1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dis ste stong pa nyid la yang mos la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang yid ches brtse ba dang / de bdag med par yang babod la
166a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la yang snying rje che ba dang / de'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas la/ sbyor ba 'khor ba na yang gnas pa dang / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
166a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa rnam par smin pa la yang mi re ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// chos rnam
166a4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du rtag mos kyang // las kyi rnam par smin la yid ches so// bdag nyid bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang // sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed// de'i bsam pa rtag
166a5(dkon brtsegs): tu mya ngan 'das la gnas// de'i sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin// yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang // las kyi rnam par smin la ra ba med// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
166a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyan pa dang / chos smra ba la khong khro ba med pa'i seMs
166a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis lta ba dang / bag yod par dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub seMs dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
166a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs kun tu sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// pha rol phyin drug po rnams kyang nyan// chos smra ba la sems ni rab tu dang // mthong na rtag tu gus pa skyed par byed// rtag tu
166b1(dkon brtsegs): bag yod gyur nas dgon par gnas// de ni de nyid la yang rtag tu dga'// bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi// gter chen yin par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs//
166b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams
166b3(dkon brtsegs): cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad rtog pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
166b4(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// byang chub sems ni yongs su gtong mi byed// sems can rnams la khong khro rtag tu spong //
166b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor bar byed// sems can tshogs la brnyas par yong mi byed// bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di dag ni// bad las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos su
166b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// 'di dag bsten na rgyal ba rnams 'dren pa// gser 'dra'i sku mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad
166b7(dkon brtsegs): sdud par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos pa med par dgon pa na gnas pa dang / lan du phan dogs par re ba med pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag dang /
166b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la lus dang srog gtong zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / thos pa dang / don gyis ngoms mi myong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par/
167a1(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa'i brtson 'grus te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// de la
167a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste// dgon par gnas shing tshul 'chos rnam par spong // rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can rnams la byed// dam chos yongs su btsal ba bcom byas nas/
167a3(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog kyang yongasu gtong bar byed// dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mi nyung ba// yang dag bsgrub phyir rtag tu ngoms mi myong // dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/
167a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
167a5(dkon brtsegs): zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la snying rje ba dang / sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems ston pa dang / nyams chung ba rnams
167a6(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pas bsten pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dag cing zang zing med pa'i
167a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis su// chos kyi sbyin byang rgyal bas rab tu bsngags// tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje che// gzhan dag byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed 'jug/ nyam nung rnams
167a8(dkon brtsegs): bzod pas dang du len// 'di ni dge chos yin par gsungs pa ste// 'di dag bsten na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na// byang chub sems dpas 'di dag rtag tu bsten// 'od srung /
167b1(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'jom par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag
167b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sgron ma sbyin pa dang / tha na 'dris pa rnams la yang sbyin pa ste/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa
167b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'jom par byed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag 'dzin byed dang // dam chos 'dzin dang sgron ma sbyir
167b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin tha na dris la sbyin byed cing // mkhas pa ma rigs las rnam par 'byed// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib med pa'i ye shes thob par
167b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srung chos bzhi
167b6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gang dag byang chub la ni sgrib med pa// sdig pa'i bzhi pa'i bcu
167b7(dkon brtsegs): po rnams spangs nas// mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan bsten na// 'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur// sems can dam pa gang dag chos tshul 'di/
167b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin tem klog gam rab tu ston byed pa// de dag bsod nams mtha' yas rgyal bas gsungs// de'i tshad ni rgyal ba rnam brjod do// gang gis zhing gi gang ga'i bye ma snyed/
168a1(dkon brtsegs): rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas// gang gis 'di la tshig bzhi tshig bcad klog/ bsngon mas 'di'i grangs su yang char mi phod//
168a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' ni ming tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o// 'od srang byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa dang / snyoms par spyod pa dang /
168a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba spyod pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang ldan pa la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'od srung yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub
168a4(dkon brtsegs): seMs dpa' zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
168a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes la gzung ba dang / bdag ci ri zhes yongasu 'jal zhing gzhan gyi shes pa la mi smod pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brten pa dang / bcos
168a6(dkon brtsegs): ma ma yin par byams pa dang mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du gtan tu 'dza' ba dang / tshig ran cing mdzum pa'i bzhin gyis/
168a7(dkon brtsegs): bsong por smra ba dang / khur blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po yongs su ma bcad pa dang / yid yongasu mi skyo ba dang / da
168a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yang su tshol ba'i phyir bos pa dang / don gyis ngoms mi myongs pa dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la skyon du lta zhing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la migashe bar sgo ba dan/
168b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongasu sbyong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i gtong ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrim dang /
168b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la zhes 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par
168b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa'i bsam gtan dang / thabs mkhas pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul
168b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal pa rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang / gus par byas te chos nyan pa dang / gus par byas te dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang /
168b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ba dang / theg pa dman pa la mi 'dod cing theg pa chen po la
168b6(dkon brtsegs): phan yon du lta ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa
168b7(dkon brtsegs): lngas rnam par rtsen pa dang / ye shes la rton pa dang / sgrub pa dang / log par bsgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang / gcig tu chad par smra ba dang /
168b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya
168b9(dkon brtsegs): bden pa gcesu byed pa dang /
169a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la phan dang bde bya ba'i// lhag pa'i bsam pa mos par byed pa yin// kun mkhyen ye shes la ni sems sgrol zhing //
169a2(dkon brtsegs): ri 'am mi ri snyam du bdag la dpog/ smon pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal med// bsam pa brtan zhing bcos pa med par byams// mdza' dang mi mdza' rnams la sems kyang
169a3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms/ mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug bar du// sems can rnams la gtan tu rab tu mdza'// 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jam por sba bar byed// khur blangs pa la
169a4(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug zhum pa med// sems can dag la snying rje yongs ma chad// dam chos yongasu tshol la skyo ba med// thos pas mi ngoms bdag gi 'khrul skyon lta// gzhan la
169a5(dkon brtsegs): gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med// spyod lam rnamasu sems ni rab tu spong // gtong ba rnam par smin la re ba med// tshul khrims srid pa'i 'gro bar gnas ma yin//
169a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la bzod cing khro khro spongs// dge ba yang dag bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus dang // gzugs med khams spangs pa'i bsam gtan dang // thabs
169a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis yang dag 'dzin pa'i shes rab dang // bsdu ba rnams bzhis yang dag 'dzin thabs dang // khrims ldan khrims med gnyis med byams pa dang // gus par
169a8(dkon brtsegs): byas te dus su chos nyan dang // gus par byas te 'gon zhi gnas pa dang // 'jig rten sna tshogs dga' bar mi byed dang // theg pa dman la dga' ba mi byed cing /
169b1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa che la 'dod pa skyed pa dang // sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong byed cing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu bsten pa dang // tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi la sgom pa dang /
169b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon shes rnam lngas rtag tu rtsen pa dang // ye shes rjes su rtag tu 'brang ba dang // sgrub dang ldan pa gtong bar mi byed dang // sgrub dang mi ldan gzhan yang ma gtong dang // gcig/
169b3(dkon brtsegs): tu chad par rtag tu smra ba dang // bden la rtag tu gus dang bcas pa dang // byang chub sems ni sngon du btang nas su// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni sgom par byed// bde
169b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs gsungs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis chos// 'di dag bde gshegs sras kyis bstan par bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang yin de dag ni// chos 'di ldan zhes bde
169b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pas gsungs// 'od srung dpe nye bar dgod pa bstan pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab tu shes par byed pa'i dpe
169b6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar dgod pa khyod la bstan par bya'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na// sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste// 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs
169b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la re ba mdo// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yang / byang chub la thug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/
169b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med lan du phan 'dogs par ri ba med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na so 'di skye bo kun gyi 'tsho// len la mi re 'gyur ba med pa bzhin// byang
170a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thog mar sems gnas pa// rgyal mchog bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su// ma gyur bar du skyo bo kun/
170a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtsho// lan la re ba med cing 'gyur ba med// bu dang dgra la yid kyis mtshungs par sems// byang chub mchog rab rtag par yongs su tshol// 'od srung
170a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i khams rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal thams cad skyed par byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam
170a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas te/ gnas pa yang sems can thams cad la dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed do// de la
170a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na chu ni rtswa dang gel ba dang // nags tshal sman dang 'bru yi rnam pa skyed// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bsam dag pa// sems can mtha'
170a6(dkon brtsegs): yas byams pas khyab par byed// sna tshogs chos la khyab pas rims kyis su// dkar po'i chos kyis rnam par rgyas 'gyur zhing // dpung bcas sde dang bcas pa'i bdud
170a7(dkon brtsegs): bcomo nas// rim gyis rgyal ba'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ me'i khams ni lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// 'od srung de bzhin
170a8(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang sems can thams cad kyi dkar ba'i chos thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na me ni rtswa dang sman
170b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang // lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed// de bzhin bde gshegs sras kyi shes rab kyang // skye bo rnams kyi dge ba'i chos mi byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste/
170b2(dkon brtsegs): dper na// rlung gi khams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par sgrub po// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can thams cad la
170b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na rlung ni sangs rgyas dgongs pa bzhin// rnam pa sna tshogs zhing rnams rnam par sgrug
170b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal sras rnams kyi thabs mkhas kyang // bder gshegs gsungs pa'i chos mchog rnam par sgrub// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ bdad sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan
170b5(dkon brtsegs): lag bzhi pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan pa 'am/ yongasu zad par bya bar mi nus so// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag
170b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang bdud thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan pa 'am/ yongasu zad par bya bar mi nus so// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 'ad sadzad bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag
