170b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ba dad thams cad kyis thal gyis/ zla ba yar gyi ro la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skye zhing gang bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa yang dka/
170b8(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos thams cad kyis rdzogs shing rgyas par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yarang ngo la// skye zhing yongs su gang 'gyur 'bri mi 'gyur//
171a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bsam dag byang chub sems dpa' yang // dkar po'i chos kyis rtag tu rgyas par 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
171a2(dkon brtsegs): lan cig byung ba'i 'od gzer rnams kyis sems can thams cad la snang bar byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lan cig phyung ba'i shes rab kyi 'od gzer rnams
171a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang sems can thams cad la shes pa'i snang bar byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na nyi las lan cig byung ba'i// 'od gzer rnams kyis sems can snang bar byed// de bzhi
171a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sras shes 'od gzer gyis// sems can rnams la shes rab snang bar byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ni ga las gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'dza
171a5(dkon brtsegs): mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsrungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzi
171a6(dkon brtsegs): dang shes rab la gnas pa yang ga las gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ral pa can// 'jigs pa
171a7(dkon brtsegs): med par gang du 'dod par 'gro// de bzhin byang chub sems dnga' tshal khrims dang // thos dang ye shes gnas pa dga' mgur 'gro// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ bas glang glang po
171a8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dul po ni// bal thams cad khyer bas yongasu skyob med do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ dzuH
171b1(dkon brtsegs): bo lnga'i khur khyer bas yongasu skyo ba med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na rab dul stobs ldan glang po che// khal rnams khyer yang yongasu skyo ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems/
171b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems rab dul// sems can khur gyis skyo bar 'gyur ba med// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni chu las skyes kyang chus mi gos so// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems
171b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'jig rten du skyes kyang / 'jig rten gyis chos rnams kyis mi gos so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na pad ma chu las skyes gyur kyang // chu 'am rdzab kyis de la gos pa med/
171b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten skyes// 'jig rten chos kyis nam yang gos pa med// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ shing ljon pa yal ga bcad pa ni/ rtsa ba ma snang na
171b5(dkon brtsegs): slar yangs las skye'o// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa nyon mongs pa'i yal ga bcad pa yang snying rje chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba la kun tu sbyor ba
171b6(dkon brtsegs): ma nyams na/ slar yang khams gsum du skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na shing ljon yal ga bcad pa ni// rtsa ba brtan pa ma snang slar yang skye// de bzhin rtsa ba kun sbyor
171b7(dkon brtsegs): ma spangs na// zabs kyis bskul kyang slar yang skye bar 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tha dad pa nas klung chen po'i chu'i phung po rgya mtsho chen po
171b8(dkon brtsegs): bab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ lan tsa'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge sgra'i rtsa ba sgo tha dad pa nas bsags pa byang chub tu yongasu bsngos
172a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na tha dad phyogs kyi chu klung rnams//
172a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho tshor bang ro gcig 'gyur ba bzhin// tha dad sgo nas dge ba bsngags byas pa// byang chub bsngos pa rnams kyang ro gcig 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen
172a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni ri rab la gnas so// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i
172a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha tshogs ri rab gnas// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dgar gnas te
172a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen nyid thob nas chos rnams ston// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ blon pos yongasu zin pa'i rgyal po rnams ni/ rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du
172a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas yongasu zin pa'i shes rab kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na blon por lnga
172a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po rnams// bya ba thams cad rtag tu byed pa ltar// thabs ldan byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang // sangs rgyas don rnams rtag tu byed pa yin// 'od srung 'di/
172a8(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na/ sprin med cing nam zang ba'i na mkha' la ni char bab pa'i rgyu med do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba la yang dag pa'i chos kyi char 'bab pa'i/
172b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na sprin med nam thang na mkha' la// char 'bab rgyu ni rnams kyang mi dmigs so// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thos nyung la/
172b2(dkon brtsegs): chos ston nas yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin chen po las byung ba'i char gyi rgyun ni lo tog thams cad la mngon par bab bo// 'od srung de bzhin du
172b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang / mang du thos pa'i chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi char yang sems can thams cad mngon par 'bab po// de la 'di skad ces
172b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ste// dper na sprin chen grogs dang bcas pa las// char pa bab pas lo tog ngoms par byed// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dam chos kyi// sprin byung chos rgyun
172b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshim par byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang du byung ba der rin po che sna bdun yang 'byung ngo // 'od srung de bzhin du byang
172b6(dkon brtsegs): nub sems dpa' gang du 'byung ba der byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang 'byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// 'khor los sgyur ba'i
172b7(dkon brtsegs): bo gar byung bar// der ni de'i rin chen sna bdun 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' gang du 'byung gyur pa// der ni byang chub yan lag bdun po 'byung // 'od srung 'di lta ste
172b8(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ gang na nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya 'byung ba'i sgo yod pa de ni/ kar sha pa ni brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgo yod do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'byung
173a1(dkon brtsegs): ba yod pa'i sgo yod pa de na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po 'byung ba'i yod de/ de la 'di skad ces pa ste// dper na gang du nor bu rin
173a2(dkon brtsegs): chen 'byung // der na kar sha pa ni mang 'byung ltar// gang du rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems 'byang ba// der ni nyan thos mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/
173a3(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtse gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs pa rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang / yongasu spyad pa rnams ni mtshungs par gnas so// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
173a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dag pa'i sbyor ba yang sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad la mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na 'dres pa'i tshal gnas lha rnams kyi//
173a5(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod rnams kyi mtshungs par gnas pa yin// de bzhin bsam dag byang chub sems dpa' yang // sems can rnams la rtag tu legs par sbyor// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper
173a6(dkon brtsegs): na sngags dang sman gyis yongs su zin pa'i dug gis ni 'chi bar byed mi nus so// 'od srung de bzhin du ye shes dang thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
173a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i dug kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i dug/ skye bo rnams la nyes pa byed mi nus/
173a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' ye shes can// nyon mongs rnams kyis log ltung byed/ mi nus// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ grong khyer chen po rnams kyi lud gang yin pa de ni/
173b1(dkon brtsegs): bu ram shing gi zhing dag dang / gun gyi zhing dag la phan par 'gyur ba yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i lud gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen
173b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la ban par 'gyur ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lung // de ni bu ram shing gi zhing la phan// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i nyon
173b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs lung // de ni rtul ba'i chos la phan pa byed/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phong rtsal ma bslabs pa las mtshon thabs slob pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' thos pa
173b4(dkon brtsegs): nyung ba las dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam 'byed pa dang / dpyod pa dang / don 'dzin pa'i shes par blta'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ so ma btang ba'i snod rnams la ni rdza mkhan gyis
173b5(dkon brtsegs): me chen po gtang dgos so// 'od srung de bzhin du shes rab ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la yang byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me chen po btang dgos par blta'o//
173b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'dod pas tshul bzhin du chos la rab tu sbyor bar bya'o// 'od srung de
173b7(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin du chos la rab tu sbyor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa'o// 'od srung dbu ma'i lam chos
173b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sor sngo rtog pa gang zhe na/ 'od srung gang la bdag med par so/ sor rtog pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang /
174a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med pa dang / shed las skyes pa med pa dang / shed bu med par so sor rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang //
174a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni gang / gzugs la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag
174a3(dkon brtsegs): par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / 'od srung de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gang rtag par so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so so
174a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam/ sa noms la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog
174a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ gang sa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / de bzhin du nu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang /
174a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la/
174a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang mig gi skye mched la rtag par yang so sor mi
174a8(dkon brtsegs): rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye mched rnams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang
174b1(dkon brtsegs): so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung rtag ces bya ba ni mtha' gcig go// mi rtag ces bya ba ni
174b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' gnyis so// mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de na dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ 'od srung
174b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung bdag ces bya ba ni mtha' gcig go// bdag med ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// mtha'
174b4(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten pa ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu
174b5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung sems yang dag pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig go/ sems yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni
174b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis so// 'od srung gang na sems med pa dang / sems pa med pa dang / yid med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa 'di ni 'od srung dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par
174b7(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// dge ba dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas
174b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kying de bzhin no// 'od srung kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// rnam
175a1(dkon brtsegs): par byang ba zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// mtha' de gnyis khas mi len cing mi rjod mi smra ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ 'od srung dbu ma'i lam chos rnams
175a2(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung yod ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// med ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du
175a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ bstan tu med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od
175a4(dkon brtsegs): srung 'khor ba zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan tu med pa/ rten ma yin/
175a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gang yang ngas khyod rnam
175a6(dkon brtsegs): la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched
175a7(dkon brtsegs): drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ rog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis
175a8(dkon brtsegs): rba shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'grub pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen pa 'ang 'ashig pa 'di 'byung bar 'ju'o/
175b1(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug/
175b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gag pas tshor 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gab
175b3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gags te/ de ltar
175b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de la/ 'od srung rig pa dang ma rig pa de dag gnyis ma yin zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'od
175b5(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par song sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / 'dus ma byas dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
175b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa 'gag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs 'gag pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug 'gag pa dang / reg pa dang / reg pa 'gag pa dang / tshor ba dang /
175b7(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba 'gag pa dang / sred pa dang / sred pa 'gag pa dang / len pa dang / len 'gag pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa 'gag pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba 'gag pa dang / rga shi dang / rga shi
175b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa de dag gnyis ma yin zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'od srung 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzha
176a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid stong pa dang / gang mtshan
176a2(dkon brtsegs): ma med pas chos rnams mtshan ma med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / gang smon pa med pas chos rnams smon pa med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid smon pa med pa dang /
176a3(dkon brtsegs): gang mngon par 'du byed pa med pas chos rnams mngon par 'du byed par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / gang ma skyes pas chos rnams ma skyes par mi byed de/
176a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams nyid ma skyes pa dang / gang ma byung bas chos rnams la ma byung bar mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ma byung ba dang / gang ngo bo nyid med pas chos rnams ngo bo nyid mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid
176a5(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid med par gang dag de ltar so sor rtog pa de ni/ 'od srung dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// yang 'od srung gang zag pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa
176a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa'o// 'od srung sngon gyi mtha' stong pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa/ byung ba stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid la rton par bya'i/ gang zag la yin no// 'od srung gang dag stong pa
176a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du dmigs pas stong pa nyid la rton pa de dag ni/ ngas gsungs rab 'di las nyams shes bshad do// 'od srung gang zab tu lta rI rab tsam la gnas pa bla'i/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can stong /
176a8(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung lta bar gyur pa thams cad byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid yin na/ 'od srung gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do//
176b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi nad pa zhig yod la/ sman pas de la sman btang nas sman des de'i nad thams cad bskyod de/ sman lto na 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems//
176b2(dkon brtsegs): mi de nad de las thar par gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags te/ gang sman des nad thams cad skyod nas sman ltor mchis pa nyid ma byung na/ de'i bro nad
176b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu tsha bas cher 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/ 'od srung gang stong pa nyid
176b4(dkon brtsegs): kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na sman pasna nad ni bstsal ba'i phyir// mi zhig la ni bkru sman btang ba las// nad rnams bskyed
176b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bkrus par ma gyur na// de'i gzhi las nad ni sos mi 'gyur// de bzhin lta ba'i thibs por gnas pa las// 'byung ba'i mchog nyid stong pa nyid yin na// gang zhig stong pa kho nar/
176b6(dkon brtsegs): lha gyur pa// de ni gsor mi rung zhes rgyal bas gsungs// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig na mkhas 'jigs skrag nas// brang rdung zhing du ste na mkha' 'di sol/ na mkha'
176b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di sol ces de skad zer naH/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ namakha' de bsal bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mi thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
176b8(dkon brtsegs): bstsal pa// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong dang // bram ze gang dag stong pa nyid kyis skrag rab tu skrag na/ de dag ni sems 'khrugs pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes ngas bshad do// de ci'i phyir
177a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'od srung de dag ni stong pa nyid la spyod la/ de nyid kyis skrag pa'i phyir ro// de la 'di skad ces pa ste// dper na na mkha' 'jigs pa nyan pa'i mi//
177a2(dkon brtsegs): blun po na mkha' 'di ni sol ces zer// na mkha' bsal bar nus pa ma yin yang // rmongs pas byis pa dag ni de skad smra// de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze gang dag cig/ stong pa nyid kyis skrag
177a3(dkon brtsegs): cing sems 'khrugs pa// byis pa de dag stong pa nyid spyod pa// stong pa nyid ni gang du'ang gzhig mi nus// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri mo mkhan zhig gis bdag nyid kyis gnod
177a4(dkon brtsegs): sprin gyi gzugs 'jigs 'jigs lta zhig bris nas/ de 'jigs skrag ste/ khrus bub du 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung bris pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bdag nyid
177a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis byas pa'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis 'khor ba na 'khor yang nos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
177a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na ri mo mkhan zhig gis// gnod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gzugs byas nas// de yis 'jigs te khas thub du// 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur pa ltar// byis pa so so'i skye ba kun//
177a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa yi// gzugs sgra la sogs rmongs 'gyur bas// 'gro ba drug tu 'khyab par 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sgyu ma
177a8(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa sprul nas/ sprul pa des sgyu ma mkhar de nyid zos pa de bzhin du 'od srung dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa yang gang dang gang yid la byed pa de thams cad de la gsog tu snang ngo //
177b1(dkon brtsegs): gsob dang / stong pa dang / snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyi mngon sprul pa// sgyu ma byas pa de yis de zos ltar// rnal 'byor pas/
177b2(dkon brtsegs): ni yid la gang byed pa// de ni de la gsog dang gsob tu snang / 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ shing gnyis rlung gis drul pa de las mi byung ste/ byang nas shing sreg pa de bzhin du/ 'od
177b3(dkon brtsegs): srung yang dag par so sor rtog pa yod na/ 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po skye ste/ de skyes pas yang dag par so sor rtog pa de nyid sreg par byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
177b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na shing gnyis rlung gis drul pa las// mi byung nas ni de nyid sreg par byed// de bzhin shes rab dbang po skyes nas kyang // so sor rtog pa de nyid sreg par byed// 'od srung 'di/
177b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na/ mar me bus na mun pa mun nags thams cad med par 'gyur yang / mun pa mun gnag de gang nas kyang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang nub dang /
177b6(dkon brtsegs): byang phyogs su 'ang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do// yang 'od srung ma re me de 'di snyam du bdag gis mun pa mun gnagra bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'od kyang mar me la brten
177b7(dkon brtsegs): nas mun pa mud gnag med par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de la mar me gang yin pa dang / mun pa mun gnas gang yin pa de gnyis stong pa ste/ gzung du med cing byed pa med do// 'od srum
177b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du ye shes skyes na mi shes pa med par 'gyur yang mi shes pa de gang nas kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang nub dang / byang phyogs su yang 'gro ba
178a1(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'ong ba med do// yang 'od srung ye shes kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mi shes pa bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang ye shes la
178a2(dkon brtsegs): brten nas mi shes pa med par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de la ye shes gang yin pa dang / mi shes pa gang yin pa de gnyis stong pa ste/ gzung du med cing byed pa med do// de la
178a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na sgron mas mun pa mun nag kun// med par gyur kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med// de bzhin shes par gyur mi shes med gyur kyang // de ni gang nas
178a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med// sgron mas mun pa bsal snyam mi sems kyang // snang ba byung nas mun pa med par 'gyur// stong pa gzung med na mkha'i me tog 'dra// de bzhin ye
178a5(dkon brtsegs): shes mi shes gnyi ga stong // 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim dang khang pa dang / khang phran lo 'bum 'das par sus kyang lan 'ga' yang mar me ma bus pa der mi la la zhig
178a6(dkon brtsegs): gis mar me bus na 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ mun pa mun gnag de 'di snyam du bdag ni lo 'bum du bsags pa yin te/ bdag 'di nas mi 'gro'i snyam du sems sam/
178a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi sems lags te/ mar me bus na mun pa mun nag la mi mche ba'i thus ma mchis kyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar ma mchis par 'gyur lags so//
178a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa yang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so sor rtog pa gcig gis med pa/
178b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// 'od srung mar me zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so// 'od srung mun pa mun nag ces bya ba de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las dang nyon
178b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na khyim du mi 'ga' la la yis// ring zhig lon nas mer me bus byas na// de la mun pa bdag gnas ring lon gyis/
178b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas mi 'gro snyam du sems pa med// mar mo byung na mun pa mun gnag la// med par mi 'gyur ba'i nus med de// mir mi brten nas mun pa med par 'gyur// gnyi ga stong pa
178b4(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems ci yang med// de bzhin zag med 'phags pa'i ye shes brten// mi shes nyon mongs bstsags pa med par 'gyur// ye shes dang ni nyon mongs rtag par yang // de dag
178b5(dkon brtsegs): lan 'ga' yang 'grogs pa med// ye shes mi shes med bya mi sems kyang // ye shes brten nas mi shes med par 'gyur// gnyi ga gzung med na mkha'i me tog bzhin// de bzhin
178b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mi shes gnyi ga stong // 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la ni sa bon rnams mi skye'o// 'od srung de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas las byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas
178b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams skye ba ni// mabyung mi 'byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mkhas las sa bon skye ba ni// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar men// de bzhin 'dus ma byas las
178b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos// skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ lud kyis gang ba'i sa la ni thams cad skye'o// 'od srung de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lud
179a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gang ba'i 'jig rten gnas pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na lud bcas
179a2(dkon brtsegs): tshan dang bcas pa la// sa bon skye'o dgon dung rnams na min// de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la// rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye// 'od srung 'di lta ste
179a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ 'brog dgon pa dgon dung rnams na ni pad ma mi skye'o// 'od srung de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba na ma byung
179a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na pad ma chu rdzing rnams na skye// dgon dung dag na namos kyang skye mi 'gyur// de bzhin 'dus ma byas las sangs rgyas chos// /
179a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ lung yod pa'i 'dam rdzab nas pad ma skye'o// 'od srung de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lud yod pa'i
179a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dam rdzab log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na lung bcas 'dam
179a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzab chu las ni// pad ma skye'i thang las nam yang min// de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la// rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na
179a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po bzhi mar sar gyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa blta bar bya'o// de la 'di
179b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste// dper na rgya mtsho chen po mar sar gyis/ yongs gang gtsang zhing kun nas yid du 'ong // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i bde gshegs sras// dge ba'i rlung
179b2(dkon brtsegs): gis rtag tu gang bar blta'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig gis skra tshal pa brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mo rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu thigs pa gcig blangs pa de bzhin du/
179b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'das byas pa blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na chu'i phung po de las ni// skra 'tshal brgya'i rtse mos thigs blangs pa//
179b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyan thos rnams kyi dge byas pa/ dge ba dag dang ldan par blta bar bya// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa'i nang gi na mkha' bzhin du/ nyan
179b5(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi 'dus ma byas pa shes pa blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa'i// nang gi na mkha' de ni chung ba yin// nyan thos 'dus
179b6(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa shes pa yang // de bzhin chung zhing shin tu nung bar blta// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs bcu na mkha'i khams bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus ma byas
179b7(dkon brtsegs): shes par blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na// na mkha'i khams ni sgrib pa med par 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes
179b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas pa// 'gro ba kun gyi mchog kyang de ltar blta// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i btsun mo dam pa skyes bu dbul po dang
180a1(dkon brtsegs): nyal nas/ phyis de la bung byung bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ de rgyal po'i bu zhes bya 'am/ gsol pa/ de ni mi 'gyur legs so//
180a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos rnams chos rnams kyi dbyings las skyes mos kyi/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras dbang bskur ba
180a3(dkon brtsegs): 'os shes mi bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na rgyal po btsun mo yid 'ong ba// skyes bu dbul po dang ni nyal gyur te// de phyir de la bu byung gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po'i bu min
180a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang bskur min// de bzhin nyan thos 'dod chags bral gyur pa// de dag da bu dbang bskur 'os ma yin// 'di ltar de dag bdag la phan phyir brtson// bdag gzhan gnyi ga'i don byed sangs rgya
180a5(dkon brtsegs): sras/ 'od seng 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bos dbang bskur ba/ bran mo ngan pa dang nyal ba de las de'i bu byung na/ 'od srung bran mo ngan pa las byung du zin kyang / de la rgyal po'i
180a6(dkon brtsegs): sras zhes bya'o// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa la 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mthu ma thob tu zin kyang / de ni de bzhin gshes
180a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sras shes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba bran mo dang // nyal bar gyur pa de las bu byung ba// bran mo las ni byung bar gyur kyang de// rgyal po'i sras
180a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'jig rten zer ba ltar// byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa// srid pa gsum na 'khor zhing mthu chung ste// sbyin dang thabs kyis sems can mi 'dul yang // sem
180b1(dkon brtsegs): can dag la rgyal ba'i sras shes bya'o// bam po gnyis pa'o// / 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la/
180b2(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu stobs che zhing mgyon pa'i shugs dang ldan pa mthu rnyed pa stong yod par gyur la/ de dag gang yang 'khor lo sbyar ba'i mtshan dang mi ldan na/ de dag la 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal
180b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa zha 'bring ba nyan thos bye ba brgya stong de dag gang yang byang chub sems dpar ma gyur na/ de dag
180b4(dkon brtsegs): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras 'du shes mi skyed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na mi bdag rgyal po'i sras stong po// 'ga' yang bu'i mtshan dang mi ldan na//
180b5(dkon brtsegs): de phyir de dag gces byed mi nus pas// de la mi mchog bu yi 'du shes med// de bzhin sangs rgyas zha 'bring bye ba mang // 'ga' yang byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' med/
180b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir// de la bde gshegs sras su dgongs mi mdzad// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur
180b7(dkon brtsegs): rna ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa chags nas/ zhag bdun lon te 'byung ba chen po mer mer por 'dug kyang shin tu stobs dang ldan pas/ de la lha rnams re ba skyed kyi/ gzhon nu stobs che
180b8(dkon brtsegs): la mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing mthu rnyed pa de dag la ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung
181a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa/ dbang po yongs su mi smin pa/ nyon mongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa/
181a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa yang shin tu stobs dang ldan pas de la sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis re ba bskyed kyi/ dgra bco
181a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa de dag la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper
181a4(dkon brtsegs): na 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo'i mchog/ de mngal bsod nams mtshan ldan sems can chags// stobs dang ldan pas lha rnams re ba skyed// gzhon nu mthu thob rnams la ma yin
181a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar// byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig sems gnas shing // 'khor bar gnas shing byang chub tshol byed pa// de la lha dang klu rnams re ba skyed// rnam par brgyad po bsam gtan gle
181a6(dkon brtsegs): la min// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig gis/ 'ching bu'i nor bu'i phung po ri rab tsam zil gyis gnon to// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems
181a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na 'od gsal rin chen po dUras// 'ching bu'i
181a8(dkon brtsegs): nor du mang po zil gyis gnon// byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pas// nyan thos stong yang de ltar zil gyis gnon// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ bya ka la bi
181b1(dkon brtsegs): phrag gu sgo nga'i skabs na 'dug pa mig ma bye ba yang 'di lta ste/ zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis pa'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
181b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang po bskyed pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling rtog gis mig khebs pa yang 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa yongs su
181b3(dkon brtsegs): sngo ba'i sbyor ba'i sgra skad kyis/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las gzhon
181b4(dkon brtsegs): na 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa btsas ma thag tu tshong dpon dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi thams cad dang / rgyal phran thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro//
181b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa la yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshal lo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sa bdag chen po
181b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po sa// mtshon gyis lum smras bragagi yang byu // gnan nu na bas par mayongs pag/ khyod khye sa hrAng+yas than pas ca da// dang sbyin bya mas pas
181b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed ma thag/ mtshan ldan rgyal ba'i sras po de la ni// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshal zhing // dang po'i sems kyis shin tu gtses par 'dzin// 'od srung 'di
181b8(dkon brtsegs): lnga ste dper na/ ri'i rgyam po gang rol sman gang dag skye ba de dag mas cad ni dir bya ba med/ ris su bcad pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med de/ nad gang la btang yang nad de rab tu
182a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi sman gang yang dag par sgrub pa de thams cad rnam par mi rtog par sgrub cing
182a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis gso bar rab tu sbyor ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na ri rgyal gangs kyi ri bo la/ sman skyes de dag mi rtog ngar 'dzin med/
182a3(dkon brtsegs): gang la gtang ba de kun zhi bar byed// kha cig nad dang rga ba'ang sel bar byed// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po ye shes sman// yang dag sgrub pa'ang rnam par rtog spangs nas// sems
182a4(dkon brtsegs): can phan phyir thams cad yang dag sgrub// snyoms pa'i sems kyis sems can gso bar byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba tshes pa la phyag 'tshal ba ltar// nya ba la ni
182a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du gang dag nga la rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
182a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ngo // de la 'di
182a7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste// zla ba tshes la thams cad phyag 'tshal gyi// zla ba nye ba la ni phyag mi 'tshal// de bzhin gang dag nga dang de dag gis// rgyal sras byang chub sems la phyag 'chom
182a8(dkon brtsegs): cig/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ yi ge'i phyi mo rnams ni bstan bcos thams cad 'dzin pa/ shes pa'i sngon tu 'gro'o// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems
182b1(dkon brtsegs): dang po bskyed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / byin gyis rlabs thams cad 'dzin pa'i ye shes bla na med pa sngon du 'gro'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil
182b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor btang ste/ sus kyang skar ma'i gzugs la nam yang sngon phyag ma byas so// 'od srung de bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang //
182b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la phan pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nga'i bslab pa la zhugs pa btang ste/ nyan thos la nam yang phyag mi 'tshalo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sus kyang zla ba
182b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spangs nas su// skar ma'i tshogs la nam yang phyag ma byas// de bzhin bslab la zhugs pa nam du yang // nga sras btang ste nyan thos phyag mi 'tshal// 'od srung
182b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ 'ching bu'i nor bu byi dor bas kyang / 'ching bu'i nor bu nam yang nor bu rin po che bai dUr+yar mi 'gyur ro// 'od srad de bzhin
182b6(dkon brtsegs): du nyan thos tshul khrims dang bslab pa dang / spangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan yang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bla na
182b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/
182b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ching bu nor bu byi dor byas kyang ni// 'ching bu dag ste bai dUr+yar mi 'gyur// 'di 'dra de nyid de'i rang bzhin 'gyur// de bzhin nyan thos khrims dang thos pa dang // bsam gtan
183a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing sbyangs kun ldan yang // byang chub snying por 'dug ste bdud btul nas// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin pa che bai durar+ya byi dor byas na/
183a2(dkon brtsegs): de kar sha ba na brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi byi dor byas na/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po
183a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rin cher bai DUr+ya ni sbyang byas na// kar sha pa na mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas sras kyi skyeng byas na/
183a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon thos mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa// 'od srung yul gang du srin bu rnga mo dud ka zhes bya ba mgo
183a5(dkon brtsegs): nag rgyal du nyal ba byung na yul de 'jigs pa dang bcas/ 'tshe ba dang bcas/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas/ 'khrug pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 'od srung gal te yul der byang
183a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byung na/ yul de 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bas na byang chub
183a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson par bya ste/ des dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs nas/
183a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la gtang bar bya'o// ye shes sman ga chol ba des phyogs bzhir song ste/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya'o// yang dge pa'i gsob
183b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams gso bar bya'o// 'od srung de yang dag pa'i gso ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing /
183b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad la stong pa nyid dang / rtag pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma'i dmigs pa yid la byed pa'i thams cad la
183b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad la gnas pa spang ba'i phyir/ smon pa med pa dang / phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i
183b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ phyin ci ldog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa la 'du
183b5(dkon brtsegs): byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa la chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa la mya ngan las
183b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i zhi bas gso ba dang / lus dang tshor ba dang sems pa dang / chos la gnas pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ de la lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba
183b7(dkon brtsegs): can du gnas kyang / lus kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta ba mi ltung ba dang / tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / tshor ba'i rje su lta bas bdag tu lta
183b8(dkon brtsegs): ba mi ltung ba dang / sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang sems kyi rje su lta bas bdag tu lta mi ltung ba dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas/
184a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rje su lta bas bdag tu lta ba mi ltung bas gso ba dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang //
184a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis ni lus dang sems la ril par 'dzin pa dor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang po lnga dang stong
184a3(dkon brtsegs): lngas ni ma dad pa dang le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes bzhin med pa rnams gso ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis ni chos la shin tu
184a4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs shing mi shes pa gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ni 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams
184a5(dkon brtsegs): gso ba ste/ 'od srung 'di ni yang dag pa'i gso ba zhes bya'o// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' gso ba 'di la bslab par brtson par bya'o// 'od srung 'dzam bu'i gling na sman
184a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sman pa'i slob ma ji snyed yod de dag gi nang na/ 'tsho byed ni mchog ces bya'o// 'od srung gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed
184a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed dang 'dra bar gyur kyang / de dag la la la zhig lta ba dang 'byod pa la gnas pa gso ba'i sman gang yin zhes dris na/ de dag gis she
184a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am bstan pa 'am/ bsgo bar mi nus so// 'od srung de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag ni 'jig rten gyi sman tsam gyis mchog par mi bya ba'i/ bdag gis 'jig
184b1(dkon brtsegs): rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman yongasu btsal bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang legs par yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// de ltar/
184b2(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang tshol ba des phyogs bzhir song la sems can rnams yang dag po'i gso ba bya ste/ yang dag pa'i gso bas sam
184b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams gso bar bya'o// 'od srung de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu rkyen la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems
184b4(dkon brtsegs): can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos rnams la mos pa'i shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la mi
184b5(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba dang / sems yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus so// de 'di ltar sems yongs su tshol te/ 'dod chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gti mug par
184b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i sems de gang yin/ ci 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhig yin nam/ de la sems 'das pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'o// ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni/
184b7(dkon brtsegs): ma phyin pa'o// de ltar byung ba ni gnas pa med do snyam mo// 'od srung sems ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyi ga med par yang da mi dmigs so// 'od srung sems
184b8(dkon brtsegs): ni dpyad tu med pa/ bston tu med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa'o// srung sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzig
185a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// log par zhugs pa'i 'du shes las chos rnams byung ba ma gtogs par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
185a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu ci 'dra bar blta zhe na/ 'od srung sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtag/
185a3(dkon brtsegs): bas skye ba rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin to// 'od srung sems ni 'bab chu'i rgyun dang mtshungs te/ mi gnas pa/ skyes nas 'jog cing 'ju ba'o 'od srung sems ni rlung dang mtshungs te/
185a4(dkon brtsegs): ring du 'gro zhing gzung du med par rgyu ba'o// 'od srung sems ni mar me'i 'od 'phro ba dang mtshungs te/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'o// 'od srung sems ni na mkha' dang mtshungs te/ nye ba'i
185a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa glo bur pa rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa'o// 'od srung sems ni glog dang mtshungs te/ skad cig tu 'jig cing mi gnas pa'o// 'od srang sems ni spre'u dang mtshungs te//
185a6(dkon brtsegs): yul thams cad 'dod pa'o// 'od srung sems ni las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir/ ri mo mkhan dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni nyon mongs pa tha dad pa 'byung
185a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'o// 'od srung sems ni gnyis pa mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i phyir gcig pu N+ye ste gnyis su med pa'o// 'od srung sems ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir rgyal po
185a8(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal thams cad skyed pa'i phyir mi mdza' ba dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i phyir bye ma'i khang pa dang
185b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyir zil pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir nya'i mchil pa dang mtshungaso//
185b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sems ni bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyir rmi lam dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i phyir sbrang ma sngon po dang mtshungaso//
185b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sems ni gnod pa rnam pa mang po byed pas phyir rgol ba dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni rtag tu glen ga tshol ba'i phyir gnod sbyin mdangs 'phrog ma dang mtshungs so//
185b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sems ni rtag tu glags lta bas dgra dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni rjes su chags dang khong khro ba dang ldan pas rtag par mthon dman can no// 'od srung sems ni dge
185b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rku bas chom rkun dang 'dra'o// 'od srung sems ni gzugs la dga' bas phi byi zho la'i mig dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni sgra la dga' bas g.yul
185b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rnga dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni bag mi gtsang ba'i dri la dga' ba bzhin du dril dga'o// 'od srung sems ni ro la dga' bas zas kyi lhag ma za ba'i bran mo dang mtshungs/
185b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sems ni reg pa la dga' bas sbrang ma 'bru mar gyi snod la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni kun tu btsal na mi rnyed do// gang mi rnyed pa de ni mi dmigs pa'o/
185b8(dkon brtsegs): gang mi dmigs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// gang 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba
186a1(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin pa de ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o// gang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa de ni yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin no//
186a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa de ni ma skyes pa'o// gang ma skyes pa de ni ngo bo nyid med do// gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de la 'byung ba med do// gang 'byung ba med pa de la 'gag
186a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med do// gang 'gag pa med pa de la 'bral ba med do// gang 'bral ba med pa de la 'ongs pa med/ 'gro ba med/ 'chi 'pho ba yang med/ skye ba med do// gang la 'ong ba yang
186a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ 'chi 'pho ba yang med/ skye ba yang med pa de la 'du byed gang yang med do// gang la 'du byed gang yang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas so// gang 'dus ma byas
186a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs so// 'phags pa rnams kyi ris gang yin pa de la bslab pa med/ bslab pa las 'das pa yang med do// gang la bslab pa yang med/ bslab pa
186a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa yang med pa de la rgyu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med do// gang la rgyu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med pa de la sems kyang med//
186a7(dkon brtsegs): sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med do// gang la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med do//
186a8(dkon brtsegs): gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med pa de la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med do// gang la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa de ni 'phags pa rnam
186b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs te/ 'phags rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la ni las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du shes pa yang med do// gang la las kyang med/ las mngon par 'dra byed pa yang med
186b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs de la ni lus kyi las med do// ngag gi ma yin/ yid kyi ma yin no// rigs de la tha ma dang / 'bring dang / mchog tu rnam par gzhag pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs de ni//
186b3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// rigs de ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'o// rigs de ni lus dang sems dben pa'i phyir dben pa'o// rigs de/
186b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'thun pa'o// rigs de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o// rigs de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa med pas nga'i ba med
186b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// rigs de ni yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa mnyam pa las byung ba ste mi mnyam med pa'o// rigs de ni dam pa'i bden pa yin pas bden pa'o// rigs de ni gtan
186b6(dkon brtsegs): tu mi skye ba'i phyir mi zad pa'o// rigs de ni rtag tu chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o// rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi phyir bde ba'o// rigs de ni
186b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir dge ba'o// rigs de ni bdag yongs su btsal te ma rnyed pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o// rigs de ni rab tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag
186b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// 'od srung nang du yong su tshol la phyi rol tu ma rgyu zhig/ 'od srung ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong khyi rdo la stsogs pa dang mtshungs pa dag 'byung ngo // 'od srung ji ltar dge slong
187a1(dkon brtsegs): khyi rdol sogs pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ khyen ngos 'jigs la/ rdo nyid kyi phyir sogs kyi rdo de sus 'pha
187a2(dkon brtsegs): de la ni mi stsogs so// 'od srung de bzhin du 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg byas 'jigs shing skrag nas dgon pa'i gnas shing /
187a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag na gcig pu gnyis su med par lus rab tu dben par 'dug ste/ chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams snang bar gyur na/ de dag
187a4(dkon brtsegs): de la btang snyoms su 'jog cing gsod nyams su sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas kyi nang du so sor rtog pa la mngon par mi brtson te/ de dag gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
187a5(dkon brtsegs): rag bya rnams cis byung ba mi shes shing khong du mi nod do// de dag gis de ma shes shing khong du ma chud pas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul
187a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu song na yang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis gnod par 'gyur ro// gal te de dag dgon pa na gnas
187a7(dkon brtsegs): ba las 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ 'jig rten pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa de dag mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang de dag dgan pa na gnas pa las
187a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gi gnod par 'gyur ro// de dag de nas shi 'phos nas ngan srong bzhi las ma grol bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can dmyal
187b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bdud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin no// 'od srung de ltar na dge slong khyi rdo la snyogs pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin no// 'od srung
187b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na khyi rdo la snyogs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'od srung gang gshe yang slar mi gshe/ khros kyang slar mi khro// mtshang brus kyang slar mtshang mi 'bru/ brdegs kyang slar mi brdeg/
187b3(dkon brtsegs): bsdig kyang slar mi sdigs/ smad kyang slar mi smod cing nang du sems la so sor rtog ste/ 'di la gshe ba 'am/ khros pa 'am/ brdegs pa 'am/ bsdigs pa 'am/ smad pa 'am/ mtshang
187b4(dkon brtsegs): bras pa de dag gang yin pa snyam du so sor rtog pa'o// 'od srung de ltar na dge slong khyi rdol snyogs pa mi 'dra ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sus 'phangs mi snyogs
187b5(dkon brtsegs): rdo la snyogs par byed// de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze la la dag/ gzugs la sogs pas skrag nas dgon par gnas// de dgon pa de la gnas gyur kyang // gzugs la
187b6(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa sdug po mthong gyur na// btang snyoms 'jog cing nang gi tshul mi shes/ de'i nyes las byung ba gang yin pa// mi shes pas na slar yang grong du gnas// gzug
187b7(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pas der yang gnod par 'gyur// 'dir yang lha'i long spyod pa spyad gyur te// lha dang maM las kha cig shi 'phos nas// de dag ngan song sar ni ltung bar 'gyur//
187b8(dkon brtsegs): blun po de dag shi 'phos sdug bsngal 'gyur// de ltar sdug bsngal brgya ldan de dag ni// khyi rdo snyogs pa 'dra zhes bde gshegs gsungs// spyos kyang mi shes brdegs
188a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi rdeg dang // su 'azhig smad kyang smad par mi byed dang // de bzhin mtshang 'brus mtshang 'dru mi byed dang // khros kyang nges par khro bar mi byed
188a2(dkon brtsegs): cing / \u0f7fnang gi sems kyi gnyen por gyur pa dag/ tshol zhing yid zhe dran dang ldan gyur pas// de 'dra'i tshul khrims rtul zhugs ldan pa ni// rdo sngogs khyi mo 'dra zhes rgyal
188a3(dkon brtsegs): bas gsungs// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ rta'i 'dul spyod la mkhas pas rta gang dang gang du g.yo byed cing ma byang ba de dang de rab tu sbyong ngo // 'od srung de bzhin du dge
188a4(dkon brtsegs): slong rnal 'byor spyod pa yang gang dang gang du sems 'gyur bar mthong ba dang / de dang de rab tu spyod po la 'jug ste/ de ci na phyis 'khrug par mi 'gyur bar de ltar sems
188a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'chos so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na rta'i 'dul chos mkhas pa zhig/ byang zhing g.yo med tshul du rab tu 'dul// rnal 'byor pa yang sems ni 'gyur mthong na//
188a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar phyis 'khrug mi 'gyur de ltar chos// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ rkog nad lha gyis ni srog gi dbang po'agag par byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad
188a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni chos kyi srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha gor srog gi dbang po la// gnod cing de la bde ba sbyin pa mi
188a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin lta bar gyur nang bdag lta ba// de ni chos srog rnam par 'jog par byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi ni gang dang gangadu bcing ba de nyid las dgrol bar bya ba yin no//
188b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems gang dngag la chags pa de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ni gang du bcings gyur pa/
188b2(dkon brtsegs): de dang de las dgrol bar bya yin/ de bzhin sems rmongs gang dang gar chags pa// rnal 'byor pas ni de dang de las dgrol// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i na mkha' la
188b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su chags pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos lhag par 'chang ba ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la
188b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jig rten rgyang phan goms byed brtson pa dang // lhung bzed chos gos lhag par 'chang byed pa// 'di ni na mkha' la ni chags pa ste// de dag byang chub sems dpas
188b5(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i 'ching ba dam po ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i 'ching ba ste
188b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// lta gyur 'ching dang rnyed dang bkur sti dang // grags pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba'i// 'ching ba dam zhes 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs//
188b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag rtag tu rab tu byung bas spang // 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i bar du gcod pa'i chos te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ khyim pa'i phyogs la sten pa dang / 'phags pa'i chog
188b8(dkon brtsegs): la gnod par sems pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ khyim pa'i phyogs la sten par byed pa dang // 'phags pa'i rophyog la rnam par spong byed pa// 'dig
189a1(dkon brtsegs): rab byung bar chung bgegs byed yin// byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang // 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i dri ma ste/ gnyis gang zhen
189a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa mi mjed pa dang / mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster ba'i khyim yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rab tu byung ba nyon mongs mi mjed
189a3(dkon brtsegs): dang // mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas steng khyim ston pa// de gnyis dri mar rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs// byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang // 'od srung 'di gnyis
189a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu byung ba'i sor ba 'bab pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / tshul khrims la so nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yongs su spyod pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// /
189a5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dam pa'i chos ni spong ba dang // tshul khrims nyams kyang spyod pa ste// ser sna bab pa 'di gnyis ni// rgyal sras rnams kyis spang bar bya// 'od
189a6(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i rma yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ pha rol gyi nyes pa la so sor rtog pa dang / bdag gi nyes pa 'chab pa ste 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad
189a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste// bdag gi sbyin ni 'chab byed dang // pha rol nyes pa rtag byed pa// 'di gnyis dug gi mi dang 'dra// rtog pa rnams kyang rma 'di spong // 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab
189a8(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i yongasu gdung pa ste// gnyis gong zhe na/ rnyog pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa las/ bsnyen bkur dang
189b1(dkon brtsegs): rim gro bya ba bdag gir byed pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rnyog dang bcas pa'i sems kyis dung smrig 'chang ba dang / bsnyen bkur rims gro bodang dang gus pa
189b2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dag/ tshul khrims ldan pa rnams las sten par byed pa dang // chos gnyis 'di dag yongasu spong bar bya ba yin// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu ste/ gnyis gang
189b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bslab pa'i gzhi las 'gal ba dang / snying po mo bslangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa ste 'di gnyis so// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nad gsor mi rung ba ste/
189b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sems nges par sems pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams kyi 'dun pa zlog pa ste/ 'di gnyis so//
189b5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mngon pa'i nga rgyal sems la nges sems dang // sangs rgyas theg pa las ni 'dun pa zlog/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i nad yir zhes// gang zag mtshungs
189b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i rgyal bas gsungs// 'od srung dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba/ ji tsam gyis na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba zhe na/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
189b7(dkon brtsegs): kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong dang / cho ga srung zhing tshul chos pa'i dge sbyong dang / brjod pa'i sgra tshig su bcad pa'i dge sbyong dang / yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong ngo // 'od
189b8(dkon brtsegs): srung de la kho dog dang rtag dang dbyibs kyi dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig kha dog dang / rtags kyi dbyibs dang ldan par gyur na/ chos gos snam bskur gyon cing
190a1(dkon brtsegs): mgo bregs te/ lag na lhung bzed thogs mod kyi de lus kyi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/ ngag gi las yongasu ma dag par spyod/ yid kyi las yongasu ma
190a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par spyod cing / ma dul ba/ ma zhi ba/ bsrung ba ma byeng ba/ 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa/ brkam pa le lo can/ tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can yin te/ 'od srung de ni kha dog
190a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la cho ga srung zhing tshul chos pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig cho ga dang spyod yul dang / spyod pa phun
190a4(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs po shing spyod lam bzhir shes bzhin du spyod la/ zas dang skom ngan pa za 'thung 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi pa de dag gis chog par 'dzin/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la
190a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga'/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang / mi 'drel tshig nyung zhing smra ba nyung mod kyi/ de'i spyod lam de dag kyang tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gis yongasu brtag/
190a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/ dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang /
190a7(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzin pa la gnas shing / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la g.yeng sar 'du shes pa yin stong pa nyid smra ba'i dge slong rnams la dgrar 'du shes pa yin te/ 'od srung do/
190a8(dkon brtsegs): cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la rjod pa'i sgra tshigasu bcad pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig ji ltar bdag tshul khrims
190b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas/ tshul khrims srung / ji ltar mang du thos par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur bar so sor brtags nas/ thos pa 'dzin/
190b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bdag dgon par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas/ dgon pa la gnas shing so sor brtags nas/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben par gyur
190b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di ltar gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir gyi/ skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'gog par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma
190b4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ rdzogs par byang nub par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ dgra sbyong gi phyir ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin te/ 'od srung 'di ni brjod pa'i sgra migasu bcad pa'i dge slong
190b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe ni/ 'od srong gang lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba yin na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigasu bcad palta la ci smos/
190b6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams thos nas/ dga' zhing de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa yin mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'dod pa med par spyad pa spyod
190b7(dkon brtsegs): na khams gsum pa la mngon par dga' ba lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid du lta ba yang mi 'dod pa yin na/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / ga
190b8(dkon brtsegs): zag tu lta ba lta 'i smos/ don la rton gyi tshig 'phrul rten pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar pa nang du rol gyi/ phyi rol du rtag pa yin/ chos thams cad shin tu yongs su
191a1(dkon brtsegs): dag cing rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med par mthong bas bdag nyid skyabs yin/ gzhan skyabs ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid du yang
191a2(dkon brtsegs): mi lta na/ gzugs kyi skar lta ci smos/ chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi lta na/ sba ba'i tshig gi lam nas brjod pa lta ci smos/ 'phags pa 'das ma byas kyi dge 'dun la yang
191a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog na/ mang por 'dus par lta ci smos/ chos gang spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'khor bar yang
191a4(dkon brtsegs): mi skye/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mngon par dga' ba ma yin/ thar par yang mi dmigs/ bcings pa yang ma yin/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
191a5(dkon brtsegs): rig nas kun tu mi khong/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin te/ 'od srung de ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge slong zhes bya'o// 'od srung yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur bar
191a6(dkon brtsegs): brtson par bya'i/ ming gis gnod par mi bya ste/ 'od srung dge sbyong ni bzhi pa 'di dag go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig lus dang ngag dang sems ma dag/ ma dul ma bsrung
191a7(dkon brtsegs): ma byang 'dod chen can/ mgo bregs chos gos lhung bzed lag ni thogs// de ni dbyibs rtag dge sbyong yin zhes bstan// cho ga spyod pa la sogs ldan gyur cing // kha zas ngan pa
191a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos la sogs ston// 'du 'dzi rgyang ring yongasu spong byed cing // spyod lam 'phags pa'i rigs dang ldan gyur kyang // de'i de kun dul bar bya phyir men// zhi phyir ma yin/
191b1(dkon brtsegs): skyo bar bya phyir men// stong pa mtshan med ga yang sar 'du shes pa// cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos gnyis pa yin// tshul khrims ting 'dzin sbyangs pa'i yon tan thos// gzhan dag ngo mtsha
191b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin tu gzhug phyir byed// zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar ba phyir min// brjod dang grags 'dod dge sbyong gsum pa yin// gang zhig lus srog don tu mi gnyer zhing // rnyed dang bkur
191b3(dkon brtsegs): sti la ni rgyab kyis phyogs// rnam par thar pa'i bskyod pa'i sgra thos nas// srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad don mi gnyer// chos rnams shin tu stong par yongs brtags nas/
191b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das mthong mi 'gyur// chos la 'dod chags bral bar rtag tu rtog/ ma byas chos rtogs mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi dbul
191b5(dkon brtsegs): po zhig la mdzod 'byor pa zhes ming du btags nas/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dbul po de dang ming 'thun pa yin nam/ gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags/
191b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag dge slong dang bram ze'i yon tan dang mi ldan pa de dag ni gsungs rab 'di las mi
191b7(dkon brtsegs): dbul po zhes ngas bshad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na dbul por gyur pa'i mi zhig la// mdzod ldan ming btags de la mdzes ma yin// dge sbyong nyams la dge sbyong
191b8(dkon brtsegs): ming mi mdzes// dbul la phyag ces btags pa'i dpa' mtshungs// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig rgya mtsho'i chu chen pos khyer la// chus skom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus
192a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de bzhin// 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha gcig chos mang po blangs te kun nub par byas kyang / 'dod chags la sred pa mi sel/
192a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang la sred pa sri sel/ gti mug la sred pa mi sel ba de dag chos kyi rgya mtshos khyer la nyon mongs pa'i skom pas 'tshe ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
192a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chus khyer la// de ni slob bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur// de bzhin chos mang sred pas bag med pa// chos kyi rgya mtshor gnas
192a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ngan 'gror 'gro/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pa sman sgro thogs te phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su rgyu ba de nad cig gis btab nas/ nad de gso mi nus na/ de'i sman de ni don med
192a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang tu blta ste/ gang mang du thos pa des bdag nyon mongs pa'i nad las gso mi nus na/ de'i mang du thos pa de ni don med pa
192a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sman pa'i sman sbyor bcug pa'i sman// 'jig rten kun tu yongs su byed kyang // nad kyis btab pa sazlog par mi nus na// de'i sman de don med gyur
192a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin// de bzhin dge slong tshul khrims yon tan ldan// thos dang ldan yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i// nyon mongs byung ba'i nad ni mi sel ba// de'i thos la brtson pa don med yin// 'od
192a8(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi nad pa zhig la rgyal po la 'os pa'i sman btang la cho ga bzhin kha byas pas 'chi ba'i dus pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung gang mi sdom pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de yang /
192b1(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du blta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal po 'os pa'i sman btang nas// cho ga ma byas mi de shi bar 'gyur// de bzhin gang mi sdom pas 'dir
192b2(dkon brtsegs): shi baM/ k+She/ de ni mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs nad// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che mi gtsang ba'i nang du ltung na/ smad par gyur cing mkho bar mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du mang
192b3(dkon brtsegs): du thos pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i mi gtsang ba'i nang du ltung bar blta ste/ ci yang med pa la ni lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rin chen mi gtsang
192b4(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba smad ji ltar sngon bzhin de ni phyis ma yin// dge slong mang du thos par gyur pa ying // bkur sti btsang lhung ba de bzhin bshad// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi ro'i mgo la gser gyi
192b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng bas btags pa de bzhin du/ tshul khrims 'chal ba ngur smrig thor pa bilta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi'i ro'i mgo la gser 'phreng ma// yang na me tog 'phreng ba gdas
192b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ de bzhin khrims med ngur smrig gyon pa yang // mthong nas de la yid ni dang mi 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong dpon gyi bu zhib legs par khrus byas te/ legs par
192b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byugs la// skra dang sen mo bregs nas/ gos dkar po bgos te can mchog gis bskus pa'i mgo la/ tsam pa ka'i me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung
192b8(dkon brtsegs): chus khrims dang ldan zhing mang du zas pa du sdig gyon par blta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ legs bkrus lags par byugs pa yi/ tshong dpon bu'i mag pa yi// mams
193a1(dkon brtsegs): ka'i me tog 'phreng // dri zhim yid 'ong btags pa mdzes// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan gyur cing // mad thos tshul khrims phun sum tshogs
193a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sras po yon tan ldan// de la ngur smrig de bzhin mdzes// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan par bcos pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
193a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di la dge slong kha cig tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams shing gnas/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs/ kha na ma tho ba phra rab rnas
193a4(dkon brtsegs): la yang 'jigs par blta/ yang dag par blangs te bslab pa'i bzhi rnams la slob cing lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gnas
193a5(dkon brtsegs): bas 'tsho ba yongasu dag kyang de bdag tu smra ba yin te/ 'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa dang po'o// 'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge sbyong
193a6(dkon brtsegs): kha cig/ 'du bla 'dzin cing 'dul ba la zhugs te 'dul ba'i tshul la gnas pa yin yang / 'jigs tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyed pa yin te/ 'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'cha
193a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan par bcos pa gnyis pa'o// 'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig byams pa gnas pa yin te/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa
193a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin yang 'du byed thams cad la skye ba med par thos na/ skrag ste kun tu dngang bar 'gyur zhing kun tu rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ba de ni/ 'od srung tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul
193b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan par bcos pa gsum pa'o// 'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs kyang dmigs par lta ba yin te/
193b2(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzin pa dang / dir 'dzin pa la gnas pa de ni/ 'od srung tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa bzhi pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa
193b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin no// 'od srung tshul khrims shes bya ba ni gang la bdag med pa dang / bdag ge ba med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / mi bya ba yang
193b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / byed pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rgyu ba mo yin pa dang / mi rgyu ba yang ma yin pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / ming
193b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yang mi yin pa dang / rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa dang / rab tu zhi ba yang ma yin pa dang / 'dzin pa
193b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can du 'dogs pa med pa dang / tshig med pa
193b7(dkon brtsegs): dang tshig tu 'dogs ma med pa dang / sems med pa dang / sems su 'dogs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rten med pa dang /
193b8(dkon brtsegs): rten med pa ma yin pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan gyi tshul khrims la mi spod pa dang / tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / tshul khrims
194a1(dkon brtsegs): la mi rtog pa yin te/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul khrims zag pa med pa dang / gtogs pa ma yin pa/ khams gsum pa dang bral ba/
194a2(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad med pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// tshul khrims ldan la dri ma med cing ci yang med// tshul khrims ldan
194a3(dkon brtsegs): la rgyags pa med cing rten pa med// tshul khrims ldan la mun pa med cing 'ching ba med// tshul khrims ldan la rdul rnams med de nyes pa med pa med// zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar
194a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i yid// rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral zhing nyon mongs med// g.yo ba dang ni rlom sems kun dang rnam bral ba// de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// /
194a5(dkon brtsegs): lus la mi lta srog la phangs par 'dzin mi byed// srid pa rnamasu skye ba kun la 'dod pa med// yang dag zhugs shing de nyid tshul la rab gnas pa// de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas
194a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan la tshul khrims ldan// 'jig rten ma gos 'jig rten dag la gnas pa med// snang ba thob cing bdag gi med de ci yang med// bdag tu 'du shes med de gzhan du 'du shes me
194a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes yongasu shes pas tshul khrims rnam par dag/ gang la tshu rol med cing pha rol dbus kyang med// pha rol tshu rol dag la nams kyang mi chags shing // bcing dang chags med
194a8(dkon brtsegs): 'chos med cing zag pa med// de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas brtan la tshul khrims ldan// ming dang gzugs rnams la ni chags pa med pa'i yid// de na nyams par bzhag cing
194b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dul ba'i sems// gang la bdag med bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa ni// de tsam gyis ni tshul khrims gnas shes brjod pa yin// so sor thar pa slob pas slom sems
194b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med// des ni 'di la de la chags par mi 'gyur te// de ni gong du 'phags pa'i las rnams tshol byed pa// de ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan pa'o// tshul
194b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims gtso bor ma yin ting 'dzin dor chags med// de'i gong du shes rab bsgom pa yongasu tshol// dmigs pa med pa 'phags pA k+Shi rigs yin te// tshul khrims de ni bde
194b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pas rab tu bsngags// 'jig pa'i tshogs la lta los rnam par grol ba'i yid// de ni ra dang nga'i snyam du 'gyur ba med// sangs rgyas spyod yul stong pa nyid la lhag
194b5(dkon brtsegs): par pos// de'i tshul khrims de ni mnyam pa med pa'o// tshul khrims la ni gnas nas ti nge 'dzin kyang thob// ting nge 'dzin rnams thob nas shes rab shin tu bsgom// shes rab
194b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni ye shes rnam par dag pa thob// ye shes rnam par dag pas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// tshig su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di spangs pa'i tshe/ dge slong brgyad pa
194b7(dkon brtsegs): ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par dag go/ dge
194b8(dkon brtsegs): slong bsam gtan thos pa lnga brgya ni chos bstan bzab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
195a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya po 'di dag chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/
195a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung 'di ltar dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 'di dag ni tshul khrims rnam par dag
195a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zag pa med pa 'di la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs/ kun tu rab tu dngangs so// 'od srung tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa zab pa/ sangs
195a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub zab ste/ de la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / mos pa mi mnga' ba dag gis mos par mi nus so//
195a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la mu stegs can gyi nyan thos su gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la brgal ba'i
195a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas chos bstan bla gcig thos so// thos nas dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed do// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
195a7(dkon brtsegs): srung 'jam zhing snyan par gsungs pa ngo mtshar te snyam mo// de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dad pa'i sems gcig pa rnyed pa des/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang
195a8(dkon brtsegs): du skyes so// de dag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so// rgyu de nyid kyis nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ste/ 'od srung dge slong lnga brgya po lta bar bying ba 'di dag ni
195b1(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste kun tu mdangangs/ kun tu rab tu dngang so/ yang dri dag ni chos bstan pa 'dis yongasu sbyang ba byas/
195b2(dkon brtsegs): phyis ning 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa
195b3(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor khyod song la dge slong de dag kun shes par byos shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di dag la bshad na yang / 'thun par mi bgyid na//
195b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag lta mos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lam gang nas 'ong ba'i lam der dge slong gnyis shig sprul pa sprul to// de nas dge slong lnga brgya pa
195b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de gnyis lam gang nas 'dong ba'i lam der dong ste phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'dong / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag
195b6(dkon brtsegs): ni dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ma la reg par gnas par 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa gang yin pa'i chos bstan/
195b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngas// kun tu rab tu dngangs par gyur nas/ kho bo cag dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par
195b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o// dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kho bo cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad pa la mi 'jug ste/
196a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rtogs ma mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs/ kun tu rab tu dngangs par gyur to// de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang dgon pa'i gnas rnam su bas
196a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o// sprul pa dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag cag yang dag par 'gro bar bya'o// rtsod pa mi bya'o//
196a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa ni/ dge sbyong gi chos so// tshe dang ldan pa dge gang 'di yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur
