196a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos de gang / lus 'di la bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu 'am/ gang yod
196a5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ gang zad pas yos su mya ngan las 'da'/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'dod chags zad/ zhe sdang zad/ gti mug zad pas yongasu mya ngan
196a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'da'o// sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod pa yin nam/ ci na de zad par bya/ de dag gis smras pa/
196a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyi ga med pa la yang mi dmigs te/ de dag ni yongasu ma brtags pa las kyang mi skye'o// sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/
196a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta bas na ma rtog/ rnam par ma rtog shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nam mi rtog na de na chags par yang mi 'gyur// chags pa dang bral bar yang mi 'gyuraro//
196b1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba yang med pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag tshul khrims ni mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o// tshe dang /
196b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang mi 'khor zhing yongs mya ngan las mi 'da'o// tshe dang ldan
196b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston na/ chos de dag kyang stong pa dben pa/ gzung du med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes
196b4(dkon brtsegs): spongs shig/ 'du shes la yang 'du shes su ma byed cig/ 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongasu shes pa ma byed cig/ gang 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes pa de ni de'i
196b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyis bcings pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'ogog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la zhugs shing / tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i
196b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug pa las gong na bya ba med do zhes smra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong lnga brgya pa de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
196b7(dkon brtsegs): grol lo// de dag sems rnam par grol nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
196b8(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong dong / gang nas lhags/ de dag gis smras pa/
197a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang / gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to// smras pa
197a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston pa gang yin/ smras pa/ gang ma skyes shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'o// smras pa khyod kyis ji ltar chos thos/ smras pa bcings pa'i
197a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang ma yin/ 'thar pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// smras pa khyod sus btul/ smras pa su la lus med cing sems med pas so// smras pa khyod ji ltar btson/ smras pa
197a4(dkon brtsegs): mo rig pa spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin/ ma rig pa bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// smras pa khyod ji ltar rnam par grol/ smras pa sbyor ba'i phyir yang ma yin/ spong ba'i phyir yang
197a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// smras pa su'i nyan thos smras pa gang gis thob pa med cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med pa'o// smras pa khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gang /
197a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa gang dag khams gsum na mi rgyu ba rnams so// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid cig na yongasu ma ngan las 'da'/ smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
197a7(dkon brtsegs): nam yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba na'o// smras pa khyod kyis bya ba byas sam/ smras pa ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzir ba yongs su shes pas so// smras pa khyod kyi nyon
197a8(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa zad dam/ smras pa chos thams cad gtan tu zad pa'i phyir ro// smras pa khyod kyis bdud brtul tam/ smras pa phung po'i bdud mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// smra/
197b1(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis ston pa la bsnyen bkur byas sam/ smras pa lus kyis kyang ma byas/ ngag gis kyang ma byas/ sems kyis ma byas so// smras pa khyod kyis sbyin pa'i gnas
197b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskangs sam/ smras pa 'dzin pa med cing sdud pa med pas so// smras pa khyod 'khor ba las rgal tam/ smras pa chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa khyod/
197b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i gnas kyi sar zhugs sam/ smras pa 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'gro// smras pa de bzhin gshegs
197b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sprul pa gang du bzhud par/ de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongasu dris te/ de dag gis lan btab nas/ 'khor de'i dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med
197b5(dkon brtsegs): par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig brdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/
197b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
197b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
197b8(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar
198a1(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig kyi bu tshar bcad cing tshar bcad nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir
198a2(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa bstan te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skyes bu dam pa nan tan snying por byed pa rnams kyi don chen por 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la
198a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig kham pa'i grur zhugs te gang ga'i klung chen po rgal 'dod par gyur na rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems mi de la ci 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus kyi gru des bsar bar bya//
198a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bgyi'o// de'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni chu chen po'i nang du zhugs kyis/ bdag 'gram du ma phyinapa/
198a5(dkon brtsegs): bar ma dor gru pa zhig tu 'ong ngo snyam du sems dpa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu snang ba de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa de bas kyang che
198a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslab par bya ste/ stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang
198a7(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub par bya'o// kye ma'o lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/ bdag gis snying po ma blangs par bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byas su 'ong ngo zhes yid la byed pa de lta bus
198a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni chu bo chen por zhugs kyis/ chu bo bzhir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams chu bo chen por zhugs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos kyi gru gang gis
198b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshos khyer ba thams cad bsgral bar dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya'o// kun tu snang ba de la byang chub sems dpasa' dam pa'i chos kyi
198b2(dkon brtsegs): gru bzhi chen po sbyor bar bya ba de ci 'dra zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid de/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa bstsags pa/ tshul khrims
198b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi snum gyis sbyar ba sbyin pa'i 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ bsam pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bcings pa sra bas dam por 'brel pa/ bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / dran pa
198b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyor kas legs par sbyar ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi tshogs can/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ dge ba'i chos kyi shing gis yang dag par sbyar ba/ bsam
198b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi sems kyis las su rung bar byas pa/ dul bzhi pa dang / cang shes kyis dge ba'i bzos legs par zin par byas pa/ shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can//
198b6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / dpa' bar 'gro bas bsar ba/ shes rab dang ye shes kyis phyir rgol ba legs par bsrungs pa/
198b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pas rnam par brtsegs pa/ legs par byas pa/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis legs par yongasu sbyangs pa/ shes rab dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi/
198b8(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnam par brtsegs pa'i lus kyis bstan pa/ yang dag par spong bas 'gro ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ dbang pos legs
199a1(dkon brtsegs): / par brtags pas/ lta ba ngan pa'i shing yon po med pa/ stobs kyi shugs yang dag par byung bas par shag shig med pa/
199a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'gro ba rnam par dag pa gcugs can dag nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi lam 'dor bar byed pa/ lam du 'jug par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin par byed
199a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mu stegs ngan pa'i mu stegs 'dor bar byed pa/ zhi gnas kyi nges par sems pa bstan pa/ lhag mthong gis sbyor ba'i mtha' gnyis la ma chags par 'jug pa/
199a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'i chos dang yang dag par ldan pa sgra grags pa yangs shing rgya che la mi zad cing tshad med par chur shog/ dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer
199a5(dkon brtsegs): du bde bar 'gro ba/ 'jigs med par 'gro ba/ lam du 'gro ba/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'khor bar zhugs la tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi lta ba thams cad sel
199a6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ gtse ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par myur tu song shig ces phyogs bcur sgras go bar byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bskal pa/
199a7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yid yongasu mi skyo bar byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po 'di 'dra ba de sbyar bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos kyi gru/
199a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dis chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o// kun tu snang ba de la 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa myur ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di
199b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la bcos pa ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bsam pa dag pas rab tu 'dun pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'artson 'grus
199b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas dge ba las 'dun pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thos pas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes brtan par bya ba'i
199b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / lus dang sems dben pa'i phyir dgon pa na
199b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / skye bo mi srun pa rnam par spangs pas 'du 'dzi med pa dang / don dam pa la rten pas chos don tu gnyer ba dang / shin tu mi 'khrugs pas ye shes kyi
199b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes kyi don yin pas chos kyi don dang / mi 'khrugs pas bden pa'i don dang / yang dag par sbyor bas byas pas stong pa nyid kyi don dang / shin tu nye bar
199b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i don yin pas dben pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa myur ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
199b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rig
199b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams la phan 'dogs par gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das dkon
200a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
200a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
200a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ de bzhin ga sh+ye
200a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang / sad+yas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs
200a5(dkon brtsegs): pa re re'i gtsug lag khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed brtsigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de
200a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ri'i nyan thos kyi dge slong dpag tu med pa dag la/ bskal pa gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /
200a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dang ldan pa gzhan gang
200a8(dkon brtsegs): gis dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rna ba grangs 'di las tshig su bcad pa tsam lung mnos te/ lung mnos nas kyang mi spong na/ de ni de bas bsod nams
200b1(dkon brtsegs): ches mang du skyed do// bud med gang zhig lung 'bog na/ de nam yang log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no// sa phyogs gang
200b2(dkon brtsegs): du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'am/ bstan pa'am/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger bris nas kyang / gleg bam du bris te bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang bcas
200b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// su zhig chos smra ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa 'am/ 'dzin pa'am/ yi ger bri ba de la 'di lta ste/ de
200b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar byas pa/ de bzhin du gus par bya'o// 'od srung rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos smra ba la bkur
200b5(dkon brtsegs): sti byed pa dang / btsun par byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de la nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// 'chi ba'i
200b6(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas kyang lus kyi las yongasu dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
200b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ tshor bas sems kun tu ma zin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de mig 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba dang / lag pa g.yob par mi byed pa dang / rkang pa 'dra bar mi
200b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / gcin mi stor ba dang / phyis mi 'byung ba dang / de'i snying kar rdul mi 'byung ba dang / khu tshur mi 'chang ba dang / na mkha' la mi rnyebs pa dang /
201a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du 'chi ba'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste/ lus kyi las yongasu dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyuraro// ngag
201a2(dkon brtsegs): gi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gdangs snyan pa'i tshigs dang / gnyen pa'i tshig dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / dga'
201a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig dang / snum pa'i tshig dang / slar ldog pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / btsun pa'i tshig dang / lha dang mis yongs su gzung ba'i tshig
201a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bzung ba'i tshig ste/ ngag gi las yongasu dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/
201a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / khon tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'chab par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang / nyes pa la mi dga' ba dang /
201a6(dkon brtsegs): kho na gcugs la mi dga' ba dang / 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba dang / spong ba la bag yod par 'gyur ba dang / ma zhum pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
201a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa 'dzin pa dang / nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal med par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba ste/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa
201a8(dkon brtsegs): bcu po de dag thob par 'gyuraro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tsho rabs nyen cing 'chi ba'i dus mi byed// de'i mig la 'khrul par 'gyur ba med// lag mi g.yo ba rkang pa 'phra mi 'gyur
201b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni gshang gci stor bar yongs mi 'gyur// de'i snying kar rdul yang 'byung mi 'gyur// khu tshur mi 'chang na mkha' rnyebs mi 'gyur// 'dug bzhin bde ba'i 'chi ba'i dus
201b2(dkon brtsegs): byed de// lus las yongs su dag pa 'di bcu thob// gdangs snyan phun sum 'tshogs shing mdzes mnyen tshig/ snum zhing yid 'ong de bzhin gshegs dga' bar 'gyur//
201b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis slar mi zlog cing gzung 'os tshig/ skye bos btsun par bya ba'i tshig tu 'gyur// de'i tshig ni lha dang klu dag da// mi 'am ci dang de bzhin rgyal bas bsngags//
201b4(dkon brtsegs): des bshad pa'i don kyang 'dzin byed de// des ni gang lags dag pa'i de dag thob// khro ba med cing mkhon tu 'dzin pa med// brtan pa 'chab pa med cing 'tshig pa med// /
201b5(dkon brtsegs): nyes la mi dga' mkhon btsugs dga' ba med// de'i 'du shes phyin ci log mi 'gyur// bslab pa yang dag blangs la sems mi zhum// spong ba la ni bag med mi 'gyur//
201b6(dkon brtsegs): te// zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis zhing sbyong byed// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yongs spangs nas// ting 'dzin 'byor pa thams cad mngon bsgrubs dang // yid kyi
201b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrubs pa'i chos rnams thob// chos rnams 'di dag ldan par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas dngos po dkon par mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung gang la la bde ba'i
201b8(dkon brtsegs): yo byad thams cad kyis nga la bkur stir byed 'dod pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod pa des/ dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
202a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di bzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ yi ger bri bar bya/ klag par bya/ bcang bar bya'o// 'od srung de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
202a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
202a3(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar
202a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos rnam grang
202a5(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// / 'od srung gi le'u zhe bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs s+ho//
202a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya rad nar shi na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u
202a7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgya pa las/ rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
202a8(dkon brtsegs): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khA na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad spong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / sa
202b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
202b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa phyir mi ldog/ pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol
202b3(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba ji tsam gyis na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang /
202b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs
202b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / ting 'dzin la 'jug pa shes pas dge sbyong zhes bya ba ste/ shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rnams par grol ba snying po lhur len pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i
202b6(dkon brtsegs): sgo gsum la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za ba dang / 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong
202b7(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi la gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa bsgoms pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / chos la
202b8(dkon brtsegs): dad pa mi byed pa dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog
203a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / srid pa bcom pa dang / yang dag par zhugs
203a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin la mkhas pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang / shes rab kyis lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / stobs lnga dang ldan pa dang / nyon mongs
203a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang / chos rnams kyi rten pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lam shes pa dang / laM la mkhas
203a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / yang dag par lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong bsgom pa la mkhas pa dang / sau yang dag
203a5(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa gzhi la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang / ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa dang /
203a6(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi/ drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rton pa dang / chos nyid la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang / bdud bzhi'i lam las shin tu 'das pa dang /
203a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po yongasu shes pa srung ba dang / nyon mongs pa bsngal pa dang / tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal
203a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa yongasu shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs dang / lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes zhug
203b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong ba dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la bya ba byas pa dang / byed pa byas pa dang / zag bzangad/
203b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba dang / sngon gyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa phun
203b3(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'phags pa'i rig la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa dang /
203b4(dkon brtsegs): blo gya gyu med pa dang / rab tu byung nas khyim gyi gnas dang mi 'dre ba dang / bas ru ltar gcig pu rgyu ba dang / 'du 'dzis 'jigs skrag pa dang / khams
203b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum las rnam par grol ba dang / rtag tu 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi tshul la gnas pa dang / thams cad la
203b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba
203b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / bdag dang /
203b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan rjes su srung ba dang / 'khrul pa myed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / nakha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis
204a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la de'i sems mi chags mi 'ching ste/ dper na na mkha' la lag 'thil bzhin/
204a2(dkon brtsegs): du mi chags mi 'ching ba yin te/ 'od srung dge sbyong gi chos rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan na/ dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa'ong
204a3(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par dge sbyo
204a4(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan 'di dag yang dag par rab tu bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchi/
204a5(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs pa nub par bgyid pa dge slong ma lags la/ dge sbyong du mchid kyis mche zhing tshangs par spyod par mchid kyis 'che ba'i dge slong la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags//
204a6(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung nga dang / khyod dang nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang yongasu mya ngan las shing / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag kyang sang+yas kyi zhing gzhan
204a7(dkon brtsegs): du dong nas/ bstan pa 'di rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba ni tshig gis bstan par mi nuso// 'od srung de la dge sbyong lus ma bsgos pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgos
204a8(dkon brtsegs): ba/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa dang / dman pa glen pa dang / rmongs pa rab tu ma zhi ba/ ma dul ba/ kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi g.yo dang sgra/ mi drad pa dang
204b1(dkon brtsegs): gya gyu dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon rnams brjod par bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong gi dri ma rnams gang zhe na/ 'od srung sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag
204b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gnod
204b3(dkon brtsegs): sems rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag la stod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan la
204b4(dkon brtsegs): spod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mi mthun pa rnyed pa kun tu tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dad pas byin pa chud gzon
204b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ltung ba 'chab pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / khyims pa la rten pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang sten pa dge slong gi dri ma dang / 'du la/
204b6(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri mo dang / rnyed pa yongasu ma grub par rtogs pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog par mi 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /
204b7(dkon brtsegs): rol bsod nams kyis rnyed pa la phra dog dang ser sna byed pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa de//
204b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yongs su chos pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba mi srub pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / kha ltar mu cor smra ba dge
205a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi dri ma dang / mgu pa dang / rgod pa dang / khengs pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / lta bas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rten cing /
205a2(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mthar lta ba la gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mya ngan las
205a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la mngon par yi dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / sgrib pas kun nas bkris pa dge sbyong gi dri
205a4(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / las kyi rnam pa smin pa dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos zab mo spong ba dge sbyong gi dri ma
205a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'od srung sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni dge
205a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong dri ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bla ma rnaMs la mi gus pa dang /
205a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnam pa rim gro med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde spong ba dang / bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa gang zag med
205a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams kyis skrag pa/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos bstan pa la mi 'jug gi/ 'dus byas nyid kyi rjesu snyegs pa dang / 'du byed rnaMs ma skyes pa zhes thos na skrag pa dang / chos zhing
205b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyi ma skyes pa zhes thos na g.yang se chen por ltung ba bzhin du lhung ba ste/ 'od srung brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste/ rab tu byung bas de dag yongs
205b2(dkon brtsegs): spangs par bya'o// 'od srung dge sbyong gi ni kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyis dge sbyong zhes nga mi 'chad kyi/ yon tan gyi chos la nan tan byed pa'i dge sbyong ni dge sbyong ngo zhes bshado//
205b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung dge sbyong gis ni rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung rnyog pa med pa la ngas dur sgeg gnang gi/ 'od srung
205b4(dkon brtsegs): gang rnyog pa dang bcas pas lus la dur smrig dag bcang ba de dag zad ni dur smrig tshig pa'o zhes bshad de/ bsam pas mos pa rnams ni ma gtog so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
205b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin pa'i phyir te/ skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral bar spyod pa rnams kyi gos 'di dag ni nye bar zhi ba'i rjesu mthun pa'i byis pa'i rjes
205b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'o// 'od srung de la 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan gang zhe na/ 'od srung bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan de/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/
205b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung tshul khrims 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / tingange 'dzin 'phags pa rnaMs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / shes rab 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol
205b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes zong ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bden pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
206a1(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bsam gtan bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
206a2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / skyon med pa la 'jug pa rnams kyi
206a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / zag pa zad pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan ste/ 'od srung bcu gnyis po de dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan no// 'od srung gang la la rgyal mtshan 'di
206a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / mi ldan par 'phags pa'i rigs ki gos ngur smrig dag 'chang ba 'di dag ni nor ba'i chos la zhugs pa'o zhes ngas bshad do// chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa zhes bshad//
206a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan pa las ring du gnas pa zhes bshadado// mya ngan 'das pa'i phyogs kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnas pa zhes bshad// 'khor ba'i phyogs dang 'thun
206a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bshad// nga rgyal gyi mchil pas zin pa zhes bshad// snying po ma blangs pa zhes bshad// chos las nyams pa zhes bshad// nyams nga ba'i laM la gnas pa zhes bshad//
206a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de lta bas na dge sbyong gi lus la ngur smrig dag bcang ba lta na rnyog pa med pa'i semasu bya'o// gal te des 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na des gus pa brgyad kyi lus ngur smrig dag
206a8(dkon brtsegs): bcang bar bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mchod rten gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'du shes dang / byams pa'i 'du shes dang / sang+yas la gus pa'i 'du shes dang / ngo cha
206b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes dang / khrel yod pa'i 'du shes dang / rnyog pa med par bya'o snyams pa ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa'i phyir gus pa brgyad po de dag gis lus la ngur smrig dag
206b2(dkon brtsegs): bcang bar bya'o// 'od srung gang dag lhod cing mi sdom pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi chos 'di dag las nyams par lus la dur smrig dag 'chang ba rnams ni gus pa 'di dag
206b3(dkon brtsegs): mi skyed do// 'od srung dge slong gi kha dog dang / gzugs can la gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ba nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba yod/ 'od srung nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba der dge
206b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi gzugasu gyur bzhin du/ gos 'bar ba dang / mgo 'bar ba dag dang / lhung bzed thar ba dang / stan 'bar ba dag dang / mal na 'bar ba dag gnod pa byed de/ dag
206b5(dkon brtsegs): gi long spyod dang / yongasu spyad pa gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar te/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar la cha de mer gyur te/ dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs
206b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnod pa de dag myong bar 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongasu ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi la
206b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu ma dag pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'gro ba yang yongasu ma dag pa nyid du 'gyuraro// 'od srung dge sbyong ma yin la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa yin
206b8(dkon brtsegs): ba la/ tshangs pa spyod par khas 'che ba gang zhig tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis phyag byas pa/ bdag gir byed pa de mi dge ba'i
207a1(dkon brtsegs): des brnyes pa brgyad thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ bems po lta bur 'gyur ba dang / go dka' zhing le lo can du gyur pa dang / skye bo mang pos bgang //
207a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bud med du 'gyur ba dang // rang dbang cing bran du 'gyur ba dang // mdog ngan mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang // mdog ngan cing dbang chung bar grags par 'gyur ba dang // de la su yang
207a3(dkon brtsegs): su bar mi 'gyur ba dang // sbyin gnas rnams la mgu bar mi byed pa ste// bskas pa brgyad po de dag thob po// 'od srung de lta bas na bzang po ma yin pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos
207a4(dkon brtsegs): nas dge slong sdig pa can gyis gzhan gyis phyag byas pa bdag gir mi bya'o// 'od srung gang dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la
207a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba ni tha na sa chen po 'di la mchil ma'i thal pa tsam 'dor ba de yang des rnyed par mi 'gyur na/ go pa 'degs pa dang / 'jog pa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na//
207a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs chen po 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal po rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams dang / sbyin gnas rnams la kun tu spyad pa'i don tu
207a7(dkon brtsegs): phul ba'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de la mi blu na po da ni go pa 'jog pa dang / 'dor ba gang yin pa de tham cad kyang dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bzhin du/ go pa 'dor zhing 'jog pa
207a8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi khri 'am/ khri'u 'am/ 'chag sa'am/ gding ba 'am/ gnas khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ kun dga' ra ba na 'am/
207b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu spyad pa 'am/ lhung bzed dam/ chos gos saM/ bsod snyoms saM/ ma la ca'am/ na ba'i gsos sman nam/ yo byad kyang rung ste/ tham cad dad pas byin pa la mi dbang ba
207b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin pa lta ci smos/ 'od srung mos par bya'o// khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o// 'od srung dge sbyong mu yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin
207b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che bas ni/ dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang yongasu dag par bya mi na so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni sangs
207b4(dkon brtsegs): rgya tsho chen po lta bu dang / bod nams kyi zhing dang / sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog tu brtan pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung bram ze 'am/ khyim bdag dad pa gang dag de la yon bul
207b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag tshad med pa'i 'du shes kyis 'bul ba de la 'od srung mi blun po tshul khrims 'chal bas tha na skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i cha tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongasu
207b6(dkon brtsegs): spyad na yang sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de yongasu sbyang ba'i phyir dad pa byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam ji snyed la spyad pa de snyed kyi las kyi rgya mtsho chen po stsogs par 'gyur ro//
207b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de lta bas na tshul khrims yongasu dag par dad pas byin pa yongasu spyad par bya'o zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na rnal 'byor
207b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i dge slong nyis brgya bstan pa 'di thos nas rab tu ngus te mchi ma gzigs shing tshig 'di skad ces/ bdag cag ni gum yang rung ste/ 'bras bu ma thob kyi bar du dad pas/
208a1(dkon brtsegs): / stsal ba'i bsod snyoms gcig tsam yang yongasu spyad par mi bgyi'o zhes smras so// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs
208a2(dkon brtsegs): so legaso// ngo mtshar shes pa dang 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol du kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba rnam pa 'di lta bu dag gis gsung rab 'di mdze
208a3(dkon brtsegs): so// 'od srung ngas dge slong gnyis la dad pas byin pa gnang ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ldan pa dang grol ba'o// yang gnyis ste/ gang 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par
208a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / gang yang sems rnam par grol ba byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'o// dge slong dag de la dge slong ldan pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de'i bstan pa la zhugs pa
208a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag las chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal ca dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams yongasu spyad nas 'khor ba'i skyon mthong /
208a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par mthong / 'du byed thams cad sdug sngal bar rig/ chos thams cad la bdag med par mos/ mya ngan 'das pa zhi bar rtogs pas
208a7(dkon brtsegs): ni ri rab tsam gyi kham dag gis dad pas byin pa yongasu spyad kyang de'i yon tan shin tu yongs su dag par gyuraro// sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gang dag las dad pas
208a8(dkon brtsegs): byin pa yongasu sbyang ba de las de dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'byor pa chen po dang phan yon chen por 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag rdzas las
208b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i bsod snyoms bya ba'i dngos po rnams las/ gang byams pa'i sems la snyogs par 'jug pa de mchog yin pa'i phyir// dge slong dag dge slong gang zhig sbyin pa po dang /
208b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bdagi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal ca dang / yo byad rnams longasu spyad nas sems rnam par grol ba tshad med pa la smos par 'jug na sbyin pa po dang / sbyin
208b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag de'i rnam par smin pa yang chad med par shes par bya'o// 'od srung stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnams ni yongasu zad par
208b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de'i bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa ni yongasu zad par gang yang mi 'gyuraro// 'od srung gang zhig sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi dad pas byin pa yongasu spyad
208b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis leg par ltung ba byed na// mi gti mug pa de gnod pa ci tsam gyi phyir zhugs pa la ltos// 'od srung de lta bas na dge sbyong gi
208b6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skon dang / dge sbyong gi mi drangs pa dang / dge slong gi g.yo dang / dge slong gi sgra dang / dge slong gi gya gyu rnam pa de de lta bu de dag ni dge
208b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyong bsam pa dag pas yongasu spang bar bya'o// 'od srung dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni gang mig nas myi zag cig/ rna ba nas ma yin/ sna nas ma yin/ lce las
208b8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ lus las ma yin la// yid nas kyang mi zag pa ste/ de'i phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// skye mched drug gi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rjes
209a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa drug dang ldan pa dang / dam pa rnams la gus pas gnas pa dang / pha rol du 'gro ba'i chos drug la gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir dge
209a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// // dge sbyong gi le'u ste dang po'o// // 'od srung dge slong dge slong zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa
209a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o// bdag tu 'du shes pa bcom pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog du 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / gang zad/
209a4(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes pa dang / skyes par 'du shes pa dang / bud med du 'du shes pa dang / khye'u du 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa dang / de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o//
209a5(dkon brtsegs): lus bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang / sems can bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / 'jigs skrag pa med pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo las rgal ba
209a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jigs med la lta ba dang / 'jigs pa zad dang bral ba dang / 'jigs pa myed pa'i lam la gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o//
209a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung gang la la zhig chos 'di dag dang mi ldan la/ bdag ni dge slong dge slong ngo snyam du khas 'che na/ bsam pas mos par ma gtogs par nga yang de'i ston pa ma yi
209a8(dkon brtsegs): la/ de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yino// 'od srung sdig pa can gyi dge slong dag phal cher nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed par 'gyur te/ 'od srung ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa lnga
209b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ni nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed mi nuso// gzhan du na nga'i bstan pa 'di las mi gti mug pa nges par mi sems pa gang dag
209b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de dag gis nga'i snyan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung 'di ltar ste dper na/ ri dgas kyi rgyal mtshan po seng ge shi ba'i sha la gcan zan nas bya gang gis
209b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang za bar mi nus kyi/ seng ge'i ro de nyid las srin bu gang dag 'byung ba de dag ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sha za'o// 'od srung de bzhin du nga'i bstan pa 'di nyid las
209b4(dkon brtsegs): mi blun po brkam pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ chos ma yin pa la lta ba/ nges par mi sems pa/ lhod pa brdzun du smra ba/ gang dge 'byung ba de dag bstan pa nub
209b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed par 'gyuraro// 'od srung chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong du rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga'o/
209b6(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa'i nga rgyal te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khengs pa dang / mu tsor smra ba dang / bya khwa lta bu dang / tshig 'chal pa dang / bzhi po de
209b7(dkon brtsegs): dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgod pa dang / pho thag can dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang
209b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ g.yon can dang / sgyu can dang / mi 'thun pas 'tsho ba dang / mi gcig par smra ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/
210a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la spyod pa dang / sngon byas pa mi dran pa dang / mdza' bal 'khu ba yin te/
210a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims mi srung ba dang / so sor thar pa khyad du gsod
210a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'dul ba mi srung ba ste/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag tu smra ba yin/ sems can du smra ba yin/ srog tu smra ba yin/ gang zag tu smra ba
210a4(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la mi gus pa yin/ chos la mi gus pa yin/ dge 'dun la mi gus pa yin/ bslabs
210a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la mi gus pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge 'dun 'thun pa la mi dga' ba yin/ gtsug lags khang la dga' ba
210a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rnyed pa yin/ 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' ba yin/ 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig brjod pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ ba ni
210a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/ gnyen gshes 'dod pa yin/ chos la mchog tu dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/
210a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdud kyis zin pa yin/ bdud kyis non pa yin/ rmongs pa dang gnyid mang ba yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la
210b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus rul cing brgyan pa dang / nyon mongs pas snad pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la
210b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyab kyis paltas pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa med pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs
210b3(dkon brtsegs): su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / nyon mongs thams
210b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi yongs su gdung pas yongs su gdungs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lam ngan pa la gnas te 'byung ba mi mthong ba yin/
210b5(dkon brtsegs): ser sna can du 'gyur te/ kun mi dge ba'i ngang tshul can yin/ thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'dod cing chog mi shes pa yin/ ngoms mi myong zhing thos pa'i
210b6(dkon brtsegs): nan tan dang bral ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mun par gzhol bas mun par gyur pa yin/ rmongs pa la gzhol bas rmong
210b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa yin/ log pa'i chos kyis dkris pas chos ma yin pa mthong ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo bcad pas 'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa yin /
210b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus kyi tshul 'chos pa ma yin/ ngag gi tshul 'chos pa yin/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/ spyod lam tshul
211a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chos ma yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// de la lus kyi tshul 'chos pa ni dal gyis 'gro bar tshul 'chos pa yin/ mgo smad
211a2(dkon brtsegs): par tshul 'chos pa yin/ gnya shing gang tsam du lta bar tshul 'chos pa yin/ gos tshags legs par brgyan par tshul chos pa yin/ dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan mi
211a3(dkon brtsegs): mtsho bar dgon pa na gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos ma yin/ gong bur 'du shes pa mi sel bar bsod nams len pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod
211a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su mi 'jug par phyag dar khrod 'chang ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ rten cing 'brel pa 'byung ba la mi 'jug par ri drung dang / shing drung du gnas pa ltar
211a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa yin/ chos bdud rtsi'i sman mi tshol bar bkus te bor ba'i sman tshol ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin te/ 'di ni lus kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// de
211a6(dkon brtsegs): la dag gi tshul 'chos pa gang zhe na/ che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo shes shing che ge mo zhes bya bas khro bo mgron du bos te/ kho bos gang 'dod pa rnyed cing sti stang du byas
211a7(dkon brtsegs): nas rnyed/ kho bos bzang po rnyed/ kho bos lan mang du rnyed/ kho bos lan mang du thos/ kho bos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin/ kho bos ni bod par
211a8(dkon brtsegs): 'os pa yin/ kho bos ni slar lan gdab pa'i 'os pa yin/ kho bos ni nus pa dang ldan zhing skal pa yod la 'thu yod pa yin/ kho bos ni don rnam par nges pa bstan pa
211b1(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin/ gang che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo la 'di skad ces smras te/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras nas tshar bcad de spobs pa med par byas/
211b2(dkon brtsegs): kho bos 'khor mgur bar byas/ kho bos legs so zhes bya ba thob/ kho bos de la bgo ba thob/ yang 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir kho bo mgron tu gnyer ces bya ba
211b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'od srung nges par mi sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa las tshig 'chal pa de lta bu gang ci 'byung ba de thams cad ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa te/ mi rigs pa
211b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi yin gyi/ rigs pa rnams kyi ma yin/ 'di ni rag gi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la sems kyi tshul 'chos pa gang zhe na/ gang sems
211b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos gos dang / bsod snyoms rnyed kyang rung bar yongasu rtog la/ tshig gis bdag la ci yang mi dgos so zhes zer ba dang / gang sems kyis rnyed par
211b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la/ 'dod pa nyung ba skad du smra ba 'di ni sems kyis tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems kyis rnyed kyang ci ma rung snyam
211b7(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ tshig tu bdag la ci yang dgos med sma/ med pa'i ngo bo yid kyis de smras te/ nam yang bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin/ sems kyi tshul 'chos
211b8(dkon brtsegs): gsam pas lha rnams dang / klum+b+ha mig can rnams slu bar byed/ spras pa'i sos kyis rnams kyang dga' mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis de mkhyen to//
212a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de ltar na dge slong chos ma yin pa dang / sdig pa can rnams kyi tshig ma yin pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa 'di lta bu gang yin pa 'di na
212a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// // dge slong gi le'u ste// gnyis pa'o// // 'od srung
212a3(dkon brtsegs): de la dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ gdol pa ni rtag tu dur khrod spyod yul yin te/ shi ba la re ba dang / byams pa med pa'i mig gis
212a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la lta ba dang / shi ba la dga' ba yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang rtag tu mdza' shes kyi khyim dang slong ba ster ba'i khyim la gdu ba yin te/
212a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas rnyed pa dang bkur bstis nye bar 'tsho zhing / khyim pa de dag chos sam 'dul ba yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa dang / de rnyed pa'i tshad du 'dris par byed kyi don gyi ched du
212a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / mdza' ba'i sems med cing rtag tu rnyed pa la re ba yin te/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ gdol pa ni
212a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slob dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis rtag tu spang bar bya ba'i/
212a8(dkon brtsegs): 'os yin te/ gdol par rig nas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongasu spong // 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang dge sbyong dang dge sbyong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma/
212b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongasu spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/ dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod cing tshul khrim 'chal par rig nas/
212b2(dkon brtsegs): thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongasu slong // 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ gdol pa'i kha phyis sam/ gos sam/ yongasu spyad pa thams cad la ni/ skye bo ya rab rnams mi reg cing
212b3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu mi spyod do// 'od srung de bzhin du ge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ yongasu spyad pa de thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i 'tsho bas yongasu btsal ba/ lus
212b4(dkon brtsegs): dang sems smras pas yongasu btsal ba yin pas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa dag de la mi reg cing mi spyod do// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ gdol pa de
212b5(dkon brtsegs): kha phyis thogs te/ zhum zhum por byas nas gyi khyim du 'gro'o// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang zhum zhum por byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag
212b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshalo// zhum zhum par byas nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro'o// zhum zhum por byas nas gtsug lag khang dang / gnas khang dang / zhum zhum por byas nas 'gro ba dang / 'dug
212b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang nyal bar byed do// 'od srung de ltar na zhum zhu ba por byas sdig pa 'chal pa de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de thams cad ni rung ba ma yin pa las yongasu brtogs par
212b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ gdol pa'i sems ni bde 'gro'i skye bu la mI pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rang gi lus kyi nyes pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung de bzhi
212b9(dkon brtsegs): du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sems kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mi gnas shing / de'i 'jig rten pha rol rnam par zhigs la de ngan 'gro gsum du gnas par rig
213a1(dkon brtsegs): par bsgribs pa med de/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong rul pa gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste/
213a2(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ rgyal po la 'os pa'i btung ba ro mchog dang ldan pa las gang snying ku mtshan bcus pa de'i lhag ma ni rul cing mi gtsang bar 'gyur ba ste myang bar bya ba ma yin no//
213a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa yang chos kyi mchog gi snying ku'i bro ba bral ba yin te/ dri nga ba dang yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/ nyon mongs pa dang
213a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu 'dzin pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa dang ldan zhing tshul khrims kyi dri dang bral ba yin/ nyon mongs pa'i dris bsgos pa yin te/
213a5(dkon brtsegs): de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du yang bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs kyi/ gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ma yin te/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong rul pa zhes
213a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'o/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rul pa zhes bya ba ni gang zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa gzags pa de ni/ rul cing dri nga yin te/ skye bo ya rab thams cad kyis
213a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu spang bar bya ba'i 'os yino// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa yang gzags pa dang mtshungs te/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su ma dag pas/
213a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i skye bo yongasu spang bar bya ba yin te/ 'di ni dge slong rul pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon rul pa gang yin po de ni/ sa chen po las skyer mi
213b1(dkon brtsegs): rung ngo // 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa yan sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la mi skye zhing / 'phags pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i sa bon nus pa ma yin pa la 'bras
213b2(dkon brtsegs): bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong rul pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ za ma tog phyi rol
213b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu byi dor bas la nang mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba zhig yod pa de bzhin du/ dge slo za ma gtog lta bu yang / dge sbyong ltar bcos shing pha rol gtsang sa spyod
213b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur la/ nang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi yongasu gang ba yin te/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong ku ra
213b5(dkon brtsegs): ran da ka lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ ku rand ka zhes bya ba'i me tog ni kha dog blta na dug la reg na rtsubs pa lci ba dang / sbrang ma'i dri mnam zhing shi la bA ka'i
213b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba'i dri mnam ste/ mkhas pa 'dzangs pa rnams ni me tog de lta bu la mi reg mi len mi snom gyi/ gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de'i skyon mi shes pa de dag ni me tog de/
213b7(dkon brtsegs): bu len cing snomo// 'od srung de bzhin du dge slong ku ran da ka lta bu yang / dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur kyang mi nges pa yin/ tshig brlang ba yin/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrim
213b8(dkon brtsegs): dri mi zhim pa yin/ 'tsho bA nyams pa yin+da/ spod pa nyams pa yin/ lta ba nyam pa yin te/ 'dzad pa mkhas pa rnamA ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong lta bu la rten pa 'am/ gnyen pa 'am/ bsnyen
213b9(dkon brtsegs): bkur mi byed kyi de'i tshul rig pas thag ring po// bas kyang ring por yongasu spong ngo // gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de dag ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta ba la rten
214a1(dkon brtsegs): cing bsnyen la/ bsnyed bkur byed de ku rad dki'i me tog byis pa'i lag na 'dug pa de bzhin du de dang 'thun pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'od srung 'di ni ku ran ka lta bu'i nga
214a2(dkon brtsegs): spong zhes bya'o// 'od ba srang de la chom kun lta bu dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na// mi yon can gyi rang bzhin can rtag tu brkam pa dang / chags pa'i zil
214a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis non pa/ bdag gi rnyed pas chog par mi 'dzin cing / gzhan gyi nor la re ba drag shul can// dbyug pa dang mtshon cha dang / dgra ca thog pa ngo mtshar med pa/ snying rje med pa
214a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gdugs pa// cing rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ de gang gi tshe grong mar/ grong mA// grong khyer ram/ grol rdal lam// yul du 'jug pa des tshe// de 'di snyam du
214a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la nor gyi phung po gang yin pa de bdag gir gyur da na/ re ste snyam du sems shing / de zin du 'ong zhes mkhun bur rgyu ba yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du chom kun lta bu'i
214a6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong yang rtag tu brkam pa/ chags pa'i zil gyis nan pa/ bdag gi snyed pas chos myi shes pa// gzhan gyi snyed pa rI ba yin te/ de gang gi tshe grong ba ram/ grong ngab/ grong
214a7(dkon brtsegs): khyero ram/ grong brdal 'am/ yul du 'jug pa de tshe/ de rnyed pa'i phyir 'jug go// chos kyi phyir ma yin te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang chom rkun lta bur ston pa yin te/
214a8(dkon brtsegs): 'chab cing sbed pa yin te/ bdag ge slong gzhan gyis tshul khrims 'chal par shes na mi rung ste/ shes par gyur da na/ so sor thar pa'i mdo sde 'don pa las bskrad par
214b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// snyam nas rtag tu skrag cing 'jig te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang g.yos spyod pas/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag gis chom rkum 'od de/ chom rkun
214b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'o// chom rkum 'dreng ngo // chom kun chag ge/ chog rkun 'dug go// nyalo// chos gos len to// chom kun grong du 'gro'o// grong nas 'byung ngo // chom kun tha'o// chom kun
214b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thun do// chom rkun skra 'dregs go zhes rig par 'gyu ro// 'od srung de lta na/ lha dang kA dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za snrums kyis de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de thams
214b4(dkon brtsegs): cad rung ba ma yin/ yongs su brtag pa yin par rig par 'gyur te/ rig nas kyang de la snying rje chen po snyed cing / kye ma 'di mtshar cig sdig pa can gyi dge
214b5(dkon brtsegs): slong 'di lta bu dag gi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i rten pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro// zhes 'phya zhing myi snyan par ze ro/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang
214b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams la ni lha dang kla dang gnod sprin dang dri za dang rnams kyang 'di dag ni brtan pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i zhes gus par cher skye do// 'od srang chom rkun lta bu'i
214b7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong brtan pa 'di rab tu byung ba ni skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gcig kyang myi skyed na/ 'bras bu thob pa lta ci smos kyis/ de ni nas myed do// 'od srungs 'di ni
214b8(dkon brtsegs): chom rkun lta bu'i dge slong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de bzhin du dge slong shin te ma gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bru'i nang na gang dag ma min pa dang / mi grung ba dang /
215a1(dkon brtsegs): !/ 'ong ba med cing 'gru 'dra ba de dag ni shin te ma zhes bya'o// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong shin te ma yang yang zhing mthu chung la bdud kyis zin pa/ bdud kyi non pa// nyon por
215a2(dkon brtsegs): pa tha mad kyis 'phrog pa/ rlung gis g.yeng ba lta bu de 'od srung dge sbyong shin te ma zhes bya ba de ni dge slong tshul khrims 'tshal pa sdig pa can rnams kyi tshig bla dag te/ de dag ngas dge sbyong
215a3(dkon brtsegs): shin te ma zhes brtag so// 'od srung de la dge sbyong sun par byed pa gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ de nas kyi ljang bu phun sum tshogs pa'i nang na/ nas la gnod pa zhig skyes nas/
215a4(dkon brtsegs): de ljang bu'i kha dog 'dra zhing rtag dang dbyibs kyang 'dra bas/ de la nas gi bdag po de dag 'di snyam du 'di dag thams cad ni nas yin no// snyam pa'i 'du shes snyed skyed pa las/ gang gi tshe
215a5(dkon brtsegs): nas kyi ljan bu las snye ma byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe// nas la gnod pa de la nas kyi 'du shes mi 'byung ngo // 'od srangs de bzhin du dge spring sun par byed pa'i dge slong dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi
215a6(dkon brtsegs): nang na 'dug pa yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnam dang kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyi bas dra bas de la sprin pa po dang smin bdag de dge slong do
215a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed cing // sprin gan su 'du shes pa skyed pa las/ de nas gal te pi ti mug pa dge sbyong ma yin la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa tshangs par
215a8(dkon brtsegs): spong par khas 'che ba/ nang rul tsong zag pa de 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste/ shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sprin dang / dri za
215b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i myig dang / ldan pa rnams kyis// de sems can dmyal bar skyes par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang mi gti mug pa 'di ni sngor dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs kyis sdig pa'i las
215b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pas/ de sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/ nas gnod pa la gnas kyi yon tan med pa lhur 'di la yang dge slong gi yon tan gyi 'bras bu med do// zhes snying rje/
215b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po skyed de/ 'od srung 'di ni dge slong sun par byed pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong ltar bcos pa la gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la ste dper na// ra gan chen po zhes bya ba'i
215b4(dkon brtsegs): lcug zhig yod de/ shin tu yongs su spang ba byas shing / shin tu yongs su dag par byas na/ gser 'dra bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gser gyi rin thang dang / gser gyi kha dog
215b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bder 'phre dang / srang la gzhal ba'i ljid 'dra ba ni ma yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge slong ltar bcos pa'i dge slong yang lus shin tu bkrus shing // gos bzang po mdzed/
215b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gyon la/ dge slo phyi rol gyi spod pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang // mdun lbu ba dang / g.ya' yor lta ba dang / bskams pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos
215b7(dkon brtsegs): gos snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa shes bzhin du spyod kyang / de 'dod chags kyis bcom pa dang / zhe sdang gis bcom pa dang / gti mug gis bcom pa dang
215b8(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pas bcom pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti bcom pa dang / nga rgyal dang // che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang // /
216a1(dkon brtsegs): cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal gyi bcom pa dang // nyon mongs pas 'khor lo dang / bsnyed bkur lhur len gyi chos lhur mi len pa dang / lus chur bar b+hU
216a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la brtson gyi/ tshul khrims kyis tsha bar spor ba la mi btson pa dang // zas dang gos lhar len kyis 'phags pa'i chos lhur len pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas
216a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten par mi lta ba dang / tshe 'di ltar len gyi tshe phyi ma lUr mi len pa dang / lu gso ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti/ grag pa rten gyi chos la rims 'gror bya ba la mi rten pa dang /
216a4(dkon brtsegs): spag pa sna tshogs kyis sngags pa dang / sdig pas bsgos pa dang / khyim gyi las kyi mtha' mngon par brtson pa dang / khyim pa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pas bde ba
216a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal dag gis kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bas bcom pa yin te/ de'i dge sbyong gi chos dang / spyod lam thams cad dang /
216a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje 'jig rten du gzhol ba yin zhing / de dge sbyong gi rin thang dang /
216a7(dkon brtsegs): ri ba dang / dge sbyong gi srang ga dang / mi mnyam pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la ji ltar dge sbyong gzi 'phrogs pa yin zhe na// 'od
216a8(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di lta ste dbor na/ skyes pa 'am// bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bo mo gang la la zhig mi ma yin pas gzigs 'phrog par gyur na/ de dbang dung bar gags shing mdo
216b1(dkon brtsegs): mdog ngan la mi sdug par 'gyur ste/ de ltar mangs 'phrog pa rnams la ri sman tam gsang sngags sam/ rig sdug rnams kyis mi smon to// de 'chi bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par
216b2(dkon brtsegs): tha mar gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// 'od srang de bzhin du mi 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge slong gang la tshul khrims kyi gzir med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gzi med pa dang //
216b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi gzi med pa dang / rnam par grol bar gzi med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i gzi med pa dang / byams pa'i gzi med pa dang / snying rje'i gzi
216b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / dga' ba'i gzi med pa dang / btang snyoms kyi gzi med pa dang // sbyin pa dang yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa'i gzi med pa dang / dge slong gi yon tan gyi gzi
216b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i gzi med pa dang / spangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyad pa'i gzi med pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag pa'i
216b6(dkon brtsegs): gzi// med pa 'di ni/ 'od srung dge slong gzi 'phrog pa zhes bya ste/ 'od srung ga gzi 'phrog pa rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba'i sman gyis mi tshugs te/ 'di lta ste/
216b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la mi sdug pa'i sman dang // zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa
216b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du 'dzi la dben par dga' ba dang / 'dzin pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir dgon par gnas pa dang / gsum bsdams pa'i phyir lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag pa
217a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems las rung bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i smad de de bzhin gshegs sbyar ba 'di lta bu 'di dag gis de la mi tshugs te/ de shin
217a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gang dag yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems 'di lta ste/ phung po shes pa dang / khams shes
217a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skye ched shes pa dang // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman
217a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di dag gis kyang de la mi tshugs te/ de shi nas sems can dmyal ba'i nyid du 'gyur te/ de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad do// dge slong rnal
217a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor smod pa lnga rgyas bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa sprad par gyu na mi rung zhes snyam par byas te/ slar khyim du dong ngo // dge slong gzhan/
217a6(dkon brtsegs): dag cig 'di skad du dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can rnams 'byor spyod pa 'di dag bstan pa las nyams pa ni shin du ma legs so zhes 'phya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
217a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ dge slong dag khyod 'di skad du/ dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can 'di dag 'di ltar bstan pa las shin tu nyams pa
217a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni shin tu ma legs so zhes ma smra shig/ de'i ci'i phyin zhe na/ dge slong dag mngon par mi dga' nas khyim na gnas pa 'di ni/ dad pa can rnams kyi chos yin te/ dge
217b1(dkon brtsegs): slong dad pa dang mos pa mang ba 'gyod pa dang ldan pa 'di dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su sprad na
217b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rung ngo // zhes nyams par gyur to// 'od srung nga lung ston to// dge slong 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag de bzhin
217b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i le'u ste gsub pa'o//
217b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ji lta bus zhal ta bgyi ba lags// bcom ldan 'das
217b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa// 'od srungs ngas zhal ta bya bar gnang ba'i ge'i spyong gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dge slong yongs su dag pa/ 'jig rten pha rol tu kha
217b6(dkon brtsegs): na ma tho bas 'jig pa lta ba rnams par smin pa la rton pa/ 'dzem pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / gang yang zag pa zad pa dgra bcom par gyur pa te// 'od
217b7(dkon brtsegs): srung dge slong ma nyams pa 'di gnyis zhal ta byed par ngas gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od bsrung legs par gsung pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rigs sna tshogs las
217b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba/ sems kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor sna tshogs la gnas pa// kha cig ni dgon pa ba zhi ba'i mal stan la mngon par dga' ba/
218a1(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni bsod nams pa/ kha cig ni grong 'dab na gnas pa/ kha cig ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ kha cig ni mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson
218a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ kha cig ni chos smra/ kha cig 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ kha cig ma mo 'dzin pa/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dang tu zhugs nas
218a3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa ste/ sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi sbed pa rnams bsrung ba'i dka' ba'i phyir ro// 'od srung de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun thams
218a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems mgu bar bya'o// 'od bsrung de la dge slong dgon pa pa baMs mthi' mal snyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas yod las su bsgo bar mi bya'o//
218a5(dkon brtsegs): zhal ta byed pas dge slong dgon pa pa de dag bsrung bar bya te/ dus ma yin par gsol bar mi bya'o// dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya'o// 'od srung ga la te dge slong mgon
218a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ba dge 'dun gyi bar gtogs pa slob pa'i las res bab na/ dge slong zhal ta bye ba des las de bdag nyid kyis bya'o// yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos la las
218a7(dkon brtsegs): de byed du gzhugs te/ dge slong mgon pa gnod par mi bya'o// 'od bsrung de la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la dge slong zhal ta byed pa des kha zas gsod pa
218a8(dkon brtsegs): bgo bsha' bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong rnal 'byor spyad pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal te byed pas 'thun pa'i 'tshogs chas dang / ra ba'i gsos smad dang / yo byad rnams sbrid par bya'o//
218b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnal 'byor spong ba des phyogs ga la gnas pa'i sa phyogs der// dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sgra chen po dang skad drag po mi dbyings zhing byed du yang mi gzhugs go// dge slong zhal ta byed
218b2(dkon brtsegs): pa se/ dge slong rnal 'byor sdod pa de bsrung zhing mal tsa yang sbar bar bya'o// kha zas gsod pa dang / yi ger 'ong ba dang / rnal 'byor spong ba'i sa dang / 'thun pa'i gza' ba dang / bcas pa
218b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams sbyin par bya'o// dge slong de la dge slong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa rton pa'i phyir gnas pa yin te/ de la bdag gis rjes su 'thun pa'i yo byad thams cad pang du smra/
218b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// snyam da shin du par pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong mang du thos pa mngon par btson pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal te byed pas lung nos shig/ lcogs
218b5(dkon brtsegs): shig/ kha ston gyis shig/ kho bo ra khyod kyi rim 'gro byed pa yin gyis// khyod ji ltar ji lta bu mang du thos par gyur pa de lta de lta bur dge slong gi dge 'dun mdzes par 'gyur bar gyis shing
218b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug la brjod pas mdzes par gyis shig/ bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shig ces spro ba bskyed par bya'o// 'od bsrung de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de
218b7(dkon brtsegs): dus ma yin pa btad par mi bya'o// las su bsko ba mi bya'o// dge slong zhal te byed pa des dge slong mang du thos pa de dag bsrung bar bya'o// 'od srud de la chos sla ba'i dge slong gang yin//
218b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas la su mi bsko bar bya'o// grong dang grong khyer dang grong bsngal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug tu bcug la chos 'chad//
219a1(dkon brtsegs): / du zhug go// chos nyan pa dag bsko bar bya'o// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o// 'brel pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi phyir dkyil 'khor du ba
219a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// chos sba ba'i dge slong gang dag gnod par byed pa'i dge slong zhal ta byed pas bzlog par bya'o// dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos sba ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bsu bar bya/
219a3(dkon brtsegs): leg so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin par gyur pa de dag gis gan du dge slong zhal ta byed pa de la song la/ ji ltar na bdag
219a4(dkon brtsegs): rma med cing ma nyams pa dang / ji ltar na bdag ltung ba med pa'i chos kyis zhal te bya zhes yongs su dri bar bya'o// de nas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag gis
219a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong zhal ta byed pa de'i bsam pa rig na de'i bya ba dang 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / byed pa gang yin pa de bstan par bya'o// dge slong zhal te byed pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang // ma mo
219a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la phangs par bya ba dang / dad pa dang gus pa dang zhes rab tu bskyed par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de dag slong zhal de byed pas dus su dusu
219a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o// dge 'dun gyi snyed pa brtag shing swa bar mi bya ste/ ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du smin par bya/ ma bskul bar smin par bya/ gnod pa byed par
219a8(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya'o// des 'dun pa dang zheng sdad dang / gti mug dang / 'jig pas 'gro bar mi bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun la rton par bya'o// khyims pa'i phyogs la rton par
219b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// khyims pa'i phyogs la rton par mi bya'o// dge 'dun gyis bya ba la rton par byi'o/ bdag dga' bar bya ba la rton par mi bya'o// dngos po gang la yang dbang bya ba'i
219b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o// bya ba ji tsam du chung ba yang dge 'dun gyis gros bzhin bya zhing rang dga' myi bya'o// dge 'dun gyi sa 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
219b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi'am/ mchod rten yo byad gang ci yang rung ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// phyogs bzhi'i dge
219b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi snyed pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// dge 'dun gyi dang po phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa mchod rten gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// mchod rten gyi rnyed pa
219b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dge 'dun gyi phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// lagal te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la 'brel phung su gyur nga la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa med che bar gyur ta na// /
219b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus la gros mthun par gyis te/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa de las phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshugs par bya'o// gal te/
219b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal te byed pas dge slong gyi dge 'du
219b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsdus la/ gros mthun par bgyis te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di ni zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
220a1(dkon brtsegs): ha/ gyi snyed par gyur na/ gal te tshe dang ldan pa rnams gnod pa med cing dad pa ldan la/ bzod cing gnang na/ bdag gis dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i
220a2(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi snyed pa 'di las dngos po cung zad cig khyer de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di bcos par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te dge 'dun gyis gnang na
220a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong zhal ta byed pa des de bzhin bya'o// ci ste dge 'dun gyis ma gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa dam sbyin pa po dang sprin bdag rnams la gsol ba thob la/ de bzhin pa'i
220a4(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten gso bar bya'o// 'od srung gal te mchod rten gyi rnyed pa ci ltar mang du gyur na du zin kyang / dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge 'dun dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshugs
220a5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad cing dang ba mang po dag gis mchod rten la phul ba ni/ tha na ras kha tsar gcig tsam gang yin pa de yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
220a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten yin no// rin po che 'am rin po che smos dag lta dmos kyang ci dgos/ mchod rten la gos phul ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de nyid du rlung
220a7(dkon brtsegs): dang nyi ma dang / char pas dengs kyang bA'i/ mchod rten la phul ba'i gos dbyigs gam dbyig gi rin tu bsgyur bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten gyi rin thang chung zad
220a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang / med la/ mchod rten ni cis kyang brel ba med bI myir ro// 'od srung dge sbyong zhal ta byed pas de yongs su dag par bya te/ de dkon mchog gsum gyi dang ma 'bags par bya'o//
220b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi rnyed pas mchog shes par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos po rnams la bdag gir 'du shes mi bya'o// 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pas
220b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa/ sprin gnas rnams la sems khros sam// dbang byed cing sgo blag byed na//
220b3(dkon brtsegs): de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal bar 'byor ro// gal te myi 'jig rten du 'ongs na yang bran drang gzhan gyi las byed par 'gyur ba dang / khu tshur dang / thal lkug dang /
220b4(dkon brtsegs): lag cag gnyems pas brdeg pa dang phrad par 'gyur ro// 'od srung gzhan yang dge slong la zhal ta byed pa dge 'dun gyi bya ba las 'das te/ rang gar dge slong rnams
220b5(dkon brtsegs): la dbang byed cing / sgo ba dang / chad pas gcod pa dang / 'jig par byed par dang / sdig pa dang / dus ma yin par mngag pa dang / dus ma yin par sgo bar byed de/
220b6(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i las des nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba phul ba mang po zhes bya ba'i der skye bar 'gyur te/ der skyes nas lus la lcag pur brgya stong zug/ de dag rab/
220b7(dkon brtsegs): mched cing 'bar 'gyur ro// des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa// sprin nas rnams la sdig shing / dag gis las gdag pa sla bar brgyur ba gang yin
220b8(dkon brtsegs): des/ de der skyes nas lce dbang po'i khyon pa dpag tshad brgya par 'gyur zhing / de lce'i dbang po la lcags phur brgya stong rab tu 'bab cing de dag kyang 'bar bar
221a1(dkon brtsegs): @#tu 'bar kun du rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te med 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des bsdig shing ngag gi las
221a2(dkon brtsegs): gi gdug pa smras par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ 'od srung dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la la dge 'dun gyi snyed pa 'du shing 'dus pa bzhag ste/ dus dus su mi sbyin zhing tho
221a3(dkon brtsegs): btsams la tses nas sbyin pa dang / kha cig sbyin kha bcig na byin na/ kha cig la byin/ kha cig la ma byin na/ de mi dge ba'i las des yid dgas kyi skye gnas rkyag
221a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jim byin pa nub ces bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro// de der skyes nas yi dag gzhan gyi kha zas blangs te de la brten na/ de bstan pa'i tshe mig gnyis ka mi 'jug
221a5(dkon brtsegs): par zas te la lta zhing bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi/ lo brgya stong du yang zas de ni thob par mi 'gyur ro// ci ste brgya la brgya
221a6(dkon brtsegs): lam na zas de thob kyang ngan skyug dang rnag khrag tu 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa sprin gnas rnams mgu bar ma bya
221a7(dkon brtsegs): shing rang gi rnyed pas chog mi shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi dge 'dun gyi 'am/ mchod kyi
221a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byas na/ de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngas bskal pa 'grangs kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo // 'od srung dge slong zhal te byed pa gang las nyes mig kyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas khro'/
221b1(dkon brtsegs): gshe bam/ gnod par sems sem/ khong khro ba skyed na/ de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas pa shad do// 'od srung de lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas
221b2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par bya'o// bdag dang gzhan srung bar bya'o// 'od srung dge slong zhal te byang pas rang gi sha za yang bli la// dkon mchog gsum gyis byin gyis brla
221b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lhung zed dam chos gos ma/ bsod snyoms sam// na ba'i gsos sman rnam// yo byad yongs su spyad par ni mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 'od srung chen pos 'di
221b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhod ba rnams kyi lhong ba'i chos dang / 'dzem mchis pa rnam kyi 'dzem bdog gi chos rnams bka' stsal to// / zhal ta byed pa'i
221b5(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dge slong dgon pa dgang dag bdag mgon pa zhes mchi kyi che na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na dge slong dgon pa pa lags//
221b6(dkon brtsegs): ci tsam gyis na dge slong bsod snyoms pa lags/ ci tsam gyis na dge slong phyag dar khrod pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung
221b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od 'asrung 'di la dge slong dgon pa pas dgon pa dang / nag tshal gyi sa nas dang / khas mthar nas mal bca' bar bya'o// chom rkun dang /
221b8(dkon brtsegs): gnag rdzi dang / phyag rdzi med pa/ sdig phrul med ga ri dgas dang bya mang po med pa/ sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang nyung ba'i/ sgra nyung ba ca co nyung ba de lta bu'i dgon pa bsam mtha' dag tu gnas
222a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ yid la byed pa brkyang bsnyed par bya ste// brgyad gang zhe na/ lus la mi lta bar bya ba dang / srog la mi lta bar bya ba dang /
222a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / bkur bsi la mi lta bar bya ba dang / 'dra 'dzi thams cad la mi lta bar bya ba dang / dgon pa dag ri dgas 'chi ba lhur khas blang bar bya ba de/ dgon par dgon pa'i yon tan yang dag par
222a3(dkon brtsegs): blangs te gnas par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'che bas 'tshe'i logs pas 'tsho ba ma yin par bya ba dang / zang zing nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos pas 'tsho bar bya ste/ yid la bya ba brgyad po'i
222a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag bskyed gnas dgon pa'i gnas su gnas par bya'o// dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na sems can thams cad la byams pa rnam pa brgyad bskyed par bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/
222a5(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i byams pa dang / bde ba'i byams pa dang / gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang / yang dag pa'i byams pa dang / tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang / zhi gnas kyi bya//
