222a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos la nges par sems dpa'i byams pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i byams pa ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa brgyad pa de dag bsnyed/
222a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas na 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ltar bdag ni lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs la gcig pu gnyis su med par sti/
222a8(dkon brtsegs): legs par byas pa/ nyes par byas pa/ skul ba'i grog ni gang yang med kyi/ lha dang kA dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
222b1(dkon brtsegs): dag bdag gi sems kyi bsam pa dag shes pa yod de/ bdag dgon pa'i gnas na gnas la mi dge ba'i sems kyi dbang du song na/ de dag dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag lam ni/
222b2(dkon brtsegs): po gnas 'ong shing / gcig pu gnyis su med de/ spen pa med/ bdag gi med/ yongs su 'dzin pa med/ gal te 'dod pa la rnam par rtog/ gnod sems kyi
222b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa rnam par rtog/ 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog gam/ myi dge ba gzhan la rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro// bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /
222b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba las mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams dang / bye brag med par 'gyur te/ bdag gi lU dang kla dang gnod sbyin dang dri za rnams la bslas par 'gyur zhing //
222b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mi mnyes par byas par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag la lha rnams 'phya bar mi 'gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas bcom
222b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro/ ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ so sor thar pa'i smon pas bsdam
222b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya// tshul khrims kyi phu rol po shin du kun tu bsrung bar bya/ lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sems mngon du bya ba dang /
222b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar chos la rten pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rab tu ldan pa dang yid byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / de mya ngan
223a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa las gzhol ba dang / 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa dang / phung po ni gshed ma ste/ phyir rgos par rig pa dang //
223a2(dkon brtsegs): khams zhi la myur du gdug pa'i dug du 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug la grong skad du mos pa dang // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par mkhas pa dang //
223a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtag tu ba dang chad pa lta ba yongs su spang ba dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med
223a4(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan pa med pa spod yul ba dang / smad ba'i sems sel ba dang / khams gsum la rtag tu 'jig pa'i yid
223a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / lus kyi skyon la yang dag par ci lta ba
223a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / skye ba dang 'jig pa la lta ba dang / sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa mngon par brtson pa dang / kun 'byung ba thams cad kyi sred
223a7(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pa dang / 'gog pa mngon gsum du bya ba la zhugs pa dang / lam sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / pa'i spyod yul dran pa nye bar gzhag la
223a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang dge ba'i chos la mngon tu phyogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba la shin tu gnas pa dang / rnga 'phral gyi rkang pa mngon
223b1(dkon brtsegs): ruta gya rad pa da nga / dbang po lnga dang ldan pa dang / stobs ldi'i shags dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lu bam gtan pa dang // phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon pa
223b2(dkon brtsegs): btsu na pa dang / zhi gnas la gnas pa dang / lhag mthong gis blta bar bya ste/ 'od srung de lta bu'i go ca 'di dge bgos nas// nam gyi cha steng dang smang la myi nyama'i pa rnal 'byor
223b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi brtson pa dang / rtag tu khyad par du 'gro ba'i dgon pa'i gnas par bya'o// de dben pa'i banas de na gnas pa na/ lus brgyan par sbyor ba la brtson par myi bya'o// mas chas brgyan pa
223b4(dkon brtsegs): la brtson par myi bya'o// chos gos kyis brgyan pa la bcom par mi bya'o// des rtsa ba ting ba bskal pa blangs la chags dang / 'dug sar legs par bting ste/
223b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'dug pa dang / dge 'dun gyis dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang ma 'phags pa dang / bdag gi gos kyis chog shes par dgon pa'i gnas der gnas
223b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// 'od srung dge slong dgon pa ba gang gi tshe lus gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam nye bar brten pa'i phyir/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong
223b7(dkon brtsegs): brdal du bsod nams kyis phyir 'jug pa na/ des sems 'di lta bus dgon pa'i gnas de nas 'gro bar bya ste/ ma rnyed kyang yongs su yi mchad par mi
223b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rnyed kyang dga' ba bskyed par mi bya/ lus kyi rnam par smin pa yid la bya/ bsod soms nye bar brtan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya
224a1(dkon brtsegs): ba bsam zhing des grong dang grong khyer dang / grong brdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug par bya'o// de grong dang grong khyer dang /
224a2(dkon brtsegs): grong brdal du bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ gos kyi go cha bgos lta/ bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o// de la chos kyis go cha gang zhe na/ mig gis yid du 'ong ba'i
224a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rnams mthong na/ rjes su chags par mi bya'o// yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams mthong na yang khrong khro bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du sgra dang ro dang reg
224a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnams la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro bar mi bya'o// dbang po shin tu brdams pa dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / ga1
224a5(dkon brtsegs): shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dul ba dang cang shes kyi sems dang / sngon gyis yid la byed pa'i chos mi 'dor ba dang / zang zing gi ma 'bags pa'i rgyud kyi bsod
224a6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms spyad par bya'o// mthar chags su bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o// gang nas bsod snyoms rnyed pa der rjes su chags par mi bya'o// gang nas ma rnyed
224a7(dkon brtsegs): pa der khong khro bar mi bya'o// khyim bcur blangs pa las khyim bcu gcig pa las bsod snyoms rnyed na yang yongs su yi chad par mi bya'o// de 'di snyam du bram ze
224a8(dkon brtsegs): dang khyim bdag 'di dag ni bya ba mang ba yin pas de dag gis bdag la sbyin par nges par med de/ de dag bdag la sems pa yang ngo mtshar che na/ bsod snyoms
224b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa lta mos kyang ci dgos snyom pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ des de ltar yongs su yi nad pa med par bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o// sems can gang
224b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag de'i mig lam du snang bar gyur pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / tha na dud 'gro skyes gnas su song ba de dag la yang byams
224b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / snying rjes sems bskyed par bya'o// ci nas kyang sems can gang dag bdag gi mig lam du snang bar gyur pa 'am/ bsod snyoms sbyin pa de dag
224b4(dkon brtsegs): tho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de ltar brtson par bya'o// des bsod snyoms ngan nam bzang yang rung blangs te/ grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal
224b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bdag gi bsod snyoms 'di las bgo bshad bya dgos pa'i sems can dbul po su yod snyam phyogs bzhir kun tu blta bar bya'o// gal te sems can dngul po
224b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig mthong na/ nges pasad goms dalas go pag bya'o// kal te sems can dngul po pa mthongan por 'di ltar gang dag bdag gi mig lam du snang bar ma 'gyur
224b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ mi snang ba'i sems can de dag la/ bsod snyoms kyi thog ma'i cha skal sbyin gyis byin nas len pa dag yongs su spyod cig snyam du sems bskyed la/ des
224b8(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms khyer te/ dgon pa'i gnas der song la lhung bzed dang lag pa bkrus te dge sbyong gi spyod pa dang cho ga dang ldan pa'i spyod pa bzang pos byin gyis brlabs
225a1(dkon brtsegs): la des dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te bza' bar bya'o// ma chags pa dang gnod sems med pa dang / mi rkam pa dang / ma zhe
225a2(dkon brtsegs): pas zas zos nas 'di snyam du lus 'di la srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri yod pa 'di dag 'di'i mthus bde bar gnas par gyur cig/ da ni 'di dag zang zing gis
225a3(dkon brtsegs): bsdus par bya'o// byang chub thob nas ni chos kyis bsdu bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bskyed par bya'o// gal te yang de'i bson soms ngan
225a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ des 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ kha zas ngan pas ni bdag gis lus yang bar gyur/ spong ba bzod par 'gyur/ bdag gi
225a5(dkon brtsegs): bshang gci 'byung ba dag nyung bar 'gyur/ bdag la dad pas byin pa chung bar 'gyur/ bdag gis lus yang ba dang sems yang bar 'gyur/ bdag
225a6(dkon brtsegs): rmugs pa dang gnyid chung bar 'gyur/ bdag la 'dod chags kyi sems kyi kun nas dkris par mi 'gyur ro// snyam du yid la bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag bskyed par
225a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gal te de bsod snyoms mang zhig rnyed na/ de la yang ran par bza' bar bya'o// dong po'i chos nyid du yang bya ste/ desad skams de rdo leb gang yang
225a8(dkon brtsegs): rung ba'i steng du gtor la/ 'di snyam du gcan zad dang / bya'i tshogs gang la la zang zing gis zas 'dod pa byin nas/ len pa de dag 'di la bo shig snyam du sems
225b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya'o// des zas zos nas lhung bzed dang lag pa bsdus te dgon pa la rten nas gnas par bya'o// sngon yid la byed pa'i chos de nyid kyang mi 'ad
225b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// 'od srung gal te dge slong dgon pa pa 'bras bu ma thob pa so so'i skye bo'i drung du sbrul dang gcan zan gtum po dag 'ongs na/ des de la 'jigs pa
225b3(dkon brtsegs): dang skrag par mi bya'i/ des 'di snyam du bdag thog ma nyid nas lus dang srog bor te/ dgon pa'i gnas su 'ongs kyis/ 'di la bdag gis 'jigs par mi bya/
225b4(dkon brtsegs): skrag par mi bya'o// byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya/ zhe sdang rnam par spang bar bya/ 'jigs pa spang bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te
225b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byas nas sbrul dang gcan zadan de dag gis srog gcod cing za na yang des 'di snyam du gcan zan 'di dag la bdag gis zang zing tsam gyis tshim par byed mi
225b6(dkon brtsegs): nus kyi/ de dag gis bdag gi sha zos nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur la/ bdag gis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par
225b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de ni 'di dag zang zing bsdu bar bya'o// byang chub thob nas ni chos kyis bsdu bar bya'o snyam du sems
225b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya'o// 'od srung dgon pa la gnas pa'i dge slong gis de ltar lus dang srog la mi lta bar dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// gal te de dgon pa'i
226a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas de na gnas pa na/ mi ma yin pa 'ongs na mdog sdug kyang rung mdog mi sdug kyang rung de la chags par mi bya/ khod
226a2(dkon brtsegs): khro bar mi bya'o// gal te sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha dag dge slong dgon pa pa'i gan du 'ongs te dri ba yongs su 'dri na/ de la dgon pa pa des/
226a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thos pa bzhin du lha de dag la chos bshad par bya'o// ci ste lha de dag zab mo'i dri ba yongs su 'dri ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa des lan mi 'thebs
226a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lta na/ des nga rgyal med par byas la/ 'di skad ces ma bslabs pa la brnyas par mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la lung mnos nas 'bad de/ khong
226a5(dkon brtsegs): du chud pa'i rnams khong du chud par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na dris thams cad kyi lan gdab par bya'o// bdag ni chos nyan pa yin gyis khyed spobs par gyis
226a6(dkon brtsegs): shig ces brjod par bya ste/ 'od srung dge slong dgon pa pas de ltar lha de dag la go bar bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pa dgon pa la gnas pas/
226a7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa'i 'du shes shin tu bsgom par bya ste/ des lus 'di ni rtsa ngang shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bang ba dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ bdag po med pa dang /
226a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// lus 'di ni bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang gang zag med kyi/ chos 'di dag ni rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba ste/
226b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung zhing / byed rgyu tshogs pa las byung ba ste/ cis kyang bdag gi lta bar gyur pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis tshul bzhin sa
226b2(dkon brtsegs): sor brtag par bya'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos kyang rgyun mi chad par yid la bya'o snyam du de ltar bslab par bya'o// dgon pa'i
226b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas de na gnas pa des/ rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal de dag ci ltar 'byung ba dang / ji ltar 'jig par 'byung ba dang / ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po
226b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bdag po med pa/ bdag gis med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ de ltar g.yo ba med cing byed pa med de/ stong bzhin du skye zhing 'jig la su yang de dag
226b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bar mi byed de/ 'gog par mi byed pa'i mtshan ma bzung la/ de bzhin du lus 'di yang rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang bong ba dang mig g.yor lta bu ste/ bdag
226b6(dkon brtsegs): po med pa/ bdag gi med pa yong su 'dzin pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las byung gi rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na mi 'byung ba ste/ 'di la dod dam par
226b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'gog pa'i chos gang yang medado// 'od srung de ltar dge slong dgon pa pas chos kyi yi dam gyi spyod pa 'di lta bus dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// de lta bus chos la gnas pa de nyanaH
226b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'ag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa zhig myur du khyad par du 'gyuraro// gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur na ni myur du 'bras bu thob par 'gyuraro//
227a1(dkon brtsegs): ci ste de las kyi sgrib pa sa bsgribs te/ 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na yang de zag pa rnams las sem rnam par grol gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis sam/
227a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum las mi 'anga'o// gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur na ni/ de myur ba nyid du rang byang chub thob par 'gyuraro// gal te byang chub sem da pa'i theg pa gyur ni na de tshe 'di ni de la mi skye ba'i chos pa
227a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ de'i sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyuraro// sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas mthong nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
227a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par ma tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// dgon pa pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ldan pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// // dgon pa pa'i le'u ste/
227a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga pa'o// // 'od srung de la ji ltar na dge slong dasod snyoms spyod pa yin zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas/ 'di ltar bdag bsod brloms kyi kha zas la gnas te/
227a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung ba bdag sngon gyi smon lam dang / dam bcas pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du bsam par bya'o// dge slong bsod snyom spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam
227a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa des mi brkam pa chu 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsags med pa dang / 'gron du bod pa thams cad kyi sems med pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dang / ma 'bag pa dang / yi dam la
227a8(dkon brtsegs): brtan par bya'o// des kha zas bzang po rnams la ro bro ba'i 'du shes thams cad du bskyed par mi bya'o// des 'di ltar bdag gis gdol pa lta bu dang lus sems btsang mar bya'o//
227b1(dkon brtsegs): kha zas kyis lus gtsad mar ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// kha zas bzang po ci rnyed cig zos kyang de thams cad ni tha mar rnag tu zag go// tha mar mi 'thun// tha mar dri nga Sha'o//
227b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na bdag gis bzang po 'dod par mi bya'o snyam du bslab par bya'o// de de ltar shun du nges par sem pa'i sems kyis grong khyer ram grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug
227b3(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ mthar chagasu bslang bar bya'o// des 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya'o// bdag la skyes pa bsod rlom ster gyi/ bud med ni ma yin no zhes 'am/ bdag la bud med bstod snyoms ster gyi/ skyes
227b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag la khye'u bsod snyoms ster gyi/ bu mo ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag la bu mo bsod snyom+ba ster gyi/ khye'u ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag gi bzang po rnyed kyi/ ngan
227b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag gis sti snying du byas nas rnyed kyi/ sti stang du ma byas par ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag gis bde blag du rnyed kyi sha thang bar ni ma yi no zhe 'am/ bdag skyes pa 'am/
227b6(dkon brtsegs): bud med dang / khye'u dang / bo mo bsu bar 'gyur ro// zhe 'am phyin ma thab du sems par 'gyur ma/ bdag sdod dgos par 'gyur ma/ shin tu bsdogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ma/ bdag gis kha zas bzang po roH
227b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang ldan pa rnyed par 'gyu gyi/ dbul po'i kha zas lta bu ngan pa ni ma yin ni snyam du des mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa thams cad bskyed par mi bya'o// 'di lta bu'i go ca bgo bar yang bya ste/
227b8(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa ma rnyed kyang yong su yi chad par mi bya ba dang / ngan pa dang bzang po'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ba 'di ni dge slong bsod snyoms pa dag gi chos nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ seman
228a1(dkon brtsegs): phal med ni ro la rkas ste/ phas kyi phyir sdig pa'i las rnams byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o// gang dag chog shes pa mi rkam pa ma zhen pa
228a2(dkon brtsegs): rol mi gdub/ lce'i dbang po chog shes pa/ zas ngan ngon ci tsam gyis kyang 'tsho ba de ga ga ni shi 'phos te/ shi ba'i dus byas nas mtho ris skye bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
228a3(dkon brtsegs): nang du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ lhar skyes nas bdud rtsi za bar 'gyuraro// 'od srung de ltar na bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gis ro la sred pa bzlog ste/ sems nges par
228a4(dkon brtsegs): sems pas lhad zan zhag bdud lon pa za yang yi chad par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs brtsegs pa'i don tu bdag gis zas
228a5(dkon brtsegs): bza'o// snyam pa'i phyiraro// 'od srung bsod snyom sbed pa'i dge slong gis lhung bzed du 'ongs pa/ lhung bzed du chud pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyis rnyed pa tshangs pa mtshungs par
228a6(dkon brtsegs): smod pa'i dge slong dag dang thun mong du byas la bzo' bar bya'o// 'od srung gal te dge slong bsod snoms spyod pa na bar 'gyur te/ nad g.yog med la bsod snyom su 'jug
228a7(dkon brtsegs): mi nus na/ de'i 'di snyam du bdag ni grogs med pa/ bdag ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa/ bdag ni rab tu byung ba bdag gis grogs ni chos yin te/ bdag ni chos la rton pa yin la bdag
228a8(dkon brtsegs): ni mi bde zhing sdug bsngal te rab tu na bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyi sman gsungs pa gang yin pa de ji ltar thos bzhin du chos de dag bdag gis tshul bzhin brtag par bya'o snyam de sem
228b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya'o// 'od srung de la gang lus 'di la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor rtog pa 'di ni chu la bzhin la sbyor ba'o// de lus 'di la skyon du yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du so sor rtog pa
228b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ tshul bzhin la zhugs pa de/ sem rtsi gcig tu 'gyur zhing dran pa dang ldan pa/ shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsam gtan dang po bskyed pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yong bar 'gyur te/ des
228b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan thob nas bsam gtan gyi bde ba dong pa na/ nyi ma gcig gam nyi ma gnyis ma/ nyi ma gsum nas ni ma bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i zas kyis gnaso// gal te
228b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rnal 'byor la zhug pa bsam gtan skyed par mi nus na/ de ltar brtson zhing rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong chos la gnas pa de la mngon pa shes pa mngon pas shes pa'i lha dang
228b5(dkon brtsegs): glu dang gnod sbyin dag kha zas dbul bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyin zhe na/ 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams kyis sgyu mo thun pa ste/ des lhas yongasu bzung ba rnyed pa'i phyiraro// 'od srung gal te sprin 'dus shing
228b6(dkon brtsegs): char 'bab ste/ bsod snyom spyod pa'i dge slong bsod snyom la 'jug mi nus pa'i dus kyis tshe/ byams pa'i zas kyi go bsgos te/ chos sem dpa' yid la byed pa la gnas nas zhag gnyis sam
228b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum zhig zan chad na 'di ltar yi dgas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa nyes par byed pa'i las byas pa gang dag lo brgyar yang mchil ma thal pa 'ga' bzang mi rnyed pa dag kyang la da /
228b8(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na bdag tshul bzhin chos sem pa la gnas pas/ sems nyam chung bar skyed par mi bya ste/ bkres pa dang skom pas ci mi snyam par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam bsgom pa/
229a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ la brtson 'grus rgyun mi chad par bar bya'o snyam du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'od srung dge slong ba sad snyoms spyod pas/ khyim 'dris pa dang / skyes pa 'dris pa dang /
229a2(dkon brtsegs): bud med 'dres pa dang / khye'u 'dris pa dang / bu mo 'dris par mi bya'o// khyim gong na bsod sdom gtsang ma byed pa'i khyim der stan la 'dug ste/ bsod snyoms gtsang ma byed pa zin
229a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bar du chos kyis btam brjod par bya'o// de nas bsod snyoms de blangs la stan las langs te 'gro bar bya'o// 'od srung bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gis ma khang par mi bya// kha gsag
229a4(dkon brtsegs): mi bya// tshul 'chos par mi bya'o// de la ma khang pa gang zhe na/ gang gzhan dag la tshig 'di skad ces smra ba ste/ bdag gi bsod snyoms ni ngan pa'o// bdag gi bsod snyoms ni rtsub pa'o// bdag gis
229a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon 'di lta bu dang ma 'drangs par ma ma sa so// bdag gi bsod sdom ni skye bo mang po dang thun mong du byaso// bdag gis nyang zhig zos te bdag ma 'drangs pas bdag gi lus nyam chung
229a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ltar mkhong ba'i mtshan ma gang ci yang rung ba 'di lta bu 'di ni sem kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong bsod snyom spyod pas de dag thams cad mi bya'o// gang
229a7(dkon brtsegs): lhung zed du 'ongs pa ngan kyang rung bzang yang rung / nyung yang rung mang yang rung / gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ bza' bar bya'o// yongasu gdung ba med pa dang / bsam pa yongs dag
229a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dag/ chos nges par sem pa mang ba dang / lus gso ba dang / wa phags pa'i lam nye bar brtan pa'i phyir/ des bsod snyoms bza' bar bya'o// 'od srung gal te dge slo bsod snyoms skyed
229b1(dkon brtsegs): pas grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms blangs te/ a rnyed pa ji ltar lhung ba zer bkrus bzhin du phyir byung na nges de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya ste/ de bzhin
229b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bsod nams kyi bzi brjid kyis brjid pa/ 'khor lo sgru pa'i rgyal srid spangs nas/ rab tu 'byung ba lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin/ dri zas mchod pa mi dge ba'i chos tham cad
229b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs ga dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ de nyid grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gcishegs na yang / ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus zhing du
229b4(dkon brtsegs): slar gshegs na bdag lta bu bsod nams chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sa bskyed pa/ ci ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du phyir byung bas yi chad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dag
229b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pas// kha zas bzang po dag mi rnyed pa'i phyiraro// gal te bdud kyi las ma/ bdud kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag bdag la bsod
229b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms mi ster na/ ci nas bdang bzhi las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur pa de ltar bya'o snyam du bsam/ de ltar nga ni nan tan la
229b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ 'od srung dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas de ltar 'phags pa'i rigs yongs su skur bar
229b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// / bsod snyoms spyod pa'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// / 'od srung de la dge slong phyag dar khrod pa bas/ ji lta bu'i sems kyis
230a1(dkon brtsegs): / phyag dar khrod pa bsdu bar bya zhe na/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas g.yog pa'i sems byi'i/ chos gos kyis tsha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa'i sems
230a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni ma yino// rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg par 'gyur par yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir bgyi// lus brgyan pa'i phyir ni ma yin no//
230a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rab la nan gyis gnas pas/ gos gtsang ma la mngon par dga' ba med de/ des phyag dar khrod kyis phung po las phyag dang khrod blangs la/ 'du
230a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gzis gang zhe na/ chog shes pa'i 'du shes dang / mgu sla ba'i 'du she so// gzhan yang 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/
230a5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal med pa'i 'du shes dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i 'du sheso// gzhan yang 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lus brgyan pa dang / sem
230a6(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba'o// 'od srung gal te dge slong phyag dar khrod pas/ phyag dar khrod kyi phung po las phyag dar khrod len pa na/ sa phyogs de na sngon gzhan bshesu gyur 'am/ sngon gang
230a7(dkon brtsegs): dris pa 'am/ pheb par smra ba de dag gis mthong na/ bdag la smod par 'gyur gyis dog te/ phyag dar khrod de la blangs na/ 'od srung phyag dang khrod pa pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de lta bu
230a8(dkon brtsegs): pi su dag pa ma yin no zhes das bshad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pas/ rdo lta bu'i semA dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sem gyis dogs pa med par phyag dar khrod pa blang
230b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyiraro// des phyag dar khrod pade blangs nas leg par bkrus te/ shin tu btsang zhing dri ma med par byas la/ tshon btsal te kha dogs legs par bsgyur la/ chos gos snam sbyar
230b2(dkon brtsegs): kha glan par bya'o// des phyis 'jig par mi 'byung ba'i phyir legs par klan/ legs par sbyar/ legs par btsems te bgo bar bya'o// 'od srung dge slong phyag dar khrod pas 'dod cha
230b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bya ba'i phyir mi sdug pa'i yid la bya ba la gnas la/ phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la rko bar bya'o// zhe sdang nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyis phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la
230b4(dkon brtsegs): bgo bar bya'o// gti mug nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba la gnas te/ phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// non mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ chu la
230b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yid la byed pa la zhug pas/ phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// skye mched drag yong su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ dbang po legs par bsdams te/ phyag dar khrod pa dag
230b6(dkon brtsegs): lus la bgo bar bya'o// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dag mgu bar bya ba'i phyin tshul bye med pa dang / kha bsag med par phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// 'od srung ci'i phyir phyag
230b7(dkon brtsegs): dang khrod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'od srung dper na phyag dar khrod de la ni su yang 'dod pa mi skyed/ su yang chags pa mi skyed cing yong su mi len te/ phyag dar de ni dor ba'i cha'o// 'od srung de
230b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bya ba dang dang mtshungs par bdag gi med pa/ yongasu 'dzin pa med pa/ rnyed sla ba/ med pa/ gzhan la gsol mi dgos pa/ gzhan gyi ngor blta mi dgos pa/ gzhan la rag ma pA ga
231a1(dkon brtsegs): phyag dar khrod lta bu bor ba ste/ de'i phyir phyag dar khrod pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni drang song rnam kyis rigaso// 'di ni 'phags pa kyi rigs gtsang ba'o// 'di ni 'phags pa rnams
231a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs kyi gnaso// 'di ni sangs pa yon tan rnams kyis rton pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi phung po kun srung ba'o// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin kyis phung po'i sgo'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi phung po'i rten no//
231a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rnams par grol ba'i ye shes mthong pa'i phung po dang 'thun pa ste/ 'od srung de ltar phyag dar khrod pa ni yon tan mang ba/ skabs med pa/ go skab
231a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ bla gab med pa ste/ dri ma par 'gyur zhing khur khyer bar 'gyur ba'o// 'od srung dge slong phyag dar khrod pa la gang yin phyag dar khrod pa'i gos kyi tshogs par 'dzin pa de la lha rnams kyang
231a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyu ro// 'od srung 'di lta bu'i dus dang / 'di lta bu'i man yod de/ 'di ltar bu'i dge slong phyag dar khrod pa la/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba bsam btan gyi bde ba la snyoms par zhugs pa
231a6(dkon brtsegs): de la/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang bral mo sbyor zhing rkang pa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ lha gzhan phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta ci smras//
231a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung dge slong dag chos gos kyis chab la mngon par brtson gyis rnal 'byor la mi brtson pa/ lus kyi rgyan lhur len pa/ phyi rol gyi gtsang sbra spyod pa la/ nang 'dod chags dang zhe
231a8(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang gti mug gi dri ma yongasu gang bdag ni gos bzang po ci tsam gyon na yang / 'od srung de dag lha rnams dga' ba'i gzugs ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// lha rnams kyi lu
231b1(dkon brtsegs): tsha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa/ de dag gi sems dang sems las 'byung ba rnams shes te/ zhes nas kyang de dag rgyad bsrings te yongasu spong bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung dge tshul skul byed mi
231b2(dkon brtsegs): btsang bas 'bags pa'i phyag dar khrod pa thogs nas/ bsod soms blangs te mtsho ma dros par song ba la/ de der song ba'i tshe mtsho mchog de la gnas pa'i lha de dag gis rgyang
231b3(dkon brtsegs): ring por bsu ste/ rkang pa la bgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gtsang sku spyod pa'i lha de dag gis mi gtsang bas 'bags pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de bdag nyid kyis bkrus te/ dri ma med
231b4(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas/ bkrus pa'i chu dri ma ca mengs rang gis lus la skadade/ skul byed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan yang dag par blangs pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa shes nas mtsho de ji
231b5(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu rgyu rab tu bzang po zhes byas pa rde gos gtsang ma bgos nas bsod snyoms blang te/ mtsho ma dros par song ba dang / mcho de nas
231b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha de dgas// de mtsho mchog 'dir kha zas zos nas lhag ma bor na6/ mtsho mchog mi gtsang bar bya su 'ong zhes rgyang grags gcig khor yul tsam gyis bar nang du 'dar ma ster ba
231b7(dkon brtsegs): la ltos// 'od srung 'phags pa'i chos kyi yon tan bsgrub pa'i khyad par dang / skal byed kyi phyag dar khrod pa bkrus pa'i chu ma can lha dag rang gis lus la skud pa dang / kun ta rgya bzang
231b8(dkon brtsegs): po ni 'gror yang ma ster ba la stos/ 'od srung de lta bas ni dge slong phyag dar khrod pa po yon tan gyi chos 'di ltar bu 'di dag 'dod la/ zhum zhum par ma gyur pa 'phags pa'i rig la gnas pa
232a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gis pa med cing yongasu 'dzin pa med pa'i 'du shes kyis lus la phyag dar khrod pa dag bgo bar bya'o// diH
232a2(dkon brtsegs): yang sems kyis lus dag par 'gyur gyi lus kyis sem dag par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na se ma dag par 'gyur bar bya'i// lus chabs dag pa ni ma yin gyi/ sems dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan
232a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la tshangs par spyod pa zhes gsungaso snyam du sem nges par bsam par bya'o// 'od srung de ltar na dge slong phyag dang khrod pa pas khyod dang de'i rje su bslab par bya'o// 'od srung 'di lta bu'i dus dang / 'di lta
232a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i man yod de/ 'od srung chos gos ngan pa gyon pa/ chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa khyod gang du chos gos snam sbyar khye'u 'am khre'u gi steng du gzhag ste/ khyod bla gos gyon nas chags ra 'chag
232a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ lha brgya stong phrag mang po dag lhag nas/ 'di ni tshul khrim dang ti nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyis yongasu bsgos pa'i lus la bgo bgo ba'i chos gos so zhes khyod kyis chos gos rnam sbyar de la phyag
232a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'od sru ltos chos gos la yang phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur na lus la lta ci smos// 'od srung ji ltar na dge slong de'i rje su slob pa dag de bzhin du bsgrub par 'gyur snyam ste/ ngas 'char
232a7(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spang nas/ rab tu byung ste ka shi ba phra mo dang du gu le'i ras dang / rga tam pa'i ngas dang / dang ris can gyi chos gos rnams spangs nas 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba'i phying gan
232a8(dkon brtsegs): ras kyis gos rnams lus la bgo so// 'od srung ngas khyod las dar gos ngan pa blangs te ngas khyod la sha na'i ras byin pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir gyi chags pa'i phyir
232b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ lus brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin no// 'od srung 'di la mi gti mug la kha cig khyod nga de'i rje su mi bsub cing rnam pa chag pa'i zil kyis non ga chos gos stsogs par byed pa/ lhung zed stsostsogs
232b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed ga 'jig rten gyi zang zing spogs par byed pa/ mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor dang 'bru stsogs par byed pa/ ba lang dang / lug dang / bya gag dang / lag dang / bong bu dang / rta dang / thod
232b3(dkon brtsegs): gshol dang / shing rta 'dren pa nye bar 'jog par byed pa/ khyim pa'i las kyi mtha' smod pa dag pas ni 'od srung khyim pa dag khyad par du 'gyur ba yod kyi/ mi blan po rab tu 'byung bI mtsham
232b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa de dag la ni khyad par du 'gyur ba gang yang medo// 'od srung khyim pa rnams khyad par du 'gyur ba ni dge sbyong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin gal/
232b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba/ gos dung smrig bgos shing bya ba mang ba/ skrag pa sna tshogs kyis sbags pa/ zas dang gos lhar len pa/ de dag khyim pa dag gis gos dur sdig gyon par rig nas/ zhes sa dang gus
232b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed pa dang / chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyis sdud par byed pa dang / gas par smrasmra zhing phyag 'tshal la/ bar byed pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni khyim pa de dag gi khyad par du 'gyur ba ni gyi/ de dag rab tu byung ba de dag la ni med
232b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la ni yongasu len pa la brtson pa mi zhing / ci yang mi stsogs pa'i phyir// 'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong phal cher lhung zed dag chos gos mang zhing snod spyad mang ba dang / rnyed mang
232b8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ de ngag pa sting snang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ ri mo byed pa dang mchod pa byed par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de sbyin pa dang / phyir sbyin pa dus dus byed cing bya ba ni lnga
233a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ ba bzhin du yongasu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// dge slong gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos can zag pa rnams zad par byed par la mngon par brtson pa/ yid 'byung ba/ mgo dang nas
233a2(dkon brtsegs): med 'bar ba bzhin du brtson pa/ don nang ga byed pa nyung ba rang gi don la brtson pa/ 'dris par byed pa yong su spangs pa dag 'byung ba/ de dag gi gan du ni de'i tshe de'i dus na su yang mi 'gro mi sten cing /
233a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur mi byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyim gis pa dag ni chags pa'i rang bzhin can de tshe 'di lhur len gyi/ tshe rabs phyi ma lhur len pa ma yin pas/ de dag 'di snyam dge slong
233a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la na bdag cag gi 'tshe ba med pa na bdag cag gis ci'i bsten/ ci'i phyir phyag bya/ ci'i phyir mchod/ ci'i phyir bsnyen bkur bya snyam du sems pa'i phyir// gzhan du na gang dag dge ba'i rtsa
233a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/ sngon gyi byin pa phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung zhing / tshul khrim dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos de lta bu de dag la sten par byed pa/ sten par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed pa ni ma gtogs te nang do// /
233a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chos 'di lta bu tshul dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni gang zag gnyis kyis yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bden pa mthong ba 'khor ba la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rnal 'byor la brtson zhing
233a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/ chos don du gnor zhing tshwa 'dod pa'o// da srung mngon par mi brtson pa chos ma yin pa la lta ga las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gakhag 'di/
233a8(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol du kha na ma thobs 'jigs par mi b+ha ba/ tshe 'di lhur len pa/ mi rangs kyi ma lhur mi lem ga tham cad kyi no ngas bshad par bya'o// 'od srung ga ngas pa na zangs dang ldan pa'i sems gcig can
233b1(dkon brtsegs): mi skyed pa'i mi gti mug pa de dag la ni ngas 'di lta bu'i chos 'dir skabs mi 'byed kyi sdeng da 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos na/ bdag sgrub pa las nyam par rig nas/ smad pa bya bar semA te/ 'di dag sangs rgyas
233b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi/ 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa 'am/ bdud kyis tho ba tsams nas/ byas po'o zhes smra zhing // de dag 'di ltar skye bo mang po dag la log par 'dzin tu 'jug par 'gyu ro/ de dang
233b3(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur/ bdag kyang nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la/ gzhan yang nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag ni/ bdag la phan pa
233b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
233b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dkon mchog brtseg pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir nan tan snying por bgyid pa'i gang zag chos cha dbang phyug rnams la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thug rje
233b6(dkon brtsegs): po gang lags pa de rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos shing / de bzhin nyid du smra' pa de dag ni sangs rgyu
233b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos yongasu bzung ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos shing de bzhin nyid du sgrub
233b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu da/
234a1(dkon brtsegs): / rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ zhi ba 'dod ga grol bar 'dod pa de dag gi ched du chos kyi le'u 'di zung shig/ khyims pa dang / rab tu byung ba de dag kyang ros 'di
234a2(dkon brtsegs): la bslabs nas phung po thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom
234a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chos kyis rnam grangs 'di bzung lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyis rnam grangs 'di chos thams
234a4(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par sdus pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ 'phags pa'i rigs sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi gnas dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa snga 'gong ba dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang /
234a5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i phung po dang / rin po che'i brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang
234a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu
234a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par stod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po ches kyi rna grangs stong phrag brgya lngas/ rin po che'i phung po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus pa bzhi
234a8(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// @rgya gar skad du/ a ru a k+Sha ya ma ti ba ri brid tsa na ma ma ha yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa blo/
234b1(dkon brtsegs): gros mi zad pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom
234b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod bung pa'i ri la dge slong stong nyis bcwa lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes rtog
234b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chas kyi tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma
234b4(dkon brtsegs): rtog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' yas tog dang / bzang skyong la stsogs pa skye bu dam pa bcu drug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
234b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal la stsogs pa dpe med pa drug cu dang / byams pa las stsogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang
234b6(dkon brtsegs): thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug bcus yongs su bskor
234b7(dkon brtsegs): cing mdun du bdar te/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/
234b8(dkon brtsegs): bla gros breg pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la bcug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal ma sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
235a1(dkon brtsegs): la rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi gdugs dang / me tog gi phuras mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi
235a2(dkon brtsegs): sems byang chub kyi sems shes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang
235a3(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi la ni sems sems dpal dmigs/ thogs pa ma chis mi dmigs/ dmigs
235a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs te/ byang chub ni brjed du ma mchis/ sems ni gzugs ma mchis/
235a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan tu ma mchis// rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing / sems dpa' yang mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos 'di dag gis don rtog
235a6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub ni brda' 'am/ gdags pa 'am/ tha skad du
235a7(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs shing / byang chub las gud na byang chub kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub ni brjod du med/ sems ni gzugs
235a8(dkon brtsegs): med/ bstan du med/ thogs pa med/ rnam par rigs pa med de/ sems dpa' yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/
235b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ji lta bar sems kyang de bzhin no// sems ji ltar bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub dang sems ji lta bar she sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems
235b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams ji lta bar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang
235b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i ming 'thob po// chos thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i sems de ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o// byang chub ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/
235b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang de bzhin no// sem dpa' yang de bzhino// chos tham cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di la ci'ang rnyed pa med/ byang chub kyang med/ byang chub du gdag pa lnga med/ sem+ba can yA med/ sems can du
235b5(dkon brtsegs): gdag pa yang med/ nyan thos kyang med/ nyan thos gdag pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ rang sangs rgyas gdag pa yang med/ byang chub sem dpa' gdag pa yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ sangs
235b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gdag pa yang med/ 'dus byas kyang med/ 'das byas/ dgas pa yang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ 'das ma byas gdag pa yang mi dmig/ ma dmig dmigs par mi 'gyur med kyi//
235b7(dkon brtsegs): ribra kyi bu 'on kyang de ltar ri rab kyi tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po ske ste/ de la rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa
235b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ni chos thams cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni 'jig pa med pa dang / bag tsa ba med pa dang /
235b9(dkon brtsegs): kye byang chub sems dpa' yang med/
236a1(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa med pa'i nus gyis ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ram pa can gyi tshul lta bur bsdu te/ de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i nub
236a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis sred med kyi bu'i mthu dang / stobs dang shugs dang brtson 'grus dang / rtul ba lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni bsod nams kyis chog
236a3(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa'i tshul gyis dge ba sna tshogs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyuni bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni mun pa mun pa
236a4(dkon brtsegs): nag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba lta bur blta te/ de la rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni ded
236a5(dkon brtsegs): dben mdzod chen pos phyug pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i nul gyis bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pas lags par brgyan par blta te/ de la d+huni thabs
236a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni zla bag pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul khrims kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yong su rdzogs par
236a7(dkon brtsegs): paHte/ de la rgyu ni sngon lam gyi pha ma du phyin pa'o// sems bsrud pa dgu pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan pakod pa mas cad kyi sa pa tha~Mr gyi chu kyi
236a8(dkon brtsegs): bajam pa pe suM rdzog par byed par bag nyi/ ma rgyu ni stobs kyi po rim du phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bcur ni men na dang / ye gas dang tshas sems cad sa dbang sgyung ba nga ba sa
236b1(dkon brtsegs): las byur ba na da kyang po'i nus kyis nam mnga' dang sanus par bas ste/ de la rgyun yeshes kyi pa rol du phyin pa'o// gas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa nim
236b2(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// don dam par ni 'di la byang chub kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub kyi sems kyang med do// rig kyi
236b3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa sngon du
236b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten tu
236b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
236b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnam kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba ches rnams pa bcu'i// rig kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam
236b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ste ste/ lus kyi las yongasu dag sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngag gi las yongasu dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam pa
236b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshe ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi khams brgyad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzla ba sngon
237a1(dkon brtsegs): du bldan du da su dgas pardzu pa dang / rna ma pas du rnams pa ldan du thab dang / gas kyi
237a2(dkon brtsegs): dun sengs dpa rnams kyi mu khrims kyi pha rim du byin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ces rnams pa 'di brtsen// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzad pa'i pha rol du phyin
237a3(dkon brtsegs): 'i sngon du 'gro ba'i marnams bdu ste/ cu gang nas/ 'dis te/ rjes su rnams bsngon du 'grob dang / ded zlang phreng ba du ldan du 'phra ba dang / lus la ses pa sngon du 'gro 'odas/
237a4(dkon brtsegs): srog la yid mi rton pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems yong su smin par bya ba'i sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa'i stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / zab mo
237a5(dkon brtsegs): yi chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rgya chen po la mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi shes pa la gsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
237a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
237a7(dkon brtsegs): sngodan du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i lus dang / ngag
237a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid rnam par bsgrubs pa la rjes su yi rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / zhum pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bsdu ba sngon du 'gro
238a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yang dag pa'i stsol ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'dul ba
238a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyis dben pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
238a3(dkon brtsegs): shes yang dag par bsgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba chos rnam pa
238a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
238a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos la gnas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nab
238a6(dkon brtsegs): sngod du 'phra ba dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par bar pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang ba sngon du 'grob dang / ting 'dzin gyi skabs sngon du la
238a7(dkon brtsegs): / las khyen sa nga ldan dus pa dang / nga 'an kyi rung ba y-is pa ra du /
238a8(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'inas yongs su bsrungs pa ldan du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi sa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rob tu phyin pa 'de'i sngon du
238b1(dkon brtsegs): ba chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang
238b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mkhas la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rten
238b3(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bden pa la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad bstsal pa sngon du 'gro
238b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya
238b5(dkon brtsegs): ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon
238b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang
238b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje
238b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skyo ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon du 'gro ba dang / khyad par
239a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi ye shes mthong ba khang du chud pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su byang bar bya ba yongs su smin par sngon du 'gro ba
239a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rtog pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems kyi stobs nye bar sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su thob par
239a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu
239a4(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnams pa bcu te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi
239a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi spyod pa'i thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi zhon mongs pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba da /
239a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i thibs po nye bar rgyub shes pa mngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa'i thibs po nye bar
239a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba shes sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa thibs po nyo bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba
239a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dang / khams gsum thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag
239b1(dkon brtsegs): la nyal ba thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba thibs po nyo bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems
239b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dbang po mi skyo ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa
239b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub
239b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bzod ma nas 'byung ba
239b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad bzod ma nas mtshan nyid med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad bzod pa nas skye ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos
239b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bzing ma nas yod pa ma yin pa sngon du 'dra ba dang / chos thams cad bzod pa nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'dra ba dang / chos thams cad 'jug pa med pa
239b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ldog pa med pa sngod du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid snod du 'gro ba dang / sa bams cad kyi thog pa
239b8(dkon brtsegs): mim mamam pa sngon du 'thob dang / chos thams cad de shin nyid la 'jug pa'i rteg pa dang / rnam par rtag pa med pa ldad du thab ste/ mas pa thu bya sasams pa
240a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha/
240a2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rnam par dbye ba la shin tu rnam par brtags pa sngon 'gro ba dang /
240a3(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs bstsal ba dpag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
240a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po yongasu bzung ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po yangs pa khong du chud par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'gre rten gyi khams par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba
240a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can gyi khams dang nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug cing rjes su 'gro ba
240a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam pa thams
240a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang skur ba'i sa 'thob pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes
240a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba chos rnam pa bcu'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/ spyod pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni ba rol/
240b1(dkon brtsegs): tu byin pa'i don no// ye shes zab cing rgya che ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chags pa med pa'i
240b2(dkon brtsegs): don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// skye bo ma mkhas pa rnams khong du myur byed pa'i
240b3(dkon brtsegs): don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sgribs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su
240b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni pha rol byin pa'i don no// sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs
240b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bzod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su
240b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bsam
240b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs
240b8(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dor ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don na// chos thams cad rab tu shes pa byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongasu
241a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyid par don no// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang dag par thob par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa' dadas
241a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi nang yongs su sbyong ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sems can thams cad yong su smin pa'i byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// byang chub kyi mang
241a3(dkon brtsegs): po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'dud thams cad 'dul bar bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'khor
241a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med par ston cing sgrol ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pI don ni pha rol tu phyin pa don no// /
241a5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// stobs bcu mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par
241a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
241a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don na
241a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems depa' sems dpa'achen pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang nga'i skyes ni sungag su gyi snyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khabs gter bye ba thag theg pa
241b1(dkon brtsegs): byung nasams su gang bar mdzadza // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'i snalhas ni gang snang bcus
241b2(dkon brtsegs): chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sag 'azil lta bur gyur ba la/ rin po ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums legs par brgyan par mdzang // rims kyi bu ngal byang nab sems dpa' sem
241b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pa'i byang nub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'i lnga ltas ni/ bdag nyid dpa' zhing lag ca dang / srog ca sra ba sogs nas khas kyi rgol ba man 'dul bar mthong // rigs kyi bu sa
241b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'i snga ltas ni/ phyog bzhi nas rlung kyi dkyil 'khor bzhis tha~Md dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la/
241b5(dkon brtsegs): me tog snga chog kyis mngon par 'thor ba mthong // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa swa bI snga ltas ni/ rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan bI bud med kyi
241b6(dkon brtsegs): mgo la me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba 'dog par mthong // rig kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpA seMs dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems da bI sa drag pa'i snga ltas ni/ rdzing them skas bzhi dang
241b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i gse gyi bye ma bdul ba/ rnyog pa med cing dang la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs gang ba/ me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos brgyan pa'i
241b8(dkon brtsegs): chu mthong de/ de la bdag nyid rtse dga' yongasu spyod pa mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de byang chub sems dbu sos dpa' chen po byang chub ses dpe sa bdun pa'i sta ltas ni phyogs gal
242a1(dkon brtsegs): / gson gnyis nas sems can dmyal pa'i gsangs mthong ste/ de nas bdag ba sa gams par mar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i byang chub sems
242a2(dkon brtsegs): ma ba'i ldanas ni shA pa panas na rigs kyi rgyam pa sang shes can cad pa thogs pa ca ma ma ca thug par byed dug pa mang nga// ngags kyi bu des bya
242a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i snga stan ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong ste/ skye bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskur cing
242a4(dkon brtsegs): mdun gyis bltas la/ mgo'i stang na rin po chen sna tshogs kyis spungs pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang
242a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ste/ kha dag gser lta bu 'od mdom gang ba/ tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong du mas
242a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis ltas nas chos ston par mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'odadi dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu snga
242a7(dkon brtsegs): sa yin no// rigs kyi bu de sa byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang 'al gnas byung chub sems dpa'i ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin gan to// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gas pa
242a8(dkon brtsegs): ni mug khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa gnon to// sa gsum pa la ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gdo te// sa bzhi pa la ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa non to// sa lnga
242b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni dasam brtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa gnan to// sa drug pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gan to// sa drug pa la rnams bdun pa la ni thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol du phyin/
242b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gnon to// sa brgyad pa la ni blonams kyi pha rol du phyin pa gdon to// sa dbu ba la ni stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa gnon to// sa bcu pa la ni ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa gnod
242b3(dkon brtsegs): to// rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang po ni/ rin po che yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi b.rung ste skye'o// sems
242b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa gnyis pa ni gnas pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni rab tu mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o//
242b5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir ni phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung te de skye'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni rin po che'i me tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung
242b6(dkon brtsegs): te skye'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis ting 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
242b7(dkon brtsegs): yangs su bzung ba gi ste'i// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni de ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa'i ting de skyes yongasu bzung ste ste'o// sems bsrung pa dgu pa ni ye shes
242b8(dkon brtsegs): pa sgron me'i ting nge 'on gyis pangs su bzung ste skye'o// sems skyed pa bcu pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs su bzung de skye'o// rigs kyi bu 'di
243a1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la khyad par gyi byin brlabs shes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa gnyis pa la gzhan gyi mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzung skye'o// sa gsum pa la/
243a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa bzhi pa la gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzung skye'o// sa lnga pa la yon tan sna tshogs shes bya ba'i gzung skye'o// sa drug pa la ye
243a4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa bdun pa la 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa brgyad pa la rnyog pa med pa'i rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
243a5(dkon brtsegs): skye'o// sa dag pa la sgom mtha' yas pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa bcu pa la zad mi shes pa za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la/
243a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa zhes bya bas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du thams cad
243a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i shing sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad sgrub pa nga mchor to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/ lha'i bu chos
243a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thug tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
243b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
243b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu mo dag lhag par
243b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yongasu dag cing / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba
243b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa dang / sgra la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi
243b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bral ba 'gyur/ nyi ma'i rtog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ kun nas snang ba thams cad rnam par
243b6(dkon brtsegs): gnon pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ brjod du med pa'i don bsta
243b7(dkon brtsegs): ba la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshig spyod pa dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ na mkha'i dkyil dri ma med
243b8(dkon brtsegs): dbasgrub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas sku mtha' yas pa yongasu rdzogs pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu
244a1(dkon brtsegs): gzungs 'di dag thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul
244a2(dkon brtsegs): nas chos ton to// chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la 'gro ba yang med/ 'ong ba yang medo// sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed kyang sems can du gdags pa yang med do// chos/
244a3(dkon brtsegs): ton kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba med do// 'chi 'pho dang skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba yang med do skye ba yang med do// chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa yang med pa'i phyir ro//
244a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams gang du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ gang nas 'ong bar yang mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sum stong gis mi skye ba'i
244a5(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
244a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha'i bu
244a7(dkon brtsegs): seng ge tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
244a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'das
244b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sab ta sha ti ka na ma ma prad nya ba ra mi ta ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog
244b2(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
244b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
244b4(dkon brtsegs): ra ba na/ dge slong stong thams pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa sa ya
244b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mir mi ldog pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byams pa dang / spobs
244b6(dkon brtsegs): ba thogs med dang / brtson mi 'dor dang / de dag las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa ya dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de
244b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ skya rang shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bo /
244b8(dkon brtsegs): gi sgo ga la ba der song nas byin pa dang / pho brang gi sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /
245a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rang gi gnas nas byang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang /
245a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan ka ta'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / de dag thams cad dang gzhan yang nyan
245a3(dkon brtsegs): thos chen po rnams rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
245a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po 'ongs shing lhags te 'dus par mkhyen nas/ bdag gi pho brang nas byung ste/ pho rang gi phyi rol phyogs gcig tu gtan bting ba la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas
245a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra da ti'i bu khyod ci'i phyir zhegs pas 'ongs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi
245a6(dkon brtsegs): sgra na 'dug/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thogs pa nyid du 'a
245a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi chab sgor mchis so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'tshal ba'i slad du slad kyis mchis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
245a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi thog
245b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgor 'dug pa bden nam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/
245b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags/ bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du thams cad
245b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi thog ma nyid du rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der mchis nas/ phyogs gcig tu mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag
245b4(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pas ma ngoms pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /
245b5(dkon brtsegs): phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchis pa de sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang //
245b6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bdag gis mthong ba dang / ji ltar bdag phyag bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de ltar blta bar bgyi'o// de ltar phyag bgyi ba dang /
245b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba nas/ bsten bkur bgyis pa'i bar tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi slad du
245b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ mi migs
246a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gsheg
246a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la mi skye ba'i rnam par blta ba nas/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rnam pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid la gud nas 'byung ba ma mchis te/ de ltar de
246a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni 'byung ba yang ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid ni 'byung ba yang ma lags/ 'jigs pa yang ma lags te/ de ltar de
246a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni 'das pa ma lags//
246a5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma lags gnyis su ma mchis pas
246a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba ma yang ma lags te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyi ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma lags/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba
246a7(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag pa te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de ltar de bzhin
246a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mthong ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
246a9(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar bltas na ci zhig mthong / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de ltar bltas na/ ci yang ma
246b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis chos gang la yang skye ba yang ma mthong na/ 'gag pa yang ma mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam
246b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar mthong ba dang / de ltar bsnyen bkur byas pa gang yin pa dang / khyod
246b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byams pa chen po sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas kyang / khyod la sems can du dmigs pa dang / sems can mngon par zhen pa ci yang med cing / sems can thams
246b4(dkon brtsegs): cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir zhags kyang / khyod la sems can du mngon par zhen pa gang yang ma 'byung ba dang / khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i
246b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul dang / sgyid lug pa med pa'i tshal gyis sems can thams cad kyi mched du go cha bgos pa de ni khyod dka' ba byed pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur
246b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla
246b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir go cha 'di yang bgos te/ bdag la sems can du dmigs pa 'am/ sems can la mngon par zhen pa gang yang med do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu go cha de ni ji
246b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdag gis sems can gyi khams bri ba 'am/ gang bar bya zhes de ltar ma bgos so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yongasu brtag pa nye bar bzung te/ gal te sangs rgyas
247a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing re re na/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas
247a2(dkon brtsegs): nyin mtshan du chos ston te/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi bskal por zhugs par gyur la/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan
247a3(dkon brtsegs): pa re res/ sems can ji rnyed btul ba de snyed kyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos brtan pa re res btul bar gyur tu zin kyang / sems can gyi khams la bri ba
247a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am gang bar mngon pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dben pa dang / sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can gyi
247a5(dkon brtsegs): khams ni bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon no// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
247a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gal te sems can dben pa dang / sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi khyams bri ba dang gang bar mi mngon na/ 'o na byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
247a7(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas su la chos ston/ de skad ces spras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa
247a8(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe su zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ su la chos brtan par bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa sha ra da ti
247b1(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa//
247b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ ci sems can du yang 'dogs sam/ yang gal te 'jam dpal khyod la gang zhig sems
247b3(dkon brtsegs): can ji rnyed yod ces de skad ces 'dri na/ de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/ 6'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la/ bdag gis 'di
247b4(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ji rnyed pa de rnyed do zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te yang sems can gyi khams kyi tshad ci tsam zhig 'dri na/ de skad 'dri ba de la
247b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshad ni ci tsam pa de tsam mo zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod la gal te la la
247b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'di skad du sems can gyi khams gag tu gdogs zhes 'dri na de la khyod kyis ji skad bya 'jam dpal gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis
247b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du skye ma med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa gag tu gtogs par gtog so zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gal te yang
247b8(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig khyod la 'di skad du sems can gyi khams ci la gnas shes 'dri na/ de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de
248a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di skad du skye ba med pa'i khams ci la gnas pa de la sems can gyi khams kyang gnas so zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
248a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe/ rta cig la gnas te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe
248a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe/ mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal mi gnas
248a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom du yang ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag
248a5(dkon brtsegs): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod gang gi tshe rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 'phel ba 'am 'bri bar 'gyur/ 'jam
248a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba 'am 'bri bar 'gyur ba ci yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la chos 'ga' zhig 'phel
248a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am 'bri ba mchis na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang yang chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'i slad du 'am 'bri ba'i slad du nye bar gnas/
248a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa bsgom pa lags pas rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mi spong la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi
248b1(dkon brtsegs): len pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni chos gang spang ba 'am/ blang bar/
