275a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos
275a4(dkon brtsegs): thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dri ba bya dgos te de'i 'og tu dkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal
275a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa ni mi 'khrugs pa ste/ dkrug tu mi rung ba/ dkrug par bya ba ma yin pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam par mi bya ba/ bsam gyis mau la nga ba'o// 'jam
275a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos dben pa'i mam stan rnams brtan par bya/ 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar byas la
275a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar skyil mo bkrung bcas te 'dug nas/ der mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig yid la bya'o// chos thams cad yid
275a8(dkon brtsegs): la bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gang yid la byed pa de'i ming yang gzung bar bya'o// ming de yang thos te dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs ga le bzhugs pa'i phyogs
275b1(dkon brtsegs): der mngon du blta ste 'dug par bya'o// yid la bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yid la byas na/ de yid la byas pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
275b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
275b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig gi sangs rgyas kyis yon tan tshad med pa/ spobs pa tshad med pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas skye ba med pa gcig gi chos kyi rnam grangs
275b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bye brag tshad med par shes par bya'o// 'dir gang dag chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
275b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gsungs pa dang / kun dga' bos ji snyed kyi rnam grangs 'dir snang bar 'gyur ro// bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgrubs pas/ de tshe'i tshad ci tsam
275b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de tsam du gnas shing gleng bzhi dang bcas pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa kha cig 'di skad du bkod pa gcig
275b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gang yin snyam du sems na/ de dag la 'di skad ces yon tan bsam gyis khyab pa yongs su bsgrags pa 'di yang dag par zung la 'dug shig dang /
275b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ji ltar yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis zhum pa med par gyis shig ces
276a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni dmigs pa'i lta ba can dag dang / dngos por lta ba can dag nas yod par lta ba can dag gi bar bgyis bsgrub
276a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig la rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po che de byi dor ma byas pa shig yod la/ mi gzhan zhig gis der mi de la 'di skad du/
276a3(dkon brtsegs): kye skyes bu nor bu rin po che 'di'i rin thang ci tsam/ nor bu rin po che 'di la yon tan ci zhig yod ces zer la/ mi des kyang de la 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu nor bu rin po che 'di
276a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan tshad med kyis tshad med pa nyid du shes par gyis shig ces smras te/ de nas mi des nor bu rin po che de byi dor bya ba'i phyir mi de la bzhag nas/ kye skyes bu nor bu rin po che
276a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di re shig byi dor gyis shig dang / de nas gdod shes par 'gyur ro zhes byas la/ de nas mi des nor bu rin po che de mi de las blangs te/ byi bdor bya ba'i yo byad rnams
276a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis byi dor byas pa dang / de ltar byi dor byas pas nor bu rin po che de rin tha~Mng med de/ des ji lta ji ltar nor bu rin po che de'i byi dor byas pa de lta de ltar/ nor bu rin po che
276a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ba bzhin du/ 'jam dpal gang dang gang gi tshe/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo da ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par 'jog pa dang / 'jug pa
276a8(dkon brtsegs): de dang / de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'od zer dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi maH
276b1(dkon brtsegs): gag kyang ma khyab pa med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob cing zhugs nas rnyed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ma yin pa'i chos
276b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi ston to// gang la las de bzhin du shes na des skye ba med pa dang 'gal ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen
276b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i phyogs bzhi nas skyes bu bzhi nas skyes bu bzhi chu 'chu na/ de thams cad 'di lta ste/ lan tsa'i ror ro gcig pa nyid du 'chu zhing len to// 'jam dpal de bzhin
276b4(dkon brtsegs): du ngas chos gang ji bstan pa de dag thams cad ni 'di ltar ste skye ba med pa'i ro dang / dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol
276b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro gcig pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pa des chos gang dang gang ston kyang
276b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad 'di lta ste skye ba med pa'i ro dang / dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro/
276b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig par ston par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de 'dod na ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de 'chad pa dang / rnam par ston pa dang /
276b8(dkon brtsegs): nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu modo'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas gang ci ston kyang de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul du
277a1(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med par rtog par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems
277a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs nas myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
277a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bdag gi dbyings nas chos kyi dbyings kyi bar du skye ba dang /
277a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa dang / gcig kho na dang / tha dad pa kho nar yang mi mthong na/ 'jam dpal de lta bu bzod pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa
277a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi sems pa dang / rnam par mi
277a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa de'i bzod pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba'o// gang yang sangs rgyas nyid dang / phyir byang chub tu
277a7(dkon brtsegs): mi smon pa de lta bu'i bzod pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur bar 'gyur bar bshad do// chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes su de
277a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir mi ldog par ngas bshad do// de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ma bral bar brjod pa bya'o//
277b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyid za bar mi 'gyur ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mi bral bar brjod
277b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par
277b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang rab rgya las nges par byang ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
277b4(dkon brtsegs): chub ni rgyu ma yin zhing rgyu las nges par byung ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa ni rgyu yang ma yin la rgyu las nges par byung ba yang ma
277b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gong gis bstan pa 'di thos kyang
277b6(dkon brtsegs): nur bar mi 'gyur ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal de lta bas na dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
277b7(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la zhum par mi 'gyur ba nas/ nub pa'i bar du mi 'gyur ba de dag ni nga la skyabasu dong ba'o// de dag ni
277b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'o// de dag gi ston pa ni nga yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi slob pa de byang chub
278a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i slob pa la slob pa'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang /
278a2(dkon brtsegs): sman dang nags tshal gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni sa chen po las rten nas skye'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos
278a3(dkon brtsegs): gang ci yang rung de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na/ 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yongs par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
278a4(dkon brtsegs): tu slu bar mi byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis
278a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa gang lags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di 'dzam bu gling 'dir grong khyer ram/ yul lam/ ldangs dag tu gang la la dag
278a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par gyur pa nas/ ston pa'i bar du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka'
278a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// 'jam dpal gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di da ltar gyi tshe la thos nas bdag tshe 'di rjes nus kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa
278a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di mnyan to zhes smon lam btab pa de dag ni/ nyan pa nas rgya cher mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol
278b1(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ste thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba rangs pa thob pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung bar mi 'chad do// 'jam dpal gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu
278b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa bstan pa 'di la nyan 'dod par gyur na/ de la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod de mnyan pas ci zhig bya/ thos nas ma dad cing phyir nur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la chos gang
278b3(dkon brtsegs): yang yongs su 'grub par ma bstan te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams skye ba 'am/ 'jig par yang ma bstan/ slob pa'i chos rnams dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams dang /
278b4(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba 'am/ 'thob par ma brtan pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
278b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge sasnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma
278b6(dkon brtsegs): gang la la bdag la 'di skad du deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gtam mdzad pa de gang yin zhes mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du chos
278b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam mo zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis te/
278b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' mchid de ni sems can gang gis kyang 'tshal bar sla ba ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gang yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//
279a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis de 'di skad du mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de bstan par gyur to zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad
279a2(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni skye ba ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du'o// bka' mchid de ni ji ltar dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyis so so'i skye bo'i chos
279a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnam par bshig pa ma lags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gong ma rtogs pa ma brtan to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de la bdag gis 'di skad du chos bstan pa 'di la
279a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang yang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
279a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad 'dri na bdag gis de skad du bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag las
279a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'tshal te/ dang khyod bcom ldan 'das dang gtab ci zhig byas shes 'dri na/ de la bdag gis 'di skad du/ gal te khya
279a7(dkon brtsegs): de nyan par 'dod na de mnyan to snyam du sems ma skyed cig/ kye skyes bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i shes rab ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes rab skyed cig dang / de lta bus chos bstan
279a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di shes par nus so// kye skyes bu gal te khyod kyi chos bstan pa 'di nyan par 'dod na/ de'i phyir 'di la 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la bya'i rjes lta bur gnas par gyis shig dang /
279b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bus chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par nus so// kye skyes bus gal te khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na/ de'i phyir gnyis la ma dmigs shig/ mi gnyis
279b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang ma dmigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la gnyis su brjod par bya ba yongs su brjod pa 'am/ mi gnyis par brjod par bya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro//
279b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams kyang ma zhig shig/ lta bar gyur pa rnams las kyang ma 'da' shig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la
279b4(dkon brtsegs): yang lhag par ma dmigs shig/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma bskyod cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig bdag las nyan par 'tshal
279b5(dkon brtsegs): te 'dri na/ de la bdag gis de skad brjod par bgyi'o// de skad rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de ltar 'di la gzhag par bgyi'o// gal te 'dri ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am
279b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de ltar gnas shing de ltar zhugs na spobs pa'i phyag rgya 'di la gnas pa de la slad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa dang / dngos po ma mchi
279b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma byung ba'i bar 'di bstan par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
279b8(dkon brtsegs): to 'jam dpal leg so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par spras pa legs so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la yang byis 'di skad
280a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi sgom pa'i bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin
280a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o//
280a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis ston pa'o// zhes smra bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i
280a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes
280a5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mkhas pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs
280a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug
280a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
280a8(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de dag byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs
280b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
280b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du byas pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste/
280b3(dkon brtsegs): gang nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang med do zhes de ltar shes par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med
280b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad ni nges par 'byung ba ste/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos de gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
280b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// chos de dag ni ji ltar brjod pa de ltar yod pa ma yin te/ brjod du med pa ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med do zhes de ltar shes par
280b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad ni
280b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/ gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i sems can de gang yang med do zhe na/ yang de la zhum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes
280b8(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni byang chub dang mnyam pa'o// ji ltar chos thams
281a1(dkon brtsegs): cang byang nab dang mnyam pa dang / byang chub ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin no// sems can thams cad ci 'dra bar med pa de yang de bzhin no//
281a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir spyod pa thams cad ni spyod pa med pa'o// de yang byang chub ste/ byang chub gang yin pa skye ba med pa yin/ 'byung ba med yang de yin te/ de lta bu'i chos 'di la zhum
281a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gyis
281a4(dkon brtsegs): shig/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa'i bar de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las
281a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bstan tu med pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi ston pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
281a6(dkon brtsegs): nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa tsam yang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
281a7(dkon brtsegs): nas yang dag par ston par byed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par nga bachang na/ gang dag de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa tsa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub tu
281a8(dkon brtsegs): nges par rig par bya'o// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i bar 'di thos nas mi skrag/ mi dang dngang bar mi
281b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas pa'o// gong du yang mos par byed na/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba
281b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa'i rgya ni gzhag par bya ste/ rgya 'di ni mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa rnams gzhag go/
281b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi bar du yang chags pa med pa yongs su ston pa'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos rgya
281b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dis btab pa ni ngan song du 'gro ba'i skal pa can ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro ba 'am/ 'jug pa'i skal pa can ma yin no// de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang
281b5(dkon brtsegs): po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog nam da ra ba dang / nam da ra ba chen po dang / lha'i
281b6(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / lha'i ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang mchod cing / bcom ldan 'das
281b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang gtor mngon par gtor nas/ 'di skad ces dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag phyag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i chos rin po che
281b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di mchod pa dang / phyi phyir zhing thos par gyur ces smras so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ma byang ba dang
282a1(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa'i bar gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma 'di 'dzam bu gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mdo'
282a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag gi rnamam du zag par 'gyur ba nas/ de dag nyid sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyi'o// bcom ldan sa
282a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gi na lam du tshogs chung dus grag la/ thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /
282a4(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chang bar bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo do dag gis bdag gi 'di ni lhas bsgrubs pa'o zhes the tsom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de
282a5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la sangs
282a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub par blta'o// de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur
282a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byed gyis brlabs tu gsol/
282a8(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa byin gyis brlad tu gsol/ cig 'di smras ma thag tu de'i tshe skad cig de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// sa chen po
282b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yos ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzum pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
282b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bstan pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//
282b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
282b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
282b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas rnams te/ ltas 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o//
282b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang dag chos gang yang mi spong zhing mi zlog la bsngags par yang mi byed pa de dang de dag ni phyag rgya 'dis btab par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
282b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal dmigs pa yod na spong bar byed pa dang / bsngags par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na gong dag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag
282b8(dkon brtsegs): gi ched du rgya 'di gzhag ste/ 'di ltar de dag gis thos nas kyang chos gang la yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par rtog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams
283a1(dkon brtsegs): cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag de'i
283a2(dkon brtsegs): shes skems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stags go// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus
283a3(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ dbang bskur ba thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ pad ma bla
283a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse ma'i dpung rgyan gyis rnam par rol pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
283a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rtogs pa/ yon tan 'byung gnas bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la shin tu btan la phebs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon tu gyur pa/ byang chub kyi snying por rab
283a6(dkon brtsegs): tu gzhol pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa mi bzad pa bstan pa'i bzungs rab tu thob pa/
283a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par byed pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i stobs kyis 'khor thams cad gnon pa la mkhas pa/ tshig
283a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa phyed pas don yod par bskal pa'i bar du lung ston pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan bzang pos legs par brgyad pa/ 'dus pa ngan pa'i tshogs pha rol rgol ba yang
283b1(dkon brtsegs): don dam par pa skyes pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub
283b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
283b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyis rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las//
283b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa'i le'u bdun brgya pa zhes bya ste// 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya
283b5(dkon brtsegs): rang na pu tsa pa ri prid tsa na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// gtsug na rin po
283b6(dkon brtsegs): ches zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
283b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong bzhi khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
283b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/
284a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu 'jom pa/ grags pa dang brjod pa'i sgra mthon po phyogs bcur grags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags
284a2(dkon brtsegs): te rab tu bkur ba/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dpag tu med pa las byung ba/ bskal
284a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par shin tu sbyang ba byas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nang yongs su shes nas/ so so ci rigs par chos kyi sman
284a4(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba/ rkyen las byung ba'i chos zab cing gting dpog dka' ba la 'jug cing / mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa dang / rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yongs su spangs pa/ dge
284a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dag cing dri ma med pa bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bsdu ba dang / kun rig pa
284a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par rig pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/ rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba/ sems dpa' zhing brtan la/ rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa/ dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang /
284a7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang / gzungs dang / sngon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ yon tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
284a8(dkon brtsegs): blo na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba dang / rtag tu rnam par
284b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dang / mthu chen thob pa dang / seng ge dang / seng ge'i blo gros dang / seng ge stabs su 'gro dang / seng ge'i sgra mngon
284b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bsgrags dang / mchog gi blo glos dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par ga
284b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jig rten gsum gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mig bzangs dang / pad ma'i mig dang / pad ma'i bkod pa dang / rin po che bkod pa dang / spobs pa chen pa
284b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mthu bo che dang / rin chen khar ba dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / yon tan gyi rgyal po snang dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po snang dang
284b5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / yid gnyis rnam par 'dzem dang / glog gi snang bas brgyan dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / dbyangs snyen dang / sprin dbyangs dang / rnga sgra dang /
284b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs rnam par dag dang / rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med
284b7(dkon brtsegs): pa drug cu dang / spos kyi glang po che la sogs pa dag pa'i sems dpa' drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang / byams pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang / bskal pa bzang po'i
284b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// lha'i bu bdud las rgyal dang / lha'i bu doge ba bkod dang / lha'i bu mtshams rab dang / bzang po'i rgyal po dang /
285a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba dang / rnal pa'i bla thos dang / rang tu gling dus pa'i dbang byug dang / lha'i bu legs par sems pa dang / de dag la sogs pa
285a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang theg pa ched po yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang / rgyal po chen po poni dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mched kyi bdag pa
285a3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / lha'i dbang phyug dang chen po dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding
285a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la zhugs te/
285a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ seng ge ltar ni sgrogs/ nyi ma ltar ni lhan ne/ zla ba ltar ni lam me/ sgron ma ltar ni 'bar/
285a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin ltar ni lding ngo / tshangs pa ltar ni lhag go// rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus nas ri rab ltar ni 'phags te khor yug chen pa'i dbus su gshegs nas/ chos ston pa ni tsham
285a7(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rjog pa/ yongs su byang ba 'di lta ste/ byang chub
285a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes zhes bya ba'i chos kyis sgo las brtsams nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
285b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa las spyod par 'gyur bar yang dag par rab tu ston to// yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs kyi sangs
285b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag du ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'odas pa na/ 'jig rten gyis khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
285b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing shes la chos kyang ston pa de'i gnas nas/ byang chub sems
285b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong dang lhan gcig tu// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
285b5(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskur cing mdun du 'dar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs
285b6(dkon brtsegs): par sbrul de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas par gyur to// de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dub nas rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis/
285b7(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par byas te/ me tog kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs
285b8(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du 'dug ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis sdug bsngal thams cad bzod byas shing // brtul
286a1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs brtan pas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa// drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa sus mthong ba/ lha mi rnams kyis rnyed par rab tu rnyed/ gang ga'i bye rnyed/
286a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mang // brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis phyir bor te/ stong phrag bye ba'i bdad rnams rab btul nas// byang chub rdul bral mya ngan med pa thob/ 'gro ba kun
286a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi gtso bo bsnyen bkur bar// shar phyogs logs kyi mchog gi 'jig rten khams// legs par sbrel nas spyad pa yongs dag pa'i// rgyal thad nas bdag ni 'dir mchis so//
286a4(dkon brtsegs): su dag chos kyi btam rnams nyan pa dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang // rkang gnyis gtso bo de yang lta 'dod pa// de dag bya dgod phung por myur tu sheg/
286a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mthong ba shin tu rnyed par dka'// zhi ba'i chos kyang thob par shin tu dka'// dal 'byor mir skye shin tu rnyed par dka'// tshul khrims dad pa'ang rtag tu rnyed par dka'/
286a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten par 'dren pa bzhugs bzhin du// bde 'dod gang zhig bsod nams mi byed na/ mya ngan 'das nas des ni ci bya yis// de ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'dod par bya//
286a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ngan gro thams cad spangs nas ni// lha min dudu bde ba thob pa dang // mya ngan las thob bde bar 'gyur 'dod pa// mtshungs med de'i gan du de dag deng // de ni sman
286a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po'i bdud rtsi sbyin// de ni ded dpon mchog gi lam mtshon pa// de ni chos rgyal rin chen dam pa 'chang // de ni sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung // byang chub sems
286b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrubs pa 'di dag smras nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dbyang
286b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis go bar gyur/ tshe dang ldan po sha ra da ti'i bus kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos te thos nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
286b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i don dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang nas byung bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
286b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas/ sangs rgyas zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs
286b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes/ la/ chos kyang ston pa de'i/
286b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong dang bcas te/ nga la blta ba dang / phyag
286b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / phyogs bcu nas 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang blta ba'i phyir/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin
286b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing
287a1(dkon brtsegs): mdun du 'dar nas rnga ni rab tu rdung / me tog gi char ni 'bebs 'od zer ni 'byin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
287a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yo bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten khams mdzes par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar
287a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mched 'dir phyin te/ sha rI bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches des/ sems can bag med pa rnams
287a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bskal ba'i phyir/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug na/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sha ri'i bu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis stong gsu
287a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
287a6(dkon brtsegs): po gtsug na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong po de dag dang lhan gcig tu/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang /
287a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dar nas/ rnga ni rab tu rdung / me tog gi char ni rab tu
287a8(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs/ 'od zer ni 'byin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g.yo bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub
287b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
287b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
287b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang po de dag dang lhan gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dag go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
287b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin chen po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
287b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ram/ 'tsho ba dang stobs dang
287b6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar reg par bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang la gnas na/ shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / shin tu grub pa dang /
287b7(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'gyur ba dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / de dag bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kun tu
287b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa'i mtshan nyid rnams yang dag pa
288a1(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi spyod pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi spyod pa rnam par sbyong
288a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / chos spyod pas sems can mi 'thun par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yang dag pa'i chos kyis nan tan la mos par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin/
288a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa thams cad la kha na ma tho ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag la bdud thams cad kyis glags
288a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba la sgrib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi spyod pa
288a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pas rigs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
288a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par rab tu brtan tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
288a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po gtsug na rin chen po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i dpe tsam cung zad cig bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gtsug
288b1(dkon brtsegs): na rin po che bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
288b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni 'di bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
288b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
288b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod po yongs su dag pa'o// de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni kun tu sngo ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par
288b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// byang nu kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni lam smra ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// mngon par shes pa'i bsgrub pa spyod pa yongs su
288b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ni bsam gtan la sems las su rung ba ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
288b7(dkon brtsegs): ni snying rje chen pos lhag pa'i bsam gton pa'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
288b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// drug po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul
289a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so// rigs kyi bu
289a2(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa/ yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ser sna'i dri mas kun dkris pa'i sems sel ba
289a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gtong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'o sems 'phel bar byed pa dang / de ser sna'i dri ma bstsal te gtong ba'i sems la gnas nas/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su
289a4(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba'i sems la gnas so// de sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ tha dad pa bzhi med de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can tha dad du byed pa dang / chos tha dad pa dang / yongs su
289a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngo ba tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad du mi byed do// de la ji ltar na sems can tha dad du mi byed ce na/ 'di la sbyin/ 'di la ni mi sbyin/ 'di la ni nyung ngu sbyin//
289a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni mang du sbyin/ 'di la ni bzang po sbyin/ 'di la ni ngan pa sbyin/ 'di la ni rtag tu skyon/ 'di la ni rtag tu mi sbyin/ 'di la ni sti stang du byas te byon/ 'di
289a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni sti stang du byis te mi byin/ 'di la ni thams cad byin/ 'di la ni thams cad mi byin/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa'o//
289a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin/ 'di la byin na sbyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur/ 'di ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyur// 'di ni yang /
289b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa/ 'di ni log par zhugs pa'o zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'di lta bu'i sems 'phro ba spong zhing / mnyam pa nyid dang / tha dad pa
289b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / mi mtho mi dma' ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / yang dag par sbyor ba dang / mtshungs par sbyor ba dang / mtshang
289b3(dkon brtsegs): par byams pa dang / mtshungs par snying rje ba dang / byed brag med pa dang / na mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur po de ni sems can tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes
289b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ji ltar na/ chos tha dad du mi byed ce na/ gang chos smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni byin/ gang chos ma yin par smra bar gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin no//
289b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam du de ltar sems mi bskyed de/ de chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob nas/ sbyin pa byin te so so'i skye bo rnams ni dman po snyam du sbyin pa mi byin/ 'phag
289b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni rgya chen po zhes sbyin pa mi byin gyi/ chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis mnyam ste/ byed brag med pas sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni chos tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes
289b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de la ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba tha dad du mi byed ce na/ gang sbyin pa byin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de brgya byin thob par mi sngo// tshangs pa thob par ma yin//
289b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i srid dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / gzugs dang longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / g.yog 'dod par ma yin/ srid pa'i 'gro ba thams
290a1(dkon brtsegs): du 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i skye gnas rnams su dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su mi sngo// nyan thos kyi theg par ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas
290a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg par ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gzhan du bsngo ba 'di ni/ sngo ba tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o
290a3(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar na sbyin pa byin pa na/ bsam pa tha dad du mi byed ce na/ bsam pa mnyam pa sbyor ba mnyam pa/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba/ pha rol la byas pa'i
290a4(dkon brtsegs): lan re ba med pa/ g.yo ba med pa dang / rgya med pas sems thag pa nas shin tu yongs su gtang ba'i blo// sems 'gyod pa med pa/ gnas gsum du dad pa
290a5(dkon brtsegs): thob ste/ sbyin no snyam pa dang / sbyin par byed pa/ byin nas dad pa rab tu thob pa 'di ni bsam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
290a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sbyin pa byin pa ni/ tha dad pa 'di bzhi mi byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su dag pa'i rkang pa dang po'o//
290a7(dkon brtsegs): de bla sa brgyad yongs su dag par smin pa byin par byed de/ brgyad po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu lta ba yongs su dag par sbyin pa byin pa dang / de ba
290a8(dkon brtsegs): du sems can tu lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta dang / 'jig par
290b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa byin par byed do// de bag la nyal bzhi yongs su dag spang nas/ sbyin pa byin par byed de/
290b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi bag la nyal dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag lo nyal dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bag la nyal ba dang / bag chags kyi mtshams
290b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i bag la nyal te/ bag la nyal po de dag yongs su spangs nas/ sbyin pa byin par byed do// de 'du shes bzhi yongs su spangs nas/ sbyin pa byin par
290b4(dkon brtsegs): byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / gtsang por 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa ste/ 'du shes bzhi po de dag
290b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spang nas/ sbyin pa byin par byed do// de rnam pa bzhi yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa bzhi po dag par byin pa byin par byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su
290b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa bzhi po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa byin
290b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// de chags pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa byin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ rnam par smin pa la chags pa dang / 'gyod pa la tshogs pa dang
290b8(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dman pa ston pa la chags ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas/ sbyin pa byin par byed do// de 'jig pa lhas shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa byin
291a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'jigs pa dang / rlom sems kyi 'jigs pa dang / bdud kyi las kyi
291a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas/ sbyin pa byin par byed do// de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa byin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nang
291a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab po dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa ste/
291a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya bzhi po de dag btab nas sbyin pa byin par byed do// de brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa byin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad
291a5(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'gros rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu
291a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su spong ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar
291a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byin par byed do// dran pa bzhi dang mi bral bar sbyin pa byin par byed de// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dran pa dang /
291a8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa chen po dran pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba dran pa te/ dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa byin par byed do// de 'khor
291b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa byin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub
291b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa te/ 'khor gsum po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa byin par byed do// de shes pa yongs su dag par sbyin pa byin par byed de// bzhi
291b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ sbyin pa shes pa yongs su dag pa/ sems can gyi bsam tshim par byed pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sgyu ma'i chos su so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su
291b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / bsngo ba la so sor rtogs pa shes pa yongs su dag pa ste/ shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su dag par sbyin pa byin pa byed do//
291b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i chos la zhugs pa de'i byin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub
291b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu
291b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa gcig te/ rnam pa gcig gang zhe na/
291b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las mchog tu bye brag tu 'phag
292a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/ las dang
292a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par byed pa'i sems/ sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/ yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems
292a3(dkon brtsegs): de nyid mi 'dor zhing srung ba dang / sbed pa dang / mi brjod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i yongs su dag pa
292a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gcig go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnams pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/
292a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la 'od gzer thogs pa med pa dang / sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrims la 'jud pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis/
292a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las kyi gnod/
292a7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad bsal bas lus yongasu dag pa dang / kha gsag dang gzhoge slong dang ngag gi skyon thams cad bsal bas ngag yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod pa dang ni gnod sam
292a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i blar rtog pa bsal bas sems yongs su dag pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gsum mo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
292b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa yang dag par bzung ba ma mnyam pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal
292b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su smin par byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin du gus par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshal
292b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga ste/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / ma bsdu
292b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mi brnyed pa dang / nyan thos kyi sems la mi re ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mi 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa lnga'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
292b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa drug te/ rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa las mi 'da' bas
292b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas chos rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta bas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / nyo/
292b7(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bas gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba thams cad mi gnas pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams
292b8(dkon brtsegs): cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pas lha rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa drug pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
293a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bdun te/ rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang
293a2(dkon brtsegs): du byas te ngo tsha shes dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med
293a3(dkon brtsegs): pas nges pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu phyin pa kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tsho ba med pa dang / sems can gyi yongs su gdung pa nye bar zhi bas
293a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhon tu mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bdun no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa brgyad de/ rnam pa
293a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi chos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag med pa dang / rang bzhin
293a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis chog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi byed pa dang / sbyongs pa'i yo byad bsnyung bas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
293a7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas gcig pu
293a8(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dga' ba mos pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa brgyad do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang
293b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa dgu he/ rnam pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu po
293b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dul ba dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams las shin tu phyin pa'i ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa
293b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su sbyor ba dang / yongs su gdung ba med pas sems zhi ba dang / sems las su rung bas zhi gnas kyi tshogs pa kun tu tshol ba dang / cho ga
293b4(dkon brtsegs): dang tshul khrims dang / lta ba nyams pa las shin tu 'das pas mi lhod pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la mi slu ba dang /
293b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang / yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
293b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las rnam pa gsum
293b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang brel te drang zhing
293b8(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal ba dang / phan par sbyor ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjes su ston pa dang /
294a1(dkon brtsegs): dul zhing cang shes kyi sa'i phyir sems dgu nod ma yin pa dang / bdag nyi byed pas sems can thams cad kyi sgrub par gyur pa dang /
294a2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la bdud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / srog gi dbang por chos mdun du byed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni
294a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis ste/ rnam pa gleng zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma
294a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas shing 'bad pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims ni srog gi phyir yang mi 'dral ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul khrims ni chos tham
294a5(dkon brtsegs): cad la sgo mi 'dogs par slob pa te/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs
294a6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nang rnam par dag pas skye mched rnam par dag pa dang / phyi rnam par dag pas yul thams cad spongs pa'o// /
294a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
294a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis byang chub yongs su sngo ba dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pas/ tshul khrims kyi rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid de gnyis po de dag go
294b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i
294b2(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag yongs su dag pas 'odi ltar gshe yang slar mi gshe'o//
294b3(dkon brtsegs): lus yongs su dag pas brdegs kyang slar mi brdeg go// sems yongs su dag pas khros kyang slar mi khro'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'tshig
294b4(dkon brtsegs): par byas kyang slar mi 'tshig go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la lta ba'i phyir gzhan gyis ngan du smras sam/ ngan du brjod pa'i tshig
294b5(dkon brtsegs): gi lam thos kyang mi gshe'o// 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba'i phyir lag pa dang / bong ba dang / dbyigs pas brdeg kyang slar khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub
294b6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu srung ba'i phyir yan lag dang nying lag bcad kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos yongs su 'dzin
294b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir slong ba la mi gshe'o// byang chub kyi lam gyi nyes par brtan pa'i phyir/ de dag la byams pa nye bar sgrub po// smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/
294b8(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs thams cad spang ba'i phyir spong yang de la phan par sems shing snying rje dang ldan te/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu nges par sbyin par byed do//
295a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su grub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing bzod de/
295a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub rjes su dran zhing bzod do// dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
295a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ ye shes rjes su dran zhing bzod do// byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ phan par 'dod pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do// snying rje chen po
295a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'bras bu yod pa rnam par gnon pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do// mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ seng
295a5(dkon brtsegs): ge'i bsgyings pa dran zhing bzod do// sems can thams cad lnga bdud pa'i phyir spyi gtsug pa ltar mi snang ba rjes su dran zhing bzod do// 'jig rten thams cad
295a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rjes su dran zhing bzod do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myang ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
295a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bzang ba ni stobs gnyis kyis yongs su dag par 'gyur
295a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / sgom pa'i stobs so// de la gang lus dang sems la gnas te/ bzod pa ni sa
295b1(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog pa'i stobs so// gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni skom pa'i stobs so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i
295b2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing chos thams cad dben par bzod do// gang chos thams
295b3(dkon brtsegs): cad la mi bzod pa de ni/ bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la don dam par gang bzod pa 'am mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang
295b4(dkon brtsegs): med do// gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ chos khas len pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang
295b5(dkon brtsegs): med do// gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa yongs su dag pa ste/ zhum pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// tshe gang chos thams
295b6(dkon brtsegs): cad mi 'dzin pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ 'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa yang med do// gang la bdag med pa dang / sems can
295b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / chos med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ bdag dang sems can dang / chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang
295b8(dkon brtsegs): yang med do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/
296a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ lus pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa
296a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa te/ gnyis po de dag go// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu
296a3(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhe na/ gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dgos pa dang / dgos pa ma
296a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa la zhum pa med pa/ brtson pas mi ngal ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa la mi zhen pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos thams cad
296a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa/ chos thams cad ston par brtson pa/ chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa la spro ba/ mchod sbyin chen po las sgrol ba/ sems
296a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa la yongs su mi skyo ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par sbyong ba/ theg pa dman pa las shin tu 'da' ba sngon du dam bcas pa
296a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa sogs pa/ sngon gyi bsod nams bstsags pa chud mi gzon pa/ nga rgyal med pas sems
296a8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la rim gro bya'o cog byed pa te/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la mig
296b1(dkon brtsegs): yor dang / gzugs brnyan du shes pa/ tshig la brjod du med par shes pa/ sems la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa/ zad pa shes pa/ rnam par rig
296b2(dkon brtsegs): bzad pa shes pa/ rab tu shes pa/ mi skye ba'i shes pa nges par rtogs pa'o// de brtson pa gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/
296b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang / dmigs pa'i rtsom pa dang / yongs su rtogs pa'i brtsom pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// de chags pa gsu
296b4(dkon brtsegs): la mi chags sum pa gsum par brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ rna ba dang /
296b5(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par
296b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la mi chags pa/ lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par
296b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la mi chags pa'o/ de 'dzin pa med cing dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sbyin pa mi len/ ser sna mi 'dor/ tshul khrims
296b8(dkon brtsegs): mi len/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dor/ bzod pa mi len/ gnod sems mi 'dor/ brtson 'grus mi len/ le lo mi 'dor/ bsam
297a1(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi len/ g.yeng ba mi 'dor/ shes rab mi len/ 'chal ba'i shes rab mi 'dor/ dge ba mi len/ mi
297a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba mi 'dor/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor ro// de len pa med cing 'dor ba med pas/ gnyis
297a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang nang gi kun tu ldang ba las dmigs pa ldang ba dang / phyi rol
297a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par shes pa mtshan mo'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba de ni gnyis shes bya'o// de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang nang nye bar zhi bar
297a5(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol gyi mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// gang rgyu med cing ma spros pa spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus
297a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gta
297a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing / yang dag par bsgrub nas so sor
297a8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang snyom par 'jug pa yin te/ de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed/ de
297b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan mi byed kyang tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed
297b2(dkon brtsegs): do// de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sna la
297b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ yid la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan
297b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ sgra la ma yin/ dri la ma yin/ ro la ma yin/ reg bya la ma yin/ chos la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang
297b5(dkon brtsegs): lus su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sems su rtog pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam
297b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bzhin du tshul ma yin/ me lA ma yin/ rlung la ma yin/ nam mkha' la gnas te bas
297b7(dkon brtsegs): gan byed do// ded skyes gad+hAn byed byung la ma yin/ me lam yin/ brgya byin la ma yin/ mangs pal pa yid/ b+h+rUM dgA'i bdag pa
297b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas tobasam gtan ma byed do// 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsapa mi byed do// gzungs kyi khams ma yin/ gzugs meng po'i khams
298a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtun byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ 'jig
298a2(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol la gnas te bsam matan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te/ mi g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan mi byed do//
298a3(dkon brtsegs): de bsam gtan byed kyang nye bar zhen pa'i lta ba la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma yin/ srog la ma yin/
298a4(dkon brtsegs): gso ba la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ shed las skyes pa la ma yin/ shed bu nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de
298a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta ba khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang rtag par lta ba la ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba
298a6(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin/ 'jig par lta ba khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin tu zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed
298a7(dkon brtsegs): do// de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan po byed do// de bsapa gtan
298a8(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang shin tu mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang stong pa nyid
298b1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par byed pa'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang mtshan ma
298b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang mtshan myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par
298b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de byams pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs la
298b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnam par mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do// de la rnam pa thams kyi mchog
298b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ sbyin pa mtshang ba med pa/ rdul khrims ma tshang ba med pa/ bzod pa mtshang ba med pa/ brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med
298b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bsam gtan ma tshang ba med pa/ shes rab ma tshang ba med pa/ thabs ma tshang ba med pa/ byams pa chen po ma tshang ba med pa/ snying rje dang / dga'
298b7(dkon brtsegs): bA dang / btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/ bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang ba med pa/ byang chub kyi sems sems can la lta ba med pa ma tshang ba med
298b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa/ don 'thun pa ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa dang /
299a1(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po/
299a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma tshang ba med pa/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyid pa dang //
299a3(dkon brtsegs): dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa ma tshang ba med pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ma tshang ba med pa/ mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i tshe
299a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus/ dge 'dun gyi tshul yong su sdud pa
299a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yong su bsgrub pas legs par brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongasu rdzog pa bsdus
299a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ mi 'jigapa
299a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhil rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rjesu mthun pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang sa 'dres pa/ bag chags kyi mtsha
299a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa/ rton pa bzhi pa thob pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig
299b1(dkon brtsegs): rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas ma smad pa/ drang ba mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal
299b2(dkon brtsegs): sel ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad skyong ba/ chu bo las sgrol ba/ 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa/ rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba/ las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis nye bar zhi
299b3(dkon brtsegs): bar ma zhi/ chos nyid kyi btang snyoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad lta ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems po byin gyi rlabs bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa/ rang gi
299b4(dkon brtsegs): rang gis lung du ma bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa/ nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa zad
299b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamA na sems
299b6(dkon brtsegs): can ji rnyed yod pa de dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslab pa yan lag rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslab par gyur te/ de la la la ni sa chod pa la mkhra kyang 'dri ba
299b7(dkon brtsegs): la mi khas/ la la ni gtan la 'bebra pa la mkhas kyang / yan lag dang nying lag la mi khas/ kha cig ni rka lag 'dri pa la mkhas kyang m+bi dang mgo dang rna ba dri ba la mi mkhas pa
299b8(dkon brtsegs): dag cig yod la/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na rnam pa tha dad du bslab pa yan lag rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslab pa/ gzug tha dad du bslab pa'i ri mo mkhyen de dag thaMd la/ rgyal po rgyal nig skye bo nas dbang bcu
300a1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ ras shig byin te/ khyed rnams kyi ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig/ khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di
300a2(dkon brtsegs): la ri mo bris shig/ de nas ri mo mkhan de dag chos nas ras de brkyangs pa las ri mo mkhan de dag gi nang nas/ ri mo mkhan cig cig yul gzhan
300a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig tu song bar gyur la/ de nas ri mo mkhan phyim de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i gzugs bris nas/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri mo mkhan
300a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig po de'i lag tu ma blangs na ras de rnams pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// ba
300a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ci tsam don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te/ 'di'i don cir blta zhe na/ rigs kyi
300a6(dkon brtsegs): bu ci ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na/ ras de rnam grangs thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa ji snyed dang spyod
300a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ji skad dang / brtson pa ci snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las/ gal te rnam pa gcig ma bsnan na yang rnam
300a8(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no// nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang / nyon mongs
300b1(dkon brtsegs): kha'i kun nas ldang ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa de'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams
300b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no// bstan pa 'di nges par bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi
300b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob po// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su
300b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
300b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ni/ shes rab yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam po bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' la yid de'i shes rab
300b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yang de'i shes rab kyi dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing
300b7(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / da lta byung ba la de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas
300b8(dkon brtsegs): la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong
301a1(dkon brtsegs): ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas thams cad la yang /
301a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong
301a3(dkon brtsegs): ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med pa
301a4(dkon brtsegs): cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / bde ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun
301a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / don dam par brtan pa la yang de'i shes rab
301a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir rab dang 'bring
301a7(dkon brtsegs): dang tha ma'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thog
301a8(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'jug pa yin te/ de'i shes rab de yang 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa nges par byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa/ sems can gyi
301b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa gting dpag dka' ste/ mthong bar dka' zhing za ba la/ khong du chud par dga' ba bye brag phyed cing nges par rtogs pa lta ba
301b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba/ bag chags bstsal pa/ bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/ thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa/ don la nges par rtogs pa/ shin du sdigs pa/
301b3(dkon brtsegs): shin du sbyangs pa ci yang snang ba med pa/ 'gal ba med pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtogs pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba skyon med pa legs
301b4(dkon brtsegs): par srung ba/ skyon med pa la dga' ba/ bden pa khong du chud pa/ 'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa/ shin du rgal ba/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/
301b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu spyod pa spyod pa med pa/ legs par spyad pa spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa spyad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las phyir log
301b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang gdu nas kyang 'ongs pa med pa yul thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log pa/ rtsom pa thams cad las shin
301b7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'das kyang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/ spyod pa thams cad las shin du 'das kyang / dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir/
301b8(dkon brtsegs): ma log pa sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ nye bar len
302a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'bar ga 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang / 'jig rten dang ma bral ba lus ma bral ba med kyang
302a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o// de'i shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud pa/ dbang po
302a3(dkon brtsegs): smin par 'gyur ba/ yun ring por lta ba/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba/ dge ba'i sbyin pa la spyod
302a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ta nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyi bslabs pa/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par
302a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa/ chos thams cad ro mtshungs pa/ thabs thams cad kyis yang
302a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par bzung ba'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
302a7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o// mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol du song bas/ de'i
302a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i shes rab kyi yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan
302b1(dkon brtsegs): nying yongs su dag pa dang / thogs pa med ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so// gzhan yang yongs su dag pa
302b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so// de'i shes rab de'i yang
302b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ sems can rjes su song ba/ chos kyi rjes su song ba'o// de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis phyir mtshams sbyor
