302b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang med la skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams kyang sbyor ro// de shes rab de rnas pa yang med la/ yul thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i
302b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi yul yang gnas so// de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang yang bral ba/ dbus la yang mi gnas pa'o// de'i shes rab de ni phyogs bcur
302b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par lta bas sgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul lo// 'byung ba shin tu mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa yang rnyed pa'o// de'i shes rab de ni chos thams cad
302b7(dkon brtsegs): shes shing mngon par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro'o// de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba
302b8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin te/ mi sbyor ba 'am/ chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni/ ye shes
302b9(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba 'am
303a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'byung gnas yin no// bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas yin no// thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// yon tan gyi 'byung
303a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas yin no// chos kyi 'byung gnas yin no// chos kyi 'byung gnas yin no// gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// so so yang dag pa'i
303a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas yin no// yon tan dang ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpel
303a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sbyor ba yongs su dag pa 'di brtan pa na/ 'khor de'i
303a5(dkon brtsegs): nang nas lha dang mi srog chags nyi khri nyi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong
303a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag po rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//
303a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag nas/ de dag tshig 'di skad 'dzer te/ bcom ldan 'das
303a8(dkon brtsegs): gang shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos par gyur pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
303a9(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung ba lags na/ gang dag thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'tshang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta
303b1(dkon brtsegs): mos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
303b2(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lus
303b3(dkon brtsegs): la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas te/ lus la so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog go/ rnam pa gnyi su
303b4(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtogs pa ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mi sngags pa'i so sor rtog par dang ldan pa dang / sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o//
303b5(dkon brtsegs): de las mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtogs pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste kye ma lus 'di ni migatsang ba te/ rtsog pas yongs su gang ba
303b6(dkon brtsegs): yun thung zhing byis pa 'drid pa yin no// zhes bya ba 'di ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtogs pa dang ldan pa'o// de la sdug pa'i rnam par so
303b7(dkon brtsegs): ser rtog pa ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gang lus mi gcab pa grogs med pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku bsod nams kyi sku/
303b8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi sku/ rdo rje sku/ mi shigs pa'i sku/ zag pa med pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ gzugs mthong ba sems
304a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i sku/ thob par bya'o snyam pa'i 'di ni sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtag pa dang ldan pa zhes bya
304a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
304a3(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa ni chos gnyis yongs su sbyong ste/ gnyis
304a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta te mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / rtag pa'i rnam pa'o// de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa te/
304a5(dkon brtsegs): ring por mi gnas pa tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas lus kyi phyir mi 'thun pa'i 'tsho ba mi spyod cing / snying po nyid len to// de snying po gsum len
304a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ longs spyod kyi snying po dang / 'tsho ba'i snying po'o// de lus mi rtag go snyam nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slobs mar mkhas
304a7(dkon brtsegs): blangs te/ ci ba'o cog la 'bad pa yin/ lus mi rtag go snyam nas lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang / g.yo dang tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do// lus mi
304a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag go snyam nas srog la bag mi rton par gyur te/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do// lus mi rtag go snyam nas sems spyod pa la sred cing chags pa'i
304b1(dkon brtsegs): byed do// bdag pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rjes su
304b2(dkon brtsegs): lta zhing gnas te/ de las yon tan gyi phan yon rab tu 'thob po// de lta rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i
304b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi dpyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing 'byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos
304b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ thams cad
304b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu sngo ste/ sems can thams cad la btab pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o//
304b6(dkon brtsegs): gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya te/ 'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i
304b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dus ma byas nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
304b8(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang / mtshan ma med pa nges par brtags/
305a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pas/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes
305a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// nam mkha' ni rtag pa zhes bya te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par mi rtog pas/ byang chub sems
305a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su dran pa blta
305a4(dkon brtsegs): ba nye bar gzhag pa skom pa/ bdag gis lus de la sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus
305a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sku zag pa med pa ltar gis lus kyi chos nyid la 'ang
305a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rtog go// de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so// de zag pa
305a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i lus kyis zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams stsogs so// de zag pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zag
305a8(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par yongasu sngo'o// de zag pa med pa'i chos thos pas zag pa las 'byung bar med byed do// zag pa rnams gang
305b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o// de 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa
305b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye'o// srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang
305b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsag pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin to// ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa
305b4(dkon brtsegs): ba nas 'dod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la 'jug go/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa de lus
305b5(dkon brtsegs): la sngon gyi 'tha' nas kyis byung bar so sor rtog go// lus la phyi me'i mthar yang mi 'pho bar se ser rtog go// lus la da ltar byung ba na rang
305b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis dben par yang so sor rtog go/ de de ltar lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas pas lus dang ldan pa'i 'jig tshogs le lta ba mi skyed//
305b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral bas bdag gir mi byed do// bdag gir mi byed pas yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi 'dzin to// yongs su
305b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa rab tu 'thob po// spyod pa spangs gnod sems med do// gnod sems med pas bzod pa rab tu 'thob po// bzod pa
306a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu thob pas khengs par yang mi 'gyur/ 'dud par mi 'gyur/ khyengs par yang mi 'gyur/ 'dud par yang mi 'gyur bas
306a2(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// chos nyid la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa/ spyod par mi 'gyur ro// chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i
306a3(dkon brtsegs): grogs su song ngo // chos kyi grogs su song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do// chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzungs
306a4(dkon brtsegs): bas/ chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan pa thos par 'gyur ro// chos thos par 'gyur ro// chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul rnams la zag par mi
306a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de yul la bsrangs pas ting de 'dzin bsgrubs po// mnyam par gzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang
306a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do// rnam par rtog par mi byed do// rnam par mi rtogs pas mi 'gyur ro// mi 'gyu
306a7(dkon brtsegs): bas phyir yang mi byed do// rnam par mi byed do// nam mi byed rnam par mi byed pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin du thob nas/ thams cad
306a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa
306b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i nor ba rnams tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs
306b2(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems tshor ba rnams la tshor ba rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhog pa sgom pa ni/
306b3(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin
306b4(dkon brtsegs): no zhes slob te/ de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spang ba'i phyir/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lte ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo//
306b5(dkon brtsegs): de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba dag pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang / bdag gi tshor ba 'gog par mi byed do// des cho pa gang ci myong yang tshor ba
306b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung zhing myong bar byed do// de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de na 'dod chags la spong ba'i sem
306b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de na zhe
306b8(dkon brtsegs): sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed do// bdag gi zhes sdang gi bag le yang rab tu spong ngo // nam bde ba yang ma yin
307a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de na/ gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag
307a2(dkon brtsegs): gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // de bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ rjes su chags pa legs par 'dzem
307a3(dkon brtsegs): par yang byed do// de sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba lnga khong khro bar mi 'gyur te/ khrong khro ba legs par 'dzem par yang byed do// sdug bsngal yang ma
307a4(dkon brtsegs): yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa ldan par mi 'gyur te/ ma rigs pa legs par 'dzem par mi byed do// des tshor ba gang ci
307a5(dkon brtsegs): myong ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig par shes shing myong bar byed do// sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do// bdag med par shes shing myong
307a6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba
307a7(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin pa de yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar na gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o// gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug
307a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal nyid te/ gang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i de ltar tshor ba rnam
307b1(dkon brtsegs): la tshor bar rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / zhig pa dang zhu ba dang / gnas med par shes so// chos thams cad la
307b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa dang / 'jig par yang so sor rtog go// so sor rtog pa na chos la skye ba de dag gang nas 'ong / 'gag pa rnams gang du stsogs par 'gyur
307b3(dkon brtsegs): skom du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'jig par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro
307b4(dkon brtsegs): bar shes nas/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par sgrub bo// bsgrub nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi
307b5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba 'gag par byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' shig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba
307b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa thabs mkhas snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'o// gang tshor ba 'gag yang rab tu shes la cho
307b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'gag pa mngon gsum du yang mi byed do// tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa sa gnas pa tshor ba rnams dben
307b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par dben par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di la mi myong ba gang yang med do// 'di la ni tshor bar byed pa gang yang
308a1(dkon brtsegs): med do// chos 'di na dag thams cad ni stong pa te/ bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o// byed pa po dang / tshor ba po mi ldan pa'o//
308a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o// bdag med pa'o// de'i ba med pa'o// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// des yang dag par na rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos go
308a3(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs so// des mi dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar rkyen stod pa yin pa bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong pa'o snyam
308a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de stong pa nyid kyi don rig pas lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / don shes pa dang / chos rnams shes pa dang / ye shes rig pas tshor ba
308a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la sgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar
308a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu des la byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs
308a7(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rjes su lta bi 'dran pa nye bar gzhags pas gnas pa/ byang chub kyi sems nye bar
308a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa shin du nye bar bzhag te/ sems dran pa'i ye shes kyis sems kun tu tshol lo// de sems kun tu tshol ba na/ sems de nang na yang dag par
308b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi rol na yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi dang nang na yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phung po rnams la sems yang
308b2(dkon brtsegs): sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / khams rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / skye mched rnams la yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
308b3(dkon brtsegs): des sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ sems ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun tu tshol zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ dmigs pa yongs
308b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la sems de yang gzhan nam/ 'on te dmigs
308b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin te/ gal te dmigs pa gzhan la/ sems kyang gzhan ni/ sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro// 'on te dmigs pa gang
308b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa nyid sems ma yin na ni/ sems kyis sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te/ sems kyis sems de mthong bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta te
308b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ ral gyi so de nyid kyis ral gyi so do nyid gcod par mi nus pa dang / sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor me'i rtse mo de nyid la rag par mi nus pa
308b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas/ de ltar tshul bzhin bar tu sbyor ba la gang sems mi gnas pa chad
309a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin te/ rtag pa ma yin te/ ther zug du mi gnas ga rgyu med pa yin pa/ rkyen dang mi 'gal ba de ni las kyang ma yin//
309a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan las kyang ma yin no// de nyid kyang ma yin/ gzhan yang ma yin/ sems kyi rgyud sems kyi khri shing / sems kyi chos nyid/ sems kyi mi gnas
309a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / sems kyi snang ba med pa dang / sems kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ji ltar de de bzhin nyid dang / 'khrug par mi byed pa
309a4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shes so// de ltar mthong ngo // de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du sems de dag dben pa nyid rab tu shes pa de bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni rigs kyi
309a5(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems
309a6(dkon brtsegs): la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong / rnam par mi mthong / mi rtog go rnam par mi rtog go// g.yo ba med/ rlom sems med/ spros pa med pa 'di yang byad
309a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med pa de
309a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o// ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i
309b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngos pa'i yang gzugs med pa'i/ ji ltar byang chub kyi sems yongasu/
309b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de yang gzugs med de/ de'i phyir sems ji ltar spyod pa yang de bzhin no// spyod pa ji ltar bar byang chub
309b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin no// byang chub ji lta bar yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad
309b4(dkon brtsegs): de/ gang 'di ltar sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o//
309b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang mgyogs pa dang / rab tu mgyogs pa mi gnas par rgyu ga/ spre'u dang rlung 'dra ba/ 'bab chu'i rgyun dang / 'bru mar me dang 'dra ba/
309b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyang ring por 'gro ga lus med pa yul la brkam pa skye mched drug la spyod yul pa/ gzhan dang gzhon gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems gnas pa rtse gcig
309b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'phro ga zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa/ g.yeng po med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o// de la dran pa nye bar gzhags pa yongasu rdzogs pa gang
309b8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang / sems la chos kyi dbyingasu gnas par shes pa dang / sems la sems kyi gnas par shes
310a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang / sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang / sems can la mngon gsu
310a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi shes rab tu shes pa dang / sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang / sems la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / sems la de kho nar shes pa dang / sems
310a3(dkon brtsegs): la g.yo ba med cing bzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de sems
310a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi rang bzhin de yongasu shes nas/ de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi sems kyi ngo bo
310a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi ngo bo nyid shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston te/
310a6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi mtsha
310a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid de shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// ji ltar rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu shes so//
310a8(dkon brtsegs): sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag
310b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'du ba yang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis
310b2(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid rab tu shes shing sems
310b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de/ rnam par mi 'gyur ro// sems gnas pas chos kyi dbyings gnas pa rjes su dran kyang / sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g.yo te/
310b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
310b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams
310b6(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems ste/ chos kho na skye ba rnams skye/ chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste/ 'di
310b7(dkon brtsegs): la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skyes pa 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skye bu 'am/ gang zag gom/ shed las skyes pa 'am/ shed bu 'am/ gang skye ba 'am/
310b8(dkon brtsegs): rga ba 'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ 'pho ba 'am/ skyes par 'gyur ba gang yang med do// 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// gal te bsgrubs na ni 'grub/ ma bsgrubs na ni mi
311a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'grub ste/ dge ba yang rung mi dge ba yang rung / mi g.yo ba yang rung / ji lta bur bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi/ chos rnams la sgrub/
311a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa yang med la/ chos rnams la rgyu ba med par yang gag kyang mi bya'o snyam du nye bar bstags na/ 'di ltar chos dran pa'i ye shes kyi ste gang bsod nam
311a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsum mo// de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o//
311a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa mchog dam pa/ rab khyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i rgyur 'gyur/ bcu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yongs
311a5(dkon brtsegs): su dag pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / rnam pa drug bcu shin du yongs su rdzogs pa dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyi gnon par bya ba
311a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las shin du 'das pa dang / ngag yongs su dge bas nga bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad chis par byed pa/ rnam pa drug bcu shin du yong
311a7(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa dang / sems yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing / rtag tu rgyun mi mchad par ting nge 'dzin mi 'khrug pa dang / so so yang
311a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par rig pa yongs su dag pas don dang chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa mi zad pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas sems can thams
311b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la rab tu dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po yongasu dag pas bskal pa dpag tu med par 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang
311b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yong su rdzogs par bar du
311b3(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos ma yin pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
311b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang / dus gsum la mi chags pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tham cad yongs su rdzogs pas rang byung gi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa te/ sangs
311b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dam pa zang po mchog rab bye brag tu 'phags pa bcu po de dag gi rgyur 'gyur ro// des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas bsod nams kyi tshogs
311b6(dkon brtsegs): stsogs pa la chog mi shes par 'gyur ro// de bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar bdag la mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams ca
311b7(dkon brtsegs): du bag chag su yang mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas brtson par byed do// de migayo ba'i 'du byed rnams rab tu shes nas/ mi g.yo ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed
311b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang ting nge 'dzin de la snying por yang mi 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bstsags pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya/
312a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i kham su skye'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chos rnams
312a2(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi rjesu lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas shing byang chub tu sgrub pa'i ches gang yin pa de dag sgrom la/ byang chub kyi mi 'thun pa'i phyogs
312a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du byed pas rtag par yang mi ltung mi dge ba'i chos spong yang chad par yang mi ltung te/ gang
312a4(dkon brtsegs): la chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa de nin byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa dang chad pa yongasu spangs pa'i lam mo// de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gang tshul bzhin ma yi
312a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yid la byed pa dang / ma rig pa gnyi ga yang mtha' te/ gang de gnyis kyi dbus ma de ni brtags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di chos rnams kyi
312a6(dkon brtsegs): dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du ma rig pa dang 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed med pa rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / ming dang
312a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs med pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug med pa dang / reg pa dang / reg pa med pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba med pa dang /
312a8(dkon brtsegs): sred pa dang / sred pa med pa dang / len pa dang / len pa med pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa med pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / rga shi dang / rga shi med pa dang
312b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang sgra sdug 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de nyig mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma'i lam de ni
312b2(dkon brtsegs): btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam de ni 'di 'dra ba
312b3(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'o zhes stan tu mu rung te/ dbu ma'i lam ni btags pa med pa/ gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ bzung ba med pa/ kun bzhi
312b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta te dper na/ mda' gang nas 'phangs pa dang / gang du phogs pa gnyi ga yang mtha' te/ gang
312b5(dkon brtsegs): phigs pa dang / phogs pa de'i dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ blta ba 'am reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu
312b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa gang gis rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / gang dus so sor rnam par rig pa gnas pa de gnyi ga yang mtha'/ gang de gnyi kyi dgu ma bstan par mi nus
312b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu brda' tsam du dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjed du med de/ de la ni nyung ngu yang med/ mang po yang med//
312b8(dkon brtsegs): gang la nyung ngu yang med mang po yang med pa de ni/ dbu ma'i lam mo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba de gzhi ga yang mtha'
312b9(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// srog dang gang zag ces bya ba de dag gzhi ga yang mtha' ste/ srog dang gang zag
313a1(dkon brtsegs): gi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i de gnyi ga yang ma thag te/ mtshan ma
313a2(dkon brtsegs): med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ rtog pa dang 'jig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i la mo//
313a3(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' te/ brjod du med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// tshul rol dang pha rol ces bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha'
313a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs 'gag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas shes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' te/ spyod pa med pa de ni dbu ma'i la mo//
313a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' te/ rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos rnams la ches/
313a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhags pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dran pa la gnas te/ de chos
313a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad chos kyi dbyingasu 'du bar rab tu shes// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid sems can gyi khams so// de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas
313a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams dbyer med pa khong du chud do// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / sems can gyi khams gang yin pa de nyid yang na mkha'i dbyings
313b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs par rab tu shes so// des chos thams cad dbyings gcig tu shes nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing gnas kyang chos la rnam par chags shing
313b2(dkon brtsegs): lta bar mi 'gyuraro// de nam mi mthong ba de ni chos rnams la tha dad du mi byed do// des chos rnams mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ lha'i mig gis
313b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i mig mtshan mar 'du shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir sha'i mig gis mthong
313b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no// de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par blta ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir de lta'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de'i mig spros pa la spyod pa ma yin
313b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ de'i phyir de'i shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad ji lto ba bzhin du
313b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas chos gang la yang mi gnas so// des chos thams cad mi gnas par shes nas chos rjes su dran pa des smon lam mi gtong ba 'di ni/
313b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rjesu dran pa sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'o// gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rtog kyang thams cad mkhye
313b8(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran par de yang mi 'don pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su ldang ba'i
314a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi po de dag la gnas/ phyin ci log bzhi rab tu spong
314a2(dkon brtsegs): te bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pas mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // tshor ba rnam
314a3(dkon brtsegs): la tshor ba'i rjesu lta zhing gnas pas/ sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas
314a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // chos rnam la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i
314a5(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log rab tu spongs ngo // de phyin ci log med pas yang dag pa nyid sgrub po// yang dag par nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
314a6(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su drag pa de yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rab tu
314a7(dkon brtsegs): thob ste/ yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongasu dag par gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' de 'brad pa med cing lhan kyi grub pos dge ba'i chos la sbyor
314a8(dkon brtsegs): ba la sems 'jug gi/ mi dge ba la ni ma yin// de phyir zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i byor brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sdig pa
314a9(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
314b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom
314b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de sde gyi las yongasu dag pa'i rang gi ngang nyid kyis dge ba'i chos rnams mngon tu 'gyur te/ 'bad pa med cing
314b3(dkon brtsegs): lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams ni skye'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
314b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongasu dag pa de yang dag par spong ba bzhi po 'di dag sems kyi dbang sgyur bar 'gyur gyi brtson 'grus dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no// de
314b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems
314b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems las byung ba 'jug ste/ yang dag par la zhugs pa de ni yang dag par spong ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni spong ba mnyam pa
314b7(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi mi mnyam pa ma yin no// de'i sbyor ba mnyam pa yin gyi mi mnyam pa ma yin no// yang dag par spongs pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam
314b8(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor ba dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sgrub pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o// de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
315a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'jug
315a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang / ldan pa'i
315a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// de la byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dun
315a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang bar 'gyuraro// mi dge ba'i chos spros pas brtson 'grus yang bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po rab tu thob par sems yang bar 'gyuraro// thabs mkhas pa ra
315a5(dkon brtsegs): tu thob pas dpyod pa yang bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gis byang chub kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrubs
315a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ dbang bzhi rab tu 'thob te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe la dbang ba 'thob po// che la dbang ba des 'dod na ye she sems can che thung ngu rnams kyi nang du
315a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe ring po yongasu 'dzin cing sems can de dag yongasu smin par byed pa dang / sems can tshe ring po chos bstan na yongasu skyo ba rnams la chos bstan pas yongasu tshim
315a8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir/ tshe thung ngu yongasu 'dzin pa dang / lha 'am mi gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du che'i tshad la dbang sgyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
315a9(dkon brtsegs): dbang po thob pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la dbang thob te/ lus la dbang ba des yid kyi lus rab tu thob nas/ lus ci 'dra ba dang /
315b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ci 'dra ba dang / kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam ci 'dra bas sems can rnams yongasu smin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dul bar 'gyur
315b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de lus dang gzugs dang / kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam kun tu ston te/ de 'dod na sems can tham
315b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi lus dang gzugs dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / spyod lam mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dbang gnyis pa 'di thob po// /
315b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dbang chos la dbang 'thob te/ chos la dbang ba des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton par 'gyur gyi 'jig rten
315b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos rton par mi 'gyur ba dang / de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton pa kyang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du yang snang ba la 'jig rten las
315b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i ye shes kyang mi g.yo ba dang / gang 'di shes rab dang ye shes chags pa med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid
315b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos rnams par bsgrubs pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par byed cing gang gis sems can chad med pa rnams bsal ba dang / mos pa ji
315b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du 'dul bar 'gyur ba de'i dra ba'i chos kyi gtam byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dbang gsum po 'di 'thob po//
316a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang thob ste/ byin gyi rlabs la dbang ba des/ gang stong gsum gyi stong
316a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad rgya mtsho gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang 'dres pa yang med la spyod pa de yang kun tu ston
316a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab de dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
316a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams phan tshun 'phos par yang mi shes la/ sprod pa de yang kun tu ston pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong
316a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ji ltar rin po che'i sa bzhi 'am/ tsan dan gyi sa bzhi 'am/ spos kyi bzhi sa 'am/ me tog gi sa bzhi 'am/ nam khar/
316a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa 'am/ nus yongasu gang ba 'am/ mis yongasu gang ba 'am/ rin po che thams cad kyi yongasu gang bar gyur cig ces de/ ltar byin gyis brlabs na yang / de 'dra bar gnas
316a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de bzhin du byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis gang ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de'i de de ltar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems bskyed ma thag tu byin gyis brlab thams
316a8(dkon brtsegs): cad de bzhin du kun tu gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dbang bzhi pa 'di thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi/
316b1(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ phyogro bsuM'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / spyan gcig tu gnas shing 'dug te gtam zer ro// de bzhin du tshangs pa thams cad dang /
316b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen
316b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dang / lhan gcig tu gnas shing 'dug ste gtam zer ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag
316b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongasu sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir/ de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta te/ lus yang bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma dang / sbyin gnas rnams la ldang
316b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ri gro byed pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyarare zhing 'thun par byed pa dang / ngag yang bar bya ba'i phyir bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin te/
316b6(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / sems yang bar bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med pa dang / bla ma la rim gro byed cing gus pa dang / 'dud
316b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / sems la su rung ba dang / sems la yongasu gdungs pa med pa dang / spong ba rnams dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / bden pa'i rtul
316b8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs rdzogs par byed pa dang / mi stong par brtson pa dang / dgos pa grub par byed pa dang / sgom las mi byed pa dang / sems mi zhum pa dang / 'dod chags rnam par
317a1(dkon brtsegs): sel ba dang / zhe sdang nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa sel ba dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / 'phrag dog dang / ser sna dang bral ba dang / bsam pa
317a2(dkon brtsegs): dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba dang / gzhan gyi dgos pa sgrub cing khur khyer ba dang / nyam chung ba rnams kyi khur sgrol ba dang / 'dum rdzab la steg 'dod pa dang / klung la zas pas
317a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrol ba dang / nu bo la gru sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dga' ba'i tshig thos par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi zhes pa mi gleng ba dang // zhes
317a4(dkon brtsegs): be byung ba rnams gso bar byed pa dang / 'gyod pa rnam sel ba dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams rnam par sel ba dang / khams gang gis 'byung ba khong du chud pa dang / phangs pa'i
317a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po yongs gtong ba dang / byin nas kyang 'gyod pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir/ byang chub tu sngo ba dang / dad pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / gzhan dag dge
317a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang / bde ba gzhan la stobs pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa
317a7(dkon brtsegs): la phrag dog med pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'byung ba la mos par byed pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / mdza'
317a8(dkon brtsegs): ba brtan pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang / rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung sbyin pa dang / ngal ba rnams yang dag par
317b1(dkon brtsegs): spro bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / bslab pa rnams la ston pa tsam du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / ma bslabs pa rnams la mi brnyes pa dang /
317b2(dkon brtsegs): dbul po rnams la longs spyod 'gyed pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi g.yog byed pa dang / sman sbyin pa dang / byams pa rnams la mi smon pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byed
317b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying stang byed pa dang / snying stang mi byed pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos las shin tu 'da' ba dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang / 'jig rten
317b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos dang / yon tan thams cad sgrub pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi sngon du 'gro ba dang / dran pa mi nyams pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub
317b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongasu sbyang ba'o// de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams pa yongasu sbyangs na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du nyams par mi 'gyur/ yongasu nyams
317b6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdza 'phral gyi rkang pa'i byed pa yongs dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i spod pa
317b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'bogs pa dad pa'i dbang po dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa
317b8(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i dbang po dang / snying rje chen po mi gtong ba ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / chos thams cad yong su 'dzin par brtson pa shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi
318a1(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// sangs kyi chos yang dag par
318a2(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin thams
318a3(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon par bsgrub pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad par yongasu bsngos pa ni ye shes kyi dbang po'o// rig kyi bu gzhan
318a4(dkon brtsegs): yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang / bsam pa mi phyed par 'gyur ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'gro ba ni brgya
318a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi dbang po'o// yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// sem
318a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu shes pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rig+sas kyi bu gzhan yang sems can thams cad chags pa las shin du 'da' bar byed pa ni byang
318a7(dkon brtsegs): nub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// sems can thams cad chags pa las shin tu thar par byed pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// gang la yang mi chags pa ni
318a8(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i dbang po'o// sems can thams cad kyi chag pa mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// gang chags pa dang mi mgra pa thams cad du shes pa
318b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang rnyog pa med par 'gyur ba 'di ni dad pa'i dbang po'o// sems rnyog pa can dang bar byed pa gang yin pa
318b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid dran pa mi 'dor pa 'di ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// gang rlog pa med par ting nge 'dzin dang / sboms pa
318b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos thob pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa rnams rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid la rab
318b4(dkon brtsegs): tu dgod pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// dge ba'i
318b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgrubs pa dang / ma bsgrubs pa rnams mi brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang
318b6(dkon brtsegs): po'o// gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang / bde ba mi 'dod cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang
318b7(dkon brtsegs): po'o// gang dge ba'i dang mi dge ba'i chog rnams mnyam pa nyid du so so rang gis shes pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
318b8(dkon brtsegs): pas ni 'dor ro// brtson 'grus kyis ni yang dag par bsgrub bo// dran pas ni chud mi gson to// ting nge 'dzin gyis ni srung ngo // shes rab kyis ni rnam par 'byed// rigs
319a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dad pas ni bdag tu 'dzin pa rab tu 'dzin pa rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyis ni bdag gir 'dzin pa 'dar ro//
319a2(dkon brtsegs): dran pas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las shin du 'da'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis ni lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis 'dor ro// shes rab kyis ni bag chags kyi mtshams
319a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu spong ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i stob
319a4(dkon brtsegs): kye spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ gang dbang po de dag gis nye bar brtan nas bdud thams cad kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi/
319a5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gnyis kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ba dang / sngon
319a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dam bcas pa la brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sems kyis shin tu brtan par 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams bde bar 'gyur
319a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dgra rnams kyis mi zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi bskyod par 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
319a8(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i stobs kyis ni bya ba ma yin pa me byed do// brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bya ba byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byas pa'i lam chud mi gzon to//
319b1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang reg pa rnams kyis rma mi phyin to// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni 'gyed pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams
319b2(dkon brtsegs): cad las shin tu 'da'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dang pa'i stobs kyis ni yang gzhan la dad pas mi 'gro'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis
319b3(dkon brtsegs): ni bar ma dor zhum par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni gzungs dang spobs pa rab tu 'thob po// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni mtshungs par chos ston to// shes
319b4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi stobs kyis ni sems can gyi the tshom thams cad gcad do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni mos pa'i stobs yod
319b5(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i stobs yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
319b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba'i stobs yongasu rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin gyis stobs kyis ni sems dang bsam pa'i sor bas yongasu rdzogs par byed do// shes rab kyi stobs
319b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa chem par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyis ni ser sna'i dris rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi
319b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni bdag gi bdogs pa thams cad yongasu gtong ngo // dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yong su snga'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni mnyam pa'i sems
320a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dor ro// shes rab kyi stobs pas kyis ni rnam par smin pa la reg pa med do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i
320a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bslabs pa las mi 'da'o// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu
320a3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu sde'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / cang shes kyi sa la 'gro'o// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshul khrims
320a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spong ngo // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyis ni gnod sems kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bzod pa sgom
320a5(dkon brtsegs): mo// dran pa'i stobs kyi ni byang chub tu yongasu sde'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi ni sems can thams cad yongasu srung ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol stobs kyis ni
320a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang / sems can dang bzod pa la rnam par mi rtog go/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dang po'i stobs kyis ni le lo'i dri ma rab tu spong
320a7(dkon brtsegs): ngod/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongasu sde'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi
320a8(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa sgrub po// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni mi phyed rnam par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
320b1(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i stongs kyis ni rnam par g.yeng ba'i dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par sgrub po// dran pa'i
320b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni rtse gcig tu yongasu sngo'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo'o// shes rab kyi stobs kyi ni bsam gtan de la chags par ba
320b3(dkon brtsegs): tu spong ngo // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni
320b4(dkon brtsegs): thos pa yongasu tshol lo// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems nges par sems pa rab tu 'thob po// shes
320b5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi stobs kyis ni nan gyis yang dag par sgrub po// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni nor bdun rab 'thob po// brtson 'grus
320b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs kyi stobs kyis ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob po// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rjes su dran pa drug rab tu thob po// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni
320b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams par shes pa gnas pa bdun las shin tu 'da'o// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni log pa nyid du nges pa brgyad las shin tu 'da'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
320b8(dkon brtsegs): gang mi phyed cing sems dang bsam pa rnyog pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang gi phyir mi ldog cing blang ba
321a1(dkon brtsegs): med la dor ba med pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang dran pa sngon du 'gro la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa'i 'di ni//
321a2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs dag po'o// gang sems rab tu dul bas rang bzhin gyis ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi
321a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// gang lta ba thams cad sel ba la mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dad par
321a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid ni brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//
321a5(dkon brtsegs): mi brjed pa'i mtshan nyid ni dran pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag
321a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// so so rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// /
321a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yong su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnam
321a8(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba ni bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lags dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson
321b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus yang dag par byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu spangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang
321b2(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
321b3(dkon brtsegs): chos bsngags shing / bsngag pa rnams chud mi gson pa yin te/ 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag pa byang chub
321b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag ni/ gang lhag mthong gi tshogs dang zung du 'brel bar gyur pa yin te/ 'di ni chos rnam par dbyed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// brtson 'grus
321b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ gang spong ba khyad par du 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// dga' ba yang dag byang
321b6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag ni/ gang mi dga' ba sel bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
321b7(dkon brtsegs): ni gang lus dang sems shin du byung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni shin du spangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi
321b8(dkon brtsegs): yan lag ni/ gang rnam par grol ba'i snying por 'gyur ba yin no// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub
322a1(dkon brtsegs): kye yan lag ni gang byed pa byas par 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// rigs kyi bu gzhan
322a2(dkon brtsegs): / yang gang byang chub kyi bsam pa mi brjed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la brtson pa 'di ni
322a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ gang sems can yongasu smin par byed pas mi skyo ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi
322a4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag go/ gang dam pa'i chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas gnas pa 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang shin tu sbyangs pa la sems can
322a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'god pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang ting nge 'dzin la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub
322a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag go// gang mngon sum du shes pa btang snyoms pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// rigs
322a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis dran pa med cing / yid la mi byed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi spyan gi
322a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// gang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba'i ye sheg la ma mkhas pa 'di ni chos rnam par dbye ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
322b1(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rtul ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag
322b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gang rjesu chags pa dang / khong khro ba yongasu spong ba 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang bya ba byas pa byed
322b3(dkon brtsegs): pa byas pa/ 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// gang 'jig rten thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes su
322b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug kyang gcig tu snyoms par zhugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang gnyis su med
322b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la rab tu gnas te/ rtog pa dang sel ba med cing btang snyoms par yang kun tu snang la sems can la yang lta ba 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub
322b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad khong du chud par byed pa dang / rjes su rtogs par byed pa/
322b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab tu shes par byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / nye bar rtog pa khong du chud cing sems can gyi spyod pa mtho bo dang dma' ba thams cad rtogs pa ste/ des
322b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang ngan song du 'gyur ba'i lam sgom pa dang / dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba 'di dag ni rig kyi bu
323a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin gyi/ 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams
323a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi ni ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni bdud sdig can rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no//
323a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni bdud sdig can rnams kyi rgyu spyod yul mo yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni
323a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal can thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phag
323a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni
323a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tshor ba yongasu 'dzin pa
323a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no//
323a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phagra pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mthong ba dang thos pa dang bye brag byed pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i chos rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa
323b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tha na mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa rnams kyi spyod yul yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi spyod sum
323b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad la rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongasu rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa ni/ 'phags pa rnam
323b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad kun nas mi ldang ba'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags
323b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad dang rtsod pa med pa spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad dang mtshan ma med pa'i spyod
323b5(dkon brtsegs): yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul yongasu dag pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang
323b6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag gi spyod yul yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub kyi sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa
323b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / yang dag pa rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dge dag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /
323b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes smos pa de la/ yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad mnya
324a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ste/ de bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / stong pa nyid
324a2(dkon brtsegs): / du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can tu lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta
324a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so// de chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chad par
324a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so// de 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid
324a5(dkon brtsegs): du lta ba de ni mtshungaso// de ni 'jig chos la lta ba dang / ngar 'dzin par lta ba dang / nga'ir 'dzin par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do//
324a6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / ngar 'dzin par lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so// de sangs rgyas su
324a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta
324a8(dkon brtsegs): kha dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so// rigs kyis bu de ltar na lta ba'i dmigasul ni ci tsam du na mya ngan las 'das pa
324b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i dmigs pa yang rung / de tsam du yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin no// gang tha ma dang rab dang / 'bring gi lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba ni yang
324b2(dkon brtsegs): dag kha'i lta ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mnyam par lta'i mi mnyam par ma yin no// ji lta nas mnyam par lha'i mi mnyam par ma yin
324b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ so sor skye bo'i chos rnams ni dma' ba/ slob pa rnams kyis chos rnams ni dam pa'o snyam du/ gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o// so so'i
324b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa/ mi slob pa'i chos rnams ni zag pa med pa'o snyam du/ gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o// so sa'i
324b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos rnams ni zang zing dang bcas pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zang zing med pa'o snyam du/ gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o// so so'i
324b6(dkon brtsegs): skye blo'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o snyam du/ gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta
324b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni 'dus byas yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni 'dus ma byas yin no snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta
324b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// nam so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad slob pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du mthong ste/ de lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes
325a1(dkon brtsegs): na/ sa sa'i skye ba'i ches snang ba nyid dang / mi slob pa'i chos ston pa nyid du mtshungs par mthang ste/ des nus pa ni yang dag pa/
325a2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi rkyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa mtshungs par mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhi bya'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos
325a3(dkon brtsegs): dben pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste/ de lta ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos yongasu
325a4(dkon brtsegs): grub pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu grub pa med pa mnyam pa nyid mtshungs par mthong te/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o//
325a5(dkon brtsegs): gang mtshungs par mthong ba de ni phyir yang gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ gang gnyi su med par mthong ba de yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de yang
325a6(dkon brtsegs): tha dad du mi byed de/ tha dad pa med pa mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de tha ma dang 'bring dang rab kyi chos la rnam par rtog chos
325a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par rtogs pa med par mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de ni mthong ba ci yang med pa'o// mthong ba ci yang
325a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de ni chos gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad snang ba med par mthong ba de ni yang
325b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa mthong ba'o// rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag de ltar mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// ji ltar ba bzhin du thong ba dang mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba 'di ni legs par
325b2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba bstan pa 'di bshang pa/ dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
325b3(dkon brtsegs): par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po zhig ni mnyam pa nyid kyis chos nyid la bzod pa skyes so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa
325b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ rtog pa gang rtogs pa spong bar 'gyur ro// de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas kyi yongs su bsdus pa lhag mthong la mkhas pa te/ de chos gang zhig chos
325b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dang ldan snyam du de chos de dag la rnam par lta ba'o// rnam par rtog go// des chos thams cad phan tshun mi ldan pa dang / rab tu ldan pa ma yin pa dang / ma 'dres par rab
325b6(dkon brtsegs): tu shes te des de ltar shes nas mnyam par yang mi rtog na/ gang mi mnyam par rtog par 'gyur ba la ci smos te/ de nas ma yin no// de chosu rtog pa dang / yong su rtog
325b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs ste/ phyir yang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub
325b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i yang dag gang zhe na/ tshig gang gis bdag la yang mi gdung la/ gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang / bdag kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed la/ gzhan
326a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang mi gnod la/ gzhan la yang ma yin te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i dag ces bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ni ngag gis thams cad
326a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du nges par rtog pa'o// de'i chos nges par rtog pa de yang chos nges pa'i tshig des 'byung ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag
326a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngag mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams la mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /
326a4(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba'o zhes dag mnyam pa dang / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// 'du byed thams cad
326a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba'o// chos thams cad bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes dag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ni bdag med pa dang / sems can
326a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / srog med pa dang / zlag med pa dang / bdag dang bral ba'o zhes dag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba te/ ngo bo nyid med pa
326a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes ngag mnyam pa dang / rgyu ji 'dra ba 'bras bu yang de dang 'dra'o zhes ngag mnyam pa'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya ba ni gang sems can gzhan
326a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / gang zag gzhan rnams yang dag pa'i chos la 'jud pa dang / byang chub kyang yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa yin te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i dag
326b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i ngag yong su dag pa gang zhe na/ ngag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yongasu zin pa 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
326b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i yang dag pa'i ngag yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/ las gang las zad
326b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gyi/ las mngon par 'du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / las gang zhen mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / las
326b4(dkon brtsegs): gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ nyon mongs pa skye ba'i phyir ma yin pa te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
326b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni gang chos 'di dag la 'di ltar rab tu shes shing / dge ba'i mngon par 'du bye ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed kyang de'i
326b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba dag kyang gso ba nyid du snang ba dang / gsog nyid dang / snying po med dang / stong pa nyid du snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa
326b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/
326b8(dkon brtsegs): ba gang bdag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur/ gzhan la yang gnod par mi 'gyur/ gzhi ga la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes
327a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gzhan yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni/ 'tsho ba gang nyon mongs pa thams cad mi rdzogs pa te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o// gang
327a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya ba ni/ gang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yongasu dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'tsho ba yongasu dag pa de la ha cang 'dud
327a3(dkon brtsegs): par yang mi byed/ mi 'dud par yang mi byed la/ 'tsho ba gang gis bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / chos kyi don yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu
327a4(dkon brtsegs): nub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/ gang dge zhing zab pa'i chos de dag yang dag
327a5(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dun pa dang / brtson pa dang / spro ba dang / mi zhum pa dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis mngon tu byed
327a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni gang mnyam par rtsol gyi/ mi mnyam par ma yin no// ji ltar na mnyam par
327a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsol gyi mi mnyam ma yin zhe na/ chos rnams mnyam par yang mi byed/ mi mnyam par mi byed la/ byed pa med cing rnam par mi 'byed pa'o// ches de dag gi chos zhing dang /
327a8(dkon brtsegs): chos gnas pa nyid ji ltar ba de bzhin du rtsol ba'o// chos de dag ni yang dag pa'i chos nyid de ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba'o// chos de dag gi mnyam pa zhing dang bye
327b1(dkon brtsegs): brag tu bya ba med pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol de yang sems can thams cad kyi log pa'i rtsol ba spang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen par yongasu sngo
327b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub
327b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dran pa pa dang / sbyin pa dran pa dang / tshul khrims dran pa dang / bzod pa dran pa dang / brtson 'grus dran pa dang / bsam btan dran pa dang / shes rab dran pa dang /
327b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dran pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag
327b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dran pa ni/ yang dag pa'i dran pa gang gis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi skabs mi 'dod pa dang / dran pa gang gis bdud kyi las thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed/
327b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dran pa gang gis lam gol ba dang / lam ngan par mi ltung ba dang / dran bsgo ba lta bur gyur pa gang gis sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos mi dge
327b7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag nga'i dran po ni/ dran pa gang gis
327b8(dkon brtsegs): dran pa phun sum chog pa dang / skyon med pa'i rig thob kyang 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran
328a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang 'phagra pa rnam par gyur pa'i ting 'dzin te/ sdug
328a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi bden pa yongasu shes pa dang / 'thun pa kun 'byung ba'i bden pa spang ba dang / thun pa/ 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon du bya ba dang 'thun pa/ lam gyi bden
328a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa dang 'thun pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// bdag mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / bdag rnam par dag
328a4(dkon brtsegs): pas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / bdag stong pa nyid pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du yang dag par snyoms par 'jug la/ gang de ltar snyoms pa/
328a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug cing / yang dag pa nyid la 'jug kyang nges par yang mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
328a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis thams cad mkhyen pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzog par
328a7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//
328a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi spyod pa yongasasu dag 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang mi srog chags nyan thos kyi theg pa can nges par gyur pa zhugs pa khri drug stong bla na med pa yang
328b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gadrug na rin po che la
328b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i
328b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag par rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas
328b4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba thob pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no// spyog bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par lta bas mun pa mun nag dang bral ba de ni de'i lha'i mis
328b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la yang dag par lta bas shin du nges par brtag pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no// phyogs brtsi/
328b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs snang ba dang / kha dog dang mtshan dang dbyings la yang dag par lta bas shin du brgyan pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no// rang gi gzi brjid grub pas
328b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid du lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs thams cad kyi spyi bar phyin pa de ni
328b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i lha'i rig yin te/ rigs kyi bu rnams pa 'di sde ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// de'i lha'i rna ba
329a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag parna par lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ gang gis mi'i sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang /
329a2(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa'i sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / dud 'gre'i skyes nas dang / gshin rje 'jig rten pa'i sgra rnams thos par
329a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad thos par 'gyur ba dang / phyogro bcu'i skad dang sgra thams cad thos par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni
329a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i rna ba'i mngon pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// de la pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam
329a5(dkon brtsegs): ba lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ gang gi lha dang mi dang / sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje pa 'jig rten pa'i sems
329a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mthar sems skyes pa gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar sems skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes
329a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus ni sems skye ba gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang dmigs par ldan pa dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / log pa nyid
329a8(dkon brtsegs): du nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa dang / 'dod chag la spyod pa rnams dang / bzhe sdang la spyod pa rnams dang /
329b1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug la spyod pa rnams dang / cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rab tu shes te shes nas kyang de kho na bzhin du de dang 'thun par
329b2(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'i/ de sngon gyi
329b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam par lnga gang zhe na/ sems gang 'dod chags kyi rgyu las
329b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rnams dang // zhe sdang gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / gti mug gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / de dag gis ci 'dra ba yongasu bzung ba de dag kyang rjesu dran pa dang /
329b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang sbyin pa'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / tinge 'dzin gyi rgyu las byung
329b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams dang / de dag gis lus ci 'dra ba yongasu bzung ba de dag kyang rjesu dran pa dang / sems gang rgyu dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / rkyen dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang /
329b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / de dag gis lus ci 'dra ba yongasu bzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang / sems gang+gA lung du ma snyan pa rnams dang /
329b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa dang / gti mug gis yang dag par bsdus pa rnams dang / de dag gis lus ci 'dra ba yongasu bzung ba de dag kyang rje su dran pa dang / de dag gi tshe dang / kha
330a1(dkon brtsegs): @dog dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjid dang / gdog dang / stongs dang / grags pa dang / brjod pa dang / dbang phyug ji 'dra bar gyur pa/ de yang rjesu dran
330a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnams pa lnga'o// de rdzu 'phrul bgyi mngon par shes
330a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang gzugs kun tu ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / tshig dang skad rnam
330a4(dkon brtsegs): par rig par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems dang / yid dang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems can thams cad kyi skad du rnam par rig par byed
330a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon du mngon par 'ad mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/ rdzu 'phral bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa 'di lnga dang ldan
330a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
330a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi mig gis brtags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gis mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa rab tu
330a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'o// rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa rab tu gnas pa ni
330b1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu gcod par rab tu gnas pa ni sngon
