330b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// mngon par 'du mi byed par rab tu gnas pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mngon par shes
330b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu de la byang
330b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni mngon par shes pa lnga po 'di dag gis rnam par brtsen cig zag pa zad pa'i ye shes la'ang gnas so// rig kyi bu 'di lta te dper na//
330b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba 'gro dgos pa na grong khyer chen po zhig yod de/ grong khyer chen po de'i lam ni bgrod par dka' zhing ring la nyams nga ste/
330b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa dang bcas pa zas dang sgo dang / bza' ba yang med pa zhig na gang grong khyer chen po der phyin pa de'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur
330b7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig yod pa dang / de nas skyes bu la la zhig gi gro khyor chen po de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan dang / bsngag bsngas pa thos nas/ skyes bu de la mthong na dag
330b8(dkon brtsegs): ba sdug pa yid du 'ong ba mi mthun pa ma yin pa'i bu gcig kyang yod pa las/ des bu gcig po de bor nas/ grong khyer chen po de'i lam du zhugs te/ de stong/
331a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi shug+sa dang / brtson 'grus thams cad kyis sdug bsngal thams cad khyad du bsad de/ lam ring po de 'das nas/ rkang pa yang cig ni grong
331a2(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po de'i sgo'i them pa la bzhag/ rkang pa ya cig phyi rol na 'dug pa las/ de'i bu cig pa de yid la dran par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems ste/ ma la kye
331a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'o bdag gi bu gcig pa de'i 'dir khrid de ma 'ongs pa la zhig snyam nas bu gcig pa de sdug pas grong khyer chen po der ma zhugs kyi/ phyir phyogs nas de bu
331a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa de ga la 'dug par slar log pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'bad pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rlom
331a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i nan tan gyis mngon par shes pa lnga po rnams skyed de/ sems gyi bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa yongasu
331a6(dkon brtsegs): spang ba byas pa/ de la zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de snying rje chen po'i sems skyes nas/ sems can thams cad yongs bskyab pa'i phyir/
331a7(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa'i ye shes 'dis par byas pa las/ sems can rnams la lta bas phyir phyogs te/ sgor log nas so so skye bo'i sa na yang kun tu snang ngo //
331a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu grong khyer zhes bya ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba bgrod dgos pa zhes bya ba de ni
331b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yong su 'dzin te'i tshig bla dgas so// bar du gcod pa mang po bgrod ces bya ba de ni bdun pa zlog pa bar chad kyi tshig bla dgas so// skyes bu zhes
331b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas so// rkang pa ya thig ni grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la bzhag/ rkang pa ya cig ni sgo'i phyi rol du bzhag ces bya ba ni 'di ltar byang
331b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang 'dres pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'jug pa'o// bu cig pa dran nas grong khyen chen po der
331b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa las phyir phyogs te slar log ces bya ba ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu cig bzhin du byams pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur// /
331b5(dkon brtsegs): de zag pa zad pa'i spyir bor phyin kyang zag pa yang mi spong la sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir phyog shing ldog par yang 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems/
331b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams ji 'dra ba thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la cher snying rje ba la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
331b7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug na rin po nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar byang chub lag 'thil du thob
331b8(dkon brtsegs): par yang mi 'tshal bar 'khor ba nyid rje su 'jug cing sems can yongasu smin par bgyid pas yongasu mi skyo ba ni ngo mtshan to// bcom ldan 'das byang
332a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du zhig dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
332a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyi shu dang ldan na 'khor ba yongasu mi skyo ba yin te/ chos nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge
332a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par zin pa'i byams pa chen po dang / byams pa chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems
332a4(dkon brtsegs): can yongasu smin par byed pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed pas yang dag par zin pa'i brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par zin pa'i lhag
332a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zin pa'i thabs dang / thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab kyis yang dag par
332a6(dkon brtsegs): zin pa'i bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyis pa yang dag par zin pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / mngon par shes pas yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes dang /
332a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i zin pa'i rtul ba dang / rtul bas yang dag par zin pa'i dran pas dang / dran pas yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i
332a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dag par zin pa'i
332b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pas yang dag par zin pa'i thos pa'i nan tan dang / thos pa'i nan tan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i gzungs dang /
332b2(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyis yang dag par spobs pa dang / spobs pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsod nams kyi cho ga dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis lnga
332b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par zin pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba yin no//
332b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches yang 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sem
332b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba nas mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu bsod nams kyis
332b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa'i thos pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes pa yin no// thos pas brgyan pa'i spobs pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rig+sa
332b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang dran pa nyams pa med pa thob pa'i gzungs kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// lag na rin po che mi zad pa'i longs spyod kyis ni
332b8(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// chos ston pas yongasu mi
333a1(dkon brtsegs): skyo bas ni skye bo mang po nye bar mtsho 'gyur ro// rig kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi legs par ni 'khor ba na mdzes/
333a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis brgyan pa'i ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas ni 'khor
333a3(dkon brtsegs): ba na mdzeso// de bzhin du byed pa nyid kyis kyang skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong bas ni byang
333a4(dkon brtsegs): / chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzeso// so so dzaM rig par chos sbyin pa pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu
333a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba mdzes so// thos pa yongasu dag pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ji ltar bag yod
333a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rigs par bya'o// rig
333a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu sngon par byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa pas kyang mches grangs med pa yang ba med/ med pa bsam gyi mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i
333a8(dkon brtsegs): dus na bskal pa dga' bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
333b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa spu da
333b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir
333b3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa dga' bar 'gyur ba zhes bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bskal pa de la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu 'byung bar gyur to/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i
333b4(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha dag gis/ kye grogs po dag ring ni bskal pa bzang po yin te/ bskal pa 'di la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dga' ba'i
333b5(dkon brtsegs): sgra bsgrags pa dang / de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dga' ba'i sgra de thos// thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang mos pa chen po skyes te/ de
333b6(dkon brtsegs): nas lha dang mi de dag gis kyi ma'o bskal pa 'di ni dga' bar 'gyur ba'o zhes de skad smras pas/ de'i phyir bskal pa'i de'i ming dga' bar gyur pa zhes
333b7(dkon brtsegs): brtags so// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar thams thams cad kyis bltas kyang de ngoms par mi 'gyur ba tsam du nyams dga' bar gyur pas
333b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ltas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa de'i bzhi ni tsan dan sprul
334a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ kyi snying po ga stag ste/ steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis can dan sbrul gyi snying po de'i phye ma khal cig gi rin du yang mi bzod do// 'jig rten gyi
334a2(dkon brtsegs): kham+ba de nas spos kyi ngad ldangs pa'i dris ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa gang du khyab bo// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po lam gyur
334a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa chen po de las 'od zer gyi dra ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad ma chen po sha stag byung bar gyur te/ pad ma de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
334a4(dkon brtsegs): de rtag tu snang bar gyur to// mi dag kyang tsan dan gyi phye ma las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa pu shu dang / sgo gang dang / khyams dang / rta babs kyis legs
334a5(dkon brtsegs): par brgyan pa la longs spyod par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong sAl gnas pa med do// mi de dag thams cad
334a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang nam mkha' la 'gro'o// de dag mngon par shes pa rab tu thob nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil le na 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag gi nang du 'jug cing rnam
334a7(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de na mang la na gnas pa yang med do// mi de dag thams cad kyang rdzus te skyes pa sha stag go// de na bud med kyi ming yang
334a8(dkon brtsegs): ming grag go// ngan song rnams kyang med do// ngan 'gro rnams kyang med do// sdug bsngal yang med do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na kha zas rags pa yang med do//
334b1(dkon brtsegs): mi de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can no// mos pa brlabs po ches theg pa la zhugs pa te/ de na theg pa
334b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi ming yang med do// gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mi de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi cod pan thog pa dpung rgyan dang rna mas brgyan pa/ lha'i kha dog dang /
334b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa sha stag go// gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur pa de nyid de dag gi rab tu byung ba yin te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
334b4(dkon brtsegs): pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gos dur smig tu bka' stsal pa yang med de/ 'di ltar sems la rnyog pa med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de
334b5(dkon brtsegs): yang tshangs pa'i kha dog lta bu spyod lam rab tu zhi bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston to// rigs kyi bu gang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'
334b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la chos ston to// rigs kyi bu gang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten tham
334b7(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon par dga' ba de la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bsdus pa der lhags te/
334b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'dong ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
335a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston pa de na ta la brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon
335a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags nas/ tshangs pa bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhags te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ji ltar nga bzhin du mang du spros te rnam
335a3(dkon brtsegs): par phye bas chos kyi brtan mi ston to// de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa de tshig dang yi ge nyung ngus chos kyi gtam mdor ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa
335a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni zur tsam gyis go ba sha stag ste/ tshig gcig gis tshig brgyad stong gi rje su 'jug pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta te/ pha rol phyin pa'i spyod
335a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa dang / sems can yongasu
335a6(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa dang / spyod pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag nyid byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mda' las brtsam te
335a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa'
335a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mdas 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar 'khor na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar
335b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhes gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig de gnyis rgyas par rnam par skye phye ste bstan nas/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sem
335b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ye shes kyi blo thogs pa med pa ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa ni skye ba mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
335b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de brtan pa de lta bu bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug cu chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i
335b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa rab tu thob po// rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sem
335b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mda' des yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par bgyid
335b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
335b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dkon mchog mda' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o// de la
335b8(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa gang zhe na/ ji tsam du chos rnams sgrub pa'o// chos rnams sgrub pa yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa 'di ni bag yod pa
336a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba tshad med pa mthar gtugs pas go cha rtsom pa
336a2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa dang / sems can chad med pa sdud pas sbyin pa ni zad pa tshad med pa dang / mi lhod cing sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul khrims kyi
336a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims tshad med pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang du len pas bzod pa tshad med pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i las kyis brtson 'grus tshad med pa dang / ting
336a4(dkon brtsegs): de 'dzin tshad med pa grub pa/ bsam btan tshad med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyis shes rab tshad med pa dang / sems can
336a5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pas byams pa tshad med pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po snying rje tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos tshad med pa yang dag par sgrub pas 'khor ba yong su 'dzin
336a6(dkon brtsegs): pa tshad med pa dang / bdag bde ba la mchog pas sems can yongasu smin par byed pa dang / brtson 'grus brtan pas dpa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa tshad med
336a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yang dag par sbyor bas yon tan yang dag par sgrub cing / stsogs pa tshad med pa dang / ye shes tshad med pas sangs rgyas la 'chod pa dang / rim gro byed pa tshad med
336a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / she rab sbyor bas thos pa yongasu tshol ba tshad med pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems la 'jug pa tshad med pa dang / byams pa nges par sbyangs pa'i
336b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la zhugs pa tshad med pa dang / sems 'dul bas dgon pa na gnas pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pa dang / myur tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i
336b2(dkon brtsegs): shes yongs su rdzog par 'gyur bas zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi tshigs med pa ste/ dkon mchog skar mda' chos 'di dag ni bag yod par sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
336b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi chos rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// bag yod pa ni ye shes bsgrubs 'i chos
336b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gnaso// bag yod pa ni dge ba'i chos bsug shing bstsags pa rnams so sor yang dag par 'dzin pa'o// bag yod pa ni sngon thos pa'i chos rnams chu de ma gson pa'o//
336b5(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa ni bsnga ba'i chos rnams sdud pa'o// bag yod pa ni sgrub pa'i chos rnams mi sdud pa'o// bag yod pa ni sgrib par mi 'gyur pa'i chos rnams rab tu 'dzin pa'o//
336b6(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa ni ma rigs pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa'o// bag yod pa ni dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa 'bar bar byed pa'o// bag yod pa ni dbang po rnams sdom par byed
336b7(dkon brtsegs): la'o// bag yod pa ni la mnyang ba las kun tu srung ba'o// bag yod pa ni dus dang dus ma yin par spyod pa las skul ba'o// bag yod pa ni spobs te stobs bcu yong su rdzog par
336b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyu ro// bag yod pa ni zil kyis mnon pa ste/ mi 'jig pa yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// bag yod pa ni yon tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i ye shes 'byung
337a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bag yod pa ni spyi bo phyin pa ste// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs par byed
337a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des 'di lta bu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis
337a3(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mdar gyur pa de bzhin zhig yin pa snyam du
337a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ de ltar mi lta lto'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mad
337a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar bag yod pa'i byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
337a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bya nub kyang yag yod pas yod pas thob par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can yong su
337a7(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa'i spyod yul pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi spyod pa tshad med pa mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin du byang chub sem
337a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i spyod ba yong su dag pa yang / mtha' yas bsams kyi mi khyab po// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams kyi
337b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa shes nas/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar sems can la la ni tshul khrims kyis yongasu smin par
337b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// lan la ni tshul khrims spangs pas/ sems can la la ni tshig gis shin tu gdams pas yongs su smin par 'gyur/ la la ni 'jam pos/ la la ni de gnyis/ la la ni
337b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs par byas pas/ la la ni 'jigs la las yongs su thar par byas pas/ la la ni bslangs pas/ la la ni ma bslangs pas/ la la ni gnod pas/ la la ni mi
337b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod pas/ la la ni zil gyis mnan pas/ la la ni zil gyis ma mnan pas/ la la ni zil gyis sbyang bas/ la la ni mi sbyang bas/ la la ni char bcad pas/ la la ni//
337b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa la phyir byin pas/ la la ni blangs pas/ sems can la la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni/
337b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba nye bar bsgrub
337b7(dkon brtsegs): bas yongs su smin par 'gyuraro// sems can la la ni sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos yid du mi 'ongs pa nye bar bsgrubs pas yongasu smin pa 'gyuraro// sem
337b8(dkon brtsegs): can la la ni spyi bos yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni rtag tu mthong bas/ la la ni mi mthong bas/ sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi sgras//
338a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can la la chos kyi sgras/ la la ni dge 'dun gyi sgras/ la la ni mi rtag pa'i sgras/ la la ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras/ la la ni bdag med pa'i sgras/
338a2(dkon brtsegs): la la ni zhi ba'i sgras/ sems can la la ni sbyin pa dang / rdul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi sgras yongs su smin par
338a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jigs rten gyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras yongs su smin
338a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// la la ni lha'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sbyin pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/ snyan
338a5(dkon brtsegs): par smra bas ma yin/ don spyod pas ma yin/ don 'thun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni snyan par smra bas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ni ma yin/
338a6(dkon brtsegs): don spyod pas ni ma yin/ don 'thun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni don spyod pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin/ snyen par smra bas ma yin/ don sbyong
338a7(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su smin par 'gyur bas ma yin/ sems can la la ni bsdu ba'i dngos po dag gis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni nang gis dang sa ma
338a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong bas/ la lani phyi rol gyi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/ la la ni phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/ sems can la la ni chung ma dang / bu mo dang /
338b1(dkon brtsegs): khu bo kun tu gtong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo kun tu gtong bas yong su smin par 'gyur ro//
338b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can lnga ni rtse mo dang / dga' ba dang / glu dang sil sman gyis yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// la la ni gcig tu sdug bsngal bas/ la la ni de gnyi gas/ la la ni
338b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyi ga ma yin pas/ sems can la la ni dge slong du sprul pas 'dul bas/ sems can la ni dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mar
338b4(dkon brtsegs): sprul pas 'dul ba/ sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog gis 'dul ba yin te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog gis 'dul ba
338b5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku brtan pas 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can
338b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod pa sna tshogs pa shes nas sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs byed pa shes nas sems can gyi bsam pa yongasu shes pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byung
338b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'di ltar pha rol du du phyin pa'i spyod pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur cing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi spyod pa yongs dag par bsdus par 'gyur te/
338b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa'i ye shes spyod pa la mkhas par gyur pa na/ de nas go dang sems can smin par byed nus pa'i skal pa dang mthu yod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
339a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin pa byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su mi rgyu
339a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par skul ba dang / bsam pa yongs su shes pa te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag
339a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams song
339a4(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bka' blo bde ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / ngeng tshul gyis 'jal ba dang / bzhin mdzum zhing khro gnyer med pa ste/ rigs
339a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos
339a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams
339a7(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / snying rjes chen po'i sems dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang / bre dge shin du dul ba'i
339a8(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
339b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dag pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu dang bral ba
339b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / legs par byas pa dang / nyes par bya ba bzod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems
339b3(dkon brtsegs): can nas yongs su smin par byed nuso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo bas sems can rnams
339b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs smin par byed nus par rig par byed/ rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus skal pa grangs med pa bsam gyi me khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskal pa dga'
339b5(dkon brtsegs): byed la/ 'jig rten gyi khams zhi bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
339b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba
339b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba de yang 'byor pa sangs rgyas pa bde ga/ lo legs pa/ skams dga' ba/ lha dang mis rab tu gang
339b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par snang ba de'i nyan thos dang / nyan thos chen po
340a1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'dus par gyur te/ de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri
340a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi stong 'dus par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi
340a3(dkon brtsegs): stong thub par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i rgyal du gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog
340a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ bcas nas mo bcu drug mon pa dang / de gzugs bzang ba dang / longs spyod dang / skyid pas dregs shing nga rgyal skye te/ rgyags nas bcom
340a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i gan du mi 'gro ste/ sten par mi byed/ bsnyen par mi byed/ rim 'gro mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de nas btsa
340a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin
340a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa yod na/ de gzugs dang longs spyod dang / skyid pas rgyags
340a8(dkon brtsegs): dregs te nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'di 'ong na/ gal te rgyun mi chad par bskul ne ni de gshegs pa'i drung du 'ong ba yang srid skam mo// rig
340b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drin ma med par snang bas byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag bsdus so// bsdus nas kyang rigs kyi du
340b2(dkon brtsegs): dag khyed kyi nang nas yid yongs su mi skyo bar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim gyi sgor 'gro zhing bde ba thams cad na
340b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs/ sdug bsngal thams cad ni dang du blangs te/ de la tha na kun tu smra ba 'am/ yang dag par smra ba 'am/ stan tsam yang mi rnyed kyi steng du gshe rgya zhing tshig
340b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa rtsub mo mi snyan par zer yang spro par gyur pa su yod ces tshul shing brims so// rigs bu de ltar tshul shing brims kyang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
340b5(dkon brtsegs): khri bzhi stong po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' tsam yang spro bar ma gyur to// bcom ldan 'das des tshul shing thogs te lan gnyis lan gsum du brim
340b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang sus ma blangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid
340b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'dul bar gyur nas 'dug par gyur pa de bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la bcugs te/ bcom ldan
340b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das dri ma med par snang ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la 'di skad ces gsol to//
341a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yid yongs su mi skyo bar bde ba thams cad ni spangs/ sdug bsngal thams cad
341a2(dkon brtsegs): ni ji mi snyam par bgyis te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du mchi'o zhes rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar gyis tshig de skad
341a3(dkon brtsegs): smras ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas/ lha'i bu brgyad stong gis kyang steng gi bar snang las kyi
341a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'o byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar gyis brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di ni legs so legs so// zhes bya ba byin no// rigs kyi bu de nas
341a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba de rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du song te/ khyim gyi sgo drung na 'dug pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs
341a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po des mthong nas/ gshe rgya zhing tshig ngan pa rtsub mo sna tshogs smras te/ de la sa dang rdul yang gtor/ de la lag pa dang / dbyig pa dang / bong bas kyang brdeg so//
341a7(dkon brtsegs): des mthong zhing thos te lus la reg cing tshor bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' brdzun 'grus 'bar ba 'khrugs pa 'am/ gshe ba 'am/ khro khro ba 'am/ phyir
341a8(dkon brtsegs): ldogs par ma gyur gyi steng du/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i stobs rab tu bskyed nas/ stobs dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po yang bskyed do// lo stong lon
341b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang cing tu zhugs te smad pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su mi skyo bar de lo khri lon pa dang /
341b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gang gnyis kyi nang du zhugs so// de lo nyi khri lon pa dang rgyal po pho brang gi sgo gang gsum pa'i nang du zhugs pa nas lo bdun khri lon
341b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rgyal po pho brang gi sgo gang drug pa'i nang du zhugaso// lo brgyad khri bzhi steng lon pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gang bdun pa'i nang du zhugs pa dang / de nas
341b4(dkon brtsegs): gdod rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal des tshig ster te/ dge slong khyod ci zhig tshol/ khyod la ci dgos smros shig dang / ci nus kyi bar du byin par bya'o// rgyal du
341b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu dge slong de la mngon mtshar chen po'i 'du shes skyes nas/ ci tsam du dge slong des yongasu skyo ba mnags nus pa de ni ngo mtshar to snyam mo// rigs
341b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu ner dpal de sems rab tu dad par shes nas/ de'i tshe tshigs
341b7(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zas dang skom dang gos dang bza' ba rnams/ gzhon nu bdag la dgos pa ci yang med/ zang zing med pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas/
341b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni chos kyi pho zhir 'dir 'ongs so// 'jig rten don mdzad drang srong che byung ba/ mi mi chos dri ma med par snang zhes bya/ de ni sdug bsngal mthar phyin chos ston te//
342a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang gis thos pa mi'i tshe 'tho ba/ bskal pa stong phrag bye ba grangs med na// sangs rgyas rnams ni brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar/
342a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs rten mun gnag sgron gyur pa/ yon tan dam pa mnga' ba de skyes nas/ khyod ni 'di na 'dod pa yon tan chags// gzugs dang longs spyod rnams la rtag tu myos/ chos
342a3(dkon brtsegs): kye rgyal po lta bar yongs mi 'gro// longs spyod mi rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srog/ rtswa rtse'i zil thigs 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang phyir sangs rgyas thos kyang myed
342a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ de ni rgyul bu khyod kyi ma ma yin/ khyod ni 'di na byang chub mchog zhugs la// sems can dag kyang gnyer te grol bar gyis/ khyod ni 'di na byang chub mchog zhag
342a5(dkon brtsegs): la/ sems can dag kyang gnyer te grol bar gyis/ khyod bdag de ltar 'dod pa'i bran gyur na// ji ltar myos pas skye bo 'dul bar 'gyur// nga rgyal spangs te nyon mongs
342a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams stsol pa// de ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyis// brtson 'grus skyed de 'jig rten snying brtse gyis// phyi ma'i dus na gdud par gyur ta re// rgyal bus tshig su ba nad
342a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di thos nas// nga rgyal spangs te gus par bskyed nas// brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te// gang sngon bdag gis gnod bgyis bzod par gsol/
342a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgyal srid thams cad spangs par bya// 'dod dang de bzhin longs spyod kun mi cho la/ nga rgyal tha ba'i skyon dang dregs spangs te// myur du bde bar gshegs pa'i
342b1(dkon brtsegs): gan du 'gro// de ni srog chags bye ba brgyad cus bskor// me tog na bza' spos dang bdug pa thogs/ dri ma med par snang ba skyes bu mchog/ rgyal ba de'i drung du nye bar
342b2(dkon brtsegs): song // bde bar gshegs kyi gnas du phyin nas kyang // zhabs la phyag 'tshal de nas mchod byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skya ngar 'dug/ rgyal bu de yis tshig
342b3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di smra so// gang phyir skyon med sems kyis bskul pas na// brtson 'grus 'bar ba bdag gi ston pa mgon// ci ltar de ni mchod pa'i 'os lags na// de dag la lan du phan pa bya
342b4(dkon brtsegs): mi nus// bdag ni 'jig rten mgon la bzod pa gsol// chos kyi rgyal la gus pa gang ma bgyis/ de dag thams cad de ring so sor bshags// bdag ni nongs pa 'jig rten
342b5(dkon brtsegs): mgon mkhyen mdzod// sems can don tu snying rje bskyed nas su// bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhug te// slan cad bag med spyod pa mi bgyi'o// rgyal bu de yis rgyal srid rnam
342b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs te// sems can bye ba brgyad cu rnams kyis bskor// byang chub dam pa 'di ni yongs tshol zhing // mngon byung rgyal ba'i rten la rab tu byung // rgyal bas de dag gi ni bsam mkhyen
342b7(dkon brtsegs): nas// byang chub las mchog rab tu ban pas ni// chos thos sems can rtag tu dag pa rnams bas cad kyis kyang rjes 'thun bzod pa thog rig kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa lnga
342b8(dkon brtsegs): lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsngag pa brjod cing gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsngag pa
343a1(dkon brtsegs): #// brjod cing gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongasu brjod kyang yon tan mtha' zang par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brjon
343a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus 'bar zhes bya bar gyur pa de bzhin zhig yin pa snyam du dogro shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis gyur na yang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang
343a3(dkon brtsegs): nub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba der gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing
343a4(dkon brtsegs): the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na yang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gnon
343a5(dkon brtsegs): na nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar sngon byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongasu smin par byed 'dod pas/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems
343a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba de ltar bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig kyi bu sems can yongasu smin par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lnga
343a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// rig kyi bu bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin no// sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi
343a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud kyi la sa las shin tu 'da' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i las dang // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu spyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /
343b1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / rig+sa kyi bu bzhi po
343b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
343b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhi te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang / dbang po yongasu shes pa'i ye shes dang / nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sman
343b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i ye shes dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes te/ rigs bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems rnam gyi byang chub sems dpa'i
343b5(dkon brtsegs): las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che gang bskal
343b6(dkon brtsegs): kha bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong chad med grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu rin po che
343b7(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyis rab tu 'akang bas kyang rin tu mi bzod pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po ched/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan
343b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gi gtsug na 'chis pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la dul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spyi gtsug bltar mi snang
344a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thob pa dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe mdzum
344a2(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ nam mdzum pa mdzad pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dag du ma kha
344a3(dkon brtsegs): dog sna chog 'di lta te/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / len rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
344a4(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med pa de dag 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ zla ba dang / nyi ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis yongasu zad pa
344a5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas slar log te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgyad stod du mar bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sem
344a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' spobs pa myur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
344a7(dkon brtsegs): la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyings kyis mdzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus so// mi mnyam mnyam pa dam
344a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi mig sbyin 'jig rten mchog/ shag kya'i rgyal sras dbang po zhi zhing dri gsum dri ma spangs// mtshungs med mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phag pa
344b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba ri rab bzhin// ci slad 'dir 'dzum ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung stan gsol// gya mi mnga' rab tu mnyen la shin du snyan mi'i gsung // skyes bu dam pa de bar sbyin
344b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dran mchog blo gros thugs// bde gsheg mos pa'i mchog dang ldan pa lha dang mis mchod pa// ci slad mdzum pa 'di mdzad pas bstan tu gsol/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' 'a
344b3(dkon brtsegs): gang 'od dang bsod nams gzi brjid 'od// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge lta bur bsgrags rgol ba bcom// thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa'i lhag pa gang
344b4(dkon brtsegs): yang med// chos kyi dbang phyug ji skad mdzum pa mdzad pa bstan tu gsol// rab tu bzhad ci mchog tu dgyes pa shin tu dri med zhal// zla ba lta
344b5(dkon brtsegs): bur nam mkhar gshegs nas phyogs bcu lam med par// mun pa bcom zhing rdal bcom 'od dang dpal ni rab rgyas pa// bde bar gshegs pa
344b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzum mdzad pas bkas stsol cig/ gser ri 'od 'dra brtul zhugs grub pa bsod nams ye shes 'phro// mkhas pas rtag tu rab bsngags 'jig
344b7(dkon brtsegs): rten ngo mtshar mchod pa'i 'os// srid pa'i dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin pa nas mi zad cing // nam mkha'i ngos rab snang bar shog kya seng ges
344b8(dkon brtsegs): mdzum pa bstan// lha dang mis mchod khyod 'dras dang lha yul dag na 'ja med// yid mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yong dpal gyis rab tu rgyas/ yon tan brgya rnams shin tu rgyas
345a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtshan ni rangab rdzogs pa/ bde gshegs mdzum pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig/ kun tu khyod ye shes dus gsum chags pa med par 'jug/ sems dang yid
345a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor dbang po gang dang sems can bsam pa gang // sems can kun gyi bsam pa ci 'dra thams cad skad cig mkhyen/ myi'i seng ges gang slad mdzum mdzad rigs don bdag la gsungs// namakhar gnas
345a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lha mang yid kyang rab tu dga'// myi tshogs sa la gnas pa thams cad thal sbyar phyag 'tshal gyis// gang thos lha mi man pa'i rdul rnams sel 'gyur ba// myi mchog gis ni bdud rtsi ro mchog
345a4(dkon brtsegs): dbye bar gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa myur ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
345a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis// sangs rgyas kyis ye shes spyi bor gyur pa// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chang du gang gtsug gi nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba
345a6(dkon brtsegs): thong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs
345a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mnyes par byas/ sti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas shing mchod nas/ thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ sems
345a8(dkon brtsegs): can dpag tu med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po de dag la yongasu smin par byas so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'di bskal pa grangs med pa bstod na/ bskal pa dri
345b1(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa
345b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'od
345b3(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa de'i sa bzhi ni rin rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'od gang byung ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rnams snang bar 'gyur ro//
345b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od de yang gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyu ro// sems can gang dag 'od des reg par gyur pa de dag kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyu ro// 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri
345b5(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa de yang 'byor pa rgyas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gi gnas su 'gyuraro// der byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//
345b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de dag gi longs spong
345b7(dkon brtsegs): dang kun tu sbyong ba thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
345b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyuraro// de na mi khom pa dang / ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro// de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba bla na
346a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa chos kyi rgyal po ma gtogs par rgyal po bzhin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lha dang mi dgra thams cad kyang rdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi kham
346a2(dkon brtsegs): de na bud med dang 'khrig cing 'du ba'i ming yang med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can long ba 'am/ zhar ba 'am/ zha bo'am/ sgur po 'am/ yan lag ma
346a3(dkon brtsegs): tshang bar gyur pa gang yang med de/ de dag thams cad kyang lus mtshan gyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
346a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe tshad kyang bskal pa bar ma bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa/ pha rol
346a5(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pa/ theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa/ ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
346a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang dbang po rno ste zur tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang chos kyi sgo'i tshig re res sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rjesu rtogs par 'gyur ro//
346a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyuraro// de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig cing
346a8(dkon brtsegs): gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o// tshig cig po de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig mi zad pa'o// tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/ tshig mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs
346b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyis kyang zad par mi nus pa'o// tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ a zhes bya ba ni tshig mi zad pa ste/ a zhes bya ba la zhugs na/ yi ge 'bru thams/
346b2(dkon brtsegs): cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de ltar na yi ge thams cad ni mi zad pa te/ yi ge 'bru gnyis snga phyi med par thos par bya mi nu so// yi ge 'bru re re nas brjod kyi yi ge yang yi ge gnyis
346b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'brel pa ma yino// de bas ni tshi gcig po de de nyid rnam par rig pa'i tshig de yang rnam par rig pa'i tshig ces rtogs par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed de/
346b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar tshig de ma rtog rnam par mi rtog par dgos pa byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo rje'i gzungs kyi tshig la 'jug pa'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
346b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu bskal pa'am/ bskal pa
346b6(dkon brtsegs): pas lhag par 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i bsngags pa brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che 'byung ba de'i chos bstan
346b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongasu brjod kyang / yon tan yongasu brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon tan gyis rnam pa bkod pa tshad med pa de snyed 'byung bar
346b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas dga' bgu yid rangs shing rab tu dga'o// bde ba dang yib
347a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la tshal dang mthun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ chos/
347a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun gyi pha rol gshegs/ 'khrul pa'i chos rnams thams cad las/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin du 'das/ ye shes chen po khyod re mtshar/ sangs rgyas bye ba de rnyed la/
347a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus gang dang / de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi// bdag gi spyod dang de bzhin du/
347a4(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kun gyi rab tu mkhyen// thub pa ci 'dra de 'dra bar// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag lung bstan// bdag ni the tsom yong ma
347a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis// sa rnams thams cad 'gas kyang 'da'// nyi zla mkha' las lhung yang gda'/ bcom ldan khyod kyi zhal sgo nas/ phyin ci log gi gsung mi 'byung / ye shes ldan
347a6(dkon brtsegs): la shes rab che// de ni bdag gi la bden tshig gis// byang chub mchog tu lung bstan pas// sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur// thugs kyis yid ni mkhyen pas na//
347a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra bar// sangs rgyas zhing yang ci 'dra bar// de 'dra nyid du kun brtan to// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas// the tshom mchis dbang po
347a8(dkon brtsegs): tshim// sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur// mchog gi spyod pa spad par bgyi// bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra ba// sngon gyi mthar ni rnams spangs pa// de bas shin du dpag
347b1(dkon brtsegs): yas par// bdag gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi// 'di ni le los mi 'da' bas// rtson 'grus brtan pa'i spod pa 'di// zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis su// byang chub spyod pa srud par
347b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi// bdag ni byang chub lung brtan pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni spro ba stsal// ji srid 'dren par ma gyur pa// de srid brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo // rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te/
347b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad gnyer bar bgyi// byang chub dam pa don du btsal// de dag bdag gis bskyab par bgyi// byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches tshig su bcad pa bstan
347b4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di bshad pa na/ srogs chags stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri
347b5(dkon brtsegs): ma med par skye bar sems kyi smon te/ tshig 'di skad bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur pa de na/ bdag cag
347b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung brtan to// /
347b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chong shig/ lhog shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
347b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grang 'di 'chang ba'am/ klog pa de dag ni bla na med
348a1(dkon brtsegs): / par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bulag/ rigs kyi bu gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
348a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stong du ci bzhed pa sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos te 'chang ngam/ klog gam/
348a3(dkon brtsegs): de kho na bzhin du nan tan byed na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang te/ tshad med pa/ grangs med par khong du chud par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
348a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba lag na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom
348a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs
348a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i man ngag ces bya bar zung shig/ gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' se
348a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zas bcas pa'i
348a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyis rnam grangs
348b1(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho//
348b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya shri mA la de bi/ sing ha nA da/ na ma ma ha yan su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa
348b3(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen pos chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang
348b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
348b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa li'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo dam pa btsun mo 'phreng ldan mas lha mo dpal 'breng chos rtogs nas
348b6(dkon brtsegs): ring po ma lon pa'i bar skabs su gtam glengs pa/ rgyal po chen po kye ma khyod kyi sras mo lha mo dpal 'phreng ni 'dzangs shing gsal la/ zab cing mkhas te/ gal te nges bcom
348b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mthong ba lta na tshogs chung ngus chos rtogs la bcom ldan 'das kyi brtan pa la yang the tsom ma mchis par 'gyuraro// de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
348b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis btsun mo 'breng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras pa/ 'breng ldan ma 'o bo cag gis lha mo dpal 'phreng la po nya nus pa cig gtang gor ma chag go// de skad ces smras pa dang /
349a1(dkon brtsegs): @btsun mo 'bring ldan mas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig de mnan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo 'phreng ldan pas bcom
349a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi yon taru bsngags pa rnam pa du ma bris te/ nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba de'i lag tu 'phrin yid bskur nas/ de mthar gyis song te/ grong khyer 'thab med
349a3(dkon brtsegs): du phyin nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste/ lha mo dpal 'phreng ma la phyag 'tshal nas/ phan tshun kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gi lag tu 'phrin yig byin no//
349a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis pha ma la gus pas phrin yig de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas/ mgo la gtugs te/ bdag nyid kyis phrin yig blangs nas/ 'phrin yid gi don
349a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po nges par bzung te/ don du nges par bzung nas/ mgo cogs te ya mtshan du bzung nas/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gi nang kor ma zla ba lta bu la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag
349a6(dkon brtsegs): smras so// sangs rgyas shes bya'i sgra 'di ni// 'jig rten dag na shin du dkon// gal te tshig 'di bden gyur na// bdag gi khyod la bgo bar byin// gal te bcom ldan sangs
349a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te// 'jig rten don du byung gyur na/ de ni bdag la thugs rje yis// brtan pa'i ched du 'dir byon cig/ de nas de'i skad cig la// mgon po gshegs nas mkha' la bzhug
349a8(dkon brtsegs): // bsam gyi mi khyab sangs rgyas sku/ 'od gzer 'gyed cing bzhugs pa mthong // de nas de che lha mo ni// gus pas 'khor bcas langs nas kyang // spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas
349b1(dkon brtsegs): nas// smra ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang // dpal dpe gang na'ang yod ma mchis/ bsam yas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i// 'jig rten mgon la
349b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshalo// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang / ye shes la yang bas ma mchis/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas// de bas thugs kyang khyod skyabs kyang lags// bsam pa
349b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ldan khyod kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams bstsal// nyams ma mchis pa'i sa brnyes pa'i// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// ye shes/
349b4(dkon brtsegs): sku'i dbang phyug ste// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi/ mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshalo// gzhal yas khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dpe las 'das la phyag 'tshalo// bsam yas
349b5(dkon brtsegs): chos khyod phyag 'tsha'o// mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshalo// bdag ni da ltar mgon pos skyangs// byang chub sa bon rnam par bskyed/ slan chad srid pa gzhan dag du// thub pas
349b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag la phan bdags mdzod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon tshe rnamasu lha mo khyod// ngas ni byang chub sbyor ba byas// phyis kyang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu// ngas ni
349b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bzung bar bya// lha mo dpal 'phreng gis gsol pa// bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu// bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa/ bsod nam de yis mgon po khyod/
349b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog/ de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng dang / lhan gcig tu btsun mo kun dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab la btugaso
350a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal 'phreng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ lha mo khyod kyis de bzhin
350a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon tan dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis lha mo khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i
350a3(dkon brtsegs): g+ha dang mi'i rgyal srid bun gsum tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs thams cad du yang nga mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / nga la mngon gsum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags
350a4(dkon brtsegs): pas bsngags par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// da phyin cad bskal pa stong phrag grangs med pa nyi shu na khyod
350a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe yang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dwa song dag 'byung bar
350a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyuraro// de'i tshe sems can rnam kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag la nad kyang med/ rga ba yang med/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa yang med do/ ming ge
350a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las kyi lam rnam kyi ming yang mi grigs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag byung ba de dag gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di ltar bde ba dang /
350a8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang 'dog dang / dpal dang gzi brjid dang / gzugs dang / sma dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag mi
350b1(dkon brtsegs): bshin du bde ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// lha mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyuraro// lha mo de bzhin du dge
350b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du bar 'gyuraro// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gi lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa thos nas/ lha dang mi dpag
350b3(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lab btab po// de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyi lung bstan to// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng
350b4(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon gsum du bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ thal mo sbyar te yid dam chen po bcu yang dag par blangaso// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das
350b5(dkon brtsegs): nga slan cad bdag gi tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam dang po 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis
350b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das nga slan cad bdag gi bla ma dag la ma gus pa'i sems bskyed par ming gyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yid ma gnyis pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i
350b7(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug gi bar du bdag gi yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das nga sman cang bdag gi gang du yang sems can la khro ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyi te/
350b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yi ma gsum pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das da slan cad bdag gis gzhan gyi
351a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang / gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dag la phra dog gi sems bskyed pa mi bgyi te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bzhi pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar
351a2(dkon brtsegs): thug gis bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis tha na kham slad ma tsam la yang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan
351a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das yi dam lnga pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par bla // bcom ldan 'das de slan cad bdag gis bdag nyid kyis longs spyod pa'i
351a4(dkon brtsegs): slad du nor yongasu bzung bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can dbul po sdug bsngal zhing mgon ma mchis pa yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yongasu bzung bar
351a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam drug pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par bla // bcom ldan 'das de slan cang bdag gis bsdu ba'i
351a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po bzhi sems can rnam la phan 'dogs pa na bdag la sman du re ba'i slad du sems can bsdu bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang /
351a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog par mi 'dzin pa dang / ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bdun pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar
351a8(dkon brtsegs): thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das ded slan cad bdag gis sems can mgor ma mchis pa dang / go rar stsal pa dang / bcings pa dang / nad kyi
351b1(dkon brtsegs): ma thag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul po dang / phongs par gyur pa dang / chog chen pos 'tshe ba dag mthong na/ de dag la sman ma btags par gom pa gcig kyang dor bar mi bgyi'o//
351b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can snga bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag na/ sdug bsngal de dang de dag las yongasu thar par bgyis la/ nor gyi bsdu bas bsgrubs nas/ slad
351b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag gis mchi bar bgyi te/ bcom ldan 'das yid pa brgyad pa 'di byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das sman
351b4(dkon brtsegs): cad bdag gis phag 'tshong ba dang / bya ba las stsogs pa sdig pa'i las kyis 'tsho zhing de bzhin gshegs pa bka' stsal pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i tshul can dag mthong
351b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ yal bar mi 'dor gyi/ bcom ldan 'das grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po pho brang 'khor gang dang gang dag na/ bdag gi mchid nyan pa'i de dang
351b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag tu tshar dgum pa'i rigs pa rnam ni tshar dgum/ sman gdags pa'i rigs pa rnam la ni sman bdags par 'tshalo// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das tshar dgum
351b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sman gdags pa ni 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i sla du te/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na lha dang mi rnam kyi lus rnam
351b8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / ngan song rnam yongasu 'grib par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjesu bskor ba
352a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yi sa dgu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gi yang dag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das sran chad bdag gis dam pa
352a2(dkon brtsegs): chos bzung ba las bskyed par bgyi ba'i sem gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyang na theg pa chen po bskyung par 'gyuraro//
352a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po bskyang na pha rol tu phyin pa bskyed par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa bskyang na theg pa chen po la mi 'dun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
352a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang theg pa chen po la mo nges pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing rang nyams du gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan
352a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sar mchi ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang / gnod pa chen por mthong lags so// bcom
352a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa las ning ngag dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa'i don yongasu grub par mthong ste/
352a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i yi dam bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par bla // bcom ldan 'das
352a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi yi ma chen po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi rje nying bdag gi dbang du gyur pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das ston pa
352b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du gyur tu lags kyang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la la dag kye ma yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni stsogs par dka'o snyam du bdag la the tsoma'am/ yid
352b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis 'tshal ba de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi yun ring por gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / phung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la sman bdags pa'i slad
352b3(dkon brtsegs): du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bgyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yid dam chen po bcu gang dag blangs pa'i yi dam chen
352b4(dkon brtsegs): po bcu po 'di dag la bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ci skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ba lta na bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bden pa'i tshigs 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil
352b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dir lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig/ lha'i sgra grag par ci gyur cig/ des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di len par gyur cig/ lha mos dpal
352b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng gi tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char chen po bab nas/ bar snang las lha'i sgra grag par gyur te/ des bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs de mnos nas/ lha
352b7(dkon brtsegs): mo de de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas pa de ni de bzhin du 'gyur to// gzhan du ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas rmang du byung ba'i cho 'phrul de yang mthong
352b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i sgras mnos pa de yang thos nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor the tsom med cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha mo dpal 'phreng dang mi 'bral zhing 'grogs par smon
353a1(dkon brtsegs): lam btab bo// 'khor de thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// de nas lha mo dpal 'breng
353a2(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam chen po gsum btab bo// gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'dis sems cad
353a3(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis pa dag la sman btags pa gang lags pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos
353a4(dkon brtsegs): togs pa thob par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam dang po lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogs te thob nas kyang ngal ba dang /
353a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu skyo ba ma mchis par sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gnyis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
353a6(dkon brtsegs): gis dam pa'i chos brtan pa de yang lus dang srog la mi blta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung bar 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon
353a7(dkon brtsegs): yab chen po gsum pa lag te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag 'debaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng gi smon lam chen po yul
353a8(dkon brtsegs): che 'di dag lung ston pa mdzad/ lha mo 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugasu brtogs pa thams cad ni rnam kha'i khas kyi khong su rtog pa khongasu chud // lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lo
353b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang smon lam chen po 'di gsum gyi khongasu gtogs la khong su chud de/ smon lam chen po gsum po de dag ni de ltar yul che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
353b2(dkon brtsegs): lha mo dpal 'greng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'di la smon lam chen po'i yul bstan pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis slob so// bcom
353b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'breng gis 'di skad ces
353b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang lags pa de zlum cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i smon lam chen
353b5(dkon brtsegs): po gcig gi khongasu 'dus shing khongasu chud de bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni de ltar yul che ba lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha mo dpal 'phreng la
353b6(dkon brtsegs): legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo legs leg so// lha mo khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ thabs kyis yongasu bgos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no// lha mo sems can gang dag khyod
353b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon pa yin te/ yun ring po nas sangs rgyas du ma la dge rtsa ba skyed pa yin no// lha mo khyod kyis dab pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba
353b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ci skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba bstan pa de nyid
354a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad de/ 'chad do// chad par 'gyur ro// lha mo nga yang da ltar mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas/ dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba bstan pa rnam pa
354a2(dkon brtsegs): du mar ston to// lha mo de ltar dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba bstan pa ngas rnam pa du mar bshad kyang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do//
354a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la yang dge mtha' 'am mu thug pa med // lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni de ltar
354a4(dkon brtsegs): phan yon che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po brtan pa gzhan
354a5(dkon brtsegs): yang bdag gis spob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo des dus la bab par shes na khyod spobs par bgyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
354a6(dkon brtsegs): gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
354a7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong sdud pa
354a8(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe sprin chen po ni kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgyu dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa lags so//
354b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshed dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa yang / bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i chab kyi rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ye shes rin po che'i rgyun dpag tu
354b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe chab kyi phung po stong gsum gyi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas de las ni bzhi
354b3(dkon brtsegs): ba bye ba phrag brgya kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / dbyibs sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing 'khor gling phran bye ba brgya phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi chab kyi phung po chen po de las 'byung ngo // bcom
354b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa/ the pa chen po yang dag par 'grub pa'i 'byung khung dang / skye gnas su gyur pa'i de las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul
354b5(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad dang / chos snang ba'i sgo rnams pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa'i dbang phyug thams cad dang / 'jig rten las
354b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i bde ba lha dang mi rnams kyi sngon ma myong ba gang lags pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ sa chen po ni khur chen po bzhi'i rten bgyid pa lag tu
354b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chab kyi phung po chen po rgya mtsho dang / ri mang po thams cad dang / gnas dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang lo tog dang / nags tshal tham cad dang /
354b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi chog thams cad kyi rten bgyidade/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po khur chen po bzhi po 'di dag gi rter bgying ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
355a1(dkon brtsegs): bu song ba pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa ni/ sa chen pobs kyang ches bur chen po bzhi khyer lag so// bani gang zhen 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu thos pas can da/
355a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing thos pa dang mi ldan la/ chos can ma lags pa rnam lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob bar bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la sbyor ba ni/ sa chen po ba
355a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ches khur chen po khyer lag so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgying ba ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lagaso//
355a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgying pa ni/ sa chen po ngas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lagaso// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma/
355a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can kha cig ni theg pa chen po la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni/ sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po khyer ba lagaso// /
355a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa ni/ khur chen po 'di bzhi khyer ba lags te/ sa chen po ngas kyang ches rten tu gyur pa dang / sa chen po
355a7(dkon brtsegs): bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba dang / khur mtha' yas pa khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi zhi rten du gyur pa dang / byams par bgyis pa dang / snying rje can dang / sman par 'tshal
355a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / chos kyis 'jig rten gyi ma zhes bgyi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ sa ched po ni rin po che sna bzhi'i 'byung gnas lags te/ snang bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ rin po che
355b1(dkon brtsegs): de thang ma mchis bdag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che rin zang mchis pa'i 'byung gnas dang / rin po che dag pas chung bdag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che dngas kyang chung bang gi 'byung gnas
355b2(dkon brtsegs): lag te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po rin po che sna bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin
355b3(dkon brtsegs): ba la rten nas/ sems can rnam kyis rin po che'i mchog rin po che thams cad kyi dam par gyur pa bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i shes gnyen rigs kyi bu'am rigs
355b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo de la brten nas sems can rnam kyi lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi khe rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i
355b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tsho gas thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs
355b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyasu nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nam kyi chog chos thon po thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rig kyi bu mongs pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa la bstan nas/
355b7(dkon brtsegs): sem can rnam kyi rin po che thams cad kyi mchog ngo mtshar slad du byung ba'i rin po che chen po bzhi'i de rnyed par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das gter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas
355b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba de ni dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dag so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ni bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos
356a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzhan ma lags/ dam pa chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa po nying dam pa'i chos lagaso// bcom/
356a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasasu 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol du phyin pa rnams
356a3(dkon brtsegs): lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa ni sems can gang sbyin pas yongasu smin par bgyi ba de dag ni/ sbyin pas yongasu smin par
356a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid de/ tha na lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag yongasu gtong bas kyang yongasu smin par bgyid de/ de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pa rnams/ dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i
356a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag tshul khrims kyi yong su smin par bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las
356a6(dkon brtsegs): yang su dag pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na spyod las gyis kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yong su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de lta de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pas/ ngas pa'i chos la gnas par
356a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bzod pas yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag la ni de dag gis de la spyod brgyad de/ gtse ba bgyis
356a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang gnod sems ma mchis shing sman par 'tshal ba dang / bzod pa'i spobs dang ldan pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongasu smim par bgyi de//
356b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag yongasu smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bcon 'grus kyis yongasu smin par bgyis pa'i sems
356b2(dkon brtsegs): can de dag ni sems ma num zhing le lo ma mchis pa dang / 'dun pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na rang gi spyod lam bsgrims pas kyang de dag gi sems
356b3(dkon brtsegs): srung zhing yongasu smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems cad gang dag
356b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyis yong su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems g.yeng ba dang / yid phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yong su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bgyis nas yun
356b5(dkon brtsegs): ring du lags pa dang / smras nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskyung bas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongasu smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di
356b6(dkon brtsegs): ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la/ le lo ma mchis
356b7(dkon brtsegs): par lung bsnyon pa dang / bstan chos thams cad dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzo'i gnas chen po dag tu yang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongasu smin pa/
356b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yong su smin par bgyis pas/ dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas/ pha rol du
357a1(dkon brtsegs): @#phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol du phyin pa rnams
357a2(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis slob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis khyod
