357a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis spobs par bgyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa po dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa po zhes bgyi ba na/
357a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa yang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos
357a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'dzin pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i slad du/
357a6(dkon brtsegs): yan lag gsum po yongasu gtong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lus yongasu gtong bas ni sangs
357a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i bye ma'i mtha'i mu dang / mnyam brga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba dang bral ba/ mi shigs pa/ rtag pa brtan pa/ zhi bather zug pa/ 'ang 'chi dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis
357a8(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo srog yong su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul ba gnas pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam/
357b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ 'chi 'pho dang bral ba 'tha' yas pa/ rtag pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo longs spyod yongasu gtong bas
357b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa/ bas par mi 'gyur ba/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rtag par rgyun
357b3(dkon brtsegs): mi mchad cing brtag par gnas pa/ yon tan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa yan lag
357b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa 'di dag yong su gtong bas ni yon tan shin du slad du byung ba gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lung ston pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
357b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bye zhing gnyi su gyur la/ sde sder tshad de/ phyogs phyogasu gyes
357b6(dkon brtsegs): nas rtsod par gyur pa na/ g.yo ma mchis shing gya gyur ma mchis la/ sgyu ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing / dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i slad du chos can gyi phyogs la 'jug par bgyid na/
357b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad las lung brtan pa nges pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ngas pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa
357b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar brtson 'grus chen po lags skam bdag bgyid de/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags
358a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni'ang bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags// de nas bamam ldan 'das kyis lha ma dpal 'breng gis dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin/
358a2(dkon brtsegs): ba bstan pa la rjes su yid rang ba mdzad de/ lha mo de de bzhin te/ lha mo dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa ni brtson 'grus chen po yin no// lha mo dper na/ mi stobs dang ldan pas gnang du mi drag
358a3(dkon brtsegs): par bsnunang du zin kyang snang bar 'gyur zhing nad bskyed par byed do// lha mo de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni chung ngu zin kyang / bdud sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan skyed
358a4(dkon brtsegs): la smre sngags 'don par byed do// lha mo ngas ni bdud sdig can dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ji ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan skyed smre sngags 'don par byed pa de ltar gnod par 'gyur ba dang /
358a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mya ngan skyed pa dang / de ltar smre sngags 'don par byed pa'i dge ba'i chos gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ngo // lha mo dper na ba lang gi mchog khyu mchog gis ni 'di ltar 'phang mtho ba dang /
358a6(dkon brtsegs): chu zheng gi ba lang gi mchog thams cad zil gyi mnan te/ mngon par brjod cing yang dag par mngon par brjod// lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa yang chud
358a7(dkon brtsegs): du zin kyang / 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por rgyas pas nyan thos dang rangs sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyi gnon to// lha mo dper na/ ri'i rgyal
358a8(dkon brtsegs): bo ri rab kyis ni 'di mthob dang / rgya che bas rinag po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mngon par lha ger 'dug go// lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhing pa
358b1(dkon brtsegs): gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa yang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas/ theg pa chen po pa theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba rnams
358b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil kyis gnon na/ gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ lha mo de bas na sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin tu gzhug par bya/ yang dag par
358b3(dkon brtsegs): gzeng btsud par ma/ yang dag par rab tu ga' bar ma/ brdung bar bya/ dgod par bya'o/ gas mdam pa'i chos ma su na pa ni de ltar ngan nal/ de ska thas hAna'o// de ltar ba
358b4(dkon brtsegs): lha mo gal te bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon
358b5(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa de dag gi mtha' 'am mu thug par mi 'gyur ro// lha mo dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yon tan 'tha' yas dang ldan no// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba/ sangs rgyas kyis
358b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhad pa/ ngas bstan pa/ da khyod kyis bshad par spobs par gyis shig/ de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul pa
358b7(dkon brtsegs): mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos shes bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dgas lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan
358b8(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni theg pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na/
359a1(dkon brtsegs): klu chen po bzhi ni mtsho ma dros pa 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
359a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang theg pa chen po las 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dper na/ sa bon gi rnam par gang ji lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang /
359a3(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la brten cing sa chen po la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas theg pa pa gang
359a4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dag dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags pa thams cad dang / de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen gro rten cing / theg pa la gnas te skye zhing
359a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas theg pa chen po la gnas shing / theg pa chen po yongasu bzung na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang /
359a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang rten cing gnas te/ yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / dam pa'i
359a7(dkon brtsegs): chos nub pa dang / so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnas drug po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing btags pa gang lag pa'i
359a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas drug po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i/
359b1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos la gnas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i
359b2(dkon brtsegs): gtags pa 'di ni/ theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa dang /
359b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni don gcig te/ yig 'bru ni tha dad lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po rnams kyi bslab pa lagaso// de ci'i slad
359b4(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lha lags pas 'di ltar
359b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i cho ga'i tshul khrims kyi phung po lagaso// bcom ldan 'das nyan
359b6(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu 'byung dang /
359b7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i
359b8(dkon brtsegs): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la skyabasu 'chi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang
360a1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang byed pa thams cad mi zad par 'jigs pa'i
360a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ gshed mas ral gyi gzas pa de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas de dag kyang nges par byung
360a3(dkon brtsegs): ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyabasu gyur pa ni skyabs gzhan tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can skyabs
360a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa rnams gang gis 'jigs skrag pa'i 'jigs skrag pa de dag/ de las 'byung ba tshol ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la ya
360a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa de mchis te/ 'jigs pa des smras pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi bar khas len pa lags so// bcom ldan
360a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang
360a7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba mi chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skye ba ma bas pa yang mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni brten par bgyi ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa lags
360a8(dkon brtsegs): des na de dag ni dag pa ma lags/ las mthar phyin pa ma lags te/ de dag gi bgyi ba mang lags so// de dag gi spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gzhan yang mang du mchis te/ de dag ma spangs
360b1(dkon brtsegs): pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
360b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa bsnyes pas/
360b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs
360b4(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
360b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa bsnyes pas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan bsan
360b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
360b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa bsnyes pas/ spang bar bgyi ba'i skyon thams cad spangs shing / mchog
360b8(dkon brtsegs): tu yongasu dag pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni skyon gyi lhag ma rnams dang bcas pa yongasu ma dag pa'i chos can lags pa'i sladu'o//
361a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
361a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa bsnyes pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lha lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang
361a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mtha' dang /
361a4(dkon brtsegs): dbugs phyin pa rjes su dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / drang ba'i don rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bgyi ba lags so//
361a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho dang / yongasu bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho lagaso// bcom ldan
361a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de la rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho na nyid mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lagaso// bcom ldan 'das yongasu bsngo ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ni dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
361a7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po thob pa dang / yid kyi yul rnams lags te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lag so// bcom ldan 'das de la
361a8(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis las rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho'i dbang du bgyis te/ bdag gi skye ba zad do snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa 'byung ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das
361b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la brten nas/ bdag gi tshangs par spyad pa bstan to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so//
361b2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo dang / lha dang mi bgyi ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang / slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba sngon ma bgyis pa de spangs pa la brten nas/
361b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni shes pa 'byung lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes zhes bgyi ba ni dgra bcom pas spong bar bgyi ba'i
361b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas/ 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung
361b5(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam pa'i shes pa de yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yang ma lags/ skye ba thams cad yongasu 'tshal ba las 'byung ba 'ang
361b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa dang / skye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su ma 'tshal ba yang
361b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dag ni rnam pa gnyis te/ gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi
361b8(dkon brtsegs): sa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lta ba gcig la gnas pa'i sa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa
362a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis ste/ bcom ldan 'das gnas kyis bzhi pa de dag rags nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad skyed lag so// bcom
362a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag kyang skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis thog ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa/
362a3(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag gi nang na stobs che ba gang lags pa de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bzhir gyur pa/ ma rigs pa'i gnas kyis stobs che ba grangs sam/
362a4(dkon brtsegs): cha 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur yang mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni stobs che ba lags te/ srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i sa zhes kyang
362a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ bdud sdig can ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du gtogs kyang 'di ltar gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / 'khor dang /
362a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug gis gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams zil gyi gnon to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa'i gnas kyis srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis zhes bgyi bas kyang
362a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag zil gyi gnon te/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed las 'das pa snyed kyi rten du gyur pa dang / kon mongs pa bzhi dang yang yun ring po nas lhan gcig gnas
362a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pas mi rdzi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhon par bgyi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi
362b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ni stobs che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ len pa'i rkyen gyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam gyi rgyus las byung ba'i srid pa gsum byung ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das mi rig pa'i
362b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sa'i rkyen gyis zag zab ma mchis pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang thob pa rnams kyis yid kyis
362b3(dkon brtsegs): lus gsum 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis gsum po 'di dag tu yid kyi lus gsum po 'di dag 'byung ba dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i las mngon par grub pa'i rten
362b4(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das rkyen mchis na rkyen 'byung ste/ de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni yid kyi yul gsum po rnams dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rkyen lags pa'i
362b5(dkon brtsegs): slad du srid pa'i las 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang mi 'dra ba lags so// de ltar lags kyang srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang las thun mong ba ni ma lags
362b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag las tha dad pa kho na lags te/ yongasu grol ba'i sa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis spong bar bgyid pa dang / de bzhin
362b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhol bar bgyi ba lags// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni gnas kyis
362b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi spangs kyang zag pa zang pa la dbang ba'i stobs kyang mi 'thob mngon gsum du mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das zag pa zad pa zhes bgyi ba de ni ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i tshig sa
363a1(dkon brtsegs): dgas lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang srid pa tha ma par gtogs pa'i byang chub sems
363a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sas bsgribs shing chod la yongasu dkris te/ ldongs par bgyis pas/ chos de dang de dag rab tu ma 'tshal cing mi rtog so// bcom ldan 'das chos
363a3(dkon brtsegs): de dang de ma 'tshal cing ma mthong bas spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dang de dag mi spongs shing byang bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'odas spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag ma spangs shing byang bar ma/
363a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag rnam
363a5(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/
363a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma
363a7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dang / rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan da
363a8(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa lags kyi/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal yongasu 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags// kun 'byung
363b1(dkon brtsegs): ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags// sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lag so// sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bskams pa
363b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag ma dang bcas pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal yongasu 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas
363b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa lha ma dang bcas de dag ni bcom
363b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mya ngan las
363b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dbying su zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang /
363b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyis pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgom pa legs pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pas
363b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom zhing / rtag tu na ba'i 'jig rten tu rtag pa dang // zhi ba dang / bsil ba'i dngos po'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni skyobs pa ma mchis pa dang /
363b8(dkon brtsegs): skyabs ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi skyob pa dang / skyabs lagaso/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bzang ngan du 'byed pa'i chos can dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa
364a1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnyam pa gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba mnyam pa dgis mya
364a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das rnam par grol ba dag gi ye shes gzigs pa mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i
364a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings ni ro gcig ste/ 'di ltar rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ror ro mtshungs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la dag ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ma spangs shing byang bar ma
364a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu ro gcig pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol bar ro mtshungs pa ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
364a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ma spangs shi ma sbyangs pas ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gi'i bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pa'i sla du ste/ bcom ldan 'das bgyi
364a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de dag ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pas/ chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed 'das pa rnyed ma thob cing / mngon sum du bgyis par gyur pa'i sa du 'o//
364a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni bsgom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas lags te/
364a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de las ni sems kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / zhi gnas kyi ge ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / lhag mthong gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi nye ba'i kon mongs
364b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 'bras bu'i ge ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / rtog pa'i
364b2(dkon brtsegs): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / stobs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'byung lag so// bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma las 'das
364b3(dkon brtsegs): pa snyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa las 'byung lag so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa
364b4(dkon brtsegs): ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang bzhi dang rkyen lag so// bcom ldan 'das kun nas ldang ba gang lags pa de dag ni/ skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang /
364b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa dang ldan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa thog ma mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las
364b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa rnyed gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gnom zhing spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyis gzhi dang rten ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa lags so
364b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dper na/ sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das sa la rten cing sa la gnas te
364b8(dkon brtsegs): skye shing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das sa chen po'i tshig cing zhig la mi gda' bar gyur te/ ma mchis par gyur na ni/ sa bon gyi rnam pa gang cing lags pa dang / rtsa dang /
365a1(dkon brtsegs): shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad kyang tshig cing zhig la mi gda' bar 'gyur zhing ma mchis par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan
365a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin du spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang ga'i glang gi bye ma las 'das pa rnyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang / mi rig
365a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas kyi sa la rten cing ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel ba rgyas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis spangs shing spangs te ma mchis par
365a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na ni/ sbar bar bgyi ba'i chos gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shos kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang spangs shing sbyangs
365a5(dkon brtsegs): te ma mchis par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad spangs shing sangs rgyas kyis chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'ongs
365a6(dkon brtsegs): ba brnyed bsnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa brnyes te/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad gzigs pa dang / skyon thams
365a7(dkon brtsegs): cad spangs pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po// chos kyi dbang phyug/ chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba'i sar gshegs nas nga'i skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod
365a8(dkon brtsegs): ba brten to// bya ba byas so// 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de lnga lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di
365b1(dkon brtsegs): ni nges pa'i don lags te/ don 'di ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bgyi ba yang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las bzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes la yang gnyis te/
365b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rgyal ba bla na ma mchis pas bdud bcom ste/ pham par mdzad nam chos kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
365b3(dkon brtsegs): pa sems can thams cad kyis blta bar bgyi ba/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa bsnyes te/ shes pas thams cad thogs pa ma mchis pa chos kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa na/ 'di las lhag par bya ba
365b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ rtogs par bya ba'i sa med do zhes yang dag par gzigs te/ stobs bcu po dag gi stobs dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa'i sa bla na med pa'i mchog tu yang dag par gshegs te/
365b5(dkon brtsegs): shes bya thams cad la sgribs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gzigs nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes kyi song ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do//
365b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las rgal ba de ma thag tu rnam par grol ba dag gis bde ba nyamasu myong ba rnams ni bdag gi ni 'khor ba'i
365b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa rnams las yongasu grol gyis/ bdag gis ni phyin cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam du yang dag par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams
365b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba togs nas/ dbugs phyin pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la so sor rtog go// bcom ldan 'das
366a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis rtogs nas kyang sa de la rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bdag gis ni
366a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to snyam du 'tshal to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
366a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams ni theg pa chen po pa la yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dbas
366a4(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na theg pa gsum po 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho na'i grangasu 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
366a5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas lag so// bcom ldan 'das mya nga
366a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i tshig bla dgas leg so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig pa lags ste/ bcom
366a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang nga gzhan ma lags/ chos kyi sku yang gzhan ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi sku lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku
366a8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig gi mtha' la gso// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi mtha' zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyar ba'i tshig bla dag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan/
366b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dus kyi mtha' mchis pa la gnas pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams na
366b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi mi'i mthi'i mur thug par gnas pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams ni 'jig rten la sman pa'i slad du dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs rje can dang / dus kyi
366b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mchis pa'i thugs rje can mnga' ba ma lags te/ kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dus kyi mtha' med par yi dam bcas pa'i sems
366b4(dkon brtsegs): can a la la zhes mchi ba dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so// kye 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir chos mi zad pa dang / chos rtag pa dang /
366b5(dkon brtsegs): chos brtan pa dang / skyabs kyi sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/
366b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni skabs ma mchis pa dang / skyob pa ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na phyi ma'i mthar thug par
366b7(dkon brtsegs): skyabs mi zad pa dang / skyabs rtag pa dang / skyabs brtan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos shes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi lam brtan pa'i tshig bla dgas lag so//
366b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gsum pa'i tshigs bla dgas lag so// bcom ldan 'das skyabs 'di gnyis ni de'i yan log gi skyabs shes bgyi te/ skyabs kyi
367a1(dkon brtsegs): bar ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyang chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
367a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i pha rol na theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyis ni bgyi ba ji yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum gyi tshogs kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs
367a3(dkon brtsegs): su mchis pa dang / 'byung ba'i thabs tshol ba dang / slob pa dang bgyi ba dang bcas pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na skyabs
367a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar ma lags te/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i skyabs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas btul ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su ma ni
367a5(dkon brtsegs): ban/ chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas chos dang dge 'dun gyi dge 'dun la yang skyabs su mchi ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas/ skyabs su
367a6(dkon brtsegs): mchi ba ni gnyis la skyab su mchis par bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyab su mchi ba ni chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas mchis par bgyid/
367a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyab su mche ba ni skyab su mche ba yang dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das skyeb su mchi ba gnyis kyang yang dag par na de bzhin gshegs
367a8(dkon brtsegs): ba la sbyang su mchi ba zhes bgyi ba ni mtha' lags par khong du chud bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags/ skyabs gnyis kyang gzhan
367b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid skyabs gsum lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi
367b2(dkon brtsegs): gsung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i sgra so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das mos pa ji lta ba dag la de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gnyis po thabs/
367b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pas bsgrubs te/ de dag kyang theg chen po pa yang dag par 'du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i bden pa thog mar mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa gcig
367b4(dkon brtsegs): pus ni gnas kyi sa de rnyed cig spong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes pa gcig pus yongasu 'tshal ba las stsogs pa bzhi po rnams mngon sum du bgyis par 'gyur zhing don bzhi po dag nyid chos nyid kyis
367b5(dkon brtsegs): shin du so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa las shes pa bzhi 'pho ba dang / dmigs pa bzhi pa 'pho ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las
367b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i zhes pa rdo rje lta bu ni mi 'pho ba'i chos zan lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'di la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyis spong ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa dang
367b7(dkon brtsegs): bo ni yang dag pa'i shes pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis kyis gnas kyis spong ba ni mchi so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
367b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa
368a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sbubs spong lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'byed pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes bgyi'o//
368a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa 'tshal ba dang po ni mthar phyin pa'i ye shes ma lags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa'i shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
368a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i don de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan
368a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de'i yan lag gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i sla du nyan 'thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'phags pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bgyi ba de dag ni kan thos dang rang
368a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa ma lags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lags te/ bden pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
368a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis thog mar mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing mngon par mkhyen la so sor rtogs nas/ de mngon par mkhyen pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubasu bcug pa'i/
368a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten la rten cing btags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa ni zab cing phra la brtag par bya ba ma yin/ khong
368a8(dkon brtsegs): du chud par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags te/ mkhas shing 'dzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das zab
368b1(dkon brtsegs): mo brtan pa bshad pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lags te/ nyan thos
368b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i bshad pa 'di'i gnas lagaso// bcom ldan 'das
368b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas zab pas na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don zab cing phra la brtags pa ste/ rtogs par dka' zhing rtag mi nus la rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags te/ mkhas shing 'dzangs
368b4(dkon brtsegs): pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs kyi mthar dkris pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la the tsom ma
368b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de ni nyon mongs pa de ni thams cad kyi sbubs nas rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la yang the tsom ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang gi yid de bzhin
368b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dgongs pa'i mthar phyin pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden
368b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don bshad pa rnams pa 'di gnyis la yid ches shing dad de mos pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis ni rig par dka' zhing rtog par
368b8(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad par bgyi ba mchis pa dang / bgyi ba ma mchi
369a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lags// bcom ldan 'das del 'phags pa'i bden pa dzin bshad par bgyis pa'i mchis pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis brtan pa dang / btags pa tshad
369a2(dkon brtsegs): med ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis bgyid du sbal kyang sdug bsngal thams cad yong su 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba
369a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgom par mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'khor ba la
369a4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dus dang 'dus ma byas pa mchis so// mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad par bgyi ba ma
369a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa gang lags pa ni bcom ldan 'das de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang btags pa dag dpag tu ma mchis pa lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid
369a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsngal kyang zin pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yong su 'tshal ba dang / zin pa sdug sngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum dubagyis
369a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgom par mi nus pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa bshad
369a8(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams pa brgyad du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
369b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i bden pa don brtan par bgyi ba ma mchis pa bzhi po dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags so// nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rdzogs par bgyid pa
369b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rab 'bring tha ma'i chos rtogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rtogs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
369b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i don bshad pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa dag la rdzogs par
369b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa lags shes na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni yongasu mkhyen/
369b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad ni spangs/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi phung po thams cad 'gog pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad
369b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa ni mngon su du mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni chos chud gson pa ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
369b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ma bgyis pa ma skyes pa/ mi bas pa/ bas ma mchis pa/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa/ nyon mongs pa
369b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sbubs nas nges par grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas pa/ grol bas shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dang
370a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chos kyi sku kon mongs pa'i sbugs
370a2(dkon brtsegs): nas nges par grol ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ de bzhin gshegs
370a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying po na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon ma mthong ma togs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis thugasu chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das
370a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa thams
370a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sbubs dang tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas shes pa rnams kyis stong pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas shing grol
370a6(dkon brtsegs): bas shes pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa rnyed dag gis mi stong pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong pa nyid shes pa rnam
370a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis la ni nyan thos chen po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid ches pas 'jug par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes
370a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs pa bzhi po dag la 'jugs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams
370b1(dkon brtsegs): cad sngon ma mthong / sngon ma rtogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thumags su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'joms pa sdug bsngal 'gon/
370b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad kyang bsgoms so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la bden pa gsum ni mi rtag pa lags so// bden pa gcig ni rtag pa lags so// /
370b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa'i du slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas mtshan nyid du gtogs
370b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so// gang mi rtag pa de ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang brdzun pa bslu ba'i chos can de ni mi bden pa dang /
370b5(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa lags te/ skyabs ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lha lags pas 'phags pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba bden pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro
370b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang / yang dag par na mi bden pa dang / mi rtag pa lags te skyabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la bden pa gcig ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan
370b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa de ni rtag pa lag so// gang rtag pa de ni mi slu ba'i chos can lags so//
370b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang 'i slu ba'i chos can rtag pa dang skyabs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di la sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa nyid yang dag par na 'den pa dang /
371a1(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las 'das pa sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni bsam
371a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i spyod ba yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ dmus long gzugs la lha mi nus pa dang / bu btsa ba'i
371a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas na mchis pa'i byis pa dgung bdun lags pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la lha mi nus pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams
371a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul ma lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i yul yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par
371a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni mtha' la lta ba'i phyin ci log pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas le lagaso// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni shes
371a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag pa'i tshig bla dgras lags so// bcom ldan 'das mtha' gnyi su lta ba zhes bgyi ba de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i byis pa so so'i skye ba rtog ge'i ba
371a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi tshig bla dgas lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di gnyis ni mthar lta ba zhes bgyi ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te
371a8(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams la mi rtag par lta na de de'i chad par lta ba ma lags te/ de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te mya ngam las 'das pa la rtag par lta na de ni de'i
371b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag par lta bar ma lags te/ de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rtog ge'i pa dag gi lta ba 'di lta bu lags te/ lus dang / dbang
371b2(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / tshor ba dang / sems pa rnams tshe 'di nyid la 'jig par mthong nas/ srid pa'i mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par mi bgyid cing ma 'tshal bar/ ldongs par gyur pa skad de chad
371b3(dkon brtsegs): bar lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rtog ge pa dag gi lta ba ni sems kyi rgyud la rmongs shing sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la yang 'jug par mi bgyid la/ rnam par shes pa'i
371b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul du ma gyur pa skad de rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtog ge' ba dag gi lta bu dag lags pa skad de dag ni de las thal ba'i dang / don de'i tha chad kyi
371b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dres pa'i lta bas chad par rlom sems bgyid pa dang / rtag par rlom sems bgyid pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni zin pa'i
371b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po lnga po dag la phyin ci log par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mi rtag pa Ni la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag ma mchis
371b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa'i
371b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sku nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa dag pas kyang sngon ma mthong lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas rtag par
372a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa'i sbubs
372a2(dkon brtsegs): nas nges par grol ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ de bzhin gshegs
372a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying po na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon ma mthong ma togs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis thugasu chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das
372a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa thams
372a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sbubs dang tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas shes pa rnams kyis stong pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas shing grol
372a6(dkon brtsegs): bas shes pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa rnyed dag gis mi stong pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong pa nyid shes pa rnam
372a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis la ni nyan thos chen po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid ches pas 'jug par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes
372a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs pa bzhi po dag la 'jugs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams
372b1(dkon brtsegs): cad sngon ma mthong / sngon ma rtogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thum kas su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'joms pa sdug bsngal 'gog/
372b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad kyang bsgoms so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la bden pa gsum ni mi rtag pa lags so// bden pa gcig ni rtag pa lags so//
372b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa'i du slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas mtshan nyid du gtogs
372b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so// gang mi rtag pa de ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang brdzun pa bslu ba'i chos can de ni mi bden pa dang /
372b5(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa lags te/ skyabs ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'phags pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba bden pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro
372b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang / yang dag par na mi bden pa dang / mi rtag pa lags te skyabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la bden pa gcig ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan
372b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa de ni rtag pa lag so// gang rtag pa de ni mi slu ba'i chos can lags so//
372b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang mi slu ba'i chos can rtag pa dang skyabs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di la sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa nyid yang dag par na bden pa dang
373a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i sems can de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log tu gyur
373a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur ba lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nyid rtag
373a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gtsang ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang
373a4(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la de ltar mthong ba de dag yang dag pa mthong ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba gang lags pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras
373a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs las skyes pa dang / zhal nas skyes pa dang / chos las skyes pa dang / chos kyi bgo skal pa sprod pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyan thos dang
373a6(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ 'di ltar shes pa dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni shes pa dag pa de'i
373a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul yang ma lags/ yul yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa bzhi'i shes pa can dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing yul ma lags pa lnga
373a8(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum pa'i las dang po pa rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can dag gis don de khong du chud par 'gyur zhing don
373b1(dkon brtsegs): de rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ston pa bani bshad cing btags pa'i slad du'o/ bcom ldan 'das non pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa lags// btsam
373b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rton pa gcig pu 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni rton pa thams cad kyi mchog 'jig rten las 'das pa lags te/ de ni yang dag par rton par bgyi ba dang skyabs so//
373b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'khor ba na rton pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i dbang du bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' med do// zhes
373b4(dkon brtsegs): bshad cing btag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchis na 'khor ba zhes mchi na ni tshig de rig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba zhes bgyi ba ni zin pa
373b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi dbang po rnams 'phos ma thag tu zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams len pa la 'khor ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho dang skye ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos gnyis kyi ming de ni de bzhin
373b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig bla bdags lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba dang / skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad lag so// bcom ldan 'das gum zhes
373b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ni dbang po 'gag pa 'di lag so// bcom ldan 'das skyes shes bgyi ba ni dbang po gsar rnams byung ba 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ni skye ba
373b8(dkon brtsegs): ba las 'gum pa 'am/ 'pho ba'am 'byung ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags so//
374a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snying pon rtag pa dang / btsun pa dang / ther chug pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das na lags pas/ da shin gshen
374a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying po ni/ tha dad du mi gnas shing 'brel la sbubs nas grol ba'i shes pa can dag gis bzhi dang rten dang gnas lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ning
374a3(dkon brtsegs): po ni 'brel ba ma mchis shing tha dad du gnas la shes pa grol ba ma lags pa/ phyi rol gyi 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi bzhi dang rten dang gnas kyang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te
374a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma mchis na ni/ sdug bsngal skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du
374a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa drug po gang lags pa 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas
374a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skad cig pa dang / sdug bsngal rnams myong ba ma lags pas/ chos de dag ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon par mi
374a7(dkon brtsegs): rig so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa'i mthar mchis pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong
374a8(dkon brtsegs): ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sdug bsngal la yang skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon par 'os so//
374b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yang bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog ma lags/ gang zag ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
374b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying po ni sems can 'jig tshogs la lta bar ltung ba dag dang / phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang / stong pa nyid las sems yengs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma lagaso//
374b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lagaso// chos kyi sku'i snying po lags so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying
374b4(dkon brtsegs): po lags so// rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rang bzhin gyis yong su dag pa/ glo bur gyi nye ba'i
374b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ bsam gyis mi 'khyab po snyam bdag bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge
374b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems ni skad cig pa te/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mi dge ba'i sems kyang skad cig pa de/ sems de yang nyon mongs
374b7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyis kun ma nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems la mi reg/ sems kyang nyon mongs pa rnams la mi reg pa
374b8(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la ji ltar sems mi reg pa'i chos can nye bar nyon mongs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang mchis la sems nye bar nyon
375a1(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa yang mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud pa dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
375a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' ba dag lags// bcom
375a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni rton pa lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha mo dpal 'phreng gi rtogs par dka' ba'i don bshad pa gsan nas rjes su yi rang mdzad de/ lha mo de de bzhin no// lha mo de de bzhin
375a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ sems rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don rtogs par dka'o// lha mo chos 'di gnyis ni rtogs par dka' ba te/ 'di lta ste/ sems rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag
375a5(dkon brtsegs): brtogs par dka' ba dang / sems de'i nye bar nyon mongs pa rtog par dka' ba'o// lha mo chos 'di gnyis nyan nus pa ni khyod dam/ byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag
375a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// lha mo lhag mnyan thos rnams ni chos 'di gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro bar zad de/ lha mo nga'i nyan thos gang dag dad pa dang / ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag ni dang ba'i
375a7(dkon brtsegs): snang ba la brtan nas chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro// lha mo chos dang 'thun par sdud par shes zhes bya ba ni lha mo dbang po'i rnam par rig pa'i spyod yul la rnam par lta ba
375a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis gnyid la rnam pa lta ba dang / sems la dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / bde ba la rnam par
375b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phral la rnam par lta ba te/ lha mo rnam par lta ba te/ lha mo rnam par lta ba'i rang bzhin rnams pa lnga la mkhas pa 'di dang
375b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ lha mo da ltar dang nga 'das pa'i 'og ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i
375b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis yongasasu dag pa dang / sems kyi nye bar nyon mongs pa la nges par 'gyur ro// lha mo de dag gis nges pa de nyid ni theg pa chen po'i lam du 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/
375b4(dkon brtsegs): lha mo de ltar na 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo mi spong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas phan pa mang ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// /
375b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di la sman pa mang ba'i don bshad pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag spob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha mo khyod spobs par gyis
375b6(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo khyi chos zab mo
375b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la ma sman ma nyams par bdag nyid la bsrung ba dang / bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed pa dang / theg pa thams cad theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so/
375b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i sems can gang sngags pa de dag ni chos zab mo dag la nan gyis mchog tu
376a1(dkon brtsegs): bzung nas/ gob lob kyi sems 'dzin cing mngon par zhen te/ ston par bgyid kun tu smra bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag la de dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab
376a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis phyogs pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / sa bon rul pa lags ste/ rgyal po'i thad du'ang mchis la brlag par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sa bon rul par gyur pa de dag ni/
376a3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par tshar bcad par bgyi ba lagaso// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis de skad ces gsol nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan
376a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs le gtugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo khyod kyis dus dang skabasu chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid yang dag par
376a5(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba'i thabs kyi don brtan pa bshad pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dgra tshar bcad pa leg so// lha mo khyod ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin pas/ khyod
376a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis don bshad pa 'di la ngo mtshar che ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus la 'od kyis khyab par mdzad nas/ ta la bdun srid du/
376a7(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mnyan yod kyi grong khyer ga la ba der gshegs so// de nas lha mos dpal 'phreng 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bos
376a8(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar nas lta bas chog mi shes shing mig mi 'dzum par lta bas/ bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mig rgyang gis mi slebs par
376b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de'i tshe/ lha mo dpal 'phreng 'khor dang bcas pa mchog tu zhing rab tu mgu ba'i bzhin dang ldan pas/ gcig gis gcig gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnam pa du mar bsngags shing
376b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du/ grong khyer 'thab med du dong ngo // de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis rang gi khyim thab rgyal po grags pa'i gshes gnyen theg pa chen po la
376b3(dkon brtsegs): nges par bcug go// grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu mo lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud do// rgyal po grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes
376b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon pa chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/ de ltar grong khyer ba thams cad theg pa chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal ba
376b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te/ nang du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal cing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la yang dgongaso// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skad cig thang
376b6(dkon brtsegs): cig yud tsam de nyid la lha'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chos
376b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung shig/ ke'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la shod cig/ kun dga' bo
376b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la shod cig
377a1(dkon brtsegs): @#de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar
377a2(dkon brtsegs): bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan te/ ke'u shi ka lan thos dang rang sangs rgyas tha~Md
377a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang mdo 'di'i don thams cad ma lus par shes pa 'am/ blta ba 'am nye bar brtag par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta ji smos// ke'u shi ka de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs
377a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni za ba la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no// ke'u shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi ming yongasu brjod pa tsam zhig bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la
377a5(dkon brtsegs): yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
377a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par bstod pa zhes bya bar zung
377a7(dkon brtsegs): shig/ ke'u shi ka 'di ni yi dam chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang yang zung shig/ smon lam thams cad sdud pa smon lam chen po zhes bya bar zung shig/ dam pa'i chos
377a8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'dzin pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang byung shig/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa brgyad bstan
377b1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya bar yang bzung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang smrig/ chos sku bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ stong pa nyid kyi don gyi dgongs pa
377b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bden pa gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa dang / skyabs
377b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gyur pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ phyin ci log gi brtan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems la dgongs pa bstan pa zhes
377b4(dkon brtsegs): bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi yang dag pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang bzung shig/ ke'u shi ka 'di ni lha mo dpal 'phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes byar bar
377b5(dkon brtsegs): yang zung shig/ ke'u shi ka mdo 'dir bstan pa gang dag bshad pa de dag thams cad ni rgyu ba bcad pa dang / nges pa'i don dang / ston pa cig pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/
377b6(dkon brtsegs): ke'u shi ka lha mo dpal 'phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis/ 'jig rten dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du phyogs
377b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par sgrogs shig/ ston cig/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
377b8(dkon brtsegs): sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ning kun chub par byas nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gzhan yang gang der 'dus gyur ba dang / lha dang /
378a1(dkon brtsegs): #ni nga rgya ma yin dang / dri zar las pa'i 'jig nan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal la mngon par bathong // 'phags pa dkon mchog bcigs
378a2(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las// dpal 'phreng gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgya pa rdzogs s+ho//
378a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / su ren tra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la bab pa/
378a4(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya byas pa brid tshA na ma ma ha ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
378a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa las// drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas rang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus
378a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig na// bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi 'gram brgal bar bya ba ma yin pa/ khu byug dang / ne tso dang / bung ba dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang / bya'i tshogs du ma sgra snyan pa
378a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa/ shing blag sha dang / n+ya gro nga dang / tsan dan dang / mya ngan tshang dang / sa la ka'i yal gas bsgrubs pa/ rtag tu me tog dri zhim pa'i sil ma bkram pa de na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
378a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po thams cad kyang bye ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rdul zad pa/ chos las mi zlog pa/ bsam gtan dang kha dog la gnas pa/ 'chags dang khri'i steng na 'dug pa/
378b1(dkon brtsegs): ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar sa phyogs de mdzes par byed pa sha sngags la/ kha cig ni nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa/ kha cig ni shing drung na gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' kun 'gro
378b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/ cha byad du la zhing brtan pa/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ 'dod pa la 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / le lo dang bral ba sha stag dang / thabs
378b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sbyin pa byin cig/ bya ba gang yin pa gyis shig/ tshul khrims kyi sdoms pas
378b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdams shing dbang po sbas la yid zhi bar gyis shig/ de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'od srung chen po dang /
378b5(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu dang / ba ku la dang / nam glu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u din n+ya dang / de dag la stsogs pa nyan thos chen po sha stag dang thabs gcig te/ yang dag par dga'
378b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam mdzad do/ de'i tshe nub phyogs logs na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba zhig tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ngo //
378b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs logs na/ 'bar zhing snang ba zhugs kyi 'od zer lta bu gda' ba 'di tsa lags/
378b8(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo 'di ni dri nag ma'i bu drang 'jig rten pa'i
379a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ drang srong rnams kyi mchag drang srong rgyas pa zhes bya ste/ drang srong dka' thub drag po la gnas pa bsnyen par gnas pa brgya
379a2(dkon brtsegs): stong gis dub pa/ lus kyi mdzes pa med pa/ lnga brgya tsam gyi phyi bzhin du 'brang ba la/ drang srong dkar min gzhonu dang / maM lha dang / rnam par bde srung gi bu dang / ri dgas man
379a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / sgra byed kyi bu dang / phur burna dang / mye'i bu dang / rnam par ko'i bu dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / de la stsogs pas yongasu bskor nas/ rjes su 'chag pa'o// de nas
379a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i bar skabasu rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ bsam gtan gyi dben pa la dgyes pa/ shing ljon pa stug po'i nang
379a5(dkon brtsegs): na bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rgyas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o ma la ngo mtshang te/ 'di bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa phyin ci ma log pa gsung zhing
379a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du grags pa ni gnas yin no// ji ltar kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing rmang du byung ba'i gzugs rgya chen po phun sum tshogs pa lags na/ 'di gdon mi za bar de/
379a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gzugs rgya chen po 'di lta bu dang bas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi bdag po drug dang bcas pa bzhin
379a8(dkon brtsegs): du spangs te/ bud med rin po ches cho ma la stsogs pa bud med drug stong yang spangs nas/ dka' shub kyi nags tshal gyi nang du gshegs te bzhugs pa 'di ni kye ma'o 'di ni
379b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten nang mtshar rmad du byung ba'o snyam du sam so// de nas drang srong mis byin gyi bus kyang rgyang ring ba nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgul yid rangs shing
379b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid 'de bskyes nas/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod ngo do// shing sngon dag gi khrod 'dug te/ bcom pa
379b3(dkon brtsegs): gser ltar ser bar snang // gzugs ni shin du 'bar ba ste// skye bo kun gyi dga' ba skyed/ be dUr+ya ni dri meng brag/ stag nang ri rab rtse gcig 'phags/ ston gyi nyi ma rab lhan ltar
379b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzugs 'a bar ba 'di su zhig/ de nas drang srong chen po de dag dga' mig phye/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
379b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dzam bu gling pa'i drang srong ma'i phung po lta 'bar ba/ ral pa'i cod pan can rgas pa/ rab tu rke ba/ zas mi za zhing bsnyen par gnas pa/
379b6(dkon brtsegs): shing shun dang g.yang bzhi gyon pa/ thal bas byugs pa/ thang dang brag khyod na gnas pa/ bkres bkres ltar 'dug pa/ rlung 'gam pa/ zla ba phyed bsnyen gnas byas pa/
379b7(dkon brtsegs): yan lag skem pa/ gcer bu pa dang / shing shun gyon pa/ ag tsam dang sen mo dang spu ring bzung ba'i kha dog lta bu dka' thub can/ bzlas brjod dang / sbyin bsreg dang / bsrung
379b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bkra shis byas pa/ sa dang / bla gab med pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa/ rkang pa byen du bsgreng ba/ rtog cog par 'dug pa cu'i nang du 'jug pa/ me mngag 'bar ga/
380a1(dkon brtsegs): bsreg me rab tu 'ab ba dang / sems lus shin du gdungs pa/ dka' thub rdzag pas yangs banor ba/ bab ra du gnas gas
380a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis yangs dga' ba/ blan med pa'i ye shes dang bral ba dgas zhes// das song dag rdzab skyong chen pa 'di dag ni 'a' ba las 'byung
380a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni 'dod pa dang / rgyags pas mos pa yang srid par skye ba yong su 'dzin pa/ lta ba'i rgyu ba yongasu ma dag pa sha stag go// de nas dge slong de dag
380a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la sems thag pa gnas skyabasu dong nas 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni tshangs par spyod pa'i tshogs bsgrubs pa te/ de'i slad
380a5(dkon brtsegs): du bdag cag srid par skye ba mi 'dzin to// de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas drang srong chen po de dag gi sems dang mi 'jigs pa dman zhing / lta ba dman par khad kyis khA gyi
380a6(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas gus pa skye te/ zhe sa dang bcas par drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor nas/ ral pa mang po mdzes te/ mchod phyir thogs thogs pa sngo sangs po// mig
380a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ser ba/ skra rtsub cing grugs pa/ lag na dbyig gu gsum thogs pa/ gzugs rab tu mi sdug pa dang ldan pa/ na mkha'i ngos las 'gro ba/ gtam sna tshogs kyi
380a8(dkon brtsegs): gtan tshigs dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ byin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'khor 'di ni kun tu rmongs pa ste/ 'di na gnas lags na
380b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'dir mchim par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// mam ldan 'alas kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po srid par skye ba thams cad dkyangangs shes
380b2(dkon brtsegs): bod yang rig go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi tshogs kyis yong su bskor ba/ gsal bzur byin pa/
380b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig mkhas pa/ blo dang / shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ral pa'i zar bu'i cod phan can 'di su legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni
380b4(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya te/ rig byed rnams byed pa nus can bu'i bstan chos kyis 'chog/ yi ges tshig sdud pa'o// de nas dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad kyis rgyas pa mthong
380b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongasu ma grol ba lags na/ dka' thub drag pos yongasu nyon mongs pa
380b6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa 'dis ci zhig thob/ dgra bcom pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyas pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la btam gang dag med pa'i gtam 'am/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang rab tu
380b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i gtam 'am/ ci'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi gtam zhig gu snyam mo// de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang
380b8(dkon brtsegs): da ltar drang srong chen po tshogs pa 'dzi ni shin du rnyed par dka' ba lag so// gal te zhus nas zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na/ bcom ldan
381a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
381a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de lta de ltar lung bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
381a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la drang song chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sbyin pa byin par bgyi/ sbyin pa ma lags pa'i don gang lags/ sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i don gang
381a4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ sbyin pa dag ji ltar rab tu 'tshal bar bgyis/ ji ltar na gtong ba por 'gyur/ ji ltar na sbyin bdag lags la gtong ba po ma lags/ ji ltar sbyin bdag sbyin pa'i mthar 'gro ba
381a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi/ spungs par gnas pa 'am/ brtsegs par gnas pa'am/ ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ ji ltar na sbyin bdag len pa la mi gnas par sbyin pa byin pa lags/ sbyin pa rnam par smin
381a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa lags/ bsod nams de'i rnam par smin pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
381a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po
381a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dang po bskyed pa'i gtam khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rtsing ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu smin ma ring ba gnyer ma can mgo skya bos lag pa g.yas pas smin
381b1(dkon brtsegs): ma bzar nas/ mig dpags brtag te/ bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong chen po rgyas pa 'di 'jig rten na grags pa yin na/ gtan tshigs kyi rig pa mi shes pa'i byis pa rogs
381b2(dkon brtsegs): rgod lta bur mkhas pa'i blo med de/ rgyu dang rkyen kyi gtam spangs shing bdag med pa'i gtam bor la/ lha yul pa'i rgyu'i gtam gtang ste/ ci'i phyir byin pa'i btam nyid zhus par gyur/
381b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi drang srong chen po 'di
381b4(dkon brtsegs): la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i bka' mchid bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la dris la/ nyan thos kyi bshad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
381b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul ma yin te/ mi dgos kyis kun dga' bo de skad ma zer cig/ 'di ni gnas ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan po sha ra dwa ti'i bul 'di skad
381b6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi drang srong chen po rgyas pa ji dang ji 'tshal ba dris pa'i lan gdab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi lan A
381b7(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyang 'di skad mi 'tshal bar ma zer/ nga'i mdun na nyan thos kyis the tsom bcad pa 'di ni mi rigs te/ de la sems can gyi sems ma rangs par 'gyur ro// sems ma
381b8(dkon brtsegs): rangs nas 'di skad du gang gi phyir rgyas pas/ dris nas nyan thos 'chang du bcug pa las ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin du nges so// yang na ni sangs rgyas la ngar 'dzin
383a1(dkon brtsegs): @#pa yod do// zhes zer bar 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ros de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces
383a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po rgyas pa'i the tsom bsal ba'i slad du bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
