383a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / sbyin pa'i bya ba dang / sbyin pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang / sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa dang / sbyin bdag gis yongasu spyad na/ ji ltar
383a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa sbyong ba dang / de dag la byin na bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ji ltar rab tu 'phel ba de nyon cig/ gang gi phyir sbyin pa zhes bya ba dang / sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin zhes
383a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni/ drang srong chen po 'di la gtong ba pos sbyin pa'i dngos po yongasu btang te/ dad pa bskyed nas gzhan byed du bcug ste/ yul gzhan du song nas byed du bcug pa des kyang nor
383a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams rnam par gtong bar byed na nor gang gi yin pa de ni sbyin bdag yin no// byed du bcug pas byin pa ni gtong ba po yin gyi sbyin ma yin no// gang rang gi dngos po bdag nyid
383a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbyin pa de ni gtong ba po yang yin la sbyin bdag kyang yin no// drang srong chen po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sbyin pa yongasu ma dag par blta'o// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang
383a8(dkon brtsegs): em 'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po 'di la btsang ba zo phyin ci log tu lta bar gyur cing ma dad pa dang / madrang ba mang la nges sbyin pa byin na de'i sbyin pa de yongasu ma dag pa yin no/
383b1(dkon brtsegs): drang song chen po gzhan yang ban btags pa'i lan tu phan 'dzegs par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin na de yongasu ma dag pa yin no// des dman pa dang 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir gang 'di lta bu'i sems
383b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis me la sbyin pa byin no zhe 'am/ me lce la sbyin pa byin no zhe 'am/ chu la sbyin pa byin no zhe'am/ des bdag yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po la sbyin pa byin na/ sbyin pa de yongasu ma dag pa
383b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gang 'jigs pa'i phyin chom po la stsogs pa la sbyin pa byin te/ thun mong ma yin pa lnga byin na yongasu ma dag pa yin no// dug sbyin pa dang / mtshon cha sbyin pa dang / srog chags
383b4(dkon brtsegs): bsad de sha sbyin pa dang / bag med pa rnams la chang sbyin pa dang / 'di dag ni bdag gir 'gyur te/ bdag gi rim gro dang mchod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems can bsdu ba dang / 'thob
383b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir bsdu ba sbyin pa dang / gang brjod pa dang / sgra dang tshig su bcad pa'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa dang / gang gar dang klu dang bzhad gang dang / rtsed mo dang / gtam dang / dga' bar
383b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir rol mo mkhan rnams la byin pa byin na/ sbyin pa de yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang bzi mtshan ma'i phyir skar mkhan la sbyin pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gang gzhan gyi nor mdza'
383b7(dkon brtsegs): bo la sbyin pa dang / gang gi khyim 'am zhing la gzhan gyi 'bru'i phung po 'am/ nas dang gro'i phung po la ri dgas dang / bya za la de de la dga' ba dang mgu ba bskyed na de yang sbyin pa yongasu
383b8(dkon brtsegs): mngag min no// gang bzo byor skyid pa byin pa dang / gang yang lus mi bdebs 'jigs pa'i phyir sman pa la sbyin pa dang / gang yang spong ba rnams la srung brgyad de/ tshog pa zabar
384a1(dkon brtsegs): bya bya/ byas pas/ sbyin pa byin na de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yang sbyin pa byin pa 'di'i rnam par smin pa yod dam med ces the tsom za na/ de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin//
384a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang sbyin pa byin nas gdung ba dang 'gyod pas gdungs na de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yang sbyin pa byin nas gang bdag las khyer ba thams cad kyis tshe phyi ma la slar sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam du/
384a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu sems bskyed na de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'di ni bdag nyid kyis spyad kyi sems can gzhan gang la yang ma gyur cig snyan du de ltar sems skyed na de yang yongasu
384a4(dkon brtsegs): ma dag pa yin no// gang lang co la bab pas sbyin pa byin pa dang / phyir dar phyid dang rga ba'i gnas dang / na bas gzir ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnad du phog pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang / snang ba dang / 'chi
384a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mya ngan du gyur pa na sangs rgyas pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa med rtsa lag rnams kyis byed du bcug ste/ sbyin gnas rnams la sbyin pa byin na/ de yang yongasu ma pa yin no// gang yul gzhan na gnas na yang
384a6(dkon brtsegs): yul dang gnas gage mo zhes bya ba na bdag sbyin bdag tu grags par 'gyur ro snyam du grags rgyur sbyir pa byin na/ de yang yong su ma dag pa yin no// gang yang kha zas gtong mi 'bod pa la 'jig rten
384a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma ngaga' ba mamangs/ sbyin pong ba'i nyas pa ni 'jig rten gyis pang sagam te skyed babyin/ di yang yongasum dag pa yin no// gang yang byung med zhing rgyas kyi chung mablang ba'i 'tshal
384a8(dkon brtsegs): rab rgya rgya kya zung med kyi nas shes dang sa tshul pa byas pa zu dang / rnam sa sa nga/ rdodzo pa/ 'du sa @
384b1(dkon brtsegs): byi ru dang / du gu la'i ras la stsogs pas mgu bar byed ma de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yang 'di ltar bdag la nor ni mang du yod na/ bdag la bud med de/ bdag gis gang
384b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa la gtong bar bya'o snyam ste/ sbyin pa byin na/ de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yang tshe 'di la byin pas 'jig rten pha rol tu rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i sems kyis
384b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byin na/ de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang me tog dang 'bras bu dang zang zing 'dod pas dbul ba dang bkren pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa/ gos dengs shing dri ma can rnams bkol
384b4(dkon brtsegs): te bor la/ phyag ba rgya chen po thob pa dag la sbyin pa byin na/ de yang sbyin pa yongasu ma dag pa yin te/ drang srong chen po rnams rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag na sbyin pa byin yang yongasu
384b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ma yin par blta'o// drang srong chen po de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni/ tsha rko can gyi zhing la sa bon btab pa mi gu skye ba bzhin du blta te/ sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa na med
384b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang shing dang sa bon gyi nyes pas me tog dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro// drang srang chen po 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig gi zhing gang 'dod pa'i sadzen
384b7(dkon brtsegs): khyer tam rmongs ma bsal ba'i zhing la btab na/ de'i sa bo lnga gnas pa del char bab nas 'das na mngon mi za bar myu gu su nus par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang me rta pa dang
384b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dram za na mi 'gyu // drang byung can pa 'dzin du byur pa de'i rnam par dbye ba yang bsam 'dang / myur ba kun nas ni ni mngos pam du byar bas 'jus bu rnam par smin bachug
385a1(dkon brtsegs): / por mi 'gyur ro// de nas drang song chen po rgyas pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad mkhyen pa
385a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'thun pa'i rnam par smin pa skye dgu rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba 'byin pa ni brtan lag so/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal na
385a3(dkon brtsegs): byin pa'i rnam par smin pa chab mi 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po khyod sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa nyon cig/ drang srong chen po dad
385a4(dkon brtsegs): pas gang cung zad ci byin pa de dag thams cad ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o// drang srong chen po gang yang 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pas snod la mi rtog par ma bslangs par yang tshul khrims
385a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la dad pa bskyed nas/ mig phye ste/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin na/ drang srong chen po de ni byin bdag yin no//
385a6(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po gzhan yang sbyin pa lnga yong su rdzogs par bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dzin po dang nang dang / nang g.yog dang / chos smras pa dang / yul gzhan du 'gro ba la dus su sbyin pa ste/
385a7(dkon brtsegs): lnga po de dag go// gzhan yang lnga ste/ chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa dang / gnas sbyin pa dang / mar me sbyin pa dang / spos dang 'phreng ba sbyin pa'o// drang srong chen po rgyas pas gsol pa/
385a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa yong su dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dad pa bskyod de sems can thams cad la dmigs shing byams pa dang ldanan pa dang ldan pa'i
385b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis gus par byas te/ dul bas sbyin pa byin pa de thams cad ni yongasu dag pa yin no// thar par bsngos te sbyin pa ni yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa bla na med pa lnga ste/
385b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no// dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin ni bla na med pa yin no// chos smra ba la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no// nang pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni
385b3(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yin no// pha ma la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no// gzhan yang sbyin pa chen por 'gyur ba ni rgyal po rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug las nyams pa la sbyin pa byin pa chen po yin no// rgyal pos
385b4(dkon brtsegs): mnar pa dang / mgon med pa dang / nad pa la sbyin pa byin pa chen po yin no// rgyal pos spangs nas gzhan na yang nyams nga zhing srog chad la khad pa 'chi 'chi la thug pa las gsol na sbyin pa chen po
385b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// na ba la sman byin na/ sbyin pa chen po yin no// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la dus su byin pa byin na 'bras bu chen po yin no// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/
385b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong bas phun sum tshogs pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no// dud 'gro'i
385b7(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas su song ba bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / ri dgas la stsogs pa la mi 'jigs pa byin na byin pa chen po yin no// gang la gang dgos pa dang / mi bdog pa de'i bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par
385b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin te/ drang srong chen po de ltar na sbyin pa byin pa yongasasu dag pa dang / sbyin pa chen po yin no// sbyin pa yong su dag pa 'di ni dag 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa dag bsgom par bya'o//
386a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag gzhan dag gis de ltar bskul na dad pa dang dang ba bskyed de/ sbyin pa yongs su dag pa 'di la rjes su yid rang bar 'gyur ba de dag mtshungs par bas
386a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams skyed pa po dang / sbyin bdag tu 'gyur te/ de ltar na gang rje su mi rang ba dang / gang bskul ba de dag thams cad bsod nams skyed pa bor mtshungs par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gang sangs rgyas
386a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa na/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i bsod nams zad par 'gyur zhes khyod kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs
386a4(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu nyon la yid la bzung shig dang ngas bshad do// drang srong chen po gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa mchod pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni
386a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs mnyam zhing 'dra'o zhes nga 'chad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni chos kyi skus rab tu bye ba yin gyis/ gzugs kyi sku rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro// gang la la zhig 'dug
386a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod na sems mtshungs pa'i phyir 'di gnyis la bsod nams kyi khyad par cung zad kyang med do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
386a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos rig su gtogs pa rnams la bsgo ga/ nga'i gang gis kyang deng phyin cang srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun gyi tshig 'byin pa dang /
386a8(dkon brtsegs): tha ma dang ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba 'byin pa mi bya'o// brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bsgo la/ de la mi la las rgyal pos bsgo
386b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de thos nas/ bsgo ba rnams rjesu srung na/ rgyal po des lus la mchod pa byed pa ma yin mod kyi/ rgyal po ngas bsgo ba bzhin du de dag kyang byas so snyam ste/ dga' bar 'gyur ro// de dag rgya
386b2(dkon brtsegs): po des bstan cing bsgo ba rab tu srung zhing srog gcod pa la stsogs pa kun srung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang dag rgyal
386b3(dkon brtsegs): po des bstan cing bsgo ba mi srung zhing / mi dge ba'i las la sbyor ba de dag mi dge ba'i las byed pas tshe 'di la rgyal po de las sdug bsngal rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/ 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas
386b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang log par lhung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du gang dag gis nga la gzugs kyi skur mthong la bslab pa rnams rje su mi srung ba de dag gi ci 'thob par 'gyur zhe na/ de dag gi
386b5(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba bskyed nas lhas sbyin bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dag nga la yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa na bslab pa rnams srung ba dang / mchod pa yang byed par 'gyur
386b6(dkon brtsegs): ba re dag nings mchog dam par shes/ drang srong chen po da ltar mchog tu byin te/ sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pas ma nges pa'i sems
386b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la ming bsgrags pas kyang / bslab pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o/ drang srong chen po gangal la zhig yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/ 'das pa'i 'ag tu mcheng ba byed pa de 'dug pa sa
386b8(dkon brtsegs): pa can du chu sa rna ma thamams cad da ba mas rnams par bya ba pa byed pa mas can bangams can ca mas rgyang chub kyi gyu pa byas
387a1(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po 'di rtsa snyed bar na/ rgya dgas kyi 'das du sdug pa' ning dus btang sa char pa'i rgyan 'bab pa'i rgyas ngazhi par 'gyur ro// drang grang chen pad bzhin du sbyin
387a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsodo nams kyi tshogs chen po sdud par 'gyur ba/ sbyin pa'i tshogs de yang sbyin pa pa nyid kyi rgyud la dad pa'i bya bab na/ sbyin pa po nyid kyi rgyud la stsogs par 'gyur mod kyi sbyin pa byu pa de yang
387a3(dkon brtsegs): phung por gnas pa 'am/ sbyangs par gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas par mi 'gyur ro// yang yang 'di ltar sbyin pa byin pa de'i byin pa de ni/ sbyin pa po de grib ma bzhin du rje su 'brang bar 'gyur te/
387a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas sbyin pa des bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de mthong yang bsod nams de khong du mi chud do// drang song chen po 'di lta ste dper na rgun 'bru dang bu ram shing ma btsa ba de la khu ba mi dmigs kyi
387a5(dkon brtsegs): btsir nas dmigs te/ rgun 'bru dang bu ram shing de'i khu ba de yang phung por gnas pa 'am/ sbyangs par gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas par mi snang ngo // khu ba de ni rgun 'bru re re dang / bu ram
387a6(dkon brtsegs): shing gi dum bu re re'i nang du 'dus pa yang ma yin no// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin pa de yang sbyin pa po'i lag pa'i rtse mo dang / snying dang brang la rnam par mi gnas te/ sbyin pa de rnam par smin
387a7(dkon brtsegs): ba mi 'byin pa yang ma yin la/ sbyin bdag 'dor ba yang ma yin no// ji ltar rkun 'bru dang / bu ram shing bor na/ khu ba de dmigs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag med na/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin
387a8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur te/ tshe'i 'du byed ma btang bar skyid pa'i rnam par smin pa snang ba ma yin no// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ shi n+ya gro has thom pam 'bus par zhing du snang bar mi 'gyur ro/
387a9(dkon brtsegs): ngacanan du byung ba 'ams thams 'bras cu blang bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di gra dab sa kyang bal la nis rdzas kyi phyog cung du zhig byeng te/ yul gzhan gyi gleng khyer du mngams
387b1(dkon brtsegs): tshong 'dus khyad par can du rang gi rdzas nor chen por rgyas par bsgrubs te/ de'i nor de nyung ngu las mang por gyur pa dang / sbrang rtsi'i sbrang mas me tog ma rung bar byas pa lngar/ sbyin bdag
387b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa yang cher stsogs par 'gyur ro// dper na sprin ni mo 'ongs pa'i char pa'i chu rab tu 'dzin to// de bzhin du sbyin bdag kyang rnam par smin pa 'phel bar byed de/ drang srong chen po de ltar
387b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bdag bsod nams 'phen par byed cing sbyin pa byin no// de'i 'bras bu la yang spyod do// de bas na len pas sbyin pa shes par byed do// drang srong chen po bsod nams shes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol tu rdzogs
387b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa 'am/ mthu rtsal thob pas srung ba ste/ de bas na bsod nams shes bya'o// 'jig rten pha rol nas gcig nas gcig tu lus dang longs spyod skyed par byed pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa
387b5(dkon brtsegs): rol gyi zhes bya bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ni bka' stsal to// bcom ldan
387b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnam par nas pa lus su dza ltar 'jug/ rnam par shes pa 'di ji ltar na lus la chags pa sbeng// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen pa 'di ltar gyi dbar sa/ rgyal po
387b7(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gyis dbus na 'dug na pha rol gyi dmag gis 'jigs pas/ thob ma nyid du 'obs mo zhing rdzas dang sran dang / 'braja na slob dpon dang skyes bu dang pa'i sdud par byed cing rgyal mtshan
387b8(dkon brtsegs): brnamams du rnams sla'o// blang ba che dang / bamang po mang gis rol byed do// rigs dang nags gnas bams cad dang nang 'das tshugs pa bams cad srung ngo // dngag mi rnams
388a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang nod kyis sbas nas/ 'di skad du thams cad kyang 'bab mo 'dod par gyis te/ so so'i lag mthogs la ral gyi byung ste/ nyin mtshan makal bar 'dug shig ces brno
388a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ pha rob kyi dmag rta dang / glang po chen dang / mir 'dres pa ma 'ongs pa dang / 'di ltar rgyal po ngas bdag gi dmag dbugs 'byin cing / pha rol gyi dpung rang gi bsod nams zad pa dang / mthu rtsal
388a3(dkon brtsegs): zang ba dang / mtshon gyi smras pa dang / bam par ma gyur gyi bar du 'khor la grags mi rnyed par sbyang bar byed do// drang srong chen po de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po lus kyi grong khyer du song nas/ skye mched
388a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer la mi rtag pa'i ngo bor gnas par mthong nas de'i tshe dad pa'i 'obs rko bar byed/ brtson 'grus la gnas te 'dug/ bzod pa'i go tsa gyon/ rtsom pa chen po com/ chos glang po che rgyags par
388a5(dkon brtsegs): byed/ ye shes kyi rta la gzhon zhing rgyug ste/ skye mched kyi grong khyer la 'di skad ces bag yod par ci bya ba dus su gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi dpung thub par dka' ba/ mi rtag pa'i dmag dpag
388a6(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa 'ong gis nga myur du sbyin pa'i gotso gyon cig/ ye shes kyi mtshon thogs shig/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel song ba'i sgyogs sbyor cig/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gtong ba'i srungs ma zhog shig
388a7(dkon brtsegs): ces skul lo// de dag kyang pha rol gyi dmag nye bar gnas pa de dang phan tshun mi 'thun pas 'bros so// de dag dang mi mthun pas skye mched kyi grong khyer de zhig nas rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po de lus kyi grong
388a8(dkon brtsegs): khyer dab na/ dmul la byongs nas 'bros// rnam par shes pa thos nas lus dang dbang ba'i tshogs khams kyi sbrul gyis gang bas skye mched drug zhis nas/ dbang pa med pa yid bca
388b1(dkon brtsegs): du mi rung ba'i lus kyi grong khyer 'jig par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal pos lus kyi grong khyer bor nas lus gzhan yongasu 'dzin par byed de/ de ltar na rnam par shes
388b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di rgyal po ltar blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pas bsod nams su nye bar mchi ba 'am/ bsod nams
388b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags par nye bar mchi ba 'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar mchi ba'i lus ji ltar rab tu 'tshal/ rnam par shes pa 'di gnyis kyis bdag gi lus 'di yongasu btang ngam/ mi btang snyam du ji ltar
388b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po 'di lta te dper na skyes bu rgya mtsho chen po rgal bar 'dod pas gzings chen po'i steng du 'dug nas/ chu'i nang du zhugs
388b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i rlabs rgyud mar byung bas dkrugs pa mthon dman can/ kum bi ra ma rungs pa/ 'dzin khri dang chu srin byis pa bsod dang / sbrul yod pa'i chu de'i tshu rol gyi 'gras nas
388b6(dkon brtsegs): rlung gis phul nas 'bad mi dgongs shing / gnod pa med la bde bar gnas te/ pha rol gyi 'gram du phyinas par gyur to// chu'i klung rab tu 'jigs pa de las thar pas gzings de la dga'
388b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ gzings 'dis bdag mtsho chen po 'di las rgal to snyam bsams nas/ gzings de la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ gzings de la rab tu mchod pa byas so// drang srong chen po/
388b8(dkon brtsegs): nga bzhin du gang bas nganams byas pa'i sems can 'di ni 'dinas ni 'phos pa de'i rnam par shes pa de 'di sam du sems te/ lus 'dis bdag bde 'gro lnga dang mir skye ba yongasu bzung ba dang /
389a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas bdag don yod par mi lus thob par 'gyur ro// lus 'dis bdag ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal te/ 'dis lhar skye ba'i gnas yongasu bzung ngo zhes
389a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar lus de la dga' ba bskyed nas bdag gis 'di la mchod pa legs par bya'o snyam mo/ phyis lus de gzings bzhin du bor nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'o// gang rang gis lus kyi
389a3(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma byas pa de'i rnam par shes pa de ni ji ltar gzings rul pas cho chen po de'i nang du 'bying zhing zhig ste ma rung bar gyur nas/ skyes bu de yang nyam thag ste/ gzings zhig pa des
389a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs bzhin du 'gram du phyin nas kyang seng ge stag yod pa'i 'jigs sar phyin par gyur nas 'di skad ces zer ro// gzings rul pas nyon mongs kyi steng du/ log par song nas mtsho chen po'i chu'i
389a5(dkon brtsegs): rlabs kyis dkrugs pa/ sbrul gyis glongs par zhugs so zhes gzings de la de skad smra'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di bsod nams ma yin pa byas pa'i lus la brten pas ngan song gi sar song nas
389a6(dkon brtsegs): lus de la 'di skad zer ro// sdig pa'i lus 'dis ci zhig rnyeng na sdig pa can gyi lus mngon par grub nas/ bdag khu re lta bus non par gyur/ bdag lus rul pa 'di'i rgyus ngan song du mngon par
389a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs shing zhugs te/ mchil bas 'dzin pa bzhin nomam mo// de ltar rnam par shes pa legs par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis bzings bzang ma mazhin du 'bor ba las rgal bar byed do//
389a8(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma yin pas ni log par ltung bar byed do// de ltar na rnam par shes pas bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i lus rnam pa 'di gnyis
389b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes so// yang rnam par shes pas lus 'di yongasu btang nas gzhan lus gnyis par 'gro zhing nye bar 'gro'o// de mngal na gnas pa'i tshe zhig bdun gyi bar du rnam par shes pas/ bdag
389b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'dir 'ongs so// las 'di byas so// bdag gis las 'di byas so zhes dran nas de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dga' bzhin du 'gro'o// de rum na gnas pa na de'i ma la ma
389b3(dkon brtsegs): ma gsum 'byung ngo // gsum gang zhe na/ bzhin mdzum zhing de'i bzhin d+hi rnyi po ma yin pa dang / bzhin lha'i kha dog lta bur 'gyur zhing rkang pa g.yas pa la rab tu gnon la/ dku g.yas pa la lam
389b4(dkon brtsegs): du mar nyug pa dang / de gos dkar po dang rab tu mdzes te/ bsod nam su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma ni gzugs de lta bur blta'o// drang srong chen po gang
389b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pas skyes par gyur pa de zhag bdun gyi bar du bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so// sdig pa'i las ni byas so zhes de lta bu dran par 'gyur ro//
389b6(dkon brtsegs): de de lta bu dran nas yid mi bde ba skye'o// yid mi bde ba skyes pa de'i ma la lhas mang du 'byung bar blta ste/ lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba dang / lus ring par 'gyur ba dang / lus la sems khyab
389b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / yang dang yang du bzhin khro gnyer sdud par 'gyur ba dang / gang tshun chad sems de mngal du skyes par gyur pa/ de tshun cad khyim der nyon mongs pa dang / gnod pa dang nang ma
389b8(dkon brtsegs): bor 'gyur ro// sems can de btsas pa'i tshe/ yang na ni ma 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ yang na ni bdag nyid mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma rung bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po de lta bu'i
389b9(dkon brtsegs): ni bsod nams ma yin pas nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can du blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la rnam par shes pa thog ma
390a1(dkon brtsegs): la ma sa du sa su
390a2(dkon brtsegs): thas ma gyungs nga/ bye 'tshal dang / nga dang yang/ gas kyi yang sa/ ma napa ma pa 'a
390a3(dkon brtsegs): tu yi du 'ong ba'i bsod nams byed bya ba'i sems can gyis gang bar mthong ngo // lha'i shes pa'i snang bas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma rjesu dran no// rjes su dran zhing rje su dran nas kyang dga' ba bskyed/
390a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni skye ba lnga brgyar bdag gi mar gyur to// zhes de ltar rab tu shes te/ de ltar rje su dran nas ma de la chags par mi byed cing / 'dod chags dang bral ba skyed do// kye ma'o 'di ltar yang
390a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal te 'khor bas ni chog go/ yongasu 'dzin pa des kyang chog go snyam mo// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
390a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// 2bcom ldan 'das sems can de mi chags na 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po thams cad
390a7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ni ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa de ni gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa med par ma gyur pa/ 'khor bar mi
390a8(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bu'i gnas med do// bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang / migayo bar nye bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen
390b1(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni 'di ltar blta ste/ rnam par shes pa gang de ltar sems dpa' de ni rnam par shes pa'i shas che bar blta te/ lus kyi shas che bas ni mi nuso// rnam par shes pa ni tshor bar byed pa/
390b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa ni sems ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// drang srong chen po khyod kyis rnam par shes pa de de ltar khong du chud bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
390b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// dgra rnams thams cad shin tu bsrung // nyon mongs stsogs pa byed pa po// shes dang mi shes shes pa po// shes rab dang ni gti mug ldan// lha dang nga
390b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ma rig dang // rnam par shes pa kun la yod// rnam par shes pa med par ni// gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa med par ni// de dag 'du bar mi 'gyur te//
390b5(dkon brtsegs): cig car gyur na 'du bar 'gyur// gcig min 'khor lo shing rta bzhin// skyes bu mnyam du 'du ba ni// nyid dang gzhan dang gnyi gis min// glang gnyis ji lta bzhin du'o// shing
390b6(dkon brtsegs): sna sbyar gnyis dang ni// 'khor lo gnyi su ldan pa dang // thag pa dag gis bcing byas pa// shing rta zhes ni yongs grags// de ltar lus kyi shing rta yang // khams kyi 'du 'phrong
390b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams las 'byung // de las dbang po ldan 'gyur te// rnam par shes pas rab tu bstan// gnang dang mtsham su sbyor ba dang // de ltar rtsa dang 'jing chu dang // sgra dang rus pa so dang
390b8(dkon brtsegs): mgo/ sen ma pags pas mdog byas dang // rgyu mgro ba mkhal ma dang // snying dang mtsher ba tshil bu dang // thams cad mnyam du 'dus pa las// lus ni shin du gnas pa
391a1(dkon brtsegs): yin// de la khams ni lus chen te// sems las dngos po kun byung bas// de phyir rnam par shes kyir 'dod// de ni kha lo sgyur bar 'dod//
391a2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po gzhan yang rnam par shes pa 'di ni phra ba gzugs med pa/ bstan tu med pa/ mi mngon pa ste/ 'di ni kha dog dang / dbyigs dang / gzugs kyi dbang po ma yin no//
391a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rags pa bor ba'i phyi na/ rnam par shes pa blta ba bzhin med de mi'i snying 'phar ba dang / 'jigs pa gang las byung ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa gang
391a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de thams cad ni rnam par shes pa'i shas che ba yin gyi lus kyi shas che ba ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
391a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi rang bzhin ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ sems can dmyal bar nye bar mchi ba dang / yings su nye bar mchi ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su nye bar mchi
391a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rang bzhin ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ ji ltar lhar nye bar mche ba dang / ji ltar mir nye bar mchi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gang lags par
391a7(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bgyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gang gis lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur// mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yid ga su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di
391a8(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po khyod sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /
391b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho dang skye ba nyon cig/ yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'di ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i yul yin no// 'di ni lha rnams dang tshangs pa la stsogs pa 'og min la thug pa rnams kyi ma yin te/
391b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nyan thos kyi skyabs kyang ma yin na/ sems can gzhan rnams kyi lha ga la yin// drang srong chen po gang dri ma gsum spangs pa chos nyid dang po thob pa/ nga'i bstan pa la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i yul
391b3(dkon brtsegs): ni yin te/ lha dang drang srong thams cad kyi ni ma yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / drang srong rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgas 'khogs btugs
391b4(dkon brtsegs): bsad da 'bras bya rnams la bsal ba'i rngo mi thog go// bdag khur chen po bkur ba'i rngo mi thog go// bdag dang bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang tha ba thang spangs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su
391b5(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o// bdag deng slan cad slob ma dang bcas g.yog dang bcas te gsum la skyabasu mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das lha'i rten nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba gang du gyur pa da bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
391b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la rab yid la zung shig dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / lhas gang yin pa ngas bshad do// drang srong
391b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di la me tog dang / spos dang 'phreng ba sbyin pa dang / bsten pa dang bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pa dang / dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni/ 'chi ba'i dus byas na 'phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye'o//
391b8(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de'i lus dri rab tu zhi ba'i spos kyis bsgos pa'i me tog bzhin du snang ngo // drang srong chen po de la me tog gi char mang po bab nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur
392a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus la me tog sna tshogs rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur/ de'i rtse lag snying du sdug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang me tog thogs shing mya ngan byed par 'gyur/ de'i bzhin gyi mdog snum
392a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ de'i mig ha tsang btsums pa yang ma yin/ ha cang phye ba yang ma yin par 'gyur/ rkang lag legs par spyang na yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rtags 'di
392a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'byung ngo // 'di lta bu'i lhas kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa/ me tog sna tshogs rab tu sbyangs pa/ me tog tha dad pas mdzes par byas pa/ bud med brgya stong gis bskor mthong nas/ rtsa lag
392a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la 'di skad smras te/ bdag gis rmi lam na khang pa brtsegs pa'i lha'i me tog sna tshogs pa dang / me tog gi lnga ldi sbyangs pa lha'i me tog bkram pa/ bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba de lta bu
392a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo zhes/ bdag gis rtsa lag smras nas/ de dag gis kyang 'breng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye bar rig go// de'i che ba'i dus byas nas/ 'phreng ba thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye ba na/ pha dang ma 'dus pa mthong nas/
392a6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba yong su 'dzin to// 'phreng ba thogs pa de dag kyang gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis spang par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu gling ba'i mi bzhin no// de la de dag gis rnam par shes pa phan tshun 'dres
392a7(dkon brtsegs): shing / dga' ba tsam gyis non pas 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ de dag khu ba 'byung ba ni ma yin no// drang srong chen po lha de dag ni lha mos mngal na zhag bdun du 'dzin to// zhag bdun 'das nas rku g.yas pa
392a8(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung ngo // drang srong chen po riji'i mangs nas byung nas/ lha'i ma tog dri rab tu nim pa/ mchog tu yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs brgyus pa'i phreng ba zang las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ drang srong cheran po/
392b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phreng ba dri rab tu zhim pa'i ngang rlung gis bdeg nas phyogs kun tu dpag tshad tsam du 'gro'o// 'phreng ba de la kha dog bdun yod pa 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang dmar po dang / ser po dang sngon po dang / be dur+ya
392b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rma dang bad ma ram las lhag pa ste/ bstan sku ge ba sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba de dag dem shi bar du ma sris par thogs par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir 'breng thogs pa shes bya'o// drang srong chen po 'phreng thogs kyi
392b3(dkon brtsegs): lha de dag gis gnas den/ shing sngon pas cang yang mi ring / bcang yang mi thung ba/ 'bras du sna tshogs bcang yang mi gyur/ ha cang yang mi mngang la bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba'i ro bro mang po lnga'i bro ba yam pas
392b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad dang ldan pa dag yod do// drang srong chen po shing de dag gi 'bras bu de dag gi tshad ni shing rtog bil ba tsam mo// de dag gi nang nas lha rnams gang dang gang za bar 'dod pa'i zas de dang de dag la nye bar gnas te/
392b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni 'bras bu ba za ba lha'i kham gyis za ba'i zas can ni ma yin no// drang srong chen po lha de dag gis phyogs ni rab tu rno ba'i tsher ma'i bag med pa/ me tog gis mdzes par byas pa/ ne'u gsing gis khebs
392b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gser dang / dngul gi 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ yid tsam ser ba lta bur snang ba'o// drang srong chen po gnas de na phreng ba thogs pa'i lha de dag lha'i bu mchog tu 'bar ba'i gos dang /
392b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan can skar krung dang // kha khyer dang / bu shu'i ngos la rgyu ba/ bde ba dang ying bde ba mchog dang ldan pa dag dang gnas so// de na drug tshe'i tshad ni la kis stong thub bo// den che zad pa'i sgras 'byung ba
392b8(dkon brtsegs): ni shing gang gi drung na 'dug 'dug pa'i zhing nga lo ma nyis/ yal ga 'byang / me tog dang / dri yang med par 'gyur te/ sems can de yang shing drung ngen/ mi dga' ba rnyed par 'gyur de'i phreng ba sngon ma rnaMs/
393a1(dkon brtsegs): @pa de yang rnyis par 'gyur/ lha'i 'jig rten gyi rlung bsil zhing bde bar ldang ba de yang dro bar ldang bar 'gyur ba ste/ de'i gnas de dag mthong nas lha'i bu mo de dag nga ro gcig tu
393a2(dkon brtsegs): snying rje rje skad smre sngags 'don no// sems can de yang mtho ris kyi grong khyer lha'i shing me tog dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa dang / lha'i bu me'i tshogs dang 'dre ba yongasu btang nas/ bsod nams zad
393a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba 'di ni mtho ris kyi nyes pa'o// drang srong chen po de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis de'i mtha' bskor nas nyams thag chen po'i sgra 'dus te/ kyi hud mi rtag pa 'di ni snying rje med pa'o// 'di ltar
393a4(dkon brtsegs): snying la dga' ba skyes shing 'khod 'khod pa las mi 'dod bzhin du/ dbang med par mtho ris nas lhung ngam/ e ma'o lha gzhon nu dmyur du mi'i 'jig rten du mi'i skye bar gyur cig ces mya ngan byed pa na/
393a5(dkon brtsegs): rims drag pos btab nas de rims drag po gnon to// de'i lus gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// lus 'bar bas gnas de nas shi 'pho bar 'gyur te de'i 'bar ba de khar zhi bar 'gyur ro// ring nas
393a6(dkon brtsegs): shi 'thos nas pa dang ma 'dus pa mthong bas skyes pa yong su 'dzin to// drang srong chen po 'phreng thog su ge bar 'gro da'i lha'i bu de 'di ltar skye bar bzla ste/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe lhas 'byung ba ni gams
393a7(dkon brtsegs): bam mnyan dang blos dang zang pa 'dod pa dang / 'bras cu sna tshogs 'dzang ba dag nags tshal sna tshags sgrus po nyams dpa' ba 'dod par 'gyur/ 'ad ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur lus lan
393a8(dkon brtsegs): bamed pa mang san 'byi par 'argya ba can thal man pa mngams snga tshogs kyi chong 'dus ma tsam gi phreng bskyengs pa'i grong khyer mthong ste/ 'di dag ni de'i mas sus mthong ba'o// drang srong chen po
393b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang lha gzhon nu de btsas nas/ 'phreng ba thogs pa'i lha las shi 'phos pas/ shin du dga' ba chen po skye'o// gos dkar po la dga' bar 'gyur// mdzes pa dang ldan par 'gyur/
393b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur/ 'dod pa rab tu chags shing 'gro ba dang rgyu ba 'phyar bar can dang / dus ston dang / ltad mo dang / phra ba'i gos la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur// kun dga'
393b3(dkon brtsegs): rab 'gyur ba dang / pha rol 'byor pa mthong na 'dod pa ste/ drang srong chen po 'di dag ni 'phreng thogs kyis lha las mir skye ba'i ltas su blta ba dag go// drang srong chen po gan yang rgyal chen
393b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyes pa'i lhas dang / 'chi 'pho lhas su lta ba ni drang srong chen po 'di la dman pa 'am mgon med pa la zas bzang po dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang kun 'thung ba'i chu grang
393b5(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / chu mgi dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / lu ma dang / rdzing bu dang / khron par mi 'gyur khron chu byin nas dad pa dang yid rab tu dga' zhing / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nyon mongs pa'i
393b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba med pa'i lus su 'gyur// de'i lus ring bar mi 'gyur/ mdog ngan par mi 'gyur/ rdul dang dri ma chags par mi 'gyur/ de'i lus la nyam nga ba'i tshor ba mi 'byung / skang dman
393b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rtsa lag dang 'bral zhing gdung ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ de bkres pa dang skom pas nyen par mi 'gyur/ de'i lus bskum pa dang sbyang ba la stsogs pas sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur/ bshang
393b8(dkon brtsegs): gci 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ yul las yongasu nyams pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ de'i dbang po zhum par mi 'gyur ste/ de lta bu 'di ni mtho ris kyi bde ba dang ldan zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par
394a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de'i lus yongasu btang nas rnam par shes pa de rab tu dga' bar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye mos tshal dang / nags tshal sdug po'i nang du
394a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ro// de 'chi kar lha'i ris de mthong nas/ bzhin me tog pad ma lta bur 'gyur/ de'i kha nas dri zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la me tog sna tshogs dri dang ldan pa'i rlung
394a3(dkon brtsegs): rjesu mthun pa ldang bar 'gyur// de shi nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang na pa ma 'dus nas skyed mo tshal na rtse zhing 'dod pa myong bas rgyags dregs nas lag pa g.yas pas lha mo'i lte ba la
394a4(dkon brtsegs): reg par mthong nas de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa lha mo'i phreng bar skye ba yongasu 'dzin to// de zhag bdun 'das nas dri ma med pa'i rna tsam du bu can gi mgo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nur mngon par grub te/
394a5(dkon brtsegs): dgod pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / 'dod pa'i long spyod skyed nus so// drang srong chen po de la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis phyogs ni dngul dang ldong ros rnam par bkram pa sna tshogs
394a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis spras shing mdzes par byas pa/ lha mo brgya stong gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i gnas mthong ba/ rang bzhin gis mdzes pa/ reg na bde ba'i rlung ldang ba'o// drang srong chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i
394a7(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha de dag gi skyed mo 'tshal dpag tshad khri bzhi stong gru bzhi lham pa nor bu sgron mas snang bar byas pa/ shing gi yal ga dang / rtse mo dpag sems kyi shing gi ras bcus bu dang / rgya dar
394a8(dkon brtsegs): la'i lnga ldi sbyangs pa/ nags tshal gyi bar 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba/ khyim gyi bar na rtag tu pi bang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga'i sgra 'byung ba'o// drang srong chen po lha'i gnas na gnas pa
394b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag zas kham gyis zas can de dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang / kha dog dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs par rig par bya'o// de dag re re la yang gser gzhong gnyis
394b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis yod do// de na gang zas gang 'dod pa de'i de phun sum tshogs par gzhong pa de las 'grub par 'gyur ro// lha'i me tog gi khu ba ro dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub ste/ de ni me tog gi chang
394b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// drang srong chen po chang de ni rab tu zhim pa mchog tu bde ba/ bsil ba dris kyang ra ro ba mngon par 'grub na/ 'thungs pas lta ci smos te/ de na gzhon nur ro bar 'gyur ro// drang
394b4(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis ngag gi gzhal med khang ni mdzes byed ces bya ste/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa'i khri shing gis mdzes par byas pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje 'bar ba'i ka
394b5(dkon brtsegs): ba brgya stong gi phyogs phyogs shin tu brtan pa lha'i mal tsa dang / gting ba bting bas phyogs shin tu rnam par phye ba/ lha'i bu mos bzor byas pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa/
394b6(dkon brtsegs): steg tshig 'jo ba'i rje su chags pa/ lha'i gos 'bar zhing rnam par mdzes pas sbud smad pa/ ka la bing ka dang / bung ba'i tshogs kyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa gzugs rab tu che zhing shin tu gzhon sha
394b7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa/ glu dang / gar dang / bsil snyan dang / 'jam zhing rtse bas rgyags pa'i shas che la rab tu bgegs pa sha stag gis bskor cing gang ba ste/ gnas de'i ka ba ni gser chu dang
394b8(dkon brtsegs): dngul chus rnam par bris pa/ ngar gyi rgyal mtshan sbyangs pa/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba'o// gzhal med khang de dag na 'di lta ste/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang /
395a1(dkon brtsegs): mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po dang / rgyal po chen po blo dag lha'i 'dod pa dang / bde ba dang / rtse ba myong ning rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa/
395a2(dkon brtsegs): glu dang / gar dang / sil snyan dang / lha'i kha zas za bas/ dbang po tshim zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas so// drang srong chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i ris de na lha gzhon nu
395a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag lag ba ring zhing shas rgyas pa/ glang po rgyags pa'i tshul du 'gro ba/ skyes bu stong gi stobs dang rtsa la yod pa/ lha'i lus shin du 'jam pa sha stag go/ de dag gi dri chang gi shas che
395a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dpag tshad khor yug chang drir phyogs par byed do// lha de dag gis che'i tshad ni lo bzhi stong thub te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus mi byed do// de dag thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang /
395a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar gnas so// lha'i ris de na bskal pa bzang po can gser dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis brgyan pa dag nags kyi 'phreng bas mdzes par brgyan pa dga' ba bskyed pa la stsogs pa skyed mos tshal
395a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dring ba med pa rnams na snying dga' ba dang ldan par gnas so// ngadag de na gnas pa nam nyam mi si la ma 'gras zhing / nor bu gser gyis mdzes par byas pa/ shin tu rnam par bye ga/ bkru ba ni pa
395a7(dkon brtsegs): nang bu'i them nas kyis brgyan pa/ zhwa'i bu mo brgya stong bu mun pa len pa/ nar bu'i snong rnams bdag nyid sgra 'byin pa'i rjes su chags pa na/ de dag gnas gnas pa las de dag bsad nams zang bas
395a8(dkon brtsegs): rang bang chung ba mas panyis 'byas/ dam ma tsha ma mi sna sa gyur ni mganas pa mi 'chung dang / lce bu mo dang byung zla ba'i blan pa mams pa// nga chum dus
395b1(dkon brtsegs): yul pa'i lha'i gnas nga mi 'gro te/ lha'i gnas lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis gang ba/ yal ga'i rtse mo la do shal dang / se mo de dang / me tog gi phreng ba sbyangs pa/ nags tshal gyi bar gyi khwa byug rgyags pa'i
395b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra 'byin pa de dag na lha'i bu'i tshogs du zhing gos dri ma can gyon nas sa'i steng na 'gre ldog cing / snying rje rje lhar bltas te/ sa'i steng na 'gre ldog pas/ me tog gi bla res brgyan pa'i phyogs dag na
395b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dga' ba mi rnyed de/ de dag gis lus las dngul 'byung zhing de dag mig mi 'dzums pa las mig 'dzums par 'gyur te/ nya chu'i gnas nas phyung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pa bzhin du phan
395b4(dkon brtsegs): tshun 'gro ldog cing gcig pu sa la gnas par mthong nas/ lha'i bu mo de dag gis bskor te/ snying rje rje ltar lta zhing skad 'thun par du ste/ 'di skad ces kyi hud re sdug kyi hud ro sdug/ kyi hud gzhon
395b5(dkon brtsegs): nu'i mchog de phyogs gang du song / lus che la rgyar sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa/ 'gram pa che la mdzes pa/ brang shin tu rgyas pa skyed mos tshal sna tshogs kyi bar na rgyu ba des bdag cag bor zhing lha yul
395b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lnga'i u ga nas yid du 'das pa yang bar te gar 'gro zhes 'dzer to// de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa sna tshogs legs par bkod// lha'i nags
395b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis shin du brgyan// zas dang dus ston gang gyur pa// rgyal po chen pos gnas byas pa// ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa// bsod nams kyi ni tshong 'dus mchog/ lha'i bud med gang bas dga'// me tog
395b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa yid 'phrog pa// 'or nas mi rtag 'di yis ni// sdug pa dag ni zin te song // de ltar lha'i bu mo de dag gis bskor te/ min ma zag/ skad 'gags shing ring po nyid nas lag pa g.yas/
396a1(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyang / ma thag gtan nas 'dig ces kyi mar grug pa langs pa byung batshama'i 'jig rte dus pa/ da pa mas byas bas nams cas ni rna ba
396a2(dkon brtsegs): mam mas pas kun tu gyub pa'i sa pa su 'ating ba bdas ma gas/ dmi sa rna la ya pa gA/ rnag
396a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus mar gyi thigs pa rdo can la bral ba bzhin no// de'i sa lus yangasu rnyed nas 'drang ba zhes bya ba'i chung gis rab tu 'das te/ rlung des de'i lus stong du gtur nas/ bye ma zhis ma ldanas
396a4(dkon brtsegs): dun mkha'i dkyil nas lhung ngo // de ltar lhung nas mi'i srid par skye ba yongasu len te/ pha ma 'dus pa mthong nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ma'i mngal du skye'o// de thog mar skyes shing
396a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i na gnas pa na/ mtshan ma 'byung ba ni de'i ma de kha zas la rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ gos mar po 'tsher ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur// skye bo sna tshogs phal po che la 'dod
396a6(dkon brtsegs): cing / rtsa lag dang / mdza' ba tsam du 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur/ de de'i mngal na zhugs nas/ mngal na tshor ba skye bar mi 'gyur/ kha nu zag pa dang / chu ser 'byung bar mi
396a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de'i lus na bar mi 'gyur/ de de'i mngal na lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mgo shin tu yongasu rdzogs pa grub nas/ de btsas pa dang gzi brjid dang ldan zhing mthong na rab tu dga'
396a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha'i gtam thos mdaga' ba bskyed par 'gyur/ sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / chang la sred pa dang / shin tu dga' ba'i cha byad 'dzin cing bskyed mos tshal
396b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur/ bud med la dbang po mngon par rab tu chags par 'gyur/ yang dang yang du bas 'dod par 'gyur/ klu dang gar dang si la spyan gyi rjes su 'jug pa gyur/ mdog snum
396b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing sangs por 'gyur/ mig lha'i bai dUr+ya sngon po ltar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di dag ni lus dang sems kyi rgyud kyi bag chags kyis bsgos pas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas shi 'pho ba'i
396b3(dkon brtsegs): ltas su blta'o// drang srong chen po gang srog gcod pa spangs nas dad cing dang bas sbyin pa byin zhing ma byin par len pa dang / bza' ba dang / bcas pa dang / bldag pa dang / bzhi pa dang / yo byad kyi
396b4(dkon brtsegs): khyad par spangs nas/ nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+yal stsogs pa rdzas thams cad rab tu sbyin pa la sten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas nas/ dad pa dang rab tu
396b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i yid kyi me tog gi lnga lding bral ba dang / mchod rten la mngon par phyag 'tshal ba la stsogs pa'i rnam par smin pas/ tshe yongasu zad pa'i dus na lus la nyon mongs pa chung bar 'gyur/
396b6(dkon brtsegs): sbrum pa'i dri ma dang / dring ba rnam par spangs nas/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rjesu dran zhing / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rab tu dang ba'i lhas mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni des lhas yon no/
396b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur/ de'i sku yon por mi 'gyur/ de'i snying 'phar bar mi 'gyur/ ming ba nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung bar mi de'i lus la dbugs nod par mi 'gyur/ de'i
396b8(dkon brtsegs): lus brdung bar mi 'gyur/ dbang po 'gyur ba ma yin// gan lag dang tid lag kun tu chad par mi 'gyur gshis kyi mtshams 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lam gyi steng na 'dre zhing ldog par mi 'gyur/
397a1(dkon brtsegs): dman pa'i tshig lta bu zla bar mi 'gyur/ mas nad kyis 'dru ba'i dus byud bar myu gyur/ ra las tu dus rkye sa/ gan du ba mi wAr
397a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bul brnam pa'i bye shing la lags pas byung bas 'chi ba'i dus byeng ba mi 'ju'o// yid du ma'ang ba'i khabs thos te khe zas mazha bas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi 'gyur/
397a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te ma'i phung po yongasu btang nas kyang / lha'i nang gi rnam par shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams mthong ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang /
397a4(dkon brtsegs): be dur+ya dang / dngul stong gis rnam par brgyan cing / shin du rnam par phye bas sbas pa/ gser gyi nye'u dang / chu srid gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rta babs dang / ba dan gyi mdzes
397a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byas pa/ rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang / gnas sna tshogs kyi bskor ba/ shing mdab chags pas brgyan pa'i nags tshal gyi
397a6(dkon brtsegs): nang na 'dug pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i chus chag chag btab pas 'dam du gyur pa/ lha'i nor bu'i sgron ma'i 'phreng bas brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/ bud med 'bar ba sna
397a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnam par rtse bas mdzes par byas pa/ dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / sor gdub dang / se mo do dang / do shal sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa'i sum
397a8(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams mthong ngo // drang srong chen po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris de na lha'i bu de dag mchog gi skyed mos tshal du song ste/ rtse dga' la dga' dgur spyod
397b1(dkon brtsegs): cing / 'ang pas rgyags myong nas de dag skyed mos chal dang nags tshal dang gi bar du 'tshwa nang dga' ba snyed do// sems can gyi rnam pa rtags pa de bsod nams su nan yin pas/
397b2(dkon brtsegs): can de'i lha dang / lha mo khri gcig gi steng na 'dug par mthong nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis myur ba myur bar nor bu skrad pa la brgyus pa 'tshugs pa bzhin du ma'i ste skye'o// sems cad
397b3(dkon brtsegs): de 'jug pa'i tshe lha mo de'i lag mthil gnyis nas me tog 'byung ngo // sems can des me tog de mthong nas 'jug ste/ lha mi de lha la dga' ba dang / bde ba'i yid kyis lta zhing / lag pa gnyis
397b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis me tog de mnyes nas/ de'i lag pa phrad pa'i rkyen gyis lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de skyes pa'i tshe/ lha mo de lha la lta zhing gzhon nu skyes kyi khyod dga' ba skyed cig ces zer te/ pha ma
397b5(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis yid dga'o// gzhon na de zhag bdun 'das nas/ rna cha sna tshogs 'gul pa 'phyang bar mngon par 'grub po// de zhag bdun 'das nas 'di lta bu dran par 'gyur te/ bdag che ge mo
397b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig nas 'dir 'ongs pa 'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha ma yin no// bdag gi dge ba'i las ni 'di byas snyam du de ltar sems shing nye bar rtog pa na/ dga' ba chen po skye'o// dga' bas myos nas rgyags
397b7(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dod pa la sred par 'gyur/ rgyang ring po nyid nas lha'i gnas yangs pa le bar gnas pa re nges mthong nas/ de la mngon par dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de lha'i 'gros kyi
397b8(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis glang po rgyags pa'i 'gros lhar 'gro ba/ brang che ba lag pa ring zhing rab tu 'phyang ba/ ra stong seng ge 'dra ba/ lce ba zab pa/ rked pa gzhu'i chang zungs lha ba/ skal tshigs rims
398a1(dkon brtsegs): / bzhin du 'dug pa/ brla chu shing gi sdong bu ltar mkhregs pa/ lha'i sgra a ga com dang spu thung ba/ dring ba med pa'i lha'i dri yong su bzung ba/ lus lhab lhub kyis srung ba/
398a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gos 'bar ba bgos pa yid gcig tu brtags kyang lus mdzes pa ste/ de'i lha'i gnas de na lha'i bu mo kha cig gis ni kun nas bskor cing gnas/ kha cig ni rtse dga' la dga' dgur sbed
398a3(dkon brtsegs): cing 'di skad 'dzer to// dza tsa lha'i gnas 'dir snyun mi mang zhing legs par byon tam/ khyod bdag cag gi mgon du gyur cig/ bdag cag lang tsho la bab gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ nu ma gser gyi bum
398a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar 'bur ba/ mchu pad ma 'dra ba/ gzugs sprin gyi nang nas glog 'byung ba dang 'dra ba dag dang / gzhal med khang chen po dang / shing yongasu 'du sa brtol mi gu dang / yal ga chags pa mdzes par
398a5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ bud med drag khri lang long du gyur pa/ 'di dag la jo co dgyes par mdzod cig ces 'dzer to// lha'i gnas pa'i bang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / cang te'u dang / glu dbyangs 'byung ba de dag dang /
398a6(dkon brtsegs): sgra'i gding bas mdzes par byas pa'i seng ge'i khrimathong ngo // nges de mthong nas rgyal bu dar mang po bcings te/ spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba bzhin du/ de seng ge'i khri la 'dzeg nas 'dug go// de de na gnas
398a7(dkon brtsegs): ban rtag tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // lha'i rol mo'i sgra 'byung ngo // phyogs kun nas kyang 'dri lta bu sgra grags te/ 'di ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can de 'jam bu gling nas ni
398a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phos nas bsod nams kyis yongasu bzung bas lha'i gnas 'dir skyes kyis bdag cag gi de'i gan du 'dong ngo // nye bar gnas nas dga' dgur sbyad par bya'o// rol mo dbyangs sgra dang gar gyis brtse
398b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o zhes sgrog so// de bud med drug khri dang / dga' dkur spyod de// de dag thams cad kyang lag na me tog thogs na shin tu dri zhim pa'i cha byad can/ du gu la'i ras kyi gos bgos pa/
398b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyan dam pa dang / rkang gdub sgra snyan pa/ bzhin pad ma lta bu la zla bam lta bus mdzes par byas pa dag sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang mngar ba dang / me tog gi chang gis rgyags shing myos pas
398b3(dkon brtsegs): khyud nas 'dug te/ de dag thams cad 'di skad ces bdag cag thams cad jo bo 'di'i g.yog dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// khyod 'di ni bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsgrubs pa'i mtho ris kyi zhim
398b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing bde ba'i lha'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod shis pa 'di la kun tu spyod cig ces 'dzer to// drang srong chen po lha'i bu de dang lha'i bu mo de dag lhan cig tu dga' tshal dang / 'dus 'tshal dang /
398b5(dkon brtsegs): ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb dang / rnam par mnyam 'phrul dang / rab 'babs dang / seng seng po dang / me tog gi 'phral 'thab dang / shing yongs 'dus bsnol la stsogs pa'i skyed mos
398b6(dkon brtsegs): mal ngam pa mchog tu bde ning bsil ba/ gnod pa'i rlung mad pa lha'i byanama'a' la 'gro zhes bya ba'i sgra snyan pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / thos kyis kun tu
398b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ ban rgya nga/ no thungs/ zlun pa na mang/ tshogs kyis thongs ma zung ba dang / zhwa sung rgyags pa dang / byathA snyan pa 'byin pa/ mabya ga/ mang rnag
398b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam gas can mong ga nor zung ri ma gyi'i mig ses das par bkra shing bkrashis pa yang ga sngam tsho zhing rig 'i du phyi'i mtshulas sgra gang dan pa chog pa 'dun par blams pa/
399a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya pam ya gas dag rgyu
399a2(dkon brtsegs): bangam 'dabs brgyag la byes mang ba/ ranas ning gis mdzes par byas pa/ me tog pa mas byas rgya med du nga ba'i ring bu dgan/ buM dag lha'i bumo brgya blang gis na sa
399a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul rtse brje su myong zhing bde ba gnas so// drang srong chen po de dag na de dag gi skyed mos tshal dang nags tshal gyis gam yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thig le rnam par 'akra ba'i snod mngon par 'grus te/
399a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de dang snod de dag 'dod pa na me tog kun da dang / ku mu da dang / kha ba lta bu dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'i kha zas mngon par 'grub bo// drang srong chen po rin po che snod pa gcig
399a5(dkon brtsegs): la za ba dang / gang gis kha cig gi khams blangs pa ni rin po che'i kha dog lta bur gyur/ kha cig gis kham blangs pa ni kha dog ser po dang / sngon po dang / dkar por 'gyur te/ kha dog cig tu
399a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa gcig pa de dag gi rin po che'i snod de dag las/ khazas kyi khyang par so so tha dad pa 'byung ba de ni de dag gi sbyin pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam
399a7(dkon brtsegs): par smin par blta ste/ gang gis sngar sbyin pa byin la phyis 'gyod par gyur pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ de'i zas kha dog ngan par grub po// gang gis sngar sbyin pa byin la phyis byams pa
399a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis snying rje bskyed de dga' bskyed par gyur pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas de'i khazas kyi bye brag kha dog bzang po rin po che lta bur snang ba grub te/ drang srong chen po khyad
399b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis de ltar las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po gzhan yang sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lha'i ris de na/ sha ri ka zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal/ yal gyi dang
399b2(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa shing brgya stong sna tshogs sdug pa sdug pa'i mthong na shel ltar dri ma med pa'i rdo leg shin du byi dor byas pa/ phun sum tshogs pa zhi
399b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing dbang po rab tu zhi ba'i thub pa 'dod chags dang bral bas bsten pa yod de/ de nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod can gyi lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshigs mi gnas so// drang srong chen po bskyed mos
399b4(dkon brtsegs): tshal dam pa'i shi ri ka de na me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa mang po las rtag tu 'alha'i gtam brjod pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // drang srong chen po de na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa'i gnas ba
399b5(dkon brtsegs): ba lang bdag bram ze'i rigs su skyed pa bsam gtan la gnas pa/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'dug go// drang srong
399b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhag bdun gyi bar du dbugs phyi nang du mi rgyu'o// drang srong chen po de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe 'dod rlung mi ldang ngo // drang srong chen po sreg pa'i bskal pa'i chu
399b7(dkon brtsegs): sa me lce gcig tu byung ba na yang de'i lus sungs 'bru tsam yang tshig par mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshigs kyis ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang tshigs so// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dpa' skabs che
399b8(dkon brtsegs): ba cher gdug pa'i shugs can rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbungs kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'jig pa/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi skam par byed pa/ gtum zhing cher gdug pa'i shugs tsam nu'i rgyal
400a1(dkon brtsegs): po de gnyis kyang dge slong ba rmang yang bdag de'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mthus gdug pa med par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gnas brtan pa yang bdag bskyed mos chal shi rigazhananas
400a2(dkon brtsegs): shing bsam gtan la 'dug par lha gzhon nu de dag dang gis mthong nas gus pa dang bcas/ ri mo dang bcas pas gnas brtan de la dga' ba dang dad pa skyes nas/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang /
400a3(dkon brtsegs): man da ra ba chen po dang / ma 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / ud pa la dang / ku mud dang / dri mchog dang / pad ma dkar pos gtor nas/ thal mo sbyar ba bya ste/ phyag 'tshal
400a4(dkon brtsegs): nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyi/ gnas pa brtan pa lang bdag la yongs su bskor te/ mchod pa chen po byas nas mdun gyis bltas te gnas nas lha'i zas bdud
400a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsi'i ro dang ldan pas tshim par byed cing ci bder byed do// gnas brtan pa lang bdag de'i lha'i bu de dag la chos ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bskrad pa'i sde dang / lung
400a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i sde dang / tshig su bcad pa'i bde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin du rgyas pa'i sde dang / rma byung ba'i chos
400a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sde dang / 'dul ba'i sde dang / mdo sde'i lung gi phyogs yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de dag dga' ba dang dad pa skyed do// de lha'i skyed mos tshal den bsam gtan la gnas te/ thams cad ba
400a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan par skyed mos tshal shi ri ka sha na brten cing gnas so// drang srong chen po gzhan yang sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris de na/ lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs shes bya ba yod de/ de'i kab brgyad
400b1(dkon brtsegs): khri bzhi stong gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po las byas pa/ tsan dan mchog shing gi spo bo bstsogs pa/ dril bu g.yer ka sgra snyan pa'i dra bas khebs par byas pa/ phyogs gser
400b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bye ma bdal ba'o// lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs lnga'i ras rab tu sbyangs pa/ rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ lha'i rol mo khong cu dang / pi bang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang /
400b3(dkon brtsegs): rnga pa ta ha dang / lcags kyi sil khrol dang / dung dang / bi bang rgyud gsum pa rab tu sgrob pa/ gzha dang / sil khrol dang / tso ci'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang ldan pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang /
400b4(dkon brtsegs): khu byug gnas shing phan tshun nas sgra 'byin pa de na lha dang lha mo de dag dga' ba dang bde ba skye ba'i bzhin gyis gnas so// drang srong chen po lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs de'i sa'i ngos nor bu rin po ches rab tu sbas pa/
400b5(dkon brtsegs): ljang khu'i byugs pas mdog snum zhing bai dUr+ya ltar dri ma med de/ me long gi ngos lta bur byas pa/ rab tu 'jam pa na spos kyi phye ma dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'thor ba/ rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu
400b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sbrul gyis nyes pa yongasu spangs pa/ ngang gis gnyid dang / snyom pa dang / le lo rnam par spangs pa/ mthongs ka dang / skar khung dang / zla gam lta bu'i dra ba'i bu ga nas reg na bde ba'i rlung stong pa rta babs
400b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / yang thog dang / yang thog chung ngu nas bde ba'i rlung gtong ba/ rin po che'i phreng ba bres pa'i sgras rtag tu mdzes par byas pa/ dri rab tu zhim pa 'byung ba'i spos dang / me tog gi sil ma 'thor ba/
400b8(dkon brtsegs): yidu 'ong ba bzhin zla ba dang nyi ma dang / me long ging kyil 'khor lta bu lha'i khyad par gyis gzugs rab tu brgyan pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gnas te/ drang srong chen po lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs de na lha'i bu mo rol
401a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ ma'i dbyangs sgra sgrogs so// lha'i dunas chos bababs de ni klu ba ni lham pa/ shin tu rnam par bye/ ngos yangs pa/ shing sngon pa dang / babyung mas mas dang / rnams dang
401a2(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyar 'khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ gser rdul 'gram pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ glu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byung ba/
401a3(dkon brtsegs): pad ma dang / shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyis mdzes par byas pa'o// lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs de ni yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad gser dang dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / sdug dang / rdo'i snying
401a4(dkon brtsegs): po las byas pa/ rin po che'i phung po yongasu bzung ba/ gser gyi snying pos kun tu khyab pa/ ri rnam pa du mas nye bar bskor cing / sna tshogs rnam par bkra bas mdzes par byas pa/ ngos
401a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mos tshal brgya stong gyis mdzes par byas pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha mya ngan dang nad kyi rnam pa'i nyes pa las grol ba dag bskyed mos tshal mchog tu dag la 'dun myong nas/ lha'i
401a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun sa chos bzangs der 'dus te/ rtse ba rjesu myong ngo // drang srong chen po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris den/ bsta na sdug ces bya ba'i gzhal med khang zla ba dang / zhi ma dang / me ma
401a7(dkon brtsegs): gis ngas sur drim med pa/ rlungab tu nam pa'i mas dang / ma hag nas mdzes par byas pa/ zeng ba dang byug pas bris pas bud med brgya myong gis mdzes par byas pa/ 'dzin zhes
401a8(dkon brtsegs): chus sun tha ba nyid byamam tham pa'i ma byang kyar lakhang pa ngas mi nyas rnas pa sna tshogs mam mchis mangs par byas pa/ nang bu'i byang chub byas pa/
401b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yer ka'i dra 'dres pas mdzes par byas pa/ rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta'i rmag pas reg na gser gyi rdul ldang ba dang / cod pan can chags shing 'byar bas mdzes par
401b2(dkon brtsegs): byas yod do// drang srong chen po blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gzhal med khang de la ka ba drug khri yod de/ ka zhu lha'i gser dang dngul dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ sna tshogs kyi 'bras rnam par
401b3(dkon brtsegs): spras pa/ shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang / a ga ru dang / bdug pa'i phreng ba dri rab tu zhim par byas pa'i khyad par can no// gzhal med khang de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnas te/
401b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bud med brgya stong gis bskur ba/ rdo rje'i mi gus lus mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i 'dod pa la rjesu myong ba/ glang po che dgu khri'i stobs dang ldan pa/ lag pa glang po che'i
401b5(dkon brtsegs): sna lta bu mdog gser dri ma med pa ltar sde ba/ lus grams pa/ ro stong seng ge 'dra ba/ rna tsa dri ma med pa 'bul bas lus snang bar byas pa/ gos mchog phra ring zhing nar pa/
401b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i brda spyod pa 'don cing bstan bcos shes shing mkhas pa/ lha'i bu brgya snang du ma rje su 'brang zhing lha'i gser gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na rgyu ba/ gser gyi skud pa dang
401b7(dkon brtsegs): se modza dang / da shal gyis brang brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/ ha cang cho ba'ang ma yin/ gtsang ring ba'ang ma yin/ rkang pa shin tu gnas pa/ bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa'i kha
401b8(dkon brtsegs): rnas na ga mthur bcos zung mong brgya mang mas thur gyis lta ba dang ldan pa/ glang po ches srung gi bu rgyags pa'i rna ba'i rlung gis sgra phyung ba to// drang srong chen po lho'i dbang
402a1(dkon brtsegs): be'i rgyal po de'i lus la rus pa med do// de'i lus la nang thams cad med de/ dri rab tu nim pa dang ldan pa/ gdangs shin tu snyan cing 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang
402a2(dkon brtsegs): snyan no// lha'i rgyal po de'i lus kyi dri'i phog na spos kyi glang po che rab tu rgyags shing 'do ba yang rgyags pa yongasu 'bri bar 'gyu ro// drang srong chen po lha'i dbang po de'i lus kyi tshad ni
402a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad tsam mo// de'i gzugs che ba gser gyi bzugs lta bu de mthong nas 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyang de'i gan du 'dong ste/ lha'i dbang po gzugs
402a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra'o zhes brjod do// de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas dpa' bo'i lus kyi tshad thos nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
402a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po dbang po che'i lus chung ngu mi rtag pa'i rjesu 'brang ba/ gar mkhan gyi cha byad lta bur shin du smras pa/ gleg shing gi las dang / shing gis las
402a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khrul 'khor gyis las lta bur byas pa/ me tog gi las lta bu yud tsam zhig mdzes pa/ me long gi nang gi bzugs brnyan lha la khyod ci ci phyir ngo mtshar du byed/ drang srong cher po khye
402a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma 'phags pa'i lus pa dang ma las skyes pa'i tshigs chags mtshams mtshams re re ma yang / dbang po chen po 'dun par 'gyur ba la ltos/ drang srong chen po gzhan yang dge
402a8(dkon brtsegs): slong ma 'gags pa'i lus la rdzu 'phrul gyi sgyu ma la da ltos/ de nas dge slong ma 'gas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
402b1(dkon brtsegs): tinge 'dzin de'i mthus dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lha'i gser 'bar ba dang / byu ru'i sdong po'i kha dog mchog dang ldan pa/ gtsug gi nor bu dang / cod phan 'phyang ba'i gtsug pud dang ldan pa/ mkhur
402b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyas shing mdangs snum pa'i mdog can/ mig lha'i ud pa la sngon po 'dra la nor bu dang / sbub dang / rdo'i snying po ldan pa'i klu'i rgyal po lta bur kun tu snang ste/ de'i gzugs chen por mngon par
402b3(dkon brtsegs): grub pa'i lha'i dri dang / gzugs kyi 'khor thams cad la snang bar byas nas/ ngo mtshar dang dga' bar 'gyur te/ dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang ldan par gyur to// de'i cho 'phrul de drang srong che
402b4(dkon brtsegs): po rgyas pas mthong nas/ snying 'phar zhing stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas rab tu ngo tshar du gyur pas/ sgra cher kye ma a la la leg so// gang gi phyir de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang
402b5(dkon brtsegs): phrad cing 'dus la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nas 'di lta bu sngon ma mthong ba'i cho 'phrul mthong ba'i mi nyid thos pa/ bdag don mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas
402b6(dkon brtsegs): ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ dbang po chen po'i lus dang / gang 'di dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus gser 'bar ba dang / nor bu
402b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog las grub pa 'di gnyis gang ba'ang / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di
402b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus de la dbang po'i lus kyis brgya'i char nye bar mi mchi/ stong gi cha 'am/ brgya stong gi cha'am/ grangs sam/ char ram/ bgrang bar ram/ dper
403a1(dkon brtsegs): yang mi bzod do// drang srong chen po bsod nams las bsgrubs pa'i lus la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa'i khyad par ni de ltar lha'o// drang srong sum cu rtsa
403a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum lha'i ris de na brgya byin gyi chung ma dam pa bde stsogs shes bya ba lha'i bu mo brgya stong gas yongasu bskor cing / dga' tshal na 'dug ste/ lus spos dang phreng ba dang / me tog gis brgyan
403a3(dkon brtsegs): cing 'bar ba/ lha'i me tob pad ma dang / ud pa la dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang ldan pa/ mchu gser dang bim pa 'dra ba/ mchog tu 'bar ba cha byad 'dzin pa/ mchog tu phra la 'tsher ba/ bskyed
403a4(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal dang / nags na rgyu ba/ lha'i rgyan dang / rkang gdub dang / gdub bu sgril ma dang / do shal dang / se mo dos lus dud pa/ 'phral ba dang / mkhur ba che la shin tu rnam par phye ba/
403a5(dkon brtsegs): nor bu dang gser shin tu rnam par phye ba'i ska rags kyis bcings pa/ 'tsho zhing sgeg pa'i rjes su chags pa/ mig ring phye ba 'dzin pa/ lag pa'i nang ri mo ring pos khyab pa/ lte ba
403a6(dkon brtsegs): zab pa/ khro ba dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa'i nyes pa spangs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer gyi rim pa g.yo ba dang bral ba/ mngal 'dzin pa'i skyon rnam par spangs pa'i lus
403a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'o// lha'i bu mo bde stsogs bya ba shin tu 'dod pa la chags pa las byung ba'i bsgegs pa/ ri ran la yod pa'i gzhal med khang dang / shing gel ba dang / 'khri shing gis bla res khebs
403a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byas pa las byung ba'i 'dod pa skyes pas byung ba me tog 'thor ba dang / bcas pa'i rlung ldang ba/ ha cang ring ba yang ma yin/ ha cang thung ba yang ma yin pa/ dku ha cang sbom pa yang ma
403b1(dkon brtsegs): yim/ ha cang zab yang ma yin/ lus ha cang sgom pa'ang ma yin/ gcang za ba yang ma yin pa/ bzhin mdangs gcang zhing mdzes pa/ pad ma 'dod pa/ dri rab tu rnam pa'i rnga'i dang rlung gis
403b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa/ rmang dbyung bas mdzes par byas so// drang srong chen pa de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha de dag ni nad med pa/ rims nad med pa/ bskyed mos tshal dang / nabs tshal dang / gnas zeng
403b3(dkon brtsegs): khang gi nang na gnas shing rgyu ba'o// de dag tshe ni lha'i lo stong thub po// de dag lnga'i gnas de na gnas pa las bsod nams zad nas tshe zad par gyur pa'i tshe/ shi 'pho ba'i ltas sngon ma byung ba lnga byung ste/
403b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzing bu shel ltar gsal ba/ reg na bde ba'i rlung ldang ba/ rdzing bu'i 'gram 'khri shing bla re dang / shing gel ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par zhugs pa na 'bru mar gyis gtor ba lta bu 'byung ngo // nges
403b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bru mar gyi gtor ba de mthong nas snying snga mas skrag ste/ rdzing bu de nas byung nas/ nags stug por rgyug cing bros so// de rings par 'gro ba lha'i bu mo de dag gis mthong nas/ phyi bzhin du 'brangs
403b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de nags stug po de'i nang na shing drung shig na gnas shing 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu mo de dag snying rje rje skad du ga chad par ngu zhing 'di skad ces dze dza bdag cag bor te gcig pu shing drung 'di
403b7(dkon brtsegs): na ci dga' zhes 'dzer to// de ngu zhing dman pa'i sgras slar 'di skad ces smraso// bdag 'di na sngon ma byung ba 'bru mar gyis gtor ba lta bu lus las byung zhes de skad smras pa dang / mchan khung gnyis
403b8(dkon brtsegs): nas rdul byung nas/ de dag gis rdul byung ba mthong ba dang / lha'i bu mo de ngag ring du dong ste yongasu spangs so// des yongs spangs par shes nas mya ngan gyi rig no/ nga mya ngan gyis reg pas dbugs
404a1(dkon brtsegs): drag du rgyu'o// dbugs rgyu ba'i rgyus lus la gdung ba skyes so// de lus dang sems gdungs pas me rton na zang sngon snying mi sring bya'ang rnyis/ phreng ba'ang yongasu rnyis/
404a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon snying mi srid pa'i gos kyang rnyisi/ lha'i gding ba bting ba'i mal ca yang dga' ba mi rnyed do// de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas kyis nyen par shes nas/ de'i dri de mi bzod de/
404a3(dkon brtsegs): ring du spangs nas snying rje rje skad ga chad par bdag la dbang med pa du'o// 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen nas rab tu ngu zhing / kyi hud lus mchog tu shin tu 'jam pa lha'i skyed mos tshal
404a4(dkon brtsegs): dang nags tshal na rgyu ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gling ni dur pa dang 'dra' ba/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs na ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ dga' tshal ne bya ka kan da ra lta bu'o// bu ni spos kyi grang
404a5(dkon brtsegs): po che 'dra ba/ shing yongasu 'du sa 'artol dang / skyed mos tshal mabung ba lta bu/ 'dres pa'i tshal na me tog gi rna brgyan lta bu/ bdag cag bor te da gar sa song / gang na gnas shes 'tsha
404a6(dkon brtsegs): cing bdag la dbang med par du'o// de bdag la dbang med par rims nad kyis btab ste/ rims nad de'i lus dang sems dkrugs nas 'dron po 'dron po mang po dang bral te/ 'brog rtsol
404a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mtshungs lam grogs gru zhig pa dang 'dra/ rgyal po yid bzhin nor bu stor ba dang mtshungs/ ri zhig pa dang 'dra bar mi rtag pa'i rlung gis gtor nas lus sa'i steng na 'gre ldog ste/
404a8(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding gis mchus klu gzhon nu zin pa dang 'dra bar/ 'dar bzhin du myur ba myur bar thal mo sbyar nas lha'i bu mo de dag la gsol ba btab pa/ tshur shog lag pa'i thal mos
404b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i lus la reg par gyis shig ces snying 'dar la gdungs bzhin du de smre sngags 'don cing gsol ba btab pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag gis bsdus nas mi nye bar grangs ste/ yan lag la reg
404b2(dkon brtsegs): lha ga la byed kyi me tog can gyi yal ga thogs te/ 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i bu de'i snying kar bzhag nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// mtho ris kyi bsod nams yong su nyams te/ dmyur du
404b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu gling du skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes de skang smras pa dang / lha'i bu de bdag lus kyis yongasu btang bar shes nas/ sde dud kye bud ces sgra cher snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing rtse me'i man
404b4(dkon brtsegs): ris lha'i gnas 'di'i lha'i yo byad dang brgyan dang skying mos tshal mchog na rtse ba rjes su myong zhing lha'i bu mo 'di dag la bdag gis sdug par bsams pa las/ da bdag 'chi ba'i dus
404b5(dkon brtsegs): la phyogs shing zhugs pa'i tshe/ de dag nye bar mi gnas shing 'di skad ces khyod 'dzam bu gling du skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes 'dzer to snyam nas/ yang dang yang du bdag gi
404b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas la lha zhing sa la 'gyel nas snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/ kye hud dga' tshal dang / 'dres tshul dang / ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa'i rdo leb dang // kyi hud lha'i 'dun
404b7(dkon brtsegs): sa chos bzangs dang / shing yongasu 'du dang / rnam par mdzes dang / dga' tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / gzhal med khang dam pa dang / sgo mang po 'di dag dang /
404b8(dkon brtsegs): lha yul pa'i lha'i gnas 'di dag bor te/ da ni mtho ris kyi gsangs nas gdon mi za bar lhung ngo // zhes skrag pa skyes nas de rang gi gnas la lha zhing kyi hud bdag gi 'dza'
405a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ bo byams pa rnams pa 'chi nyen ci phyir me ste/ 'di ltar nga ning 'khor ba'i 'brog dpon pa dgongs mal ring por chas kyis chur nag/ ngal 'khyud/ byis ngas
405a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod mi mthong ngo // kyi hud mtho ris 'di nas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu zad pas 'pho bar gyur pa'i tshe/ bdag mun pa lta bur snang ngo // ci mtho ris 'di stong ngam 'di na yang rol
405a3(dkon brtsegs): mo dang sil snyan kyang mi len tam/ de gla gi sgra yang mi grag go/ las kyi nyes pas bdag ni 'dir nyams par gyur to zhes de skad smras nas yang smre sngags 'don to// kyi hud ma
405a4(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha dang / dri zas mdzes par byas pa na/ gang mig stong pa'i bu 'gro ba dang / phyis yang de mthong bar 'gyur ba de ni bsod nams che'o// kun nas skyes pa'i me tog nga'i glad
405a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'dug pa ci'i phyir rnyings shes lha'i bu des smras pa dang / lha'i bu de sems dman pa dri ma med pa'i rna cha'i gdub bu 'gul ba thogs pa de dag thams cad me tog khyer te/
405a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing lha mo bde stsogs dang / lha mo dag phyi bzhin 'brang ba/ mi sbyin gyi bu dang / mig rgyu dang / sna tshogs rgyan dang /
405a7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug pud lnga pa dang / tum bu ru la stsogs pa lha dang dri za rnams lha'i glu dbyangs len cing 'dong pa dag gis lha lnga po des nyam thag par gyur pa mthong nas/ snying rje skyed de/
405a8(dkon brtsegs): ngaro gcig tu kyi hud mi rtag pa 'di ni rab tu drag cing mi bzang ngo zhes tshig smra'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang lha'i bu de la bltas nas tshangs pa'i glu dbyangs kyi 'di skad ces
405b1(dkon brtsegs): smras so// tshogs zla bu bdag ca thams cad kyi 'am 'a ngas me pas byed nga 'brang sa yangs zhig 'i bu dag gis dbyangs cis smras pa/ rnams
405b2(dkon brtsegs): ba byed pa'i 'jig rkyen pa'i 'jig rten dus shig ces byas pa dang / lha'i bu des bdag ni nges par 'chi yang dag sam du bsams te/ thal mo sbyar nas sgra mang po de dag la 'dzin
405b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba bcab go/ bdag ni 'chi 'pho ba'i dus la nye bar gnas kyis lha'i bu thams cad bdag la bzod par mdzod cig/ de'i cha shugs ring du byung nas lhas
405b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis byung ste/ mig pad ma'i lo ma lu bur gyur pa dang / rgya thams cad mi spang bar gyur pa'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis brgyan mi snang ba
405b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa mthong nas me tog man da ra ba dang / pad ma la stsogs pas mngon par gtor/ bi bang dang / gling bu dang / sil snyan gyi
405b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra yang byas nas/ rgyan de dag kyang lha'i bsdus par mthong nas/ 'dzam bu gling la dga' ba bskyed de/ de mchi ma zag cing ga chad par
405b7(dkon brtsegs): dus 'chi ba'i dus kyi chos rnams sbyar ma lha'i bsod rnams dang me yang su rangs cung drug sa sangs pa
406a1(dkon brtsegs): rlung dri rab tu zhim pa dang ldan pa des de'i lus la phog nas gtor te/ lha'i bu ga nas de nas shi pho bar 'gyur ro
406a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas de nas 'pho ba na lus kyi gnas mi shes so// rga/ de gnas de nas 'phos nas// mir skye ba yongs su len te/ mir skyes te
406a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma la mtshan mar lta ba de nyid glu dang / gar dang / rtse ba dang / rgod pa dang / dga' ba'i dbang por
406a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dgon pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ kha dog sna tshogs 'tsher ba'i gos 'chang bar 'gyur/ lha'i kha zas shin
406a5(dkon brtsegs): tu bzang po sred par 'gyur ro// de ma'i ma/ la na gnas pa'i tshe ma 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas bskor bar mi 'gyur/ de dri rab tu nim pa'i cha lugs la dga' bar 'gyur/
406a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyid las na yang rme lam na lha'i ngan 'askul ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po dmang ban gnas pan byin ci ma log pa'i rmilam mthang// bcas pa'i dus na
406a7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dod chags dang / sdang dang / gti mug rnam par nas bcas/ de gzugs 'azang ba bstan sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ rkang bzhin
406a8(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas pa/ shis pa'i mamal pa dang / nying lag 'brel pa/ lag pa dang rkang pa ring la sdom pa/ ra skad seng ge'i/ bu/ so thogs bzang ba/ shin tu 'jam pa'i lus/
406b1(dkon brtsegs): de gcig tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la chags par 'gyur/ 'dod chags mi bzad pa gos phra ba la dga' ba/ skyed mos tshal dga' bo// lha'i dri dang rol mo
406b2(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bar 'gyur ro// de gser dad nor thams cad 'byor pa'i rigs chen por skyes ste/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par bsdom pa la dga'
406b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod pa la shin tu chags nas/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims la dga' bar 'gyur na/ de phyis gcig nas gcig tu dbul
406b4(dkon brtsegs): tshams su bya bar 'byungaH/ se can dang / tshul khrims 'ams parnams la 'askong pa dang / yang rdza za'ang ma yin pa dang / bcang pa
406b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang ma yin pa dang / skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi chung ma la chags shing bdag gi chang ma la mi lta ba dang / rtsa lag gi skye bo la dga' ba
406b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris nas ni 'pho ba'i lhas byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
406b7(dkon brtsegs): ka' stsal nas/ drang srong chen po rgyas pa dang / drang srong chen pod dag dang / dang / mi
406b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyan mdang / dri thar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par byung // 'phags pa dag na mchog ces
407a1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes
407a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ste// 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// / 'di'i mtshon bdag gzhan dus gsu
407a3(dkon brtsegs): gsags pa'i dge ba'i mthus/ bstan pa dang rgya bstan 'dzin bu tshe ring / dge 'dun chos 'phel rgyal
407a4(dkon brtsegs): khas bde zhing skyid/ mtha' dmag byir zlogs nang 'khrugs mu ge bral/ lo legs 'gros pas don 'grub par shog/
407a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan tshe'i 'du byed stong pa'i tshe/ khor tshogs rgya mtshos bskor ba'i 'od dpag med/ migi yul du gsal bar mthong gyur/
407a6(dkon brtsegs): nas dang sog snying rjes bdag rgyud gang bar shog/ 'di nas nyin mtshams sbyar ma thag/ dag pa'i zhing kham bde ba can/ pad+mo'i snying po/
407a7(dkon brtsegs): ze 'bru la rdzus te skye ba len par shog/ gzung ting nge 'dzin la sog/ yon tan ma lus mngon gyur nas/ byos su'i sangs rgyas thaM dza la/
407a8(dkon brtsegs): bka' srung cig car nong par shog/ ye d+haHrbe dra pra b+ha la be dun te 'an tan gton dang/ te bany+tsa yon ro d+ha e la~M b+ha ti mad shA ma Na ye swA hA/ bachis
